question: I have bite size shredded rice biscuits vanilla brown sugar nuts milk butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make No-Bake Nut Cookies with 1 c .  firmly packed brown sugar , 1/2 c .  evaporated milk , 1/2 tsp .  vanilla , 1/2 c .  broken nuts (pecans) , 2 Tbsp .  butter or margarine , 3 1/2 c .  bite size shredded rice biscuits . Here's the instruction : In a heavy 2-quart saucepan , mix brown sugar , nuts , evaporated milk and butter or margarine .  Stir over medium heat until mixture bubbles all over top .  Boil and stir 5 minutes more .  Take off heat .  Stir in vanilla and cereal; mix well .  Using 2 teaspoons , drop and shape into 30 clusters on wax paper .  Let stand until firm , about 30 minutes .

question: I have cream of mushroom soup beef sour cream chicken breasts . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Jewell Ball'S Chicken with 1 small jar chipped beef , cut up , 4 boned chicken breasts , 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 1 carton sour cream . Here's the instruction : Place chipped beef on bottom of baking dish .  Place chicken on top of beef .  Mix soup and cream together; pour over chicken .  Bake , uncovered , at 275° for 3 hours .

question: I have frozen corn pepper cream cheese garlic powder butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Creamy Corn with 2 (16 oz . ) pkg .  frozen corn , 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , cubed , 1/3 c .  butter , cubed , 1/2 tsp .  garlic powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper . Here's the instruction : In a slow cooker , combine all ingredients .  Cover and cook on low for 4 hours or until heated through and cheese is melted .  Stir well before serving .  Yields 6 servings .

question: I have chicken gravy cream of mushroom soup chicken shredded cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Funny with 1 large whole chicken , 2 (10 1/2 oz . ) cans chicken gravy , 1 (10 1/2 oz . ) can cream of mushroom soup , 1 (6 oz . ) box Stove Top stuffing , 4 oz .  shredded cheese . Here's the instruction : Boil and debone chicken .  Put bite size pieces in average size square casserole dish .  Pour gravy and cream of mushroom soup over chicken; level .  Make stuffing according to instructions on box (do not make too moist) .  Put stuffing on top of chicken and gravy; level .  Sprinkle shredded cheese on top and bake at 350° for approximately 20 minutes or until golden and bubbly .

question: I have graham cracker crumbs powdered sugar peanut butter chocolate chips butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Reeses Cups(Candy)   with 1 c .  peanut butter , 3/4 c .  graham cracker crumbs , 1 c .  melted butter , 1 lb .  (3 1/2 c . ) powdered sugar , 1 large pkg .  chocolate chips . Here's the instruction : Combine first four ingredients and press in 13 x 9-inch ungreased pan .  Melt chocolate chips and spread over mixture .  Refrigerate for about 20 minutes and cut into pieces before chocolate gets hard .  Keep in refrigerator .

question: I have sour cream bacon pepper extra lean ground beef cheddar cheese green onion baking potatoes milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cheeseburger Potato Soup with 6 baking potatoes , 1 lb .  of extra lean ground beef , 2/3 c .  butter or margarine , 6 c .  milk , 3/4 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  pepper , 1 1/2 c (6 oz . ) shredded Cheddar cheese , divided , 12 sliced bacon , cooked , crumbled and divided , 4 green onion , chopped and divided , 1 (8 oz . ) carton sour cream (optional) . Here's the instruction : Wash potatoes; prick several times with a fork .  Microwave them with a wet paper towel covering the potatoes on high for 6-8 minutes .  The potatoes should be soft , ready to eat .  Let them cool enough to handle .  Cut in half lengthwise; scoop out pulp and reserve .  Discard shells .  Brown ground beef until done .  Drain any grease from the meat .  Set aside when done .  Meat will be added later .  Melt butter in a large kettle over low heat; add flour , stirring until smooth .  Cook 1 minute , stirring constantly .  Gradually add milk; cook over medium heat , stirring constantly , until thickened and bubbly .  Stir in potato , ground beef , salt , pepper , 1 cup of cheese , 2 tablespoons of green onion and 1/2 cup of bacon .  Cook until heated (do not boil) .  Stir in sour cream if desired; cook until heated (do not boil) .  Sprinkle with remaining cheese , bacon and green onions .

question: I have buttermilk egg sugar vanilla soda flour rhubarb butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Rhubarb Coffee Cake with 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  butter , 1 egg , 1 c .  buttermilk , 2 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 c .  buttermilk , 2 c .  rhubarb , finely cut , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Cream sugar and butter .  Add egg and beat well .  To creamed butter , sugar and egg , add alternately buttermilk with mixture of flour , salt and soda .  Mix well .  Add rhubarb and vanilla .  Pour into greased 9 x 13-inch pan and add Topping .

question: I have egg pepper crackers cream-style corn whole kernel corn butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Scalloped Corn with 1 can cream-style corn , 1 can whole kernel corn , 1/2 pkg .  (approximately 20) saltine crackers , crushed , 1 egg , beaten , 6 tsp .  butter , divided , pepper to taste . Here's the instruction : Mix together both cans of corn , crackers , egg , 2 teaspoons of melted butter and pepper and place in a buttered baking dish .  Dot with remaining 4 teaspoons of butter .  Bake at 350° for 1 hour .

question: I have oil tomatoes green peppers water onions worcestershire sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Nolan'S Pepper Steak with 1 1/2 lb .  round steak (1-inch thick) , cut into strips , 1 can drained tomatoes , cut up (save liquid) , 1 3/4 c .  water , 1/2 c .  onions , 1 1/2 Tbsp .  Worcestershire sauce , 2 green peppers , diced , 1/4 c .  oil . Here's the instruction : Roll steak strips in flour .  Brown in skillet .  Salt and pepper .  Combine tomato liquid , water , onions and browned steak .  Cover and simmer for one and a quarter hours .  Uncover and stir in Worcestershire sauce .  Add tomatoes , green peppers and simmer for 5 minutes .  Serve over hot cooked rice .

question: I have condensed milk lemons graham cracker crusts pecans pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Millionaire Pie with 1 large container Cool Whip , 1 large can crushed pineapple , 1 can condensed milk , 3 lemons , 1 c .  pecans , 2 graham cracker crusts . Here's the instruction : Empty Cool Whip into a bowl .  Drain juice from pineapple .  Mix Cool Whip and pineapple .  Add condensed milk .  Squeeze lemons , remove seeds and add to Cool Whip and pineapple .  Chop nuts into small pieces and add to mixture .  Stir all ingredients together and mix well .  Pour into a graham cracker crust .  Use top from crust to cover top of pie .  Chill overnight .  Makes 2 pies .

question: I have flavor gelatin dark sweet pitted cherries marshmallows ginger ale almond extract boiling water . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Double Cherry Delight with 1 (17 oz . ) can dark sweet pitted cherries , 1/2 c .  ginger ale , 1 (6 oz . ) pkg .  Jell-O cherry flavor gelatin , 2 c .  boiling water , 1/8 tsp .  almond extract , 1 c .  miniature marshmallows . Here's the instruction : Drain cherries , measuring syrup .  Cut cherries in half .  Add ginger ale and enough water to syrup to make 1 1/2 cups .  Dissolve gelatin in boiling water .  Add measured liquid and almond extract .  Chill until very thick .  Fold in marshmallows and the cherries .  Spoon into 6-cup mold .  Chill until firm , at least 4 hours or overnight .  Unmold .  Makes about 5 1/3 cups .

question: I have paraffin powdered sugar peanut butter chocolate chips butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Buckeye Candy with 1 box powdered sugar , 8 oz .  soft butter , 1 (8 oz . ) peanut butter , paraffin , 12 oz .  chocolate chips . Here's the instruction : Mix sugar , butter and peanut butter .  Roll into balls and place on cookie sheet .  Set in freezer for at least 30 minutes .  Melt chocolate chips and paraffin in double boiler .  Using a toothpick , dip balls 3/4 of way into chocolate chip and paraffin mixture to make them look like buckeyes .

question: I have flour chicken barbecue sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Quick Barbecue Wings with chicken wings (as many as you need for dinner) , flour , barbecue sauce (your choice) . Here's the instruction : Clean wings .  Flour and fry until done .  Place fried chicken wings in microwave bowl .  Stir in barbecue sauce .  Microwave on High (stir once) for 4 minutes .

question: I have sour cream tomato shredded lettuce cheddar cheese onion cream cheese taco sauce taco seasoning ground beef green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Taco Salad Chip Dip with 8 oz .  Ortega taco sauce , 8 oz .  sour cream , 8 oz .  cream cheese , 1 lb .  ground beef , 1 pkg .  taco seasoning , shredded lettuce , 1 large diced tomato , 1 medium diced onion , 1 large diced green pepper , shredded Colby or Cheddar cheese . Here's the instruction : Mix taco sauce , sour cream and cream cheese .  Spread on pizza pan .  Brown meat .  Drain off fat and add taco seasoning .  Spread over cream mixture .  Layer with raw vegetables .  Top with cheese .  Serve with chips .

question: I have condensed milk pie filling pineapple lemon juice . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pink Stuff(Frozen Dessert)   with 1 can pie filling (cherry or strawberry) , 1 can crushed pineapple , drained , 1 can sweetened condensed milk , 1 (8 oz . ) container thawed whipped topping , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients together .  Pour into a 9 x 13-inch pan .  Freeze until firm .  Allow to set out approximately 15 minutes before serving .

question: I have sugar shell water cleaned strawberries cornstarch strawberry jello salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fresh Strawberry Pie with 1 baked pie shell , 1 qt .  cleaned strawberries , 1 1/2 c .  water , 4 Tbsp .  cornstarch , 1 c .  sugar , 1/8 tsp .  salt , 4 Tbsp .  strawberry jello . Here's the instruction : Mix water , cornstarch , sugar and salt in saucepan .  Stir constantly and boil until thick and clear .  Remove from heat and stir in jello .  Set aside to cool .  But don't allow it to set .  Layer strawberries in baked crust .  Pour cooled glaze over .  Continue layering berries and glaze .  Refrigerate .  Serve with whipped cream .

question: I have chocolate fudge cake white cake wesson oil . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Easy German Chocolate Cake with 1/2 pkg .  chocolate fudge cake mix without pudding or 1 Jiffy mix , 1/2 pkg .  white cake mix without pudding or 1 Jiffy mix , 1/4 c .  Wesson oil . Here's the instruction : Mix according to directions and add oil .  Bake in 9 x 13-inch pan .

question: I have bacon vinegar sugar green onions raisins mayonnaise broccoli . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli Salad with 1 large head broccoli (about 1 1/2 lb . ) , 10 slices bacon , cooked and crumbled , 5 green onions , sliced or 1/4 c .  chopped red onion , 1/2 c .  raisins , 1 c .  mayonnaise , 2 Tbsp .  vinegar , 1/4 c .  sugar . Here's the instruction : Trim off large leaves of broccoli and remove the tough ends of lower stalks .  Wash the broccoli thoroughly .  Cut the florets and stems into bite-size pieces .  Place in a large bowl .  Add bacon , onions and raisins .  Combine remaining ingredients , stirring well .  Add dressing to broccoli mixture and toss gently .  Cover and refrigerate 2 to 3 hours .  Makes about 6 servings .

question: I have sour cream frozen strawberries strawberry pecans bananas boiling water pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Strawberry Whatever with 1 lb .  frozen strawberries in juice , 1 small can crushed pineapple , 3 ripe bananas , 1 c .  chopped pecans , 1 large pkg .  strawberry Jell-O , 1 1/2 c .  boiling water , 1 pt .  sour cream . Here's the instruction : Mix Jell-O in boiling water .  Add strawberries , pineapple , crushed bananas and nuts .  Spread 1/2 mixture in 13 x 6 1/2-inch pan .  Allow to gel in freezer 30 minutes .  Add layer of sour cream , then remaining mixture on top .  Gel and serve .

question: I have sugar shortening cinnamon soda applesauce raisins flour nuts . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Eggless Milkless Applesauce Cake with 3/4 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  shortening , 1 1/2 c .  applesauce , 3 level tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  each: cinnamon , cloves and nutmeg , 2 c .  sifted flour , 1 c .  raisins , 1 c .  nuts . Here's the instruction : Mix Crisco with applesauce , nuts and raisins .  Sift dry ingredients and add .  Mix well .  Put in a greased and floured loaf pan or tube pan .  Bake in loaf pan at 350° to 375° for 45 to 60 minutes , layer pan at 375° for 20 minutes or tube pan at 325° for 1 hour .

question: I have sugar shortening eggs soda bananas flour nuts salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Grandma Hanrath'S Banana Breadfort Collins, Colorado   with 1 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  shortening , 2 eggs (add one at a time) , 1 tsp .  salt , 2 tsp .  soda , 2 c .  flour , 1/4 c .  nuts , 2 over-ripe bananas (chopped) . Here's the instruction : Cream sugar and shortening .  Add eggs , salt and soda , then bananas and flour .  Add nuts .  Mix well .  Bake in loaf pan at 350° for 1 hour .

question: I have sour cream frango cake mix eggs chocolate fudge pudding wesson oil water . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chocolate Frango Mints with 1 pkg .  devil's food cake mix , 1 pkg .  chocolate fudge pudding mix (instant) , 8 oz .  sour cream , 3/4 c .  water , 1/2 c .  Wesson oil , 4 eggs , 6 oz .  chopped Frango mints . Here's the instruction : Mix ingredients together for 5 minutes .  Scrape bowl often .  Last fold in chocolate chip mints .  Bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes or until done (cake mix directions) .

question: I have garlic vegetable oil soy sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cuddy Farms Marinated Turkey with 2 c .  7-Up or Sprite , 1 c .  vegetable oil , 1 c .  Kikkoman soy sauce , garlic salt . Here's the instruction : Buy whole turkey breast; remove all skin and bones .  Cut into pieces about the size of your hand .  Pour marinade over turkey and refrigerate for at least 8 hours (up to 48 hours) .  The longer it marinates , the less cooking time it takes .

question: I have oil oregano sugar tomatoes tomato paste italian seasoning peppers sweet basil garlic salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Spaghetti Sauce To Can with 1/2 bushel tomatoes , 1 c .  oil , 1/4 c .  minced garlic , 6 cans tomato paste , 3 peppers (2 sweet and 1 hot) , 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  salt , 1 Tbsp .  sweet basil , 2 Tbsp .  oregano , 1 tsp .  Italian seasoning . Here's the instruction : Cook ground or chopped peppers and onions in oil for 1/2 hour .  Cook tomatoes and garlic as for juice .  Put through the mill .  (I use a food processor and do my tomatoes uncooked .  I then add the garlic right to the juice . ) Add peppers and onions to juice and remainder of ingredients .  Cook approximately 1 hour .  Put in jars and seal .  Yields 7 quarts .

question: I have egg tomato juice pepper oats onion ground beef salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Prize-Winning Meat Loaf with 1 1/2 lb .  ground beef , 1 c .  tomato juice , 3/4 c .  oats (uncooked) , 1 egg , beaten , 1/4 c .  chopped onion , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 1 1/2 tsp .  salt . Here's the instruction : Mix well .  Press firmly into an 8 1/2 x 4 1/2 x 2 1/2-inch loaf pan .  Bake in preheated moderate oven .  Bake at 350° for 1 hour .  Let stand 5 minutes before slicing .  Makes 8 servings .

question: I have beef stock ground red pepper steak bell peppers celery flour ground white pepper ground black pepper onions vegetable oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Smothered Round Steak(Servings: 4)   with 2 lb .  round steak , 1/2 tsp .  ground black pepper , 1 tsp .  ground white pepper , 1/2 c .  vegetable oil , 2 bell peppers , chopped , 1 c .  beef stock or water , 2 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  ground red pepper , all-purpose flour (dredging) , 3 medium onions , chopped , 1 celery rib , chopped . Here's the instruction : Alex Patout says , "Smothering is a multipurpose Cajun technique that works wonders with everything from game to snap beans .  It's similar to what the rest of the world knows as braising .  The ingredients are briefly browned or sauteed , then cooked with a little liquid over a low heat for a long time . "

question: I have brown sugar cooking oil onion water long mustard worcestershire sauce tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Corral Barbecued Beef Steak Strips with 2 lb .  round steak 1/2 to 3/4-inch thick , sliced in strips 1/8-inch thick (or thinner) and 3 1/2 to 4-inches long (easily sliced if partially frozen) , 2 Tbsp .  cooking oil , 1 can (15 oz . ) tomato sauce , 1/3 c .  water , 2 Tbsp .  brown sugar , 1 Tbsp .  prepared mustard , 1 tbsp .  Worcestershire sauce , 1 medium sized onion , thinly sliced . Here's the instruction : Brown strips in cooking oil .  Pour off drippings .  Combine tomato sauce , water , brown sugar , mustard and Worcestershire sauce .  Add sauce and onion to meat slices .  Cover and cook slowly , stirring occasionally 30 minutes or until meat is tender .  Serve over rice or buttered noodles .  Yields 6 to 8 servings .

question: I have condensed milk vanilla nuts unsweetened chocolate semi-sweet chocolate chips . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Easy Fudge with 1 (14 oz . ) can sweetened condensed milk , 1 (12 oz . ) pkg .  semi-sweet chocolate chips , 1 (1 oz . ) sq .  unsweetened chocolate (if desired) , 1 1/2 c .  chopped nuts (if desired) , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Butter a square pan , 8 x 8 x 2-inches .  Heat milk , chocolate chips and unsweetened chocolate over low heat , stirring constantly , until chocolate is melted and mixture is smooth .  Remove from heat .  Stir in nuts and vanilla .  Spread in pan .

question: I have tomato sour cream green peppers cheddar cheese onion salsa taco seasoning beans ground beef . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Taco-Filled Green Pepper with 1 lb .  Ground Beef , 1 pkg .  taco seasoning , 1 san Kidney beans , 1 onion , chopped , 1 C salsa , 4 green peppers , 1 medium Tomato , chopped , 1/2 C cheddar cheese , shredded , 1/2 C sour cream . Here's the instruction : In a large skillet , brown the ground beef .  Drain , stir in taco mix , kidney beans , and salsa .  Bring to a boil .  Reduce heat , and let simmer for about 5 minutes .  Cut peppers in half and clean it .  Put peppers in boiling water for 3 minutes- drain- spoon the meat mixture into the green pepper .  Put pepper in an ungreased pan .  Cover , and bake at 350 degrees for 15 to 20 minutes or until peppers are crispy and filling is heated through .  Top with tomatoes , cheese , and sour cream .

question: I have sugar milk flour yeast crisco oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make One Hour Rolls with 1 c .  milk , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 1 pkg .  dry yeast , 1 Tbsp .  salt , 3 Tbsp .  Crisco oil , 2 c .  plain flour . Here's the instruction : Put flour into a large mixing bowl .  Combine sugar , milk , salt and oil in a saucepan and heat to boiling; remove from heat and let cool to lukewarm .  Add yeast and mix well .  Pour into flour and stir .  Batter will be sticky .  Roll out batter on a floured board and cut with biscuit cutter .  Lightly brush tops with melted oleo and fold over .  Place rolls on a cookie sheet , put in a warm place and let rise for 1 hour .  Bake at 350° for about 20 minutes .  Yield: 2 1/2 dozen .

question: I have yellow apples purple grapes fresh strawberries fruit cocktail bananas red apples white grapes peaches pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Punch Bowl Fruit Salad with 2 large cans sliced peaches , 2 large cans fruit cocktail , 1 large can diced pineapple , 1 qt .  fresh strawberries , 2 red apples , 2 yellow apples , 4 large ripe bananas , 1 lb .  white grapes , 1 lb .  purple grapes . Here's the instruction : In a 6-quart punch bowl mix all of the cans of fruit , juice and all .  Clean and slice berries .  Wash and slice apples; leave peeling on apples .  Dice apples .  Slice bananas .  Wash and cut grapes in half .  Mix all together .  Nuts or other fruit may be added .

question: I have oil oregano red vinegar garlic salt chicken cutlets . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Summer Chicken with 1 pkg .  chicken cutlets , 1/2 c .  oil , 1/3 c .  red vinegar , 2 Tbsp .  oregano , 2 Tbsp .  garlic salt . Here's the instruction : Double recipe for more chicken .

question: I have cherry pie mix deluxe white cake mix butter ground nuts . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cherry Pizza with 2 cans cherry pie mix , 1 box deluxe white cake mix , 1 stick butter , 1 c .  ground nuts . Here's the instruction : Grease a 9 x 12-inch cake pan .  Spread cherry pie mix .  Sift cake mix and spread it dry over the cherries .  Top with ground nuts .  Melt butter and pour over top .  Bake 45 minutes in a 350° oven .

question: I have potatoes pepper green onions eggs cheddar cheese salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Potato And Cheese Pie with 3 eggs , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 2 c .  half and half , 3 c .  potatoes , shredded coarse , 1 c .  Cheddar cheese , coarsely shredded , 1/3 c .  green onions . Here's the instruction : Beat eggs , salt and pepper until well blended .  Stir in half and half , potatoes and onions .  Pour into well-greased 8-inch baking dish .  Bake in a 400° oven for 35 to 40 minutes , or until knife inserted in center comes out clean and potatoes are tender .  Cool on rack 5 minutes; cut into squares .  Makes 4 large servings .

question: I have tuna pimentos onion macaroni . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Tuna Macaroni Casserole with 1 box macaroni and cheese , 1 can tuna , drained , 1 small jar pimentos , 1 medium onion , chopped . Here's the instruction : Prepare macaroni and cheese as directed .  Add drained tuna , pimento and onion .  Mix .  Serve hot or cold .

question: I have mayonnaise parmesan cheese hearts . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Artichoke Dip with 2 cans or jars artichoke hearts , 1 c .  mayonnaise , 1 c .  Parmesan cheese . Here's the instruction : Drain artichokes and chop .  Mix with mayonnaise and Parmesan cheese .  After well mixed , bake , uncovered , for 20 to 30 minutes at 350° .  Serve with crackers .

question: I have sour cream cheddar cheese broccoli vegetable soup mix . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli Dip For Crackers with 16 oz .  sour cream , 1 pkg .  dry vegetable soup mix , 10 oz .  pkg .  frozen chopped broccoli , thawed and drained , 4 to 6 oz .  Cheddar cheese , grated . Here's the instruction : Mix together sour cream , soup mix , broccoli and half of cheese .  Sprinkle remaining cheese on top .  Bake at 350° for 30 minutes , uncovered .  Serve hot with vegetable crackers .

question: I have salad supreme italian dressing . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Summer Spaghetti with 1 lb .  very thin spaghetti , 1/2 bottle McCormick Salad Supreme (seasoning) , 1 bottle Zesty Italian dressing . Here's the instruction : Prepare spaghetti per package .  Drain .  Melt a little butter through it .  Marinate overnight in Salad Supreme and Zesty Italian dressing .  Just before serving , add cucumbers , tomatoes , green peppers , mushrooms , olives or whatever your taste may want .

question: I have lemon yogurt lime gelatin pear halves cream cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pear-Lime Salad with 1 (16 oz . ) can pear halves , undrained , 1 (3 oz . ) pkg .  lime gelatin , 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , softened , 1 (8 oz . ) carton lemon yogurt . Here's the instruction : Drain pears , reserving juice .  Bring juice to a boil , stirring constantly .  Remove from heat .  Add gelatin , stirring until dissolved .  Let cool slightly .  Coarsely chop pear halves .  Combine cream cheese and yogurt; beat at medium speed of electric mixer until smooth .  Add gelatin and beat well .  Stir in pears .  Pour into an oiled 4-cup mold or Pyrex dish .  Chill .

question: I have oil sugar oil of cinnamon apple vinegar watermelon rind . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Watermelon Rind Pickles with 7 lb .  watermelon rind , 7 c .  sugar , 2 c .  apple vinegar , 1/2 tsp .  oil of cloves , 1/2 tsp .  oil of cinnamon . Here's the instruction : Trim off green and pink parts of watermelon rind; cut to 1-inch cubes .  Parboil until tender , but not soft .  Drain .  Combine sugar , vinegar , oil of cloves and oil of cinnamon; bring to boiling and pour over rind .  Let stand overnight .  In the morning , drain off syrup .  Heat and put over rind .  The third morning , heat rind and syrup; seal in hot , sterilized jars .  Makes 8 pints .  (Oil of cinnamon and clove keeps rind clear and transparent . )

question: I have potatoes peas corn sugar tomatoes macaroni black pepper butter beans english peas onions tomato juice chicken salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Stew with 3 lb .  chicken , boiled , 4 medium potatoes , diced , 2 medium onions , chopped , 1 (16 oz . ) can creamed corn , 1 (16 oz . ) can English peas , 1 (16 oz . ) can field peas , 1 (16 oz . ) can butter beans , 1 (16 oz . ) can tomatoes , 1 (46 oz . ) can tomato juice , 1 small box macaroni , 1 Tbsp .  black pepper , 1 Tbsp .  salt , 1 Tbsp .  sugar . Here's the instruction : Remove chicken from bone .  Use the broth .  Mix the vegetables and macaroni .  Add sugar , salt and black pepper .  Cook until all vegetables are tender over medium heat .

question: I have egg baking powder sugar vanilla brown sugar cinnamon flour milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Quick Coffee Cake(6 Servings)   with 3 Tbsp .  softened butter or margarine , 1/2 c .  granulated sugar , 1 egg , 1 c .  flour , 1 1/4 tsp .  baking powder , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1/3 c .  milk , 1/4 tsp .  vanilla , 1/3 c .  brown sugar , packed , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 2 Tbsp .  butter or margarine . Here's the instruction : Mix 3 tablespoons fat with granulated sugar .  Add egg and beat until creamy .  Mix flour , baking powder and salt thoroughly .  Add to sugar mixture alternately with milk .  Add vanilla .  Spread batter evenly in a greased 8-inch square baking pan .  Mix brown sugar and cinnamon and sprinkle over batter .  Dot with 2 tablespoons fat .  Bake at 350° (moderate oven) for 25 to 30 minutes .

question: I have buttermilk baking powder sugar warm water soda flour margarine yeast . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Angel Biscuits with 5 c .  flour , 3 Tbsp .  sugar , 4 tsp .  baking powder , 1 1/2 pkg .  dry yeast , 2 c .  buttermilk , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 1/2 sticks margarine , 1/2 c .  warm water . Here's the instruction : Mix flour , sugar , baking powder , soda and salt together .  Cut in margarine , dissolve yeast in warm water .  Stir into buttermilk and add to dry mixture .  Cover and chill .

question: I have peppermint candy margarine crescent rolls marshmallows . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Quick Peppermint Puffs with 8 marshmallows , 2 Tbsp .  margarine , melted , 1/4 c .  crushed peppermint candy , 1 can crescent rolls . Here's the instruction : Dip marshmallows in melted margarine; roll in candy .  Wrap a crescent triangle around each marshmallow , completely covering the marshmallow and square edges of dough tightly to seal .  Dip in margarine and place in a greased muffin tin .  Bake at 375° for 10 to 15 minutes; remove from pan .

question: I have brown sugar eggs water nuts yellow cake mix butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fruit Pizza with 1 box yellow cake mix , 1/4 c .  water , 1/4 c .  brown sugar , 1/2 c .  soft butter , 2 eggs , 1/2 c .  chopped nuts . Here's the instruction : Mix ingredients and spread into 2 greased pizza pans .  Bake at 350° for 15-20 minutes .

question: I have oleo sugar chocolate syrup eggs flour . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chocolate Mint Bars with 1 c .  flour , 1 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  oleo , softened , 4 eggs , 1 can chocolate syrup . Here's the instruction : Mix together and bake in 9 x 13-inch pan at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes .  Top should spring back when touched lightly; do not overbake .  Cool completely , then spread with mint layer .

question: I have flour sugar beer . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Beer Bread with 3 c .  self rising flour , 1 - 12 oz .  can beer , 1 Tbsp .  sugar . Here's the instruction : Stir the ingredients together and put in a greased and floured loaf pan .  Bake at 425 degrees for 50 minutes .  Drizzle melted butter on top .

question: I have curry powder onion mushrooms celery flour margarine cream of celery soup broccoli cheese chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Divan with 1/4 c .  margarine , 1/4 c .  chopped onion (or as much as you want) , chopped celery to taste , 1/4 c .  flour , 1/8 tsp .  curry powder , 1 can sliced mushrooms (save juice) , 1 can cream of celery soup , 1 pkg .  chopped broccoli , 1 cubed chicken , shredded Monterey Jack cheese . Here's the instruction : Melt margarine in skillet; saute onions and celery .  Remove from heat .  Stir in flour and curry powder .  Drain mushrooms and keep juice .  Add water to juice to make 1/2 cup liquid .  Stir liquid and soup into flour mixture; add mushrooms .  Cook until thick .  Arrange broccoli and cubed chicken in a large baking dish .  Spoon sauce over chicken .  Top with grated cheese .  Bake in a 350° oven for about 20 minutes or in microwave until cheese is melted .

question: I have egg yolks sugar baking powder vanilla flour multi-colored candies butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mexican Cookie Rings with 1 1/2 c .  sifted flour , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 c .  butter , 2/3 c .  sugar , 3 egg yolks , 1 tsp .  vanilla , multi-colored candies . Here's the instruction : Sift flour , baking powder and salt together .  Cream together butter and sugar .  Add egg yolks and vanilla .  Beat until light and fluffy .  Mix in sifted dry ingredients .  Shape into 1-inch balls .  Push wooden spoon handle through center (twist) .  Shape into rings .  Dip each cookie into candies .  Place on lightly greased baking sheets .  Bake in 375° oven for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown .  Cool on racks .  Serves 2 dozen .

question: I have sugar vanilla shortening baking soda eggs water flour cocoa milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Moist Devil'S Food Cake with 2 c .  sifted flour , 1 1/2 tsp .  baking soda , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1/2 c .  shortening , 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 2 eggs , separated , 1/2 c .  cocoa , water , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  milk . question: I have apple sugar cranberries orange gelatin nuts orange . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oil egg baking powder sugar powdered sugar soda flour milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar jars junior baby food apricot jello cream cheese water milk pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make *Apricot Salad with 1 large pkg .  apricot jello (6 oz . ) , 2/3 c .  sugar , 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , 2 jars Junior baby food apricots , 1 (No .  2) can crushed pineapple (20 oz . ) , 1 tall can evaporated milk , chilled and whipped , 2/3 c .  water . question: I have sweet milk baking powder sugar vanilla eggs flour margarine butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have potatoes bacon sugar pepper green onions water flour cider vinegar salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have tomatoes frozen artichoke parmesan cheese green onion fresh mushrooms water margarine garlic zucchini . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Zucchini-Artichoke Continental with 1 (9 oz . ) pkg .  frozen artichoke hearts , 2 Tbsp .  water , 3 medium zucchini (1 lb . ) , sliced 1/4-inch thick (4 c . ) , 2 c .  fresh mushrooms , halved , 2 Tbsp .  finely chopped green onion , 2 cloves garlic , minced , 1 Tbsp .  margarine or butter , 2 medium tomatoes , cut into wedges and seeded , 1/4 c .  grated Parmesan cheese . question: I have sugar eggs water flour butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make St. Joseph'S Zeppole with 1 c .  water , 1/2 c .  butter , 1 tsp .  sugar , 1 c .  all-purpose flour , 4 large eggs . Here's the instruction : Combine water , butter , sugar and salt in saucepan and bring to a boil . question: I have beef stock bay leaf black pepper garlic salt onions chicken stock butter worcestershire sauce salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have bisquick beef hash mustard salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Corned Beef Hash Swirls with Bisquick , can corned beef hash , mustard , salt and pepper to taste . Here's the instruction : Make dough according to Bisquick directions on box .  Roll out until about 1 inch thick .  (Shape , as you roll out into an oblong shape . ) Thinly spread with a knife , mustard on top of dough .  Then , salt and pepper lightly or to taste .  Spread corned beef hash on top of the mustard , salt and pepper .  Then , lengthwise , roll up securely and pan freeze .  When frozen , take out and with a sharp knife , cut roll into 3/4 to 1 inch slices .  Bake in moderate oven at approximately 350° for 15 or 20 minutes or freeze , individually and reheat frozen for a longer period of time .  Whether you serve right away or serve after being frozen , pour on top either a cream cheese sauce or a sauce made of 1 can of cream of celery soup , adding a little water .  A good lunch!!

Here's the instruction : These pancakes are as big as a dinner plate and formerly even bigger (12-inches in diameter!) .  Nowadays you may find such big pancakes on the menu of a restaurant , but at home , we make them the dinner plate size .  They are either eaten as a savory (with smoked sausage or bacon) or as a sweet (plain with molasses or golden syrup or with apples) .  Pancakes are best when made with yeast and they should be served piping hot .  Use two skillets when available .  Keep the pancakes hot on steam , or covered in the oven .  Cold pancakes are awful! Here's the instruction : Brown meat and cook until tender , 2 to 2 1/2 hours .  Add mushroom and onions .  Cook until onions are done .  Add 6 to 8 cups water , soy sauce and vegetables .  Thicken with cornstarch in a mixture of 1/2 water and 1/2 soy sauce .  Serve over rice or noodles .

question: I have mayonnaise crescent rolls vegetables cream cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Vegetable Pizza with 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  crescent rolls , 2 (8 oz .  each) pkg .  cream cheese , softened , 1 c .  mayonnaise , 1/2 (10 oz . ) pkg .  Hidden Valley Ranch mix , 4 c .  finely chopped raw vegetables (cauliflower , broccoli , carrots , green onions , etc . ) . Here's the instruction : Press crescent rolls flat on baking sheet . question: I have margarine cinnamon sugar white . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Log Cabin Toast with 1/4 c .  sugar , 2 tsp .  cinnamon , 2 slices white or whole wheat bread , soft margarine or butter . Here's the instruction : Mix sugar and cinnamon in custard cup .  Toast bread .  Spread with soft margarine .  Sprinkle with sugar-cinnamon mixture .  Cut each slice of toast into 4 strips . question: I have oleo sugar eggs water flour yeast salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have white onion tomato soup celery hamburger green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have celery pork sausage noodle soup onions almonds white minute rice green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oleo sugar vanilla oats peanut butter cocoa milk . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have brown sugar cinnamon crust flour butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Belly Buttons with 1 box crust mix , flour , butter or margarine , softened , brown sugar , cinnamon . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 400° .  Follow directions for pie crust mix .  Roll out pie crust on a flat , floured surface .  Butter crust with butter or margarine .  Sprinkle on brown sugar until it covers pie crust , then sprinkle cinnamon over brown sugar .  Roll crust like a long , thin cinnamon roll .  Cut sections 1-inch thick .  Place sections on a buttered 13 x 9-inch casserole dish in an upright position so that the swirls are showing on both sides .  Bake 15 minutes .  Let cool 3 minutes and enjoy .

question: I have bacon eggs swiss mayonnaise cornbread mix cream-style . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have pepper onion basil carrots parsley packets instant chicken broth garlic zucchini . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Favorite Vegetable Soup(Low-Fat)   with 1/4 c .  diced onion , 2 packets instant chicken broth and seasoning mix , 2 garlic cloves , minced , 1 1/2 c .  thinly sliced zucchini , 1/2 c .  each thinly sliced carrots and chopped seeded tomato , 1 tsp .  chopped fresh parsley , 1/4 tsp .  basil leaves , 1/8 tsp .  pepper . Here's the instruction : In 1 1/2-quart nonstick saucepan , combine onion , broth mix and garlic; cook , stirring occasionally , until onion is translucent . question: I have whole wheat flour water . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Raw Gluten with 2 lb .  whole wheat flour , 1 qt .  water . Here's the instruction : Mix whole wheat flour with water into a firm texture .  Make sure all flour is mixed well (medium to firm dough) .  Let set for 45 minutes (no less) .  Put dough in a colander and while running cold water , continually squeeze dough to wash out starch from mixture .  Continue to squeeze dough , while at the same time , making sure dough stays firmly together .  Keep rinsing until all graininess is removed and water is clear from rinsing .  Cover with water until ready to use .  Yield: 1 pound .

question: I have greens bacon grease baking soda salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Turnip Greens with 1 bucket turnip greens , 1 c .  bacon grease , 1 Tbsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  baking soda . Here's the instruction : Wash greens in cold water to remove grit or any dirt .  In a large pot filled 3/4 full of water , add the bacon grease and salt .  Bring to a boil .  Add the greens by the handful to the pot , letting them have a little time to start to cook down before adding more .  When pot is full , you will need to poke the greens down for a few minutes as they like to come to the top of the pot and run over .  Add 1/4 teaspoon of baking soda to the greens to take the bitterness out .  Cook at a boil until greens are tender , perhaps a half hour .  Drain well .  While greens are draining in the colander , cut them up using two knives .

question: I have semi-sweet chocolate pecan confectioners sugar bourbon butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Bourbon Balls with 1/2 c .  (1 stick) butter , 1 lb .  (1 box) 10x confectioners sugar , 4 1/2 tsp .  100 proof bourbon , 8 sq .  (1 oz .  each) semi-sweet chocolate , broken into pieces , 36 pecan halves . Here's the instruction : Beat butter in medium-size bowl until light and fluffy .  Beat in gradually 10x confectioners sugar .  Slowly beat in bourbon .  Chill 1 hour or until mixture is stiff enough to shape .  Roll into 1-inch balls .  Arrange in single layer on wax paper-lined tray .  Chill 1 hour .  Melt chocolate in top of double boiler over simmering water .  Remove chocolate from heat; cool until a good dipping consistency .  Dip bourbon balls with 3-pronged fork halfway into chocolate .  Return to wax paper-lined tray .  Place pecan half on top of each ball .  When all the bourbon balls have been dipped , return tray to refrigerator .  Chill about 30 minutes or until firm .  Makes about 3 dozen .

question: I have sugar beans ground ginger melted meat drippings salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pinto Beans with 1 1/2 c .  dry beans , 3/4 tsp .  ground ginger , 3 Tbsp .  melted meat drippings , 1 1/2 tsp .  salt or to taste , 1 heaping Tbsp .  sugar . Cook until beans have swollen and turned color , about 1 hour .  Add grease and salt and continue to cook , keeping water about 1-inch above beans at all times .  When beans begin to get tender , add sugar and cook until very tender .

question: I have sugar egg whites nuts coconut chocolate chips cream of tartar salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cook While You Sleep Cookies with 2 egg whites , pinch of salt , 1 c .  chocolate chips , 1/4 tsp .  cream of tartar , 2/3 c .  sugar , 1 c .  chopped nuts , coconut (optional) . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Beat egg whites until foamy; add salt and cream of tartar .  Beat until stiff . Put in the oven and turn off oven immediately .  Do not open the door for at least 8 hours .  Carefully remove cookies from foil .  Makes 40 to 50 cookies .

question: I have egg pepper macaroni cheddar cheese milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have condensed milk pecans butterscotch chips margarine coconut graham crackers chocolate chips . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have pepper cheddar cheese flour milk elbow macaroni butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have egg baking powder sugar vanilla nutmeg cinnamon blueberries flour butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sweet milk vanilla flavoring sugar shortening eggs flour . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sour cream bread onion parsley flakes mayonnaise corned beef monde dill weed . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have black pepper white pepper onion basil spanish paprika red potatoes garlic butter red cayenne pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Spicy Home Fried Potatoes with 4 medium red potatoes , 1 medium onion , chopped , 1/2 stick butter , red cayenne pepper , white pepper , black pepper , garlic powder , basil , Spanish paprika , salt . question: I have sugar vanilla baking powder shortening eggs soda corn flakes dates flour cherries milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla cocoa milk butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oil tomato pepper soy sauce garlic onion water green beans rice beef salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Beef And Green Beans with 1 lb .  beef , 1 lb .  green beans (French-cut) , 3 cloves garlic , pressed , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 Tbsp .  soy sauce , 1 onion , quartered , 1 Tbsp .  pepper (black) , hot cooked rice , 1 Tbsp .  oil , 1/2 c .  water , 1 tomato , quartered . question: I have egg sugar salt shortening nutmeg baking soda cinnamon cloves raisins flour nuts persimmon pulp . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Persimmon Cookies with 1 c .  persimmon pulp , 1/2 c .  shortening , 1 c .  sugar , 1 egg , beaten , 2 c .  flour , 1 c .  chopped nuts , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 tsp .  cloves , 1/2 tsp .  nutmeg , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 1 c .  raisins or chocolate chips or butterscotch chips . question: I have apple shortening brown sugar molasses eggs baking soda ground cloves raisins ground nutmeg flour nuts ground cinnamon salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oil baking powder sugar eggs cloves cinnamon flour walnuts junior jars baby carrots . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have celery salt bell pepper eggs garlic onion thyme white bread ground meat butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cornbread Dressing with 1 pan of your favorite cornbread , 6 slices of white bread , 1/2 lb .  ground meat , 1 stick butter , 1 large onion , chopped , 6 cloves (small) garlic , minced , 1 small bell pepper , chopped , 1 tsp .  thyme , 1 tsp .  celery salt , 2 eggs , slightly beaten , salt and pepper to taste . question: I have liquid hot pepper sauce mullet onions black-eyed peas cider vinegar garlic green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have chili powder peanuts beef broth . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chilled Peanut Soup with 3/4 c .  roasted peanuts , 3 (10 1/2 oz . ) cans beef broth , 1 1/2 c .  half and half , 3/4 tsp .  chili powder . question: I have cabbage parmesan cheese onion powder garlic powder parsley rice ground beef tomato sauce sauerkraut salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cabbage Rolls with 3 lb .  ground beef , 2 c .  rice , uncooked (I precook 5 minutes) , 3 tsp .  onion powder or 1 large onion , 1 tsp .  garlic powder , 3 tsp .  salt , 2 Tbsp .  parsley , 2/3 c . question: I have cream of mushroom soup onion margarine broccoli rice . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli Rice Casserole with 1 (16 oz . ) pkg .  frozen , chopped broccoli , 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 1 1/2 c .  Minute rice (uncooked) , 1 (8 oz . ) jar Cheez Whiz , 1 stick (1/2 c . ) margarine , 1/2 c .  chopped onion . Here's the instruction : Cook broccoli 6 to 8 minutes on High or until done .  Set aside .  In a large mixing bowl , combine soup , rice , cheese and margarine . 	Cook for 5 to 7 minutes or until cheese melts and can be blended easily . 	To cheese mixture, add onion and broccoli; stir thoroughly .  Pour into an 8-inch dish (Pyrex) .  Cook on High for 10 to 12 minutes, rotating dish 1/4	turn after 5 minutes . question: I have pasta of your choice chicken breasts tomatoes italian seasoning parmesan cheese mushrooms onion olives garlic butter olive oil . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have cake mix eggs mandarin oranges cooking oil . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have marshmallows orange segments topping orange flavor coconut boiling water pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Ambrosia Mold with 1 can (8 oz . ) crushed pineapple in juice , undrained , 2 c .  boiling water , 1 pkg .  (8 oz .  serving size) orange flavor gelatin , 1 3/4 c .  thawed Cool Whip whipped topping , 1 can (11 oz . ) mandarin orange segments , drained , 1 1/2 c .  miniature marshmallows , 1/2 c .  coconut (optional) . Here's the instruction : Drain pineapple , reserving liquid .  Add cold water to liquid to measure 1 cup .  Stir boiling water into gelatin in large bowl 2 minutes or until completely dissolved .  Stir in measured liquid .  Refrigerate 1 1/4 hours or until slightly thickened (consistency of unbeaten egg white) .  Stir in whipped topping with wire whisk until smooth . question: I have unflavored gelatin sugar lemon juice lemon rind water egg whites walnuts cranberry sauce mandarin oranges salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cranberry Souffle with 2 envelopes unflavored gelatin , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1 c .  water , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1 tsp .  grated lemon rind , 3 egg whites , 1/4 c .  sugar , 1 can whole cranberry sauce , 1/4 c .  chopped walnuts , 1 large or 2 small cans mandarin oranges . Here's the instruction : Mix gelatin and salt thoroughly in small pan .  Add water and stir constantly over medium-low heat until gelatin is dissolved .  Remove from heat and stir in lemon juice and rind .  Chill in refrigerator .  While gelatin is chilling , beat egg whites , gradually adding sugar and beating after each addition .  Set aside .  Remove chilled gelatin from fridge and beat it up a little until fluffy if too firm .  Add cranberry sauce , then fold the mixture into the egg whites .  Add oranges and nuts .  Pour into a lightly greased mold and chill thoroughly .  When ready to serve , dip mold in warm water and invert on plate .

question: I have vanilla extract marshmallows brown sugar sweet potatoes bourbon butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have philadelphia cream cheese bacon mushrooms salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have green chilies eggs cheddar cheese swiss cheese cheese milk . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar marshmallows raspberry yellow cake mix rhubarb . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Rhubarb Cake with 5 c .  rhubarb , cut in small pieces , 1 (3 oz . ) pkg .  raspberry Jell-O , 1 c .  sugar , 3 c .  miniature whole marshmallows , 1 pkg .  yellow cake mix , prepared according to directions . question: I have crackers milk chocolate brown sugar nuts margarine . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have egg baking powder sugar vanilla honey milk peaches boiling water butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have american cheese eggs water stove top chicken stuffing mixed vegetables ground turkey barbecue sauce butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Barbecue Turkey Loaf with 2 c .  Stove Top chicken stuffing , 1 c .  frozen mixed vegetables , thawed , 1/2 c .  water , 1 Tbsp .  butter , melted , 1/2 c .  barbecue sauce , 2 slices American cheese , halved , 1 lb .  ground turkey , 2 eggs . question: I have tomato soup hamburger onion macaroni . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hamburger And Macaroni Casserole with 1 lb .  hamburger , 1 small onion , diced , 1 c .  macaroni , 2 cans tomato soup . Here's the instruction : Brown hamburger and onion . question: I have bread flour egg sugar salt very warm water butter active dry yeast . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make One-Rise Monkey Bread with 3 to 3 1/2 c .  unsifted all-purpose or bread flour , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 pkg .  active dry yeast , 1 c .  very warm water (120~ to 130~) , 2 Tbsp .  butter or margarine , softened , 1 egg , 1/3 c .  butter or margarine , poppy seed (optional) . Here's the instruction : Grease a 12-cup fluted tube pan or a 10-inch tube pan .  In large bowl blend 1 1/2 cups flour , sugar , salt , yeast , water , margarine and egg at low speed until moistened .  Beat three minutes at medium speed .  Stir in remaining flour by hand .  Knead dough on floured surface until smooth , about 1 minute .  Press or roll dough to 15 x 12-inch rectangle . Dip each piece of dough in melted butter and place in prepared pan , making layers .  Sprinkle each layer with poppy seeds .  Cover; let rise in warm place until light and doubled in size , 45 to 60 minutes .  Heat oven to 375° .  Bake 20 to 25 minutes .  Cool in pan 2 minutes .  Invert into serving pan .  Makes a 10-inch pull apart loaf .

question: I have cooking oats nutmeg brown sugar cinnamon flour apples butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar eggs celery sweet relish salad dressing chives salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sour cream frozen raspberries raspberry cream cheese water cranberry sauce salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oleo sugar warm milk eggs flour yeast salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sour cream sugar vanilla water cold water milk jello gelatine . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Ribbon Layer Jello with 4 (3 oz . ) pkg .  jello , make each pkg .  separately , 1 c .  hot water for each pkg .  jello , 1/2 c .  cold water for each pkg .  jello , 2 pkg .  Knox gelatine , 2 c .  milk , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  sugar , 1 pt .  sour cream . Here's the instruction : Dissolve Knox gelatine in 1/2 cup cold water; put aside .  Bring to a boil , milk and sugar .  Add gelatine mixture , sour cream and vanilla .  Beat until thick , about 10 minutes , with electric mixer .  Separate this into 3 parts .  Layer jello in desired order .  (Red on top for Christmas or green on top for St .  Pat's day .  Christmas layers are green , white mixture , orange white mixture , yellow white mixture and red . ) Let each layer set 45 minutes before adding next layer .  Mix each jello separate before making layers .  Time consuming but very decorative .

question: I have pepper butter parmesan cheese mushrooms shallots fettucini chicken chicken bouillon cubes whipping cream . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Fettucini with 1 c .  butter , 4 chicken bouillon cubes , 8 shallots , chopped , 1 c .  whipping cream , 1/4 lb .  mushrooms , sliced , pepper , 1 c .  Parmesan cheese , 1 lb .  fettucini , cooked and drained , 1 chicken , cooked , deboned and sliced or chopped . Here's the instruction : In double boiler , melt butter with bouillon cubes .  Mix in shallots , cream , mushrooms , pepper and Parmesan cheese .  Simmer until mushrooms are soft and cheese is melted .  Add cooked chicken; heat until warm .  Pour sauce over noodles , tossing gently .  Garnish with additional Parmesan cheese and parsley .

question: I have apricots apple ginger eggs brown sugar cinnamon cardamom cilantro cloves raisins flour walnuts allspice salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make "Spicy" Cake with 4 eggs , 1 3/4 c .  brown sugar , salt , 1 Tbsp .  allspice , 1 Tbsp .  cinnamon , 1 tsp .  cardamom , 1 tsp .  cilantro , 1 tsp .  ginger , 1/2 tsp .  cloves , 1/2 c .  walnuts , 1/2 c .  raisins , 1/2 c .  dried apricots , 1 apple , 2 1/2 c .  wheat flour . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Cut nuts and fruits into pieces .  Add flour to it .

question: I have sugar baking powder lemon juice eggs cream cheese flour margarine lemon chips . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lemon Chip Cookies with 2 c .  flour , 1/2 c .  sugar , 3 oz .  cream cheese , 1/2 c .  margarine , 4 eggs , 1 c .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/3 c .  lemon juice , 1/4 c .  flour , 1 c .  lemon chips . Here's the instruction : Mix first 4 ingredients .  Pack in 9 x 13-inch pan .  Bake 15 to 20 minutes at 350° .  Mix last 6 ingredients .  Pour on top of baked bottom .  Bake at 350° for 25 minutes .  Cool; cut in squares .

question: I have unbaked pie crust sugar vanilla eggs flour margarine pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pineapple Pie with 1 c .  sugar , 1 Tbsp .  plain flour , 3 eggs , separated , 1 (8 oz . ) can crushed pineapple , 1 tsp .  vanilla , margarine (size of walnut) , unbaked pie crust , 3 Tbsp .  sugar . Here's the instruction : Sift sugar and flour together .  Mix all ingredients together; pour into raw crust .  Bake 40 minutes or until thickened in 300° oven .  Beat egg whites .  Add 3 tablespoons sugar and beat until stiff .  Spread over pie and brown .

question: I have sugar baking powder salt eggs cinnamon cloves soda flour margarine milk persimmon pulp . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Persimmon Pudding with 2 c .  persimmon pulp , 2 c .  sugar or less , 2 eggs , 1 c .  milk or cream , 1 1/2 to 2 c .  flour , 2 tsp .  cinnamon , pinch of cloves , pinch of salt , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 stick margarine . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 325° .  Melt margarine in large rectangular pan .  Mix all ingredients together; add melted margarine .  Mix .  Pour batter into pan margarine was in .  Bake one hour at 325° .

question: I have egg sugar crisco vinegar water flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pie Crust with 4 c .  flour , 1 3/4 c .  Crisco , 1 Tbsp .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 egg , 1 Tbsp .  vinegar , 1/2 c .  ice water . Here's the instruction : Mix dry ingredients (flour , sugar and salt) .  Add Crisco .  Add and mix egg , vinegar and ice water .  Makes 2 double crusts .

question: I have oil corn baking powder eggs cheddar cheese crawfish tails onions cornmeal jalapeno peppers salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cajun Crawfish Cornbread with 2 c .  cornmeal , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 6 eggs , 2 medium onions , 16 oz .  Cheddar cheese , 2/3 c .  oil , 2 cans creamed corn , 2 lb .  crawfish tails , 1/2 c .  jalapeno peppers . Here's the instruction : In bowl , combine cornmeal , salt and soda .  In medium bowl , beat eggs; chop onions and jalapeno peppers .  Grate cheese and add beaten eggs , onions , peppers , cheese , oil , corn and crawfish tails .  Combine this mixture with cornmeal mix and mix well .  Pour into greased 12 x 14-inch baking dish .  Bake at 375° for 55 minutes or until golden brown .

question: I have egg substitute sugar baking powder vanilla extract baking soda nonfat yogurt bananas flour cereal nuggets . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fat-Free Banana Crunch Muffins with 1 c .  all-purpose flour , 1/2 c .  wheat and barley cereal nuggets , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  baking soda , 2 medium-size ripe bananas , mashed (about 1 c . ) , 1/2 c .  plain nonfat yogurt , 1/4 c .  thawed frozen no-cholesterol egg substitute , 1/2 tsp .  vanilla extract . Here's the instruction : About 40 minutes before serving or early in the day: Preheat oven to 350° .  Spray 24 mini muffin pan cups (1 3/4 x 1-inch) with nonstick cooking spray .  In medium bowl , mix first 6 ingredients .  In large bowl with wire whisk or fork , mix bananas , yogurt , egg substitute and vanilla; stir in flour mixture just until moistened .  Spoon batter into muffin pan cups .  Bake muffins 20 minutes or until tops are golden and toothpick inserted in center of muffins comes out clean .  Remove from muffin pan cups to wire racks .  Serve muffins warm or let cool on wire racks to serve later .  Makes 24 muffins .  Each muffin contains 55 calories , 0 g fat , 0 mg cholesterol and 65 mg sodium .  Calories from fat: 0% .

question: I have kidney beans salt chili seasoning chili powder water ground beef yellow onions tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chili Con Carne with 3 lb .  ground beef , 2 yellow onions , 2 cans tomato sauce , 2 to 3 c .  water , 3 cans kidney beans , 5 Tbsp .  chili powder , 1 pkg .  chili seasoning , salt , Tabasco and red pepper to taste . Here's the instruction : Brown onions and meat; drain .  Add other ingredients; simmer .  It's ready when you're ready , but even better the second day .

question: I have spaghetti cream of mushroom soup onion hamburger green pepper tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Spaghetti Casserole with 1 small pkg .  spaghetti , 1 lb .  hamburger , 1 onion , 1 green pepper , 2 cans tomato sauce , 1 small jar Ragu sauce (no meat) , 1 can cream of mushroom soup . Here's the instruction : Brown hamburger , onion and pepper in skillet and drain .  Mix all the ingredients together in 9 x 13-inch dish .  Sprinkle top with grated Cheddar cheese .  Bake for 30 minutes at 350° .

question: I have sweet milk sugar eggs cold butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cold Bread Pudding with cold biscuits (crumbled) , sweet milk (for soaking) , 1 Tbsp .  butter (cut into pieces) , 4 eggs , beaten , 2 cups sugar . Here's the instruction : One mixing bowl of crumbled up cold biscuits soaked in sweet milk .  Add butter , sugar and eggs .  Spray your pan with Pam , pour in mixture .  Bake at 375° until done .  About 1 hour .

question: I have persimmons sugar vanilla lemon juice nutmeg baking soda eggs cinnamon cloves raisins flour nuts butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Persimmon Cake with 3 c .  persimmons , cut in chunks , 2 tsp .  baking soda , 1/2 c .  butter or margarine , 1 2/3 c .  sugar , 2 eggs , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 1 tsp .  lemon juice , 2 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 tsp .  nutmeg , 1 tsp .  cloves , 1/2 c .  raisins , 1/2 c .  chopped nuts . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 350° .  Mix together the persimmons and baking soda; set aside .  Mix together the butter , sugar , vanilla and lemon juice; set aside .  Mix together the flour , salt , cinnamon , nutmeg and cloves; set aside .  Blend butter mixture with flour mixture .  Add persimmon mixture .  Add raisins and nuts .  Put in 1 large loaf pan or 2 small loaf pans .  Bake at 350° for 50 minutes for large loaf or 30 minutes for small loaves .

question: I have sugar baking powder vanilla eggs pecans maraschino cherries margarine coconut milk graham crackers . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Graham Cracker Cake with 1 lb .  box graham crackers , crushed , 2 c .  sugar , 2 sticks margarine , 1 c .  pecans , 1/4 c .  milk , 2 Tbsp .  baking powder , 1 bottle maraschino cherries , chopped , 5 eggs , 1 can coconut , 1 Tbsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Mix sugar , eggs and margarine in bowl , then add cracker crumbs .  Add coconut , pecans , cherries and vanilla .  Add baking powder in the milk and pour into batter .  Bake at 350° for 1 hour .

question: I have oleo sugar vanilla peanut butter cocoa milk oatmeal . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make No Bake Cookies with 1 stick oleo , 1/3 c .  cocoa , 2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  milk , 3 c .  oatmeal , 1/2 c .  peanut butter , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Put oleo , cocoa , sugar and milk in saucepan .  Bring to a boil .  Boil one minute .  Add oatmeal , peanut butter and vanilla .  Mix well .  Drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper .  Chill .

question: I have baking powder vanilla brown sugar eggs flour nuts margarine salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Butterscotch Squares(Servings:  4)   with 1 lb .  margarine or butter , 2 lb .  8 oz .  brown sugar , 10 eggs (1 lb . ) , 1 Tbsp .  vanilla , 1 lb .  8 oz .  flour (all-purpose) , 2 Tbsp .  baking powder , 1 tsp .  salt , 12 oz .  nuts , chopped (optional) . Here's the instruction : Cream margarine and sugar on medium speed for 5 minutes .  Add eggs , one at a time , and vanilla .  Mix on low speed until blended .  Combine dry ingredients .  Add to creamed mixture .  Mix on low speed until blended .  Add nuts; mix to blend .  Spread mixture evenly in 2 greased 12 x 18 x 2-inch baking pans .  Bake at 325° for 25 minutes .  Cut 5 x 6-inch .  Yield: 60 portions .

question: I have eggs cheddar cheese mozzarella cheese pie shells sausage salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sausage And Egg Quiche with 2 pie shells , 1 lb .  sausage , 8 eggs , 2 c .  shredded Cheddar cheese , 2 c .  Mozzarella cheese , salt and pepper . Here's the instruction : Brown sausage and drain off fat .  Beat eggs .  Add in cheeses and sausage .  Pour into pie shells .  Bake 30 minutes at 350° .

question: I have sugar vanilla pecans dates rice krispies butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Date Nut Balls with 1 1/2 sticks butter (not oleo or margarine) , 8 oz .  chopped dates , 1 c .  sugar , 1 c .  chopped pecans , 2 c .  Rice Krispies , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Cook butter , dates and sugar until very thick .  Add remaining ingredients .  Mix .  Cool until lukewarm .  Roll into balls , then roll in sifted confectioners sugar .

question: I have american cheese broccoli florets onion condensed chicken broth all-purpose celery carrots milk butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli Cheese Soup with 1 1/2 c .  chopped onion , 1/2 c .  butter or margarine , 3/4 c .  all-purpose flour , 1 (10 1/2 oz . ) can condensed chicken broth (undiluted) , 1 qt .  milk , 2 c .  sliced carrots , parboiled , 1 c .  sliced celery , parboiled , 2 c .  broccoli florets , parboiled , 1/2 lb .  process American cheese , cut into cubes . Here's the instruction : In a large saucepan , saute onion in butter .  Add flour and stir to make paste .  Gradually add chicken broth and milk .  Cook until mixture thickens , about 8 to 10 minutes .  Add carrots , celery and broccoli; heat through .  Add cheese; heat until cheese is melted and vegetables are tender .  Yield: 6 to 8 servings (2 quarts) .

question: I have tomatoes italian sweet sausages pasta onion parsley garlic olive oil tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sausages And Seashells with 1 lb .  small seashells pasta , 8 Italian sweet sausages , 3 Tbsp .  olive oil or margarine , 1 medium onion , finely chopped , 1 garlic clove , minced , 2 Tbsp .  chopped parsley , 1 large can tomatoes , chopped , 1 (8 oz . ) can tomato sauce . Here's the instruction : Prick the sausages with a sharp fork , cover with cold water and bring to a boil .  Simmer , uncovered , about 10 minutes; drain and dry .  Slice in rounds .  Heat the oil in a skillet and add the sausage , onion , garlic and parsley .  Cook , stirring often , until meat and vegetables are golden brown , then add tomatoes and tomato sauce .  Simmer covered while you prepare pasta .  Drain pasta and mix with sausage and sauce .

question: I have instant vanilla pudding powdered sugar instant chocolate pudding topping cream cheese flour nuts margarine milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Barbara Mandrell'S Four Layer Dessert with 1 c .  flour , 1 c .  chopped nuts , 1/2 c .  melted margarine , 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , softened , 1 c .  whipped topping , 1 small pkg .  instant chocolate pudding , 1 small pkg .  instant vanilla pudding , 4 c .  milk , divided , 1 c .  sifted powdered sugar , whipped topping , chopped nuts . Here's the instruction : Combine flour , nuts and melted margarine and mix well .  Press into bottom of 11 3/4 x 7 1/2-inch baking dish .  Bake at 350° for 15 minutes .  Cool .  Combine softened cream cheese and powdered sugar and mix well until blended .  Fold in whipped topping .  Spread over crust .  Chill .  Prepare chocolate pudding; mix as directed on package .  Spread over cream cheese mixture .  Prepare vanilla pudding mix as directed on package and spread over chocolate pudding .  Cut into squares and garnish with additional whipped topping and chopped nuts .

question: I have oil sugar vanilla baking powder eggs cinnamon soda flour allspice pineapple zucchini salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Zucchini Bread with 3 eggs , 1 c .  oil , 2 c .  sugar , 3 tsp .  vanilla , 3 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  allspice , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 2 tsp .  cinnamon , 2 1/2 c .  grated zucchini , 1 (16 oz . ) crushed pineapple . Here's the instruction : Beat eggs; add oil , sugar and vanilla .  Mix well .  Add crushed pineapple .  Sift dry ingredients .  Stir in zucchini .  Mix well all ingredients .  Pour into loaf pans .  Bake at 325° for 1 hour and 45 minutes .

question: I have sugar eggs flour ground cornmeal milk butter egg yolks salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Corn Crepes with 2 eggs , 2 egg yolks , 2 c .  milk , 1 c .  flour , 1/2 c .  finely ground cornmeal , 1 tsp .  sugar , dash of salt , 2 Tbsp .  butter . Here's the instruction : In blender combine eggs , egg yolks , milk , flour , cornmeal , sugar and salt .  Blend until smooth .  Mixture should be consistency of unbeaten whipping cream .  Set aside in refrigerator at least 1 hour .  Remove batter from refrigerator and stir well with whisk .  Heat 9-inch nonstick pan over medium-high heat .  Rub lightly with butter .  Pour about 1/4 cup of crepe batter in center of pan , tilting and angling pan to spread batter evenly over entire bottom .  Return pan to heat and cook 1 minute , until top of crepe appears dry .  Turn crepe and cook briefly on opposite side .  Remove to plate and repeat until all batter is used .  Leftover crepes can be stored in refrigerator wrapped in plastic wrap 2 days .  Makes 12 crepes .

question: I have italian dressing tomatoes onion salad seasonings celery cucumber green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .

Here's the instruction : Cook spaghetti .  Dice vegetables together .  After spaghetti is cooked and cooled , add vegetables , salad seasonings and Italian dressing .  Mix .  If making for next day , wait and add tomatoes that day .

question: I have bisquick cheddar cheese grated ham . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Ham Balls with 1 lb .  grated ham , 8 oz .  sharp Cheddar cheese , softened , 3 c .  Bisquick . Here's the instruction : Roll in balls and bake 10 minutes .

question: I have sugar vanilla milk egg scramblers . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Low Cholesterol Ice Cream with 1 box Egg Scramblers (2 eggs) , 2 c .  sugar , 1 Tbsp .  vanilla , 1 (13 oz . ) skim evaporated milk , 2 % skim milk . Here's the instruction : Beat Scramblers in large bowl .  Mix in evaporated milk , sugar and vanilla until sugar dissolves .  Pour into freezer and add enough 2% milk to fill 1 gallon freezer .  Freeze and enjoy .  Can add 3 bananas , 1 pint strawberries or 6 peaches .

question: I have potatoes biscuits onion celery soup green beans cheese soup hamburger . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Glop with 1 small onion , 3 to 5 potatoes , sliced thin , 1 can green beans , 1 lb .  hamburger , cooked and drained , 1 can celery soup , 1 can cheese soup , 1 can biscuits . Here's the instruction : Slice potatoes and onion .  Put on bottom of pan .  Drain green beans and put on top .  Layer hamburger over beans .  Pour celery over hamburger .  Place biscuits on top .  Spread cheese soup over biscuits .  Bake at 350° for 1 hour .

question: I have pepper phyllo pastry eggs onion green onion cream cheese feta cheese butter spinach salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Spanakopeta(Spinach Squares)   with 2 bunches green onion , finely chopped , 1 onion , finely chopped , 1/4 lb .  butter , 2 pkg .  frozen chopped spinach , thawed and drained , 1/2 lb .  pkg .  cream cheese , softened , 1/2 lb .  Feta cheese , crumbled , 8 eggs , 1 tsp .  salt , pepper to taste , 1 lb .  phyllo pastry sheets , melted butter or margarine . Here's the instruction : Saut onions in butter until soft .  Add spinach and saut a few minutes longer; cool .  Add cream cheese , Feta , eggs , salt and pepper; mix well .  Place 10 layers of phyllo pastry sheets in a 12 x 16 x 2-inch pan , brushing each sheet well with melted butter .  Add spinach mixture , then place another 10 layers of phyllo , buttering each sheet .  Bake at 350° for 30 minutes .  Cut into squares before serving .  You can brush the spanakopeta with a slightly beaten egg before baking for a nice luster .  I use margarine as all butter is very rich .

question: I have frozen corn chicken breasts cheddar cheese onion celery cornstarch chicken broth taco salsa jalapeno peppers cornbread mix . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hot And Spicy Chicken with 3 chicken breasts , skinned , cooked and chopped , 10 oz .  frozen corn , 1/2 c .  diced celery , 1/2 c .  chicken broth , 1/2 c .  onion (thin wedges) , 4 tsp .  cornstarch , 1 (8 1/2 oz . ) pkg .  cornbread mix , 1 1/2 c .  shredded Cheddar cheese , 2 (4 oz . ) cans diced jalapeno peppers , drained , 1/2 c .  taco salsa . Here's the instruction : Combine chicken , corn , broth , celery and onion .  Bring to a boil .  Reduce heat; simmer for 15 minutes , uncovered .  Add salsa .  Stir 2 tablespoons water into cornstarch .  Add to chicken mixture .  Cook and stir until bubbles .  Cook an additional 2 minutes .  Prepare cornbread according to package .  Pour chicken mixture into a 10 x 6 x 2-inch dish .  Sprinkle with cheese and jalapeno peppers .  Spoon cornbread on top .  Bake for 20 minutes at 425° .

question: I have italian seasoned tomatoes water salt onion soup . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Oven Swiss Steak with 1 1/2 lb .  round (or sirloin) steak , cut in pieces , 16 oz .  can Italian seasoned tomatoes , 1 envelope Lipton onion soup mix (dry) , salt and pepper to taste , 1/4 c .  water , large size oven cooking bag . Here's the instruction : Shake 1 tablespoon flour in the oven cooking bag .  Add all ingredients to bag and squeeze to mix .  Tie bag and place in a 9 x 13-inch pan .  Slit bag with 6 (1/2") cuts to vent .  Bake at 325° for approximately 2 hours .  Slit open and put back in pan to serve .

question: I have vanilla candies eggs brown sugar soda peanut butter syrup white sugar oatmeal chocolate chips . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have philadelphia cream cheese garlic cheese pecans . Give me some cooking ideas .

Cheddar cheese , shredded (next layer) . Here's the instruction : Seal and refrigerate overnight .  Next day , mix .  Can add cooked bacon (approximately 8 slices , chopped) .

question: I have oil tortellini romano cheese heavy cream parmesan cheese creamed spinach onions garlic butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Judy'S Vegetable Tortellini with 1 bag frozen chopped onions , 1/2 tsp .  minced garlic , 2 Tbsp .  oil , 2 Tbsp .  butter , 1 lb .  pkg .  creamed spinach , softened , 1/2 c . question: I have cream of mushroom soup stew meat onion soup . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Beef Tips With Rice with 1 lb .  stew meat , 1 pkg .  Lipton onion soup mix , 2 cans cream of mushroom soup . Here's the instruction : Mix ingredients in glass baking dish .  Cover and bake until tender at 325° .  Serve over cooked rice .

question: I have oil sugar vanilla nutmeg eggs baking soda cinnamon cloves water flour pumpkin salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pumpkin Bread with 4 eggs , beaten , 1 (15 oz . ) can pumpkin , 2/3 c .  water , 3 1/2 c .  flour , 2 tsp .  baking soda , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 tsp .  salt , 3 c .  sugar , 1 c .  oil , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1/2 tsp .  cloves , 1 tsp .  nutmeg . Here's the instruction : Sift flour .  Measure and resift with dry ingredients .  Beat eggs well .  Add sugar gradually .  Using medium speed of mixer , add pumpkin . question: I have sour cream stuffing mix water chestnuts onion mushroom soup margarine almonds yellow squash pimento . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Squash Casserole with 2 lb .  small yellow squash , sliced , 1 large onion , chopped , 1 (7 oz . ) can water chestnuts , sliced , 1 stick margarine , 1/4 c .  pimento , chopped , 1 (3 oz . ) pkg .  sliced almonds , 1 c .  sour cream , 1 (10 3/4 oz . ) can mushroom soup , 1 lb .  pkg .  Pepperidge Farm stuffing mix . Here's the instruction : Cook squash , onions and pimento together .  Drain well; then add sour cream , mushroom soup and water chestnuts . Put the other half of the stuffing mix and the almonds on top of the casserole .  Dot with remaining half stick of margarine .  Bake at 350° for 30 minutes .

question: I have oil lemon jello eggs water yellow cake mix . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Bonnie'S Lemon Jello Cake with 1 pkg .  yellow cake mix , 1 pkg .  (3 oz . ) lemon jello , 3/4 c .  water , 4 eggs , 3/4 c .  oil . When cake is done , punch holes in cake (all over) with a large fork .

question: I have cream of chicken soup sour cream cheddar cheese onion margarine hash browns salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hash Brown Casserole with 1 (2 lb . ) pkg .  hash browns (frozen) , salt and pepper to taste , 1 stick margarine , melted , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 1 (8 oz . ) sour cream , 1/2 c .  onion , chopped , 1 (8 oz . ) Cheddar cheese , grated . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients well .  Pour into 9 x 12-inch pan .  Bake in a preheated 350° oven for 1 hour .  Serves 8 to 10 .

question: I have onion cream of celery soup broccoli margarine rice . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli Casserole with 1 1/3 c .  Minute rice (uncooked) , 1 small jar Cheez Whiz , 1/2 c .  onion , chopped , 1 pkg .  frozen chopped broccoli , 1 can cream of celery soup , 1 stick margarine . Here's the instruction : Melt margarine , cheese and soup until creamy .  Add rice , onion and broccoli .  Stir until well blended .  Pour into ungreased 13 x 9-inch pan .  Bake 35 to 40 minutes at 350° .

question: I have sour cream sugar tomatoes macaroni chili powder onion pork sausage green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sausage Casserole(Microwave)   with 1 lb .  pork sausage , 3/4 c .  diced onion , 3/4 c .  diced green pepper , 1 (1 lb .  13 oz . ) can whole tomatoes , 1 Tbsp .  sugar , 1 Tbsp .  chili powder , 1 tsp .  salt , 8 oz .  macaroni , cooked , 1 c .  dairy sour cream . Here's the instruction : In a 10-inch microwave cooker , cook sausage , onion and green pepper for 6 minutes , stirring once .  Drain off fat .  Stir tomatoes , sugar , chili powder , salt and cooked macaroni into sausage mixture .  Cook 6 minutes .  Stir in sour cream .  Heat 1 to 2 minutes .

question: I have egg oats brown sugar baking soda cinnamon raisins flour walnuts vanilla flavor milk butter flavor salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chewy Oatmeal Cookies with 3/4 c .  butter flavor Crisco shortening , 1 1/4 c .  firmly packed light brown sugar , 1 egg , 1/3 c .  milk , 1 1/2 tsp .  vanilla flavor , 1 c .  all-purpose flour , 3 c .  Quaker oats (quick or old fashioned , uncooked) , 1/2 tsp .  baking soda , 1/2 tsp .  salt (optional) , 1/4 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 c .  raisins , 1 c .  coarsely chopped walnuts . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 375° .  Lightly grease baking sheet with butter flavor Crisco .  Combine Crisco , brown sugar , egg , milk and vanilla in a large bowl . Drop rounded tablespoonful of dough 2-inches apart .  Bake for 10 to 15 minutes , or until lightly brown .  Cool , then serve .

question: I have lemon juice garlic powder parsley fish fillet paprika . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Flavorful Fish with 1 (4 oz . ) fish fillet , 1 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1/8 tsp .  garlic powder , 1/4 tsp .  paprika , 1 Tbsp .  chopped parsley . question: I have american cheese oregano tomatoes tomato paste creamette shells pepper onion celery ground beef salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

Creamette shells , 1 lb .  ground beef , 1 1/2 c .  celery , diced , 1 c .  onion , chopped , 1 (28 oz . ) can whole tomatoes , 1 (6 oz . ) can tomato paste , 2 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  oregano , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 1 c . question: I have sugar vanilla eggs flour butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Texas Prize Cake with 4 sticks butter , 2 2/3 c .  sugar , 9 eggs , 3 c .  flour , 1 Tbsp .  flavoring (vanilla or lemon) . question: I have sugar eggs baking soda flour almond extract . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Springerle with 4 eggs , 1 tsp .  almond extract , 3/4 tsp .  baking soda , 2 c .  sugar , 4 c .  flour . Here's the instruction : Beat eggs until light .  Add sugar and beat until mixture is very stiff and light , about 15 minutes at high speed on electric mixer .  Add extract , flour and soda; mix thoroughly . question: I have sugar vanilla eggs flour milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have corn sugar crisco pepper eggs flour milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have potatoes corn bread crumbs onion milk corned beef hash butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Corned Beef Hash Casserole with 3 to 4 potatoes , sliced , 1 onion , sliced , 1/4 c .  canned milk , butter or oleo , 1 can corned beef hash , 1 can creamed corn , 1 1/2 c .  bread crumbs . question: I have sugar lemon juice water flour cornstarch butter lemon egg yolks salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
