question: I have onion cream cheese mayonnaise carrots cucumber salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have savers sugar baking powder eggs lemon extract flour butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Life Saver Cookies with 3/4 c .  butter , 1 c .  sugar , 2 eggs , 1/2 tsp .  lemon extract , 2 1/2 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 6 pkg .  Life Savers . Here's the instruction : Mix together butter , sugar , eggs and lemon extract .  Blend in flour , baking powder and salt .  Cover and chill at least 1 hour . question: I have italian bread crumbs italian dressing pepper garlic salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar baking powder cinnamon water flour vegetable shortening apples milk vegetable oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fried Apple Pies with 4 cups of peeled and slice apples , 4 cups of water , 1/2 cup of sugar , 4 teaspoons of cinnamon , 6 cups of flour , 1 teaspoon of salt , 1 tablespoon of baking powder , 1 1/2 cups of vegetable shortening , 1 cup of milk , 2 cups of vegetable oil . Here's the instruction : In a saucepan , combine apples and water .  Simmer until tender , then cool .  Mash apples , stir in sugar and cinnamon .  Chill; combine flour , salt and baking powder . Heat oil to 370° and fry the pies until brown .

question: I have rolls sugar regular mountain dew cinnamon margarine apples . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have egg dressing thin white bread slices green onions anchovy worcestershire sauce water cognac butter green pepper pimento . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have frozen whipped topping instant vanilla pudding pecans fruit cocktail maraschino cherries layer coconut cherry pie filling pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Punch Bowl Cake with 2 layer-size yellow cake mix , 2 (3 oz . ) boxes instant vanilla pudding , 1 (20 oz . ) can fruit cocktail , drained , 2 (8 oz . ) cans crushed pineapple with juice , 1 (16 oz . ) can cherry pie filling , 2 c .  chopped pecans or walnuts , 2 (6 oz . ) pkg .  shredded or flaked coconut , 2 (8 oz . ) c .  frozen whipped topping , thawed , maraschino cherries (optional) . Here's the instruction : Prepare cake mix by package directions .  Bake into layers .  Cool layers .  Prepare 1 box pudding mix .  Place 1 cake layer (cut into cubes) in bottom of punch bowl .  Spoon the prepared pudding mix evenly over cake .  Top with half of fruit cocktail , 1 can pineapple , 1/2 of fruit cocktail , 1/2 of cherry pie filling , 1 cup nuts and 1 package coconut .  Spread 1 container whipped topping evenly over top .  Repeat layers .  Garnish top with maraschino cherries , if desired .  Chill until ready to serve .  Refrigerate any leftovers .

question: I have all-purpose flour sugar lemon juice egg whites coconut cream of tartar . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Quick Macaroons with 3 large or 4 medium egg whites , 1 tsp .  lemon juice , 1 c .  shredded coconut , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/4 tsp .  cream of tartar , 2 tsp .  all-purpose flour . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 300° .  Line 12 muffin cups with paper liners .  Put room temperature egg whites in medium all metal or glass bowl with cream of tartar and beat at high speed until foamy .  Add sugar , 2 tablespoons at a time , beating until whites hold stiff glossy peaks .  Add lemon juice and flour .  Fold in with a spatula until blended .  Fold in coconut .  Spoon into the lined muffin cups .  Bake 30 to 35 minutes .  Cool on a rack .  As soon as you can , remove them from the pan .

question: I have scallops mushrooms onion buttered ritz crackers water flour white wine light cream shrimp butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Seafood Casserole with 2 lb .  shrimp , 1 lb .  scallops , 1/4 c .  flour , 3 Tbsp .  butter or margarine , 1 c .  chopped mushrooms (optional) , 1 onion , chopped , 1 c .  light cream , 1 c .  buttered Ritz crackers , 2 c .  water , 1/2 c .  white wine . Here's the instruction : Boil water and wine .  Cook shrimp in water 3 minutes .  Remove and cook scallops in same liquid for 6 minutes .  Reserve 1 cup liquid for later .

question: I have velveeta cheese cheddar cheese onion cream cheese nuts worcestershire sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oleo graham cracker crumbs eggs powdered sugar bananas nuts pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Banana Split Cake with 2 c .  graham cracker crumbs , 3 sticks oleo , 2 eggs , 2 c .  powdered sugar , 1 (No .  2) can crushed pineapple , 2 or more bananas , 1 large Cool Whip , nuts and chopped cherries . Here's the instruction : Combine graham cracker crumbs and 1 stick melted oleo .  Pat in bottom of pan .  Beat 2 cups powdered sugar , 2 sticks oleo and eggs 15 minutes .  Pour over crumb mixture . question: I have sugar cornmeal baking soda water flour yeast milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make English Muffin Loaf with 2 pkg .  yeast , 6 c .  flour , 1 Tbsp .  sugar , 2 tsp .  salt , 2 c .  milk , 1/4 tsp .  baking soda , 1/2 c .  water , cornmeal . Here's the instruction : Combine 3 cups flour , yeast , sugar , salt and soda .  Heat liquid until very warm (120° to 130°) .  Add to dry ingredients .  Beat well . question: I have vinegar beer brown sugar kielbasa ketchup mustard . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Crock-Pot Kielbasa with 3 cans beer , 1 small bottle ketchup , 1 small jar mustard , 1 tsp .  vinegar , 3/4 c .  brown sugar , 2 or 3 kielbasa . question: I have green onions noodles onion chicken broth parsley chicken bouillon cubes garlic chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oleo nuts colored marshmallows coconut chocolate chips . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Church Windows with 1/2 c .  oleo , 1 large package chocolate chips , 1 c .  chopped nuts , 1 large bag miniature colored marshmallows , 1 can coconut . Here's the instruction : Melt oleo and chocolate chips in a sauce pan , cool and add nuts and marshmallows .  Shape into 3 logs .  Spread coconut on wax paper and roll logs in coconut to coat . question: I have sugar lemon juice blueberries water flour milk butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Blueberry Dumplings with 2 1/2 c .  blueberries (fresh or frozen) , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1 c .  water , 1 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1 c .  self-rising flour , 1/4 c .  sugar , 2 Tbsp .  butter or margarine , 1/2 c .  milk . Here's the instruction : In Dutch oven with tight fitting lid , bring blueberries , 1/2 cup sugar , 1 cup water and dash of salt to boiling .  Cover and simmer 5 minutes; add lemon juice . Drop from tablespoon into bubbling sauce , making 6 dumplings .  Cover tightly; simmer 15 minutes without uncovering .  Serve hot .  Sprinkle with sugar , if desired .  Serves 6 .

question: I have sugar vanilla marshmallows whipping cream pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have potatoes onion water vegetable soup hamburger . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oleo cream of chicken soup sour cream pepper onion frozen hash browns cornflakes margarine milk cheddar cheese soup salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have velveeta cheese miracle turkey milk chives frozen peas . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have bisquick cheddar cheese garlic powder milk butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have vanilla brown sugar eggs soda cold water flour white sugar butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

Here's the instruction : Combine crushed wafers , nuts and 1/2 cup powdered sugar in large bowl; set aside .  Melt chocolate with corn syrup .  Stir in rum until smooth .  Pour chocolate mixture over crumb mixture; mix thoroughly .  Roll into 1-inch balls .  Place on wax paper .  Roll each ball in remaining 1 cup powdered sugar .  Store in airtight container for at least 3 days before serving .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs soda flour nuts coconut pineapple salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oleo brown sugar cornstarch carrots pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hawaiian Carrots with 1 lb .  pkg .  carrots , 1 (No .  2) can and 1 small can crushed pineapple , drained , 3 Tbsp .  cornstarch , 1/2 c .  brown sugar , 1/2 stick oleo . Here's the instruction : Scrape and cut carrots into small pieces or chunks .  Cook and drain; salt .  Drain pineapple . question: I have mozzarella cheese italian dressing walnuts . Give me some cooking ideas .

Mix with dressing prior to serving .

question: I have bread sugar swiss cheese beef broth flour vegetable oil onions white wine butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Onion Soup with 2 large onions , thinly sliced , 1 Tbsp .  butter , 1 Tbsp .  vegetable oil , 1/4 tsp .  sugar , 2 Tbsp .  flour , 6 c .  beef broth , 1/4 c .  white wine , 4 to 8 slices French bread , 2 tsp .  vegetable oil , 1 to 2 c .  grated Swiss cheese . Here's the instruction : Cook onions in butter and oil for 15 minutes in Dutch oven; stir occasionally .  Add sugar and cook 15 minutes until onions are brown .  Sprinkle onions with flour; blend in hot broth , wine and seasonings .  Simmer for 30 minutes .  Lightly toast garlic bread in 350° oven for 20 minutes .  Baste each slice with 1/2 teaspoon oil and garlic .  Serve soup with toast floating on the soup .  Sprinkle the toast with cheese .  Bake for 15 minutes .  Serve hot .  Makes 4 to 8 servings .

question: I have cake flour sour milk sugar vanilla baking powder shortening eggs soda walnuts banana pulp salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Banana Walnut Cake with 3/4 c .  shortening (butter) , 2 1/4 c .  sugar , 3 c .  cake flour , sifted , 1 1/2 tsp .  vanilla , 3/4 tsp .  salt , 1 1/2 c .  chopped walnuts , 6 Tbsp .  sour milk , 1 1/2 c .  banana pulp , 3 eggs , beaten well , 3 tsp .  baking powder , 3/4 tsp .  soda . Here's the instruction : Cream shortening and gradually add sugar; cream together until light and fluffy .  Add eggs .  Sift flour before measuring , then add baking powder , soda and salt .  Add the sour milk and flour mixture , alternating with the egg , sugar and butter mixture .  Beat after each addition .  Add banana pulp; beat well .  Add nuts .  Pour into greased Bundt pan .  Bake at 350° for 50 to 60 minutes .

question: I have salad dressing lemon wedges broccoli flounder . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sesame seed soy sauce fresh ginger freshly ground black pepper sesame oil chicken garlic honey . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sesame Chicken Wings with 3 1/2 Tbsp .  light soy sauce , 1/2 garlic clove , minced , 1/2 tsp .  minced fresh ginger , 1 Tbsp .  honey , freshly ground black pepper to taste , 2 lb .  chicken wings , wing tips cut off , 1 Tbsp .  Oriental sesame oil , 2 Tbsp .  sesame seed , toasted lightly . Here's the instruction : In a bowl , whisk together the soy sauce , the garlic , the ginger , the honey and the pepper .  Add the wings; toss them to coat and let them marinate , covered and chilled , for 2 hours .  Line a baking pan with foil and arrange the wings , drained (reserving the marinade) in one layer on the foil .  Brush the wings with the oil; sprinkle them with the sesame seed and bake them in the middle of a preheated 400° oven , basting them occasionally with the reserved marinade , for 30 to 35 minutes or until they are browned .  Serves 4 as an hors d'oeuvre .

question: I have celery salt sour cream spiral pasta pepper green onions water chestnuts onion powder celery mayonnaise frozen pea pods monde imitation crabmeat dill weed . Give me some cooking ideas .

Add pasta to crabmeat , then add all other ingredients .  Chill for at least 1/2 hour before serving .

question: I have salt butter macaroni cottage cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have eggs parmesan cheese mozzarella cheese green onion onion cottage cheese ground beef spaghetti sauce butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make String Pie with 1 lb .  ground beef , 1/2 c .  chopped onion , 1/4 c .  chopped green onion , 1 jar spaghetti sauce , 8 oz .  spaghetti , cooked and drained , 1/3 c .  grated Parmesan cheese , 2 eggs , beaten , 2 tsp .  butter , 1 c .  cottage cheese , 1/2 c .  shredded Mozzarella cheese . Here's the instruction : Cook beef , onion and green pepper in large skillet over medium-high heat until meat is brown , stirring to separate meat; drain fat .  Stir in spaghetti sauce , mix well . question: I have sugar egg whites maraschino cherries flour coconut almond extract salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have lemon pudding fruit cocktail vanilla pudding mandarin oranges pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have vinegar sugar ground cinnamon ground turmeric green peppers pickling salt ground ground allspice onions ground ginger sweet red peppers hot peppers . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pear Relish with 16 pears , peeled , cored and ground , 6 medium onions , ground , 8 green peppers , ground , 4 sweet red peppers , ground , 2 hot peppers , ground , 6 c .  vinegar (5% acidity) , 6 c .  sugar , 3 Tbsp .  mustard seed , 2 Tbsp .  pickling salt , 1 Tbsp .  ground turmeric , 1 tsp .  ground allspice , 1 tsp .  ground cinnamon , 1 tsp .  ground ginger . Here's the instruction : Let pears , onions and peppers stand in separate containers for 1 hour .  Pour boiling water over each; drain well .  Combine pears , onion , peppers , vinegar , sugar and seasonings in a large kettle .  Bring to a boil , reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 30 minutes .  Pour hot mixture into hot sterilized jars , leaving 1/4 inch headspace .  Remove air bubbles and wipe jar rims .  Cover at once with metal lids and screw on bands .  Process in boiling water bath for 20 minutes .  Let stay in a cool place for 1 month before using .  Chill before serving .  Makes 10 pints .

question: I have sugar salad oil eggs cinnamon soda flour nuts strawberries salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have american cheese chili beef soup macaroni extra lean ground beef tomato soup . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chili Beef Casserole with 1 can tomato soup , 1 can chili beef soup , 3/4 lb .  extra lean ground beef , 1 c .  macaroni , 3 slices sharp processed American cheese . Here's the instruction : Cook macaroni in boiling salted water until done (10 to 12 minutes) .  Drain thoroughly .  Brown ground beef in skillet .  Add the soups and the macaroni .  Heat for 5 to 7 minutes , stirring occasionally , until the mixture is bubbly .  Slice cheese slices in half diagonally and put on top of hot mixture .  Cover for a few minutes to allow cheese to melt slightly .  Serve at once .  Serves 6 .

question: I have sugar water yeast butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Bread with 2 c .  warm water , 1 pkg .  yeast (RapidRise) , 3 Tbsp .  melted butter or shortening , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  salt . Here's the instruction : Dissolve yeast in warm water .  Add other ingredients , then add 1 to 1 1/2 cups whole wheat flour .  Blend with electric mixer .  Add slowly bread flour (3 1/2 to 4 cups; total wheat and bread flour should be 5 cups) .  After 3 cups flour are mixed with electric mixer , fold the balance of flour with a wooden spoon .  Put on a floured board or wax paper and knead .  Next , put in oiled bowl .  Oil top of dough and press wax paper down over dough .  Let rise until doubled in bulk .  Divide dough and put in pans and let rise again .  Bake at 350° for 30 minutes to 1 hour or until golden brown and pulled away from sides .  This will make 2 big loaves or 4 small loaves .

question: I have sour cream pepper lemon juice salmon onion dill parsley salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Salmon Casserole Baked In Sour Cream with 1 (1 lb . ) can salmon , drained and juice reserved , 1 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1/2 tsp .  salt , pepper to taste , 1 c .  sour cream , 1/2 tsp .  dry dill weed , 1 medium onion , thinly sliced , 1 Tbsp .  chopped parsley . Yields 4 servings .

question: I have recipe basic sweet dough sugar cinnamon apples butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have tomatoes oregano flakes parmesan cheese eggplant salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have potatoes oregano marjoram curry powder green split peas water celery ham basil thyme bay leaves onions carrots tomato puree garlic salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chippewa Soup with 1 qt .  carrots , diced , 2 qt .  onions , chopped , 1 qt .  celery , diced , 1 lb .  green split peas , 2 qt .  tomato puree , 6 cloves garlic , 1 gal .  of water , 10 oz .  smoked ham , 2 potatoes , diced , 1 oz .  marjoram , 1 oz .  basil , 1 oz .  oregano , 1 oz .  thyme , 4 bay leaves , 4 oz .  curry powder (we use Javin Brand) , Salt and pepper . Here's the instruction : Soak the split peas overnight .  In a large pot (preferably 3-4 gallons) heat a small amount of oil until very hot .  Add the carrots , onions and celery and sweat the vegetables .  Add the garlic and sweat a few more minutes .  Add the curry powder to the vegetables and stir until curry is thoroughly mixed with the vegetables .  Add all remaining ingredients to the pot .  Bring this to a boil , reduce heat and simmer for approximately three hours .  Adjust the seasoning with salt and pepper .  Remove the bay leaves and puree the soup through a food mill or in an electric blender .  Chill thoroughly .  This is the base for Chippewa Soup .  It should be slightly salty because it is the base and needs to be creamed before use .

question: I have egg baking powder sugar lemon juice shortening flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lemon Sugar Cookies with 3 3/4 c .  sifted all-purpose flour , 3 tsp .  baking powder , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1/2 c .  soft shortening , 1 c .  granulated sugar , 1 egg , 1/2 c .  fresh lemon juice , granulated sugar . Here's the instruction : Sift together flour , baking powder and salt .  Heat oven to 400° .  Work shortening in a bowl until creamy .  Add the 1 cup granulated sugar and beat until well blended .  Add egg; beat thoroughly .  Add sifted dry ingredients alternately with lemon juice to creamed mixture .  Beat until smooth .  Cover and chill 1 hour .  Roll a small portion of dough at a time on a lightly floured board to a thickness of about 1/4-inch .  (Keep rest of dough refrigerated . ) Cut with a 2-inch cookie cutter .  Place cookies 2 inches apart on a lightly greased cookie sheet and sprinkle with granulated sugar .  Bake 10 to 12 minutes , until edges are lightly browned .  Cool on wire racks .  Makes about 4 to 5 dozen cookies .

question: I have buttermilk oil mix corn sugar bell pepper eggs peppers onion sharp cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mexican Cornbread with 2 pkg .  Mexican cornbread mix , 1 1/2 c .  sharp cheese , grated , 1 (15 oz . ) can creamed corn , 1 onion , chopped , 1/4 c .  oil , 1 Tbsp .  sugar , 1/2 bell pepper , chopped , 3 eggs , 1 c .  buttermilk , 4 jalapeno peppers , chopped . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Mix and bake at 350° in cookie sheet for about 30 minutes or until done .

question: I have egg sugar ginger shortening baking soda molasses cinnamon cloves water flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Molasses Cookies with 1 egg , 2/3 c .  sugar , 1 c .  molasses , 2/3 c .  shortening , 3 1/2 c .  hot water , 4 1/2 c .  flour , 2 tsp .  baking soda , 1/4 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/4 tsp .  cloves , 1/4 tsp .  ginger , 1/2 tsp .  salt . Here's the instruction : Mix together the first 5 ingredients .  Combine remaining dry ingredients together and add to molasses mixture .  Mix well .  Let set overnight in refrigerator . question: I have egg onion italian style tomatoes ground beef hot italian sausage bread crumbs green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have buttermilk sugar vanilla eggs flour butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mother J'S Chocolate Cake(Delicious!)   with 2 c .  sugar , 1 c .  butter , 4 eggs , 1 c .  buttermilk , 3 c .  self-rising flour , 1 Tbsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Cream butter and sugar .  Add eggs , one at a time , and mix well .  Add buttermilk .  Add flour , 1 cup at a time , mixing well .  Add vanilla .  For layer cake bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes .  For sheet cake pan bake at 325° for 1 hour and 20 minutes .  Makes three layers or sheet cake .  Real nice for birthdays .

question: I have cream of mushroom soup onion frozen broccoli cuts rice butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli Casserole with 2 pkg .  frozen broccoli cuts , 1 stick butter , 1 chopped onion , 1 c .  cooked rice , 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 1 small jar Cheez Whiz . Here's the instruction : Thaw broccoli .  Cook chopped onion in butter until tender .  Add rest .  No salt! Excellent for potlucks .  Bake at 350° for 1 hour .

question: I have black beans sour cream tomatoes salt pepper green onions chili powder cheddar cheese bottled salsa onion avocado ground raw turkey tortilla chips fresh cilantro . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Southwest Taco Dip with 2 (15 oz .  each) cans black beans , drained and rinsed , 3/4 lb .  ground raw turkey , 1/2 c .  chopped onion , 1 tsp .  chili powder , 1 c .  bottled salsa , 1 c .  shredded Cheddar cheese , 1 (8 oz . ) container sour cream , 3 Tbsp .  chopped fresh cilantro , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 1 avocado , chopped fine , 2 plum tomatoes , chopped fine , 2 green onions , sliced , tortilla chips . Here's the instruction : Combine beans , turkey , onion and chili powder in a skillet .  Cook over medium heat until turkey is brown .  Stir occasionally to mash beans and break up turkey .  Stir in salsa and place in microwave-proof dish .  Sprinkle with cheese and microwave on High 1 to 2 minutes until cheese is melted .  Combine sour cream , cilantro , salt and pepper and spread on top .  Sprinkle with avocado , tomato and green onions .  Serve with tortilla chips .  Makes 7 cups .

question: I have onion orange roughy orange juice garlic butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Orange Roughy Fillets with 5 to 6 pieces orange roughy , 1 medium onion , 2 Tbsp .  butter , 1 can frozen orange juice , garlic powder (no salt) . Here's the instruction : Fry onion in butter until golden .  Cover pan with foil .  Lay fish out .  Put butter , garlic and 1 teaspoon of orange juice on top of fish .  Broil for 20 to 25 minutes .

question: I have unflavored gelatin tomatoes salt lemon juice hot sauce cucumbers green onion cold water tomato juice chicken bouillon cubes dill weed . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fresh Tomato Aspic with 2 envelopes unflavored gelatin , 2 c .  cold water , divided , 2 chicken bouillon cubes , 1 c .  tomato juice , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 2 Tbsp .  dill weed , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  hot sauce , 1/4 c .  chopped green onion , 2 c .  peeled and chopped fresh tomatoes , 1 c .  peeled , seeded and chopped cucumbers , lettuce (optional) . Here's the instruction : Soften gelatin in 1 cup cold water; add bouillon cubes .  Place over low heat , stirring constantly , until gelatin and bouillon cubes dissolve . question: I have sugar vanilla milk strawberries banana . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Banana Strawberry Smoothie with 1 medium banana , 1 c .  sliced strawberries , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 1/4 tsp .  vanilla , 1 1/2 c .  cold whole milk . Here's the instruction : Put ingredients in a blender and whip for 1 minute .  Serve immediately .  Makes 2 large glasses .

question: I have oleo bread water chestnuts mushroom soup grated cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Asparagus Casserole with 3 cans asparagus spears , 1 can water chestnuts , 1 stick oleo , 1 c .  grated cheese , 1 can mushroom soup , 4 slices bread . Here's the instruction : Melt oleo; slice bread in finger size slices .  Dip in melted oleo and set aside .  Drain cooked asparagus and place in a long casserole dish .  Cut water chestnuts and place on top .  (I use the juice too . ) Put cheese on that , then cover with mushroom soup .  Cover with bread slices .  Bake at 350° until bread is brown .

question: I have potatoes peas tomato soup celery ground chuck carrots rice . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make 7 Layer Dish with 2 potatoes , 2 carrots , 1 celery , 1 small can peas , 1 Tbsp .  Minute rice , 1 lb .  ground chuck , 1 can tomato soup . Here's the instruction : Building from bottom of covered (tall) casserole dish (2 1/2-quarts) , spread in layers , 2 cubed raw potatoes (1/4-inch cubes) , 2 diced raw carrots , diced celery (enough to cover layer) , small can peas , drained , 1 1/2 tablespoons Minute rice (cover peas) , 1/2 pound raw ground chuck .  Pat down; add 1 cup tomato soup .  Final layer , another 1/2 pound ground chuck .  Bake at 350° for 1 1/2 hours covered .

question: I have oil bread crumbs eggs parmesan cheese onion mushrooms shell macaroni ground meat cheddar garlic spinach salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Inside Out Ravioli with 1 lb .  ground meat , 1/2 c .  chopped onion , 10 oz .  pkg .  frozen chopped spinach , 1 qt .  Ragu sauce with mushrooms , garlic powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt and pepper , 2 c .  elbow or shell macaroni , cooked and drained , 1/2 c .  Cheddar , grated , 1/2 c . question: I have lemon juice perch fillets low-fat margarine red onion salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lo-Cal Baked Perch Fillets With Lemon Butter with approximately 30 oz .  perch fillets , 16 small red onion rings , 4 Tbsp .  low-fat margarine , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice , salt and pepper to taste . question: I have sugar vanilla baking soda water flour cocoa mayonnaise . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have cream of chicken soup cheese broccoli onions rice butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have soy sauce green onions accent seasoning carrots rice ground beef salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Japanese Fried Rice with 1 c .  rice (medium grain) , 1 lb .  ground beef or round steak , cut into small cubes , 3 carrots , sliced thin , 3 green onions , chopped , salt and pepper to taste , sprinkle of Accent seasoning , soy sauce . question: I have onion soup water regular rice cream of celery soup chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make No Peek Chicken with 1 can cream of celery soup , 1 can water , 1 c .  regular rice , 6 pieces chicken , 1/2 pkg .  dry onion soup mix . question: I have tomatoes pepper onions ground beef white potatoes salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Missouri Casserole with sliced white potatoes (8 medium) , 2 onions , sliced , 2 to 3 lb .  ground beef , 2 cans crushed tomatoes , salt , pepper . Here's the instruction : Make 1 pound of your favorite meat loaf and pat into a 10-inch pie plate .  Spread 1 small can of tomato sauce over top and bake in a 350° oven for 45 minutes .  Then add grated cheese over top and put back in oven until cheese is melted .  Slice like pie and serve with beer bread .

question: I have stout potatoes pepper water flour prunes thyme margarine carrots onions beef garlic minor beef base . Give me some cooking ideas .

Guiness stout , 10 c .  water , 12 prunes , minced , 2 tsp .  thyme , 1/2 tsp .  pepper , 10 potatoes , cubed , 12 carrots (chunks) , 3 large onions (chunks) , 1 1/2 c .  flour . Here's the instruction : Brown beef in margarine; add garlic and saute for 2 to 3 minutes .  Add flour to meat; stir .  Add Guiness and stir well to remove any lumps . question: I have vinegar bacon brown sugar water beans bacon grease mustard . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Green Beans Marinated with 2 cans beans (qt . ) , 4 Tbsp .  brown sugar , 4 Tbsp .  bacon grease , 2 Tbsp .  prepared mustard , 4 Tbsp .  vinegar , 6 to 8 strips crisply fried bacon , 1/2 c .  water from the beans . Here's the instruction : Fry bacon .  Remove from grease .  Pour off grease , leaving at least 4 tablespoons .  Add sugar , mustard , vinegar and water .  Heat until dissolved .  Add beans .  Cook about 5 minutes .  Serve at room temperature .  Crumble bacon over top of beans when ready to serve .

question: I have sugar vanilla baking soda eggs brown sugar pecans flour corn oil margarine apples milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fresh Apple Pound Cake with 3 c .  unsifted flour , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 1/2 c .  corn oil , 2 c .  sugar , 3 eggs , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 2 c .  finely chopped apples , 1 c .  chopped pecans , 1/2 c .  margarine , 1/2 c .  firmly packed brown sugar , 2 tsp .  milk . question: I have sugar gelatin level fresh nonfat milk cold water yogurt boiling water peanuts . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sugar-Free Peanut Butter Pie with 1 envelope plain gelatin , 2 Tbsp .  cold water , 3/4 c .  boiling water , 6 level Tbsp .  peanut butter , 1 c .  fresh nonfat milk , 1/2 c .  plain low-fat yogurt , 1 (4 servings) box sugar-free instant pudding mix (vanilla or butterscotch) , 3 Tbsp .  chopped de-fatted dry roasted peanuts . question: I have sugar vanilla shell heavy cream nutmeg eggs flour milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

Cook until done .  Combine meatballs with barbecue sauce .

question: I have corn mix corn margarine sour cream . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have hominy onion tomato soup flour chicken broth butter green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Honey'S Hominy Soup with 1 medium onion , chopped , 1 green pepper , chopped , 2 tsp .  butter or oleo , 1 can chicken broth , 1 can hominy (golden variety) , 1 can tomato soup , 1 to 2 Tbsp .  flour . question: I have egg instant rice onion water garlic powder head cabbage milk tomato sauce ground beef sauerkraut salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oregano sugar parmesan cheese onion cream cheese catsup ground beef garlic tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla baking powder shortening brown sugar eggs peanut butter flour coconut salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sweet milk sugar baking powder soda lard flour yeast salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hot Rolls with 1 c .  sugar , 1 c .  lard , 1 qt .  sweet milk , 1 yeast cake , flour , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1 tsp .  soda , 2 tsp .  salt . question: I have buttermilk sugar baking powder nutmeg brown sugar eggs soda pecans powdered milk cinnamon flour butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Night Before Coffee Cake with 2/3 c .  butter , 1 c .  granulated sugar , 1/2 c .  brown sugar , 2 eggs , beaten , 2 c .  flour , sifted , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 2 tsp .  powdered milk , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 c .  buttermilk , 1/2 c .  brown sugar , 1/2 c .  chopped pecans , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 tsp .  nutmeg . question: I have celery salt vinegar sugar garlic salt onion water celery onion salt salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have french fried onions pepper soy sauce cheese broccoli milk cream of broccoli . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs flour pie crust margarine coconut milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Coconut Pie with 1 raw pie crust (9-inch) , 1 c .  sugar , 1 Tbsp .  flour , 1/3 c .  margarine , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 2 eggs , beaten , 1/3 c .  milk , coconut , bag or can (use 2 1/2 c .  or more if you like) . Wesson oil , 3 c .  sugar , 4 eggs , 1 can pumpkin (2 c . ) , 2/3 c .  water , 3 1/2 c .  flour , 2 tsp .  baking soda , 1 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 3 tsp .  cinnamon , 3 tsp .  nutmeg , 1/2 tsp .  ginger , 2/3 c .  nuts (optional) , 2/3 c .  raisins (optional) . Here's the instruction : Cook sausage well and drain .  Melt butter in 9 x 13-inch Pyrex dish .  Tear bread into small pieces and sprinkle over butter .  Sprinkle drained sausage over bread crumbs .  Sprinkle cheese over sausage .  Beat eggs and other ingredients .  Pour over mixture .  Chill 8 hours or overnight .  Bake in 350° oven for 40 to 50 minutes .  Serve immediately .  Serves 6 to 8 .

question: I have red wine vinegar oregano sugar onion catsup clove garlic paprika dry mustard olive oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Italian Dressing with 1/2 c .  chopped onion , 1 chopped clove garlic , 1/4 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  red wine vinegar , 1 c .  olive oil , 1 c .  catsup , 2 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  dry mustard , 1 tsp .  paprika , 1 tsp .  oregano . Here's the instruction : Combine all ingredients in jar with tight fitting lid; shake well .  Chill 3 hours .  Strain to remove onion and garlic .  Rechill .  Makes 3 1/2 cups .

question: I have sugar frozen strawberries cool whip bananas cream cheese nuts pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Strawberry Fluff with 1 (8 oz . ) cream cheese , softened , 1 large can crushed pineapple , drained , 1 (19 oz . ) pkg .  frozen strawberries , thawed , 3/4 cup granulated sugar , 3 bananas , sliced , 1/2 cup chopped nuts , 1 large container cool whip . Here's the instruction : Mix softened cream cheese and sugar thoroughly .  Add pineapple , strawberries , nuts and bananas .  Mix in cool whip thoroughly but gentle .  Pour into pans .  Freeze .  Cut in squares .

question: I have potatoes onion flour parsley milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Old-Fashioned Scalloped Potatoes with potatoes , milk , butter , flour , salt and pepper , chopped onion , chopped parsley . Here's the instruction : Layer sliced potatoes in greased baking dish .  Sprinkle each layer with salt , pepper , onion , parsley and flour .  Dot with butter and add milk to cover .  Bake , uncovered , at 375° until potatoes are tender .

question: I have brown sugar almond extract cream cheese almonds butter crescent rolls honey . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Bee Sting Buns(Makes 16 Buns)   with 2 (8 oz . ) cans refrigerated crescent rolls , 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , 1/4 c .  (1/2 stick) melted butter or margarine , 1/4 c .  firmly packed light brown sugar , 3 Tbsp .  honey , 1 tsp .  grated orange peel , 1/2 tsp .  almond extract , 2/3 c .  slivered almonds . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 375° .  Unroll crescents and divide into scored triangles .  Cut cream cheese block into 16 cubes .  Place one cube at base of each triangle and roll up to enclose cheese .  Bring ends of crescent together forming balls .  Spray 16 muffin cups with nonstick coating .  Combine remaining ingredients and spoon into bottoms of muffin cups .  Place ball of dough in each cup .  Bake 15 to 20 minutes , until golden brown and bubbly .  Let cool 1 minute , then immediately invert onto foil .

question: I have egg black pepper lasagna noodles mozzarella cheese parmesan cheese onion powder garlic powder parsley ricotta cheese salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Meatless Lasagna with 1 box lasagna noodles , 1 (32 oz . ) jar thick spaghetti sauce , 2 c .  (15 oz . ) Ricotta cheese , 1 (16 oz . ) pkg .  Mozzarella cheese , 1/2 c .  grated Parmesan cheese , 1 egg , 2 Tbsp .  chopped parsley , 1 Tbsp .  onion powder , 1 Tbsp .  garlic powder , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  black pepper . Here's the instruction : In a bowl , mix Ricotta cheese , egg , parsley , onion powder , pepper , garlic powder , salt and Parmesan cheese thoroughly .  Pour 1 cup sauce in bottom of a 9 x 13-inch pan .  Layer 3 pieces of uncooked lasagna noodles over sauce (noodles will later expand to fill empty spaces) .  Cover with about 1 1/2 cups sauce .  Add about 1/3 of the Mozzarella slices .  Spread Ricotta cheese mixture over sauce and Mozzarella cheese .  Add 3 more noodles , more sauce and then the rest of the Ricotta mixture and the remaining sauce and Mozzarella cheese .  Cover with aluminum foil .  Bake at 350° for 1 hour .  Remove foil and bake for about 5 minutes .

question: I have sugar vanilla shell eggs pecans flour cocoa butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pecan Fudge Pie with 1 c .  sugar , 1/4 c .  self-rising flour , 1/4 c .  cocoa , 2 eggs , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1/2 stick butter , 1 uncooked pie shell , 1/2 c .  pecans . Here's the instruction : Melt butter and mix all other ingredients , except pecans .  Pour into pie shell .  Place pecans on top and bake at 350° until done .

question: I have butter your favorite salsa chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Browned Chicken And Salsa with chicken legs , thighs , wings (2 each) , Tbsp .  butter , cooking oil or olive oil , your favorite salsa . Here's the instruction : Use chicken legs , thighs and wings from Paul's Baked Chicken Breast .  Brown in butter .  Add your favorite salsa .  Cover and simmer until chicken pieces are done .  Do not allow salsa to break down .  Simmer approximately 30 minutes .  Serve over rice , pasta , potatoes or polenta .  Serves 4 .

question: I have potatoes pepper cheddar cheese cauliflowerets onion ham celery flour carrots milk boiling water butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cheddar Chowder with 2 c .  boiling water , 1 c .  diced potatoes , 1/2 c .  sliced celery , 1 to 1 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/4 c .  butter , 2 c .  milk , 2 c .  (8 oz . ) shredded Cheddar cheese , 2 c .  cauliflowerets , 1/2 c .  sliced carrots , 1/4 c .  chopped onion , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 1/4 c .  flour , 1 c .  cubed ham . Here's the instruction : In saucepan , combine water , vegetables , salt and pepper .  Cover and simmer 10 minutes .  Do not drain .  In large saucepan , melt butter .  Stir in flour , them milk and heat to boiling .  Continue simmering , stirring constantly until thickened .  Add Cheddar cheese .  Stir until melted .  Add undrained vegetables and ham .  Heat through , but do not boil .  Freezes well .  Makes 8 servings .

question: I have pecans flour sharp cheese butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cheese Patties With Pecans with 1/2 lb .  sharp cheese , 1 stick butter , 1 1/2 c .  flour , 3/4 tsp .  salt , pecans . Here's the instruction : Grate cheese and mix with softened butter .  Add flour and salt; work mixture with hands until it firms up .  Shape into long roll; wrap in waxed paper .  Refrigerate .  Cut as for icebox cookies .  Put pecan pieces on top .  Bake at 400° for 10 minutes .

question: I have cocktail sauce lemon juice parsley flakes cream cheese mayonnaise shrimp garlic worcestershire sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Crab Spread(Appetizer)   with 8 oz .  cream cheese , 1 Tbsp .  mayonnaise , 1 Tbsp .  Worcestershire sauce , 1 tsp .  lemon juice , garlic to taste , parsley flakes , 1 lb .  cooked shrimp or crab flakes , cocktail sauce . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients , except parsley , shrimp (or crab) and cocktail sauce .  Spread on glass plate .  Top with cocktail sauce and shrimp (or crab); sprinkle with parsley .  Serve with chips or crackers .

question: I have egg substitute sugar sweet onions corn flakes paprika salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Crispy Baked Onion Rings with 2 large sweet onions , 1 (7 oz . ) pkg .  corn flakes , 1 tsp .  seasoned salt , 2 tsp .  sugar , 1 tsp .  paprika , 1 c .  egg substitute . Here's the instruction : Cut onions into rings .  Combine cereal , salt , sugar and paprika .  Divide in half .  Beat egg at high speed with electric mixer until soft peaks form .  Dip onion in egg .  Dredge in crumb mixture .  Place in single layer on baking sheet coated with vegetable cooking spray .  Bake at 375° for 15 minutes until crispy .  Good and low-fat .

question: I have sugar chunky peanut butter rice krispies white corn syrup chocolate chips . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Peanut Butter Rice Krispie Bars with 1 c .  chunky peanut butter , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  white corn syrup (Karo) , 2 c .  Rice Krispies cereal , 1 small pkg .  chocolate chips . Here's the instruction : Cream together peanut butter , sugar and corn syrup .  Add Rice Krispies and put in an 8 x 8-inch pan .  Press down .  Top with chocolate chip pieces and place in heated oven until chocolate melts .  Spread with knife .  Cool and cut into serving pieces .

question: I have baking powder vanilla shortening brown sugar eggs cinnamon baking soda flour nuts coconut oatmeal salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Unusual Oatmeal Cookies with 1 c .  shortening , 2 c .  brown sugar , 2 eggs , 1 Tbsp .  vanilla , 2 c .  flour , 2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 tsp .  baking soda , 1 tsp .  salt , 2 c .  coconut , 1 1/2 c .  chopped nuts , 1 1/2 c .  oatmeal . Here's the instruction : Cream shortening and sugar; add eggs and vanilla .  Beat well .  Sift flour , baking powder , soda , cinnamon and salt .  Add gradually .  Stir in oatmeal , coconut and nuts .  Beat well .  Drop by teaspoonful on cookie sheets .  Bake at 350° for 12 to 15 minutes .  Makes 5 dozen .

question: I have vegetable juice sugar tomatoes lemon juice salad oil green pepper green onion celery carrots cucumber garlic worcestershire sauce salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Salad Soup with 1 small clove garlic or garlic salt , 1 Tbsp .  sugar , 1 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 large can V-8 vegetable juice , 1/4 c .  salad oil , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1 tsp .  Worcestershire sauce , 3 tomatoes , finely diced , 1 cucumber (about 1 1/2 c . ) , finely diced , 1 green pepper , finely diced , 1 c .  shredded carrots , 1 c .  thinly sliced celery , 1/4 c .  thinly sliced green onion (can use chopped white onions) . Here's the instruction : Mix first 7 ingredients in a blender .  Stir in remaining ingredients .  Chill at least 1 hour before serving .  Keeps for weeks in refrigerator .

question: I have lemon-lime soda maraschino cherries orange ginger ale red maraschino cherries . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Christmas Cheer Punch with 3 large bottles ginger ale , 3 large bottles lemon-lime soda , 12 red maraschino cherries , 1 firm orange , sliced , 12 green maraschino cherries . Here's the instruction : Chill ginger ale and soda in bottles in refrigerator .  Pour part of ginger ale and lemon-lime in separate ice cube trays; place a green or red cherry or orange slice in each cube .  Freeze as quickly as possible .  When ready to serve , put cubes in chilled punch bowl and pour in chilled carbonated beverages .  Place bowl in bed of Christmas greens or other appropriate decoration .  Yields 30 servings .

question: I have cranberries orange sugar . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fresh Cranberry-Orange Relish with 1 navel orange , unpeeled and cut into small chunks , 1 bag cranberries (12 oz . ) , 3/4 c .  granulated sugar . Here's the instruction : Process all ingredients in food processor using on/off turns until finely chopped .  Cover and chill at least 1 hour .  Makes 3 cups; 12 servings .

question: I have buttermilk flour mayonnaise . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make May Muffins with 1 c .  self-rising flour , 3 Tbsp .  mayonnaise , 1/2 c .  buttermilk . Here's the instruction : Mix lightly , bake in greased muffin pan for 15 to 20 minutes in a 425° preheated oven .  Yields 10 to 12 muffins .

question: I have oil lemon pepper dill garlic oyster crackers . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Oyster Cracker Snack with oyster crackers , 1 pkg .  Ranch dressing mix , 1/3 c .  oil , 1/2 tsp .  dill seed , 1/2 tsp .  lemon pepper , 1/4 tsp .  garlic . Here's the instruction : Mix all dry ingredients and spread over crackers , then spread oil over .

question: I have liquid peas condensed cream salmon chips . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Quick Salmon Casserole with 1 (7 3/4 oz . ) can salmon , 1 (10 oz . ) can condensed cream of mushroom soup , 1/4 c .  liquid (liquid from canned salmon plus milk to volume) , 1 1/2 c .  cooked or canned peas , 1 c .  unbroken potato chips . Here's the instruction : Drain and flake salmon and save liquid .  In a 1-quart , greased casserole , combine soup , liquid , peas and salmon .  Top with potato chips .  Place in a moderately hot oven (375°) and bake for 30 minutes or until bubbling hot .  Makes 4 to 6 servings .  This is very delicious .

question: I have snow peas chicken-style soy sauce water chestnuts green onions tofu mashed tofu water fresh bean sprouts flour yeast . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Tofu Foo Yong with 2 Tbsp .  water , 1 c .  snow peas , cut in 1-inch pieces , 8 green onions , cut in 1 1/2-inch pieces , 8 oz .  can sliced water chestnuts , 2 c .  fresh bean sprouts , 1 3/4 lb .  tofu , 2 Tbsp .  soy sauce , 1/2 c .  mashed tofu , 3 Tbsp .  unbleached flour , 3/4 c .  yeast flakes , 2 Tbsp .  CHICKEN-STYLE SEASONING . Here's the instruction : Saute snow peas, green onions and chestnuts in water over low heat for 5 minutes .  When vegetables are crisp-tender , mix in sprouts , remove from heat and set aside .

question: I have sour cream sugar vanilla lemon juice eggs cream cheese cornstarch ricotta cheese butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cheese Cake with 1 lb .  Ricotta cheese (low-fat) , 3 (3 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , softened (low-fat) , 1 c .  sugar , 4 eggs , slightly beaten , 1/3 c .  cornstarch , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1/2 c .  melted butter or oleo , 1 pt .  sour cream (low-fat) . Here's the instruction : Grease spring-form pan with butter; dust with graham cracker crumbs .  Beat cream cheese and Ricotta until creamy .  Blend in sugar and eggs .  Add cornstarch , lemon juice and vanilla until blended .  Add melted butter and sour cream and blend well .  Pour into a 10-inch spring-form pan up to top ring .  Bake in preheated 250° oven for about 1 1/2 hours until firm around edges .  Turn off heat and leave in oven for 2 hours .  Cool on rack , then put in refrigerator until morning .  Remove sides of pan .  Top with any topping you wish or eat plain .

question: I have sugar vanilla shortening brown sugar eggs baking soda flour chocolate chips salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make M&M Cookies with 1 c .  shortening , 1 c .  brown sugar , 1/2 c .  sugar , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 1 1/2 c .  M&M's or chocolate chips , 2 eggs , 2 1/4 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 1 tsp .  salt . Here's the instruction : Blend shortening , brown and white sugar in bowl .  Beat in vanilla and eggs . question: I have sour cream grated monterey pepper sweet paprika clove garlic baguette chickpeas salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chickpea Spread On Baguette with 16 oz .  can chickpeas , 8 oz .  sour cream , 1 small clove garlic , pressed , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  pepper , 1/2 Tbsp .  sweet paprika , 1 c .  grated Monterey Jack cheese , baguette . question: I have tuna onion green pepper macaroni . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Quick One Dish Meal with 1 box Kraft macaroni and cheese , 1 green pepper , chopped , 1 (6 oz . ) can tuna , 1 small onion , chopped . question: I have cinnamon sugar ground cloves . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Instant Spiced Russian Tea with 1 c .  Tang , 1/4 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  presweetened lemon flavored instant tea , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 tsp .  ground cloves . question: I have sour cream onion taco seasoning mix beans grated cheese ground beef tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Bean Dip with 1 lb .  ground beef , 1 medium onion , diced , 1 can refried beans , 1 pkg .  taco seasoning mix , 1 (15 oz . ) can tomato sauce , 1 small pkg .  sour cream , grated cheese (Mexican , optional) . Here's the instruction : Brown ground beef with onion .  Drain grease .  Add refried beans , seasoning mix and tomato sauce .  Mix well .  Spread in shallow dish .  Top with grated cheese .

question: I have sugar gelatin lemon juice eggs pastry shell cold water prunes milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Prune Whip Pie with 1/2 lb .  cooked , dried prunes , 1/4 c .  juice from prunes , 1 1/2 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1/2 c .  sugar , pinch of salt , 2 eggs , separated , 1/2 c .  milk , 1 tsp .  gelatin , 2 Tbsp .  cold water , baked 8 or 9-inch pastry shell . Here's the instruction : Remove stones from prunes and press pulp through food mill or coarse sieve .  Add juice , sugar and salt .  Beat egg yolks; add milk and cook over boiling water , stirring constantly , until mixture coats spoon .  Remove from heat at once and stir in gelatin , which has been softened 5 minutes in the cold water .  Add to prunes when cool .  Fold in stiffly beaten egg whites . question: I have nonfat dry milk orange flavored instant breakfast marshmallows peanut butter raisins cheerios butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Breakfast Bars with 1/2 c .  butter/margarine , 3 c .  miniature marshmallows , 1/2 c .  peanut butter , 1/2 c .  nonfat dry milk , 1/4 c .  orange flavored instant breakfast drink , 1 c .  raisins , 4 c .  Cheerios . Here's the instruction : Butter 9 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan .  In a large saucepan , melt butter and marshmallows over low heat , stirring constantly .  Stir in peanut butter until melted .  Stir in milk and breakfast drink .  Remove from heat .  Fold in raisins and cereal stirring until evenly coated .  Turn into pan .  With buttered hands , pat evenly in pan .  Cool thoroughly .  Cut into bars .  Makes 1 dozen bars .

question: I have egg lemon juice salmon crackers onion celery parsley dry mustard salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Salmon Patties For Two with 1 (7 3/4 oz . ) can salmon , 8 soda crackers , crumbled , 1 egg , 1 Tbsp .  onion , grated , 1 Tbsp .  parsley , 1/4 to 1 tsp .  dry mustard , salt , celery , chopped , 1 Tbsp .  lemon juice . Here's the instruction : Drain salmon , reserving liquid .  Flake and clean salmon and blend it with the reserved liquid and the remaining ingredients .  Add more crackers or another egg if the consistency will not make firm patties .  After you make the patties , fry them in a skillet .  Fry with 2 or 3 tablespoons melted butter .  Brown on both sides .  Serve with sliced lemon wedges .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs soda dates flour butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Soft Date Cookies with 1 pkg dates cut up , 2 tsp soda , 2 c .  sugar , 2 Tbsp butter , 2 eggs , 2 tsp vanilla , 4 c .  flour , salt . Here's the instruction : Cream sugar and butter .  Then add eggs , vanilla , salt and flour .  Then the cooled dates , 1/2 c nuts may be added .  The batter will be soft .  Drop by teaspoonfuls on cookie sheet .  Bake at 375° 12 to 15 minutes .

question: I have canning salt vinegar corn water . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pickled Corn with corn , canning salt , water , vinegar . Here's the instruction : Cook corn until just tender; rinse until cold .  Leave on cob or cut off .  Put in jars .  Pour over a mixture of 1 gallon water , 1 cup salt and 2/3 cup vinegar .  Seal and let stand a few weeks .

question: I have cream of chicken soup chicken breasts stuffing cream of celery soup chicken broth margarine . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Casserole with 4 to 6 large chicken breasts , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 1 can cream of celery soup , 2 cans chicken broth , 1 pkg .  stuffing , 1 stick margarine . Repeat this step .  Add mixture to moisten .  Pour cream of chicken and celery soup plus chicken broth over the layers .  Bake at 350° for 45 minutes .

question: I have summer squash sugar eggs cheddar cheese onion ground sage paprika butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

Cheddar cheese , grated , 1 Tbsp .  sugar , 2 eggs , beaten , 3 Tbsp .  butter , melted , 1 tsp .  ground sage , paprika , salt and pepper to taste . question: I have potatoes pepper onion thyme marjoram butter vegetable oil . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have flour milk bacon drippings salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Brown Gravy with 4 Tbsp .  bacon drippings , 1 tsp .  salt , 3 Tbsp .  self-rising flour , 2 c .  whole milk . Here's the instruction : Add bacon grease , salt and flour .  Stir until brown .  Add milk slowly , stirring until thickens .  Serves 8 .

question: I have oil white beans fresh ground pepper oregano tomatoes beef broth basil clove garlic cheese parsley pasta salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Italian Pasta And Bean Soup(Pasta E Fagioli)   with 1 clove garlic , crushed , 3 Tbsp .  oil , 1 (16 oz . ) can tomatoes or 2 c .  chopped fresh tomatoes , 2 (13 3/4 oz . ) cans beef broth , 1 Tbsp .  minced parsley , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  fresh ground pepper , 1/8 tsp .  basil , 1/8 tsp .  oregano , 1 (16 oz . ) can white beans , drained , 1/2 lb .  Ditalini pasta or Elbow pasta , cooked "al dente" , Grated cheese . Here's the instruction : In medium saucepan , saute garlic in oil just until it begins to brown . question: I have sugar baking powder shortening eggs baking soda cinnamon cloves water raisins flour nuts pumpkin salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pumpkin Muffins with 1/3 c .  shortening , 1 1/3 c .  sugar , 2 eggs , 1 c .  pumpkin , 1/3 c .  water , 1 1/2 c .  plus 3 Tbsp .  flour , 2 tsp .  baking soda , 3/4 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 tsp .  cloves , 1/3 c .  chopped nuts , 1/3 c .  raisins . question: I have cabbage kidney beans tomatoes pepper chili beans onion celery hamburger green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cabbage Patch Stew with 1 lb .  hamburger , 1/2 c .  sliced celery , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  pepper , 1 can tomatoes , 1 medium onion , chopped , 1/2 c .  chopped green pepper , 1 can chili beans , 1 can kidney beans , 3 c .  shredded cabbage . Here's the instruction : Combine the first 7 ingredients .  Brown until meat is done .  Drain and add remaining ingredients .  May want to add to a stew pot .  Bring to boil and then simmer 30 to 45 minutes .

question: I have swiss cheese mayonnaise sauerkraut corned beef . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Reuben Dip with 4 pkg .  Buddig corned beef , cubed , 1 can sauerkraut , drain and chop , 3/4 to 1 lb .  Swiss cheese , shredded , 1/2 c .  real mayonnaise . Here's the instruction : Mix together and heat in oven at 300° .  Serve warm on cocktail rye or pumpernickel bread .

question: I have broccoli cheese soup pepper water broccoli flowerets margarine skinless . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make V. Mc'S Chicken And Broccoli with 1 Tbsp .  margarine or butter , 4 skinless , boneless chicken breast halves , 1 can broccoli cheese soup , 1/3 c .  water or milk , 2 c .  broccoli flowerets , 1/8 tsp .  pepper . question: I have mayonnaise onion salt cream cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Onion Sandwich Spread with 1 large onion , 1 (4 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , 4 Tbsp .  mayonnaise , 1 pinch salt . Here's the instruction : Chop onion real fine . question: I have oil baking powder brown sugar eggs soda flour nuts coconut white sugar oatmeal salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla pie shell eggs syrup pecan halves margarine . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pecan Pie with 3 eggs , slightly beaten , 1 c .  Karo syrup , 1 c .  sugar , 2 Tbsp .  margarine , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 1/2 c .  pecan halves , 1 unbaked (9-inch) pie shell . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients until well blended .  Add nuts last .  Pour in shell .  Bake at 350° for 50 to 55 minutes .

question: I have orange rind concentrate water . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Florida Orange Chiffon Pie with 1 (3 to 5 . 8 oz . ) pkg .  instant vanilla pudding , 1/2 c .  undiluted Florida orange concentrate , 1/2 c .  water , 1 (2 oz . ) envelope whipped topping , 1 to 2 Tbsp .  grated orange rind .
