answer: you can make Blended Gazpacho with 2 cloves garlic , 4 fresh tomatoes , 2 medium onions , 2 green peppers , 2 cucumbers , 4 eggs , 1/4 c .  vinegar , 1/4 tsp .  salt , dash of cayenne , 3/4 c .  tomato juice , 1/4 c .  salad or olive oil , 2 Tbsp .  butter , 1 c .  small bread cubes . Here's the instruction : Remove garlic skins; peel away tomato skins and blend 1 clove garlic and 3 tomatoes in your electric blender .  Now add 1 onion (cut in quarters) , 1 green pepper (cut in quarters) and 1 cucumber (peeled and cut in cubes) to blender mixture and blend again .  Strain mixture into a large serving bowl .  Blend together eggs , vinegar , salt , cayenne and tomato juice long enough to mix thoroughly .  Stir into the serving bowl and chill in refrigerator .  Add oil before serving .  Chop remaining tomato , onion , cucumber and green pepper in very fine pieces (some blenders will do this) .  Keep these 4 vegetables in separate piles .  Then put into 4 small bowls .  Heat butter with remaining clove of garlic; toss in bread cubes and fry until crisp and golden .  Put these into a small bowl .

question: I have sugar eggs flour paprika golden crushed corn lots of pepper butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Corn Pudding with 1 can golden crushed corn , 2 eggs , slightly beaten , 2 Tbsp .  flour , 1 Tbsp .  sugar , 1 c .  half and half , 1/2 stick butter , salt , lots of pepper , sprinkle of paprika . Here's the instruction : Melt butter in casserole .  Beat eggs .  Add flour , sugar , salt and pepper .  Add corn; mix well with electric mixer .  Add butter (that melted) and half and half; mix well .  Pour into casserole .  Sprinkle paprika on top .  Bake at 325° for an hour (it should jiggle and a knife should come out kinda clean) .

question: I have cream of mushroom soup deli onion soup . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Roast Beef In Crock-Pot with 2 lb .  thinly sliced deli roast beef , 1 pkg .  Lipton onion soup mix , 1 can cream of mushroom soup . Here's the instruction : Combine in crock-pot and cook 1 1/2 hours on high or 3 hours on low .  Serve on buns if desired .

question: I have kidney beans ground pepper bacon brown sugar onion butter beans pork lima beans dry mustard white wine vinegar garlic . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Beans, Beans, Beans! with 10 slices bacon , 1 c .  chopped onion , 1 large garlic clove , chopped , 1 (1 lb . ) can butter beans , drained , 1 (1 lb . ) can lima beans , drained , 1 (1 lb . ) can kidney beans , drained , 1 (15 oz . ) can pork and beans , not drained , 3/4 c .  brown sugar , 1/2 tsp .  dry mustard , 1/2 c .  white wine vinegar , 1 tsp .  ground pepper . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Brown bacon in skillet .  Drain , crumble and set aside .  Add onion and garlic to bacon drippings in pan; saute until onion is soft .  Combine all ingredients in a casserole dish and bake for 1 1/2 hours .

question: I have vanilla powdered sugar cream cheese margarine melting chocolate . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Butter Creams with 3 oz .  cream cheese , 1/2 c .  margarine , 4 c .  powdered sugar , 1 1/2 tsp .  vanilla , melting chocolate . Here's the instruction : Mix ingredients until well blended .  Form into uniform balls .  Melt chocolate in a double boiler on low heat .  Dip balls into chocolate to cover .  Let cool; store airtight in a cool dry place .

question: I have frozen leaf spinach pepper nutmeg onion flour margarine chicken broth whipping cream . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cream Of Spinach Soup with 1 1/2 c .  frozen leaf spinach , thawed and drained , 1 1/4 c .  chicken broth , 3 Tbsp .  margarine , 1/4 c .  chopped onion , 2 Tbsp .  flour , 1/2 c .  whipping cream , dash of pepper , dash of nutmeg . Here's the instruction : Blend spinach and 1/2 cup chicken broth in blender until pureed .  In saucepan , melt margarine .  Add onion and saute until tender .  Stir in flour and cook about 1 minute .  Add remaining chicken broth and cook until thickened .  Stir in pureed spinach mixture , whipping cream , pepper and nutmeg .  Heat thoroughly .  Makes 2 or 3 servings .

question: I have low-salt chicken broth veal stew meat oregano bell pepper red pepper mushrooms flour ground allspice steamed white rice garlic marsala wine olive oil . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Veal With Mushrooms And Peppers with 4 Tbsp .  olive oil , 1 lb .  veal stew meat , cut into 1 inch cubes , all-purpose flour , 12 large mushrooms , quartered , 1 large bell pepper (red) , sliced , 1 Tbsp .  dried oregano , crumbled , 1/2 tsp .  ground allspice , 1/4 tsp .  dried crushed red pepper , 3/4 c .  dry Marsala wine , 3 large garlic cloves , 1/2 c .  low-salt chicken broth , steamed white rice . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Heat 2 tablespoons oil in heavy large ovenproof skillet over medium-high heat .  Dredge veal in flour , shaking off excess .  Add veal to skillet and cook until brown , stirring occasionally (about 5 minutes) .  Transfer veal to plate , using slotted spoon .  Heat remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil in same skillet .  Add mushrooms , bell pepper , oregano , allspice and crushed red pepper to skillet .  Saute until mushrooms are just beginning to brown (about 3 minutes) .  Stir in Marsala wine and garlic and boil until skillet is almost dry .  Add veal and juices on plate to skillet .  Mix in chicken broth and bring to a boil .  Cover and bake in oven until veal is tender .  Transfer to stove and boil until liquid thickens .  Serve with rice .  Serves 4 .

question: I have cream of chicken soup broccoli cuts cheddar cheese milk chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Broccoli Casserole with 1 bag broccoli cuts , cooked chicken , cut up , 1 to 1 1/2 lb .  grated Cheddar cheese , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 1 can milk . Here's the instruction : Cook broccoli until slightly tender .  Drain .  Layer a casserole dish with broccoli cuts , chicken and cheese .  Mix cream of chicken soup with milk and pour over casserole .  Make sure it gets down through the mixture .  Bake at 350° for 45 minutes .

question: I have buttermilk sugar shortening eggs soda flour bran flakes all-bran cereal boiling water salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Bran Muffins with 2 c .  boiling water , 2 c .  All-Bran cereal , 2 1/2 c .  sugar , 1 c .  shortening , 1 qt .  buttermilk , 4 eggs , 5 c .  flour , 5 tsp .  soda , 2 tsp .  salt , 4 c .  bran flakes . Here's the instruction : Combine 2 cups boiling water over All-Bran cereal .  Let cool .  Cream shortening and sugar .  Add eggs .  Add alternately the wet and dry ingredients .  Bake muffins at 400° for 15 to 18 minutes .  Batter will keep in refrigerator indefinitely .

question: I have pineapple juice sherbet hawaiian fruit vodka . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Party Punch with 1 large can pineapple juice , 1 large can Hawaiian fruit punch , 1/2 bottle Southern Comfort or vodka , 1 large bottle 7-Up , 1/2 gal .  rainbow sherbet . Here's the instruction : Mix all liquids together .  Top punch by adding scoops of sherbet to the bowl .  This also helps to keep it chilled .

question: I have cucumbers white pepper salt white vinegar . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Jan Clay'S Cucumber Sauce For Fish with 2 medium cucumbers , 3 Tbsp .  white vinegar , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/8 tsp .  white pepper . Here's the instruction : Grate cucumber .  Mix with seasonings .  Pack into covered container and refrigerate .

question: I have baking powder sugar eggs powdered sugar flour nuts coconut candied cherries butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Charming Cherry Bars with 1 1/4 c .  flour , 1/4 c .  powdered sugar , 1/2 c .  butter , 3/4 c .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 2 beaten eggs , 1/2 c .  coconut , 1/2 c .  finely chopped candied cherries , 1/2 c .  nuts . Here's the instruction : Sift 1 cup flour and powdered sugar .  Dot in butter .  Press into 11 x 17-inch pan .  Bake 10 minutes at 350° .

question: I have chicken bouillon sugar soy sauce cornstarch barbecue sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Barbecued Chicken Wings with 1 bottle Kraft hickory barbecue sauce , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/4 c .  soy sauce , 2 Tbsp .  cornstarch , 1 c .  chicken bouillon . Here's the instruction : Mix ingredients in a saucepan .  Bring to a boil .  Set aside .  Dip chicken wings in sauce .  Lay on foil-lined cookie sheet .  Bake at 325° for about 1 hour .

question: I have ground red pepper cornflake crumbs yogurt clove garlic parsley chicken worcestershire sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Oven Fried Chicken with 2 - 2 1/2 lbs .  meaty chicken , breasts , thighs or drumsticks skinned , 1/4 c .  cornflake crumbs , 1 Tbsp .  parsley , 1/3 c .  plain low-fat yogurt , 1 clove garlic , minced , 2 tsp .  worcestershire sauce or white wine worcestershire sauce , dash ground red pepper . Here's the instruction : Rinse chicken , pat dry .  Place on a rack in a shallow baking pan and set aside .  In a small mixing bowl combine cornflake crumbs and parsley; set aside .  In another bowl combine yogurt , garlic , worcestershire sauce and pepper .  Brush chicken with yogurt mixture , then sprinkle with crumb mixture .  Bake uncovered in 375° oven for 45 to 55 minutes or till chicken is tender and no longer pink .  Makes 6 servings .

question: I have flour . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Beer Bread with 2 2/3 c .  self-rising flour , 12 oz .  beer , freshly opened , chilled or at room temperature . Here's the instruction : Lightly grease a 9 x 5 x 3 inch loaf pan .  Preheat oven to 375° .  Put flour in medium bowl .  Add beer and stir with a rubber spatula just until mixed and flour is moistened completely .  Scrape into prepared pan .  Bake 50 to 55 minutes until top is lightly browned , sides pull away from pan and pick inserted into center comes out clean .  Cool in pan on wire rack 5 minutes , then turn out on rack to cool .

question: I have buttermilk sugar vanilla double-acting baking powder eggs baking soda unpeeled apples flour walnuts butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Raw Apple Bread with 1/2 c .  butter or margarine , 1 c .  sugar , 2 eggs , 2 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  baking soda , 1 tsp .  double-acting baking powder , 2 Tbsp .  buttermilk or sour milk , 1 c .  coarsely chopped unpeeled apples , 1/2 c .  coarsely chopped walnuts or pecans , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Cream butter and sugar , then beat until light and lemon colored .  Beat in eggs .  Sift together dry ingredients .  Add alternately to the creamed mixture with milk .  Stir in apples , nuts and vanilla .  Pour into greased 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan .  Bake at 350° for 50 to 60 minutes until knife inserted comes out clean .  Cool in the pan for 5 minutes , then loosen from pan and turn out onto a rack to cool completely before slicing .  Serves 10 to 12 .

question: I have cabbage potatoes sweet onion corn tomatoes healthy choice tomato soup oregano peppers basil carrots baby limas beef bouillon rutabaga salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cabbage Soup with 1/2 large cabbage , cut up , 2 potatoes , chopped , 3 carrots , sliced in large pieces , 1 turnip , chopped , 1 sweet onion , in large pieces , 1 large can corn , 2 large cans whole tomatoes , 3 cubes beef bouillon , 1 can rutabaga , 1/2 c .  baby limas , 1 can Healthy Choice tomato soup , 2 pods jalapeno peppers , 1/2 tsp .  oregano , salt and pepper to taste , 1/2 tsp .  basil . Here's the instruction : Prepare all vegetables .  You can leave the skin on the potatoes if you like .  Add all the other ingredients to a large pot or crock-pot .  Add water to fill the pot and cover the vegetables .  Now simmer for 8 or 9 hours until ready to eat .

question: I have cake flour natural peanut butter egg white baking powder unsweetened applesauce vanilla extract brown sugar eggs milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Peanut Butter Cake(Low Calorie-160 Per Slice)   with 2/3 c .  unsweetened applesauce , 2 c .  sifted cake flour , 3 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 c .  reduced fat or natural peanut butter , 1 c .  packed brown sugar , 1 tsp .  vanilla extract , 2 large eggs , 1 large egg white , 3/4 c .  fat free milk . Here's the instruction : Place a strainer over a deep bowl .  Spoon applesauce into the strainer and set aside to drain 15 minutes .  You should have about 1/3 cup drained applesauce .  Discard the liquid .  Preheat oven to 350° .  Coat 13 x 9 inch baking dish with nonstick spray .  In medium bowl , combine flour and baking powder .  In a large bowl , with an electric mixer , beat peanut butter 2 minutes .  Add drained applesauce and beat 2 minutes or until creamy .  Beat in vanilla extract .  Beat in eggs , one at a time .  Beat in egg white .  Beat in milk .  Add flour mixture and mix on low until moistened .  Pour batter into prepared baking dish and bake 20-25 minutes or until cake springs back when pressed .  Cool completely in dish on a rack .

question: I have sugar ginger nutmeg eggs cinnamon pumpkin milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make New England Pumpkin Pie with 1 can pumpkin (2 large c . ) , 2 c .  sugar , 4 eggs , 2 c .  milk , 2 pie crusts , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  ginger , 2 tsp .  nutmeg , 3 tsp .  cinnamon . Here's the instruction : Stir together the pumpkin , sugar , eggs and salt .  Add the milk and stir again .  Take a little of the pumpkin mix in cup and put the spices in and stir well .  Then add to the pumpkin mix .  Divide between the pie crusts .  Bake at 450° for 10 minutes .  Lower the oven to 325° and bake for 30 minutes .

question: I have sour cream egg vanilla brown sugar cinnamon soda peeled apples flour nuts whipped cream butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sour Cream Apple Cake with 2 c .  flour , 2 c .  brown sugar , 1/2 c .  butter or margarine , 1 c .  chopped nuts , 2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 tsp .  soda , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 c .  sour cream , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 egg , beaten , 2 c .  chopped , peeled apples , whipped cream . Here's the instruction : In a mixing bowl , combine flour , brown sugar and butter; blend at low speed until crumbly .  Stir in the nuts .  Press about 2 3/4 cups into the bottom of an ungreased 9 x 13-inch pan .

question: I have potatoes eggs onion mayonnaise paprika mustard dill pickles . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Potato Salad with 2-3 lb .  potatoes , 3-5 boiled eggs , chopped , 4 dill pickles , chopped , 1 jar of sweet pickle relish , 1 large onion , chopped , 1-2 c .  mayonnaise , 1/2-1 c .  mustard , Paprika . Here's the instruction : Boil potatoes with skin on .  When cool , peel off skins and cut potatoes into pieces .  Add eggs , pickles , onions and sweet relish to the potatoes .  Add mayonnaise and mustard to taste and to make the salad the way you like it .  Sprinkle paprika over the salad .  Refrigerate until ready to serve .

question: I have oil sugar wonton skins peanut oil water . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Glazed Butterflies with 1 pkg .  wonton skins , 3 c .  sugar , 1 Tbsp .  oil , peanut oil , 1 c .  water . Here's the instruction : Twist each wonton skin in the center to resemble a butterfly .  Heat peanut oil to 375° in saucepan or electric skillet .  Deep fry each skin in hot oil until golden brown .  Drain on paper towel .

question: I have bacon pepper heavy cream cayenne pepper eggs powdered mustard swiss cheese onion pie crust salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Quiche Lorraine with 2 c .  grated Swiss cheese , 8 slices crisp bacon , crumbled , 1 unbaked 9-inch pie crust (I use Pet Ritz deep dish pie shell) , 4 large eggs , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 1/2 tsp .  powdered mustard , 2 c .  heavy cream (whipping cream) , 1/2 scant tsp .  salt , dash of cayenne pepper , 1/4 or less chopped onion . Here's the instruction : Sprinkle cheese and bacon into unbaked 9-inch pie shell .  Beat very well remaining ingredients together and pour over cheese mixture .  Bake in a preheated 375° oven for 45 minutes or until firm and browned .  Cool 10 minutes and then cut into wedges and serve hot .

question: I have oleo soda cracker crumbs graham cracker crumbs vanilla instant pudding butterfinger vanilla ice cream milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Toffee Refrigerator Dessert with 1 1/2 c .  graham cracker crumbs , finely crushed , 1/2 c .  soda cracker crumbs , 1/2 c .  oleo , melted , 2 pkg .  vanilla instant pudding , 2 c .  milk , 1 qt .  vanilla ice cream , softened , 1 (4 1/2 oz . ) tub Cool Whip , 2 Butterfinger candy bars , crushed . Here's the instruction : Mix the first 3 ingredients and pat into a 9 x 13-inch dish .

question: I have chili sauce coffee brown sugar onions beef brisket . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Vern'S Easy Beef Brisket with 3 to 5 lb .  beef brisket (flat cut) , 2 sliced onions , 1 c .  prepared instant coffee , 2 bottles chili sauce , 3 Tbsp .  brown sugar . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 325° .  Place onions in bottom of metal baking pan and place beef brisket (not corned) on top .  Pour coffee over meat , then pour over the chili sauce .  Sprinkle brown sugar over all .  Cover baking pan tightly with foil .  Bake for 3 1/2 to 4 hours .  Allow to sit for 8 to 10 minutes before slicing thinly across grain .

question: I have sour cream pepper green onions garlic salt cheddar cheese egg noodles ground chuck cottage cheese tomato sauce butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sour Cream Noodle Bake(Serves 6)   with 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  medium egg noodles , 2 Tbsp .  butter or margarine , 1 lb .  ground chuck , 1 (8 oz . ) can tomato sauce , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 4/ tsp .  garlic salt , 1/8 tsp .  pepper , 1 c .  cottage cheese , 1 c .  sour cream , 1/4 c .  chopped green onions , 3/4 c .  coarsely grated Cheddar cheese . Here's the instruction : Cook noodles according to package directions; rinse and drain .  Melt butter in skillet .  Stir in chuck and cook until it loses its pink color .  Add tomato sauce , salt , garlic salt and pepper .  Cover and simmer 5 minutes .  Fold together noodles , cottage cheese , sour cream and onions .

question: I have onion celery soup rice frozen broccoli butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli Casserole with 3 tsp .  chopped onion , 1/4 c .  butter , 1 pkg .  frozen broccoli , 1 small jar Cheez Whiz , 1 can celery soup , 1 c .  cooked rice . Here's the instruction : Cook onion in butter 2 to 3 minutes .  Add broccoli and heat until it thaws .  Stir in soup , cheese and cooked rice .  Mix together .  Bake at 350° for 45 minutes .

question: I have italian dressing macaroni parmesan cheese onion mushrooms pimentos green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Italian Pasta Salad with 12 oz .  rainbow twirl macaroni , 1 small jar pimentos , 1 green pepper , chopped , Parmesan cheese , 1 onion , chopped , 1 small jar mushrooms , sliced , 1 bottle Italian dressing . Here's the instruction : Cook macaroni as directed on package; drain and let cool .  Mix all other ingredients with macaroni .  You may need more or less Italian dressing according to taste .  Keep in refrigerator .  Sprinkle with Parmesan when served .

question: I have sugar nutmeg eggs cinnamon cloves pecans raisins flour milk allspice butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Japanese Fruit Cake with 3 eggs , 1 c .  milk , 3 c .  flour , 2 c .  sugar , 1 c .  butter , 1 tsp .  allspice , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 tsp .  cloves , 1 tsp .  nutmeg , 1 c .  seedless raisins , 2 c .  chopped pecans . Here's the instruction : Mix eggs , milk , flour , sugar and butter together .  Put 1/3 mixture in greased and floured 9-inch cake pan .  Mix last 6 ingredients .  Add to the other 2/3 of batter .  Bake in two 9-inch cake pans at 325° .

question: I have graham cracker crust lemon juice milk o peaches . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Peach Pie with 1 can Eagle Brand milk , small pkg .  peach Jell-O , 1 c .  fresh peaches , 1/3 c .  lemon juice , 9 oz .  Cool Whip , 1 graham cracker crust . Here's the instruction : Mix Cool Whip and Eagle Brand milk .  Sprinkle dry Jell-O over and mix well .  Add peaches , then lemon juice .  Mix well .  Pour into graham cracker crust .  Chill .  (This also freezes well . )

question: I have bell pepper onion margarine chicken broth rice shrimp salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Rice Cooker Shrimp with 1 medium onion , chopped , 1 bell pepper , chopped , 1 1/2 c .  uncooked , unwashed rice (measuring cup , not rice cooker cup) , 1 (15 oz . ) can chicken broth , 1 stick margarine , sliced , 1 1/2 lb .  peeled and deveined shrimp , salt and pepper and Tony Chachere to taste . Here's the instruction : Combine all ingredients in a bowl .  Mix well .  Put in rice cooker and cook as usual .

question: I have oil oregano sugar tomato paste pepper onion water garlic salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make All-Purpose Sauce with 1 c .  chopped onion , 2 cloves garlic , minced , 2 Tbsp .  oil , 2 (6 oz . ) cans Hunt's tomato paste , 3 c .  water , 2 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  sugar , 1 tsp .  oregano , 1/4 tsp .  pepper . Here's the instruction : Cook onion and garlic in oil until tender .  Add remaining ingredients .  Simmer , uncovered , for 30 minutes .  Makes 4 cups .

question: I have unflavored gelatin sugar vanilla powdered sugar water walnuts . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Melt-In-Your-Mouth Marshmallows(Microwave)   with 1 3/4 c .  Diamond walnuts , 2 envelopes unflavored gelatin , 1 1/4 c .  water , divided , 2 c .  granulated sugar , 2 tsp .  vanilla , powdered sugar . Here's the instruction : Chop walnuts fine .  Sprinkle about 1 cup evenly in 9-inch square pan .  Set remaining walnuts aside .  Combine gelatin and 1/2 cup of the water in measuring cup; set aside to soften .  In 2-quart glass measuring cup with handle , combine remaining 3/4 cup water and sugar .  Microwave at High for 5 minutes .  Stir well until sugar dissolves .  Microwave at High for 7 to 8 minutes or until mixture reaches 234° .  Stir in softened gelatin; let stand until slightly cooled (about 130°) .  Stir in vanilla .  Empty mixture into large bowl of electric mixer .  Beat at high speed until mixture is very fluffy and increased 4 to 5 times in volume , about 12 to 15 minutes .  Turn into walnut-coated pan and sprinkle remaining walnuts on top .  Let stand at room temperature several hours or overnight until mixture is firm and set .  Use a sharp knife dipped in powdered sugar to cut mixture into 1-inch squares .  Roll sides in walnuts remaining in pan and additional powdered sugar , if desired .  Makes about 1 1/2 pounds .

question: I have sugar shortening cinnamon cloves applesauce raisins nuts flour cocoa . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Applesauce Cake with 1 c .  shortening , 2 c .  sugar , 2 1/2 c .  applesauce , 1 c .  nuts , 2 c .  raisins , 4 c .  flour , 2 Tbsp .  cocoa , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 tsp .  cloves . Here's the instruction : Cream shortening .  Mix ingredients .  Beat and pour into prepared pans and bake 30 to 35 minutes at 325° .

question: I have oleo vinegar sugar vanilla eggs baking soda cinnamon powdered sugar water flour cocoa milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Texas Chocolate Sheet Cake with 1 c .  or 2 sticks oleo , 4 Tbsp .  cocoa , 1 c .  water , 2 c .  sugar , 2 c .  flour , 2 eggs , 1 tsp .  baking soda , milk , vinegar , vanilla , cinnamon , powdered sugar . Here's the instruction : Bring to boil first 3 ingredients , then add 2 cups sugar and 2 cups flour .  Blend well and add eggs , 1/2 cup sour milk (fresh milk + 1 teaspoon vinegar) , soda , 1 teaspoon vanilla and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon .  Bake at 400° for 20 minutes .

question: I have low-fat milk cayenne pepper whole wheat bread crumbs broccoli florets cheddar cheese parmesan cheese flour elbow macaroni butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Very Cheese-Y Macaroni with 8 oz .  elbow macaroni , 1 c .  broccoli florets , 4 Tbsp .  butter , 2 Tbsp .  flour , 2 c .  low-fat milk , 1 c .  shredded sharp Cheddar cheese , 1/2 c .  grated Parmesan cheese , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  cayenne pepper , 1/4 c .  whole wheat bread crumbs . Here's the instruction : In medium saucepan , cook macaroni according to package directions , until al dente .  Drain well .  Fill another saucepan 3/4 full with water .  Bring water to a boil .  Add broccoli; reduce heat to medium and cook until done .  Drain and set aside .  Preheat oven to 375° .  Grease an 8-inch glass baking dish .  In medium saucepan , melt butter; add flour and stir until smooth .  Whisk in milk , stirring continually , until thickened , about 3 minutes .  Remove from heat .  Reserve 1/4 cup Cheddar cheese .  Stir remaining Cheddar , Gruyere , Parmesan , salt and cayenne until cheese melts .  Add macaroni and broccoli .  Put it into baking dish .  Bake 15 minutes .  Sprinkle Cheddar and bread crumbs on top; bake another 15 minutes , until bubbly .

question: I have garlic salt eggs chili powder olive halves flour sharp cheese tamales cream-style . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Tamale Bake Casserole with 1 (29 oz . ) can tamales , 1 Tbsp .  all-purpose flour , 1 (16 oz . ) can cream-style corn , 1 tsp .  chili powder , 1/2 c .  pitted ripe olive halves , 1/8 tsp .  garlic salt , 1/2 c .  or 2 oz .  shredded sharp cheese , 3 beaten eggs . Here's the instruction : Drain tamales; reserve sauce .  Remove papers and slice tamales crosswise; set aside .  Combine tamale sauce , flour , chili powder and garlic salt .  Add eggs , corn , olives and tamales .  Turn into 10 x 9 x 2-inch dish .  Bake in a 350° oven 40 minutes or until set .  Sprinkle cheese on top and bake 3 minutes or until cheese melts .

question: I have bread egg backfin crabmeat mayonnaise paprika mustard salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Maryland Crab Cakes with 1 lb .  backfin crabmeat , 1 egg , 2 tsp .  prepared mustard , 3 to 4 Tbsp .  mayonnaise , 1 slice bread , crumbled , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  paprika . Here's the instruction : Combine and mix all ingredients thoroughly .  Chill for 2 hours .  Shape into cakes .  Melt 3 tablespoons of butter in a skillet over a quick fire .  Brown the cakes on both sides .  Yield: 6 cakes .

question: I have milk chocolate chips butterscotch chips peanut butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Snicker Bars with 1 c .  milk chocolate chips , 1/4 c .  butterscotch chips , 1/4 c .  peanut butter . Here's the instruction : Melt together; pour into 9 x 13-inch greased pan and cool .

question: I have sugar pineapple juice orange juice red hawaiian lemon . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hawaiian Punch with 2 cans red Hawaiian punch , 1 can pineapple juice , 6 oz .  can frozen orange juice , 1 c .  real lemon , 1 c .  sugar , 2 liters 7-Up . Here's the instruction : Mix and serve over ice .

question: I have sugar eggs flour coconut milk butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Coconut Pie with 3/4 c .  sugar , 4 eggs , 3 Tbsp .  flour , 1 1/2 c .  milk , 4 Tbsp .  butter , 1 c .  coconut . Here's the instruction : Separate eggs .  Use whites for meringue .  Cream sugar and butter .  Add flour and milk .  Add eggs last .  Cook on low heat until thick .  Add coconut and pour into baked pie shell .  Top with meringue , sprinkle with coconut and brown .

question: I have pepper macaroni grated cheese flour mayonnaise broccoli milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli Macaroni Casserole with 3 Tbsp .  butter or margarine , 3 Tbsp .  flour , 1 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/8 tsp .  pepper , 1 1/2 c .  milk , 3/4 c .  mayonnaise , 1 3/4 c .  macaroni , cooked and drained , 2 c .  cooked broccoli , 1/4 c .  grated cheese . Here's the instruction : Melt butter; stir in flour , salt and pepper .  Add milk gradually , stirring constantly .  Cook until thickened , stirring occasionally .  Add the mayonnaise .  Cook macaroni in boiling , salted water until tender .  Drain , rinse and drain again .  Layer macaroni , broccoli and sauce in a greased 1 1/2-quart casserole dish , ending with sauce .  Sprinkle with cheese .  Bake at 350° about 20 minutes .

question: I have potatoes cream of chicken soup salt buttered bread crumbs onion cheese light cream pimento . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Potato, Pimento Casserole with 1 qt .  cooked potatoes , cubed , 1 c .  cream of chicken soup , 1/2 c .  light cream or milk , 1 c .  cheese , grated , 2 Tbsp .  pimento , chopped , salt and pepper to taste , 1/2 c .  onion , minced , buttered bread crumbs . Mix soup with remaining ingredients , except crumbs .  Cover layer of potatoes .  Continue alternate layers with potatoes completely covered .  Sprinkle top with buttered bread crumbs . question: I have cloves instant tea cinnamon sugar . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have buttermilk flour butter oil . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have bacon tomatoes vermicelli another onion full garbanzos onion chorizo ham hock beef soup bone olive oil . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cocido Castellano(Castillian Bean Soup; One Pot Meal)   with 1 fist full garbanzos per person , 1 ham hock , 1 chorizo (Spanish sausage) or 3-inch beef smoked sausage , 1 beef soup bone , 1 medium onion , 1 piece smoked bacon (2 x 2 x 3-inch cube) , vermicelli (very fine spaghetti noodles) , collards and another onion , lettuce , tomatoes , lemon salt, , olive oil . Here's the instruction : Soak beans overnight (8 to 10 hours) in saltwater 3-inches over beans .  When ready to cook , drain off saltwater .  Put garbanzo beans , ham hock , sausage , soup bone , bacon and onion in boiling water and cook about 4 hours .  When it has cooked about 3 1/2 hours , taste .  Add salt if needed .  Saute onions in oil .  Add collards and pepper to taste; stir-fry .  Add water if needed .  Cook until done .  Next prepare fresh salad of lettuce , tomato , etc .  After bean soup is cooked , strain liquid into another pot .  This broth is then brought to a boil (be sure to taste for salt , pepper , etc . ) and use to cook the vermicelli .  While soup is cooking (15 to 20 minutes) separate bones and gristle or fat (skins) .  On a large platter or shallow serving dish , arrange garbanzos , meat and collards .  Put salad in separate bowl .  The vermicelli soup should be served and eaten first .  Then , the main course .

question: I have bacon onion celery flour margarine rice shrimp worcestershire sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla baking soda syrup butter peanuts . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oil sugar water flour yeast milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have green bell pepper pepper salt onion rice ground beef vegetable oil ro-tel tomatoes . Give me some cooking ideas .

(4 oz . ) medium shell macaroni , cooked and drained , 2 c .  chopped tomatoes , 2 c .  chopped cucumber , 1 (10 oz . ) pkg .  frozen peas , thawed and drained , 6 bacon slices , crisply cooked and crumbled , 1 c .  (4 oz . ) shredded Cheddar cheese . Here's the instruction : Combine dressing , green onions and mustard; set aside .  Toss tuna with dill .  In a 3-quart serving bowl , layer lettuce , shells , cucumber , tomatoes , tuna , peas and bacon .  Spread dressing mixture over bacon , sealing to edge of bowl .  Sprinkle with cheese; cover .  Chill several hours or overnight .  Toss to serve .  Makes 8 servings .  Prep .  Time: 25 minutes plus chilling .

question: I have american cheese oleo pepper pet-ritz regular pie crusts flour chicken broth broccoli milk chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Divan Pot Pie with 2 Pet-Ritz regular pie crusts , 3 Tbsp .  oleo , 3 Tbsp .  flour , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 1/2 c .  chicken broth , 1/4 c .  milk , 4 oz .  (1 c . ) shredded American cheese , 2 c .  cooked and diced chicken , 1 (10 oz . ) pkg .  chopped broccoli , thawed and drained . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 425° .  Place cookie sheet in oven to preheat .  In a medium saucepan , combine oleo , flour and pepper .  Cook over low heat until mixture becomes thick and bubbly .  Gradually stir in broth and milk and stir until mixture begins to thicken .  Add cheese and stir until melted .  Stir in chicken and broccoli .  Pour mixture into pie shell .  Remove second crust (frozen); place on top of filled pie .  Let thaw 10 to 20 minutes .  Crimp edges together .  Cut slits in top crust .  Place pie on cookie sheet .  Bake 30 to 35 minutes or until crust is brown .

question: I have chocolate cake powdered sugar cream cheese nuts margarine coconut . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Earthquake Cake with 1 c .  chopped nuts , 1 c .  coconut , 1 stick margarine or butter , 1 (2 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , 1 box 10x powdered sugar , 1 box German chocolate cake mix . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Grease and flour sheet cake pan (9 x 13-inch) .  Sprinkle nuts and coconut in pan .  Spread to cover .  Mix cake according to package directions .  Pour evenly over nuts and coconut , but do not stir .  Melt margarine and cream cheese in pan over low heat .  When melted , mix in a box of powdered sugar .  Spoon this over cake .  Mix to cover but do not stir .  When cooked , the cake will crack like the earth and is so good!

question: I have corn baking powder eggs cheddar cheese green onion flour cottage cheese salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Jim'S Breakfast Delight with 1/4 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 6 eggs , beaten , 1 (16 oz . ) carton small curd cottage cheese , 1 (14 oz . ) can corn , drained , 8 oz .  shredded Cheddar cheese , green onion slices , pimentos and red pepper . Here's the instruction : Stir together the dry ingredients .  Add the remaining ingredients; mix well .  Pour into greased 7 x 11-inch baking dish .  Bake at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes , until set .  Let stand 5 minutes before serving .  Serves 6 .

question: I have oil lemon flavoring eggs water lemon pineapple cake mix . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Jello Cake with 1 pkg .  pineapple cake mix , 1 pkg .  lemon or lime jello , 2/3 c .  water , 2/3 c .  oil , 1 tsp .  lemon flavoring , 4 eggs . Here's the instruction : Put all ingredients in bowl and mix well .  Bake at 350° for 30 minutes .  When done , poke holes on top and pour a mixture of pineapple juice and powdered sugar over hot cake .

question: I have bacon bagels tomatoes cheddar . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Breakfast On A Bagel with 2 (2 1/2 oz . ) bagels , split and toasted , 4 (1 oz . ) slices Canadian bacon , 4 (1/2-inch) slices tomatoes , 1/2 c .  shredded reduced-fat Cheddar . question: I have sugar shortening cinnamon water flour margarine walnuts apples milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Apple Cobbler with 1/2 c .  (1 stick) margarine , 2 c .  sugar , 2 c .  water , 1 1/2 c .  flour (self-rising) , 1/2 c .  shortening , 1/3 c .  milk , 2 c .  chopped apples , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 c .  chopped walnuts . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 350° and melt margarine in a 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan .  In a saucepan , heat sugar and water until sugar melts .  Cut shortening into flour until particles are fine crumbs .  Add milk and stir .  Turn onto floured board and knead until smooth . Bake 55 to 60 minutes .

question: I have food coloring cornstarch water . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Goop - Cornstarch with cornstarch , water , food coloring . Here's the instruction : Mix food coloring in water and add to cornstarch .  Add less water for thicker solution .  Add more water for a thinner one .

question: I have powdered orange drink cinnamon sugar ground cloves . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Russian Refresher Mix with 2 c .  powdered orange drink mix , 1 (3 oz . ) pkg .  presweetened lemonade mix , 1 1/3 c .  sugar , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 tsp .  ground cloves . Here's the instruction : Combine all ingredients and put in 1-quart airtight container .  Label and store in cool dry place .  Use within 6 months .  Makes about 3 1/2 cups of mix .

question: I have eggs cheddar cheese cream of mushroom soup crackers mayonnaise onions frozen broccoli butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have condensed milk graham cracker crumbs pecans butterscotch chips coconut chocolate chips butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hello Dolly with 1 c .  melted butter , 1 c .  graham cracker crumbs , 1 c .  chocolate chips , 1 c .  butterscotch chips , 1 c .  pecans , 1 c .  coconut , 1 can sweetened condensed milk . Here's the instruction : Mix butter and graham cracker crumbs together .  Press into 9 x 13-inch pan .  Layer other ingredients as listed .  Sprinkle a few nuts on top . question: I have oil baking powder vanilla milk eggs cinnamon soda flour nuts cocoa margarine white sugar zucchini salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chocolate Zucchini Cake with 3/4 c .  margarine , 2 c .  white sugar , 1/2 c .  cocoa , 3 eggs , 1/4 c .  oil , 2 1/2 c .  flour , 2 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 1/2 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 c .  milk , 2 c .  grated zucchini , 1/2 c .  chopped nuts , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : In a bowl , mix oleomargarine , sugar and cocoa .  Add 3 eggs while mixing .  Slowly add flour , baking powder , salt , soda and cinnamon .  Beat in 1/2 cup milk . question: I have warm water shortening molasses rye flour yeast boiling water white flour . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Swedish Rye Bread with 2 pkg .  dry yeast , 1/2 c .  warm water , 2 c .  rye flour , 3/4 c .  molasses , 1/3 c .  shortening , 2 c .  boiling water , 6 to 6 1/2 c .  white flour . Here's the instruction : Soften yeast in warm water .  Combine rye flour , molasses , shortening , salt and boiling water; blending well .  Cool to lukewarm; add softened yeast .  Stir in white flour gradually .  Transfer to floured board , let rest 10 minutes .  Knead until shiny (about 10 minutes) .  Cover and put in greased bowl to rise for 2 hours .

question: I have nutmeg green apple salmon steaks . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Salmon Bake with 1 1/2 lb .  salmon steaks , dash of nutmeg , 1 green apple (a bit tart) . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 400° to 450° .  Wash and pat dry salmon steaks .  Place on sheet of foil .  Cut apple into thick slices and place on top of salmon .  Sprinkle with nutmeg (to taste) and wrap foil over .  Place in oven (can put cookie sheet under foil or in shallow baking dish) .  Bake 15 to 25 minutes , covered , then unwrap and continue baking 5 to 10 minutes longer at lowered temperature of 350° , until salmon pulls into flakes with fork .

question: I have bacon onion syrup pork catsup green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Skillet Baked Beans with 1 large can pork and beans , 1/2 lb .  bacon , 1 medium green pepper , 1 medium onion , 1/2 c .  syrup , 1/2 c .  catsup . Here's the instruction : Brown bacon , pepper and onion in skillet .  Drain grease and break up bacon .  Add beans , catsup and syrup to skillet .  Let simmer 45 minutes .

question: I have condensed milk lemon juice graham cracker crusts pecans containers pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pineapple Pie with 3 graham cracker crusts , 2 small cans sweetened condensed milk , 3 (8 oz . ) containers Cool Whip topping (or two 12 oz . ) , 2 small cans crushed pineapple , drained , 3/4 c .  lemon juice , 1 c .  chopped pecans . question: I have marshmallows corn flakes cocktail peanuts pretzels almond bark . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have frozen mixed vegetables tomato pepper hot mashed potatoes cream cheese milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mixed Vegetable Bake with 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  Philadelphia Brand cream cheese , cubed , 1/2 c .  milk , 1 (10 oz . ) pkg .  frozen mixed vegetables , cooked and drained , 1/4 tsp .  salt , dash of pepper , 1 c .  hot mashed potatoes , 1 small tomato , sliced . question: I have sugar vanilla cream cheese pecan halves pretzels pineapple pie filling butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Jack'S Delight with 1 can pineapple pie filling , 8 oz .  cream cheese , 1 large Cool Whip , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 stick butter , pretzels , pecan halves . Put in 300° oven until butter melts and is absorbed by pretzels .

question: I have cake flour baking powder sugar vanilla eggs water cocoa salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chocolate Cream Log with 1/2 c .  cake flour , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1/4 c .  cocoa , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 4 eggs , 3/4 tsp .  sugar , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 2 Tbsp .  water . Here's the instruction : Sift flour and measure; add baking powder , cocoa and salt .  Sift again .  Beat in half the sugar a little at a time .  Beat until smooth and glossy .  Beat egg yolks until thick and lemon-colored; add remaining sugar and vanilla .  Continue beating until very thick; slowly add water , stirring constantly .  Gently fold in beaten whites; gradually fold in dry ingredients .  Turn into shallow oblong pan about 15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 1-inch .  Line with wax paper .  Bake at 375° for 15 to 20 minutes .  Turn out on clean towel and roll up .  Cool .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs pet milk crust flour cocoa butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chocolate Fudge Pie with 1 stick butter , 6 Tbsp .  cocoa , 2 c .  sugar , 4 Tbsp .  flour , dash of salt , 2 eggs , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 1 large can Pet milk , 1 deep pie crust . question: I have sugar pack flour cheese butter pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have taco sauce refrigerator crescent rolls cheddar cheese lean ground beef . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mexican Biscuit Casserole with 2 cans refrigerator crescent rolls , 1 lb .  lean ground beef , 1 large jar taco sauce , 1 to 2 c .  shredded Cheddar cheese . question: I have boiling water unflavored gelatine . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oleo miracle lemon juice cheddar cheese onion corn flakes celery almonds chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fred'S Chicken Or Turkey Casserole with 3 1/2 c .  cubed , baked chicken , 2 c .  chopped celery , 1 c .  finely chopped onion , 3 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 5 oz .  grated Cheddar cheese , 1 1/2 c . question: I have margarine cans biscuits sugar cinnamon . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Monkey Bread with 4 (10 count) cans biscuits , 1 1/2 c .  sugar , divided , 2 tsp .  cinnamon , divided , 1 1/4 sticks margarine . Here's the instruction : Grease Bundt or tube pan .  Mix together 3/4 cup sugar and 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon .  Cut each biscuit in fourths , using scissors to do this .  Shake pieces from one can at a time in the sugar/cinnamon mixture .  Place these into cake pan .  Melt margarine , 3/4 cup sugar and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon together and pour over biscuit pieces in cake pan .  Bake 35 minutes at 350° .  They may be done sooner .  Turn out on cake plate .  Break off in bits .  Do not cook in two-piece angel food pan .  All the butter will leak out!

question: I have white chocolate pretzel sticks peanuts . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pretzel Candy with 1 lb .  white chocolate , 3 C .  pretzel sticks , broken , 1 C .  salted peanuts . Here's the instruction : Melt chocolate in microwave , stirring often to avoid scorching .  Add the pretzels and peanuts and stir to coat well .  Cover a cookie sheet with foil and spread the mixture on foil .  Let cool in refrigerator for at least 30 minutes or until hardened .  Lift foil from cookie sheet and peel away from hardened candy .  Break candy into bite-sized pieces .  Store in air-tight container in a cool , dry place .

question: I have lemon juice liquid smoke horseradish salmon onion parsley flakes cream cheese nuts salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sour cream dill weed pepper green tomatoes eggs green onion all-purpose cornmeal vegetable oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have soda white karo water white sugar butter peanuts salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

answer: you can make Chicken Inspiration with 1 lb .  boneless , skinless chicken breast , 20 fresh mushrooms , halved , 5 to 6 slices Provolone cheese , 1/2 c .  milk , Spike seasoning or any mixed herbs , 2 eggs , 1/4 c .  milk , chicken bouillon powder , slivered almonds , Parmesan cheese to taste , croutons/bread cubes . question: I have sour milk sugar nutmeg eggs blueberries soda flour butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs cranberries pecans flour margarine coconut milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cranberry-Pecan Bars with 1 1/2 c .  flour , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/3 c .  margarine , 1 c .  finely chopped pecans , 1 1/4 c .  sugar , 2 beaten eggs , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 2 Tbsp .  milk , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  cranberries , cut small , 1/2 c .  coconut . question: I have twinkies pecans coconut pineapple yellow cake . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Stacked Twinkie Cake with 2 c .  coconut , 2 pkg .  instant French vanilla pudding , Twinkies , 1 can crushed pineapple , chopped pecans for topping , 1 yellow cake , Cool Whip . question: I have american cheese eggs cheddar cheese swiss cheese jalapeno peppers . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have cumin vinegar sugar tomatoes oregano cayenne pepper onion clove garlic hot pepper clear jel green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have baking powder oats shortening brown sugar eggs water flour milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

Let it sit for an hour; adjust seasoning .  Serve on bed of lettuce .  Serves 6 to 8 .

question: I have italian bread crumbs any wine mushrooms shrimp butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Baked Stuffed Mushrooms with fresh mushrooms , 2 Tbsp .  any wine , 1/3 to 1/2 c .  Italian bread crumbs , 1 can minced clams or shrimp , 1/4 c .  melted butter . Here's the instruction : Wash mushrooms and remove stems .  In a bowl , mix clams and wine .  Cut a few mushroom stems and add 1/3 to 1/2 cup Italian bread crumbs .  Spoon stuffing into mushroom caps .  Place in baking pan and pour 1/4 cup melted butter over them .  Cook in oven 20 minutes at 375° .

question: I have oil sugar tomatoes pepper soy sauce green peppers green onions cold water cornstarch bean sprouts garlic salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Crock-Pot Pepper Steak with 1 to 1 1/2 lb .  round steak , 2 Tbsp .  oil , 1 clove minced garlic , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 1/4 c .  soy sauce , 1 tsp .  sugar , 1 c .  bean sprouts , drained , 1 c .  tomatoes , 2 green peppers , cut in strips , 1 Tbsp .  cornstarch , 2 Tbsp .  cold water , 4 green onions , sliced or 1 onion . Here's the instruction : Slice steak into narrow strips .  In skillet , brown steak in oil .  Combine with garlic , salt , pepper , soy sauce and sugar in crock-pot .  Cook on low 6 to 8 hours .  Turn control to high .  Add bean sprouts , tomatoes and green peppers .  Dissolve cornstarch in water and stir into pot .  Cover and cook on high 15 to 20 minutes .  Serves 4 .

question: I have potatoes pepper pastry celery flour poultry seasoning margarine onions carrots chicken broth chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Pot Pie with pastry for double crust pie , 1 1/2 c .  diced potatoes , 1 c .  diced carrots , 3/4 c .  chopped celery , 3/4 c .  chopped onions , 1/4 c .  margarine or butter , 1/3 c .  flour , 2 c .  chicken broth , 1/8 tsp .  pepper , 1/2 tsp .  poultry seasoning , 4 c .  cooked , cubed chicken . Here's the instruction : Prepare pastry; set aside .  Cook potatoes and carrots until tender in one saucepan .  Cook celery and onions in another pan .  While vegetables are cooking , make gravy by adding flour to the butter in a small pan .  When blended , add chicken broth , salt , pepper and poultry seasoning .  Bring to a boil .  Set aside .

question: I have sugar vanilla shell eggs pecans syrup margarine salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pecan Pie with 3 eggs , 1 c .  Karo syrup , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 3 Tbsp .  margarine , melted , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  pecans , chopped , 1 unbaked pie shell . Here's the instruction : Blend eggs slightly .  Add syrup , sugar , salt , margarine and vanilla .  Add nuts .  Pour into unbaked pie shell and bake for 12 minutes in a 375° oven , then reduce heat to 325° and bake for 40 minutes or until pie is set .

question: I have baking powder new york state red pepper flour butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cheese Sticks with 1 lb .  New York State strong cheese , 1 stick butter or margarine , 1 3/4 c .  plain flour , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/8 tsp .  or dash of red pepper (1/4 tsp .  if doubled) , 1/4 tsp .  salt . Here's the instruction : Grate cheese .  Let butter soften to room temperature .  Hand mix cheese and butter until smooth .  Mix dry ingredients together , then pour into cheese and butter mixture .  Mix with hands until well blended .  Press onto cookie sheet (ungreased) .  Bake about 15 minutes or until set at 350° .  Makes 7 to 8 dozen .

question: I have semi-sweet chocolate powdered sugar oreo cookies milk mint chocolate chip ice cream butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Grasshopper Pie with 24 crushed Oreo cookies (do not remove filling) , 1/3 c .  melted butter or oleo , 1/2 gal .  mint chocolate chip ice cream , 4 sq .  semi-sweet chocolate , 1 c .  powdered sugar , 2 Tbsp .  butter or oleo , 1 small can evaporated milk . Here's the instruction : Mix crushed Oreo cookies and melted butter; press into 9 x 13-inch cake pan .  Freeze .  Soften 1/2 gallon ice cream .  Spread over frozen crust .  Return to freezer .  In saucepan , melt semi-sweet chocolate; add powdered sugar , butter and evaporated milk .  Bring to rolling boil; cool .  Spread over ice cream .  Return to freezer .  Keep frozen until just before serving .

question: I have sour cream sugar pepper garlic onion egg noodles cream cheese grated cheese tomato sauce lean beef butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Beef Noodle Casserole with 1 lb .  lean beef , 1/2 c .  grated cheese , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  sugar , dash of pepper , 2 Tbsp .  butter , 2 (8 oz . ) cans tomato sauce , 1 (7 oz . ) wide egg noodles , 1 medium onion , chopped , 8 oz .  cream cheese , 1 c .  sour cream , garlic to taste . Here's the instruction : Brown beef in 2 tablespoons butter .  Drain .  Garlic to taste .  Add sugar , salt and pepper .  Then add tomato sauce and let simmer on low for 15 minutes .

question: I have vinegar brown sugar cinnamon pastry water raisins cornstarch butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Raisin Pie with 2 c .  raisins , 2 c .  water , 1/2 c .  brown sugar , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 2 Tbsp .  cornstarch , 1/8 tsp .  salt , 1 Tbsp .  vinegar , 1 Tbsp .  butter , pastry for 9-inch double pie crust . Here's the instruction : Boil raisins in 1 3/4 cups water for 5 minutes .  Combine brown sugar , cornstarch , cinnamon and salt .  Moisten with remaining 1/4 cup water .  Add to raisins , stirring until mixture boils .  Remove from heat and add butter and vinegar .  Pour into pastry lined 9-inch pie pan .  Cover with top crust .  Bake 15 minutes at 425° , then reduce heat to 350° and bake until brown .

question: I have sugar whipping cream brown sugar cranberries flour butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fruit Scones with 3 c .  self-rising flour , 1/4 c .  sugar , 1/4 c .  firmly packed light brown sugar , 1/2 c .  dry cranberries or cherries , coarsely chopped , 1/2 c .  chilled butter , cut into pieces (1 stick) , 1 c .  whipping cream . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 400° .  Butter 2 large cookie sheets .  Sift flour into bowl .  Mix in both sugars .  Add butter and rub in fingertips until mixture resembles coarse meal .  Add 1/2 cup dried fruit .  Stir in enough cream to form soft , slightly sticky dough .  Turn dough out onto slightly floured surface and knead until just combined .  Gather dough into ball; flatten into disc .  Roll out to thickness of 3/4-inch .  Cut out rounds using 2-inch round cookie cutter .  Gather scraps and re-roll on floured surface .  Cut out additional rounds .

question: I have salsa chicken breasts milk bread crumbs . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Salsa Chicken with 4 chicken breasts , bread crumbs , milk , 1 jar salsa . Here's the instruction : Dip chicken in milk and then roll in bread crumbs .  Bake chicken at 375° for 30 minutes .  Pour salsa on top .  Bake for 30 more minutes or until chicken is done .

question: I have egg baking powder sugar milk flour cornmeal salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cornbread with 1 c .  cornmeal , 1 c .  flour , 1/4 c .  sugar , 4 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 egg , well beaten , 1 c .  milk , 2 Tbsp .  melted fat . Here's the instruction : Mix dry ingredients .  Add milk , well beaten egg and melted fat .  Beat .  Bake in a shallow greased pan in a hot oven , 375° , for 20 minutes or more .

question: I have vinegar sugar tomatoes cinnamon red pepper mixed spices cornstarch ground mustard salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Catsup with 4 qt .  unpeeled tomatoes , 2 Tbsp .  salt , 3 c .  sugar , 2 c .  sharp vinegar , 1 Tbsp .  stick cinnamon , 1 tsp .  ground mustard , 2 tsp .  red pepper , 1 Tbsp .  mixed spices , 3 Tbsp .  cornstarch , mixed with a little vinegar . Here's the instruction : Combine tomatoes , salt , sugar , vinegar , cinnamon , mustard , red pepper and mixed spices in kettle .  Boil hard for 1 hour .  Strain .  Return to stove and thicken with cornstarch , moistened with a little vinegar .  Boil for 10 minutes .  Very good .  I prefer to use only 1 teaspoon red pepper .

question: I have oil egg baking powder sugar milk chocolate chips white flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chocolate Chip Muffins with 2 c .  white flour , 1/4 c .  sugar , 3 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 egg , well beaten , 1 c .  milk , 1/4 c .  oil , 6 oz .  chocolate chips . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 400° .  Grease or line bottoms of 12 muffin cup tin .  Combine first 4 ingredients .  Stir in remaining ingredients until dry ingredients are moistened .  (Batter will be lumpy . ) Fill cups 2/3 full .  Bake at 400° for 20 to 25 minutes .  Remove from pan .  Serve warm .

question: I have chuck roast vinegar tabasco sauce brown sugar chili powder onion water celery clove garlic garlic powder paprika ketchup allspice dry mustard bay leaf green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Worm Meat(Shredded Barbecue Beef)   with 3 lb .  or larger chuck roast , 1 large onion , chopped , 1 stalk celery , chopped , 1 large green pepper , chopped , 1 1/2 qt .  water , 2 clove garlic , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 (16 to 20 oz . ) bottle ketchup (plain or tangy) , 2 Tbsp .  brown sugar , 2 Tbsp .  vinegar , 1 tsp .  allspice , 1 tsp .  dry mustard , 1/2 tsp .  chili powder , 2 to 3 drops Tabasco sauce , 1 bay leaf , 1/4 tsp .  garlic powder , 1/4 tsp .  paprika . Here's the instruction : Place roast and vegetables in a large , heavy pot .  Cover with water .  Cook , covered , for 4 hours .  Remove meat , cool and shred with a fork .  Return meat to 1 1/2 cups of the broth .  Add remaining ingredients .  Slowly boil , uncovered , for 1 hour .  Additional broth may be added , if needed .  When done , mixture should be of spreading consistency .  Serve on either noodles or rolls .  Serves 10 to 12 .

question: I have fudge sauce vanilla instant pudding chocolate crumb crust cold instant coffee . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mississippi Mud Pie with 1 1/2 c .  cold half and half , 1 pkg .  vanilla instant pudding and pie filling , 1 Tbsp .  instant coffee , 3 1/2 c .  Cool Whip , thawed , 1 pkg .  chocolate crumb crust , fudge sauce . Here's the instruction : Pour half and half into large mixing bowl .  Add pie filling mix and instant coffee .  Beat with wire whisk 1 minute .  Let stand 5 minutes .  Fold in whipped topping .  Spoon into crust .  Freeze until firm (about 6 hours) .  Remove from freezer .  Let stand 10 minutes to soften .  Top with fudge sauce .  Store in freezer .

question: I have egg chicken breasts mozzarella cheese flour bread crumbs butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mozzarella Chicken with 4 boneless chicken breasts , 4 Tbsp .  butter , salt and pepper , 4 slices Mozzarella cheese , 1/2 c .  flour , 1 egg , slightly beaten , 1/2 c .  seasoned bread crumbs . Roll up and fasten with toothpicks .  Roll each in flour , dip in egg and then roll in bread crumbs .  Place in a medium size casserole .  Cover and bake at 350° for 30 minutes .  Remove cover and bake 15 minutes longer .

question: I have horseradish ham slices cream cheese parkay margarine whole wheat bread slices velveeta pasteurized process cheese spread mustard . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Grilled Ham Sandwich with 1 (3 oz . ) pkg .  Philadelphia Brand cream cheese , softened , 2 tsp .  Dijon mustard , 1 tsp .  Kraft prepared horseradish , 8 whole wheat bread slices , 1/2 lb .  Velveeta pasteurized process cheese spread , sliced , 4 boiled ham slices , soft Parkay margarine . question: I have sour cream sugar vanilla eggs soda bananas flour butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Best Ever Banana Bread with 1 c .  butter or oleo , 3 c .  sugar , 6 eggs , 3 c .  sour cream , 4 tsp .  soda , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 4 to 5 bananas , mashed , 1 tsp .  salt , 5 c .  flour . Here's the instruction : Cream together butter , sugar and eggs .  Mix sour cream and soda together in bowl and let stand until foamy .  Add the rest of the ingredients to the above mixtures and mix well .  Place into 4 greased and floured 9 x 5-inch bread pans or into 12 prepared mini loaf pans .  Sprinkle lightly with sugar just before baking .  Bake at 350° for 50 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean .  Note: You may add 1 cup of chopped nuts to the batter if you wish .  You may also use Egg Beaters , low-fat sour cream and margarine .  This is a very moist bread recipe which makes a lot and freezes well .

question: I have salt black pepper eggs saltine cracker crumbs lean ground beef thyme onions marjoram green pepper tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mom'S Meat Loaf with 1 1/2 lb .  lean ground beef , 1/2 c .  saltine cracker crumbs , 2 beaten eggs , 8 oz .  can tomato sauce or 1 c .  catsup , 1/4 c .  chopped onions , 2 Tbsp .  green pepper (optional) , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  black pepper , 1 dash marjoram , 1 dash thyme . Here's the instruction : Combine all ingredients in large mixing bowl , mix well together .  Shape into greased loaf pan and bake .

question: I have vanilla brown sugar powdered sugar butter whipping cream . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Easy Caramel Frosting with 1/2 c .  butter or margarine , 1 c .  firmly packed brown sugar , 1/4 c .  whipping cream , 2 1/2 c .  sifted powdered sugar , 1 tsp .  vanilla . question: I have frozen limeade bottles apple juice frozen lemonade . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Green Apple Punch with 1 (6 oz . ) can frozen apple juice , 1 (6 oz . ) can frozen lemonade , 1 (6 oz . ) can frozen limeade , 2 drops green food coloring , 4 (28 oz . ) bottles chilled 7-Up . Here's the instruction : Put juices and green coloring in punch bowl .  Gently add cold 7-Up .  Serves 32 (4 ounces) .

question: I have egg baking powder sugar liquid oil flour milk yellow corn meal . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Golden Corn Bread with 1 c .  yellow corn meal , 1 c .  sifted flour , 1/2 c .  sugar , 4 tsp .  baking powder , 1 egg , 1 c .  milk , 1/4 c .  liquid oil . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 425° .  Sift together corn meal , flour , sugar and baking powder into a bowl .  Add egg , milk and oil .  Beat with beaters until smooth .  Bake in a greased 8-inch square pan for 20 to 25 minutes .

question: I have sugar unsweetened applesauce vanilla extract egg whites flour walnuts cocoa powder salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fat-Free Fudge Brownies(Yield: 16 Servings)   with 3/4 c .  unbleached flour , 1/4 c .  plus 2 Tbsp .  cocoa powder , 1 c .  sugar , 1/4 c .  chopped walnuts (optional) , 1/4 tsp .  salt (optional) , 1/3 c .  unsweetened applesauce , 3 egg whites , 1 tsp .  vanilla extract . question: I have sharp cheese hot sausage bisquick . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sausage Balls with 1 lb .  hot sausage , 1 lb .  sharp cheese , grated , 2 c .  Bisquick . Here's the instruction : With sausage and cheese at room temperature , mix well with Bisquick .  Bake at 350° for 15 to 20 minutes on ungreased baking sheet .

question: I have flour crisco salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Flaky Pie Crust(Makes Two 9-Inch Crusts)   with 2 1/4 c .  flour , 3/4 c .  Crisco , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 can cold 7-Up or water . Here's the instruction : Place flour and salt in large bowl .  Mix until blended well .  Add Crisco with pastry blender .  Cut Crisco into flour until size of small peas .  Pour in 7-Up (1/2 cup); stir with fork .  Dough should be kind of sticky .  Turn onto floured board .  Smooth out to small circle with hands , making sure flour stays under at all times .  Roll , then roll to size of pie plate needed .  Flute edges under .  For baked shell , bake at 450° for 10 to 12 minutes , until golden brown .  Be sure to prick all over with fork .

question: I have cheddar cheese strawberry preserves onion pecans clove garlic mayonnaise . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cheese Ring with 1 lb sharp cheddar cheese , shredded , 1 cup chopped pecans , 3/4 to 1 cup mayonnaise , 1 medium onion , grated or finely chopped , 1 clove garlic , pressed (optional) , 1/2 tsp Tabasco or Lawry's ground red pepper seasoning , 1 cup strawberry preserves . Here's the instruction : Combine all ingredients except preserves and mix well .  Chill .  Mold into ring . Can be served as a complement to a main meal or as an hors d'oeuvre with crackers .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs flour butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Old Fashion Pound Cake with 1 2/3 c .  sugar , 2 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  vanilla , 5 eggs , pinch of salt , 1 c .  soft butter . question: I have baking powder sugar vanilla apple pie spice egg whites flour apples . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make No Fat-No Cholesterol-No Trouble Apple Pie with 1/2 c .  flour , 3/4 c .  sugar , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 2 egg whites , 2 c .  peeled and chopped apples , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 tsp .  apple pie spice or cinnamon . question: I have cream of chicken soup chicken breasts onion corn flakes water celery mayonnaise butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar eggs vanilla wafers pecans coconut butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Vanilla Wafer Cake with 1 box vanilla wafers , 2 sticks butter , 1 c .  pecans , 6 eggs , 2 c .  sugar , 1 c .  coconut . question: I have tabasco pepper salad oil chili powder red pepper onion tomato soup celery cream mushroom soup ground meat green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Souped Up Spaghetti with 1/2 c .  salad oil , 1 large onion , 1/2 c .  green pepper , 1/2 c .  celery , 1 lb .  ground meat , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  pepper , dash of red pepper , 2 tsp .  chili powder , 1/4 tsp .  Tabasco , 1 can cream mushroom soup , 1 can cream tomato soup . Here's the instruction : Saute first 4 ingredients until tender .  Add ground meat to chopped vegetables and brown . question: I have pork country-style chili sauce grape jelly red wine mustard . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Country Ribs(Very Good)   with 3 lb .  pork country-style ribs , 3/4 c .  chili sauce , 1/2 c .  grape jelly , 1 Tbsp .  dry red wine (optional) , 1 tsp .  Dijon mustard . question: I have green pepper cream cheese nuts onions pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oil sugar warm water water flour yeast salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Buns with 12 c .  flour , 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 6 c .  warm water , 1 c .  oil , 3 tsp .  salt , 1 c .  warm water , 1 Tbsp .  sugar , 2 pkg .  dry yeast . Bake at 350° for 15 to 30 minutes or until golden brown .

question: I have sour cream gelatin boiling water pineapple salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Gelatin Mold with 1 large or 2 small gelatin , 1 c .  boiling water , 1 pt .  sour cream , pinch of salt , crushed pineapple , drained . question: I have sugar vanilla oats peanut butter cocoa margarine milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make No Bake Cookies with 2 c .  sugar , 1 stick margarine , 3 Tbsp .  cocoa , 1/2 c .  milk , 1/2 c .  peanut butter , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 2 c .  oats . question: I have vanilla brown sugar eggs soda cinnamon raisins flour walnuts white sugar oatmeal butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mom'S Oatmeal Cookies with 1/2 c .  butter , 1 c .  brown sugar , 1 c .  white sugar , 2 eggs , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 tsp .  salt (optional) , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 3 c .  oatmeal , 1 3/4 c .  flour , 1 c .  raisins (optional) , 1 c .  walnuts (optional) . answer: you can make Tortilla Soup with 2 Tbsp .  oil , 1 small onion , chopped , 2 lb .  stew meat , cut up , 1 (14 1/4 oz . ) can tomatoes , 1/2 can Ro-Tel tomatoes , 1 can beef broth , 1 can chicken broth , 1 can tomato soup , 1 tsp .  chili powder , 1 tsp .  ground cumin (optional) , 2 tsp . question: I have bacon green onions water chestnuts parmesan cheese celery frozen peas . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Layered Salad with 1 head iceberg lettuce , sliced , 3 to 4 green onions , chopped , 8 or more stalks of celery , chopped , 1 can water chestnuts , chopped , 1 bag frozen peas , 1 c .  fresh shredded parmesan cheese , Bacon bits . question: I have chocolate-flavored chocolate ice milk milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Dumbo'S Double-Thick Chocolate Malted with 1/2 c .  milk , 2 scoops chocolate ice milk or ice cream , 3 Tbsp .  chocolate-flavored malted milk . Here's the instruction : Pour the milk into a small mixing bowl .  Add 1 scoop ice cream .  Beat with an eggbeater until the ice cream is mixed in .  Add the rest of the ice cream and the malted milk .  Beat again until mixture is foamy .  Pour into a glass to serve .  Serves 1 .

question: I have vanilla powdered sugar walnuts milk butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Buttercream Candy with 1 lb .  butter , softened , 1 can Eagle Brand milk , 2 boxes powdered sugar , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 qt .  chopped walnuts . Here's the instruction : Mix together in large bowl .

question: I have oil chocolate instant pudding chocolate cake eggs water chocolate chips . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chocolate Chip Cake with chocolate cake mix , chocolate instant pudding (3 oz . ) , 2 eggs , 2/3 c .  chocolate chips , 1 1/3 c .  water , 1/4 c .  oil . Here's the instruction : Swirl oil in a 9 x 13-inch pan .  Add rest of ingredients and mix well .  Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes .

question: I have vinegar sugar onion celery pimentos green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Kraut Slaw with 1 qt .  kraut , 1 c .  chopped green pepper , 1 large onion , chopped , 1 c .  celery , 1 c .  vinegar , 1 c .  sugar , 1 small jar pimentos . question: I have golden raisins sugar vanilla extract salt baking soda brown sugar eggs flour white chocolate nuts unsalted butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make White Chocolate Chip Cookies with 2 1/4 c .  flour , sifted , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 c .  unsalted butter , softened , 3/4 c .  firmly packed brown sugar , 1 1/4 c .  golden raisins , 3/4 c .  granulated sugar , 3 large eggs , 1 tsp .  vanilla extract , 12 oz .  coarsely chopped white chocolate , 3/4 c .  coarsely chopped , salted Macadamia nuts . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Combine flour , baking soda and salt in medium bowl .  Beat butter and sugars in large mixer bowl at medium speed until light and fluffy .  Add eggs , one at a time , beating well after each .  Beat in vanilla .  Beat in dry ingredients .  Stir in white chocolate , nuts and raisins .  Drop by rounded teaspoons onto cookie sheets .  Bake 8 to 10 minutes until pale golden .  Cool on wire rack .  Makes 6 dozen .

question: I have vinegar sugar tomatoes ginger green peppers cinnamon red pepper cloves onions allspice salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chili Sauce with 12 ripe tomatoes , 4 onions , 2 green peppers , 1 red pepper , 4 Tbsp .  sugar , 2 Tbsp .  salt , 2 tsp .  cinnamon , 2 tsp .  cloves , 2 tsp .  allspice , 1 tsp .  ginger , 1 qt .  vinegar . question: I have sugar soy sauce lemon juice eggs apple jelly water apple cider vinegar cornstarch ketchup chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sweet And Sour Chicken Wings with 10 to 12 chicken wings , 2 Tbsp .  cornstarch , 2 eggs , 2 Tbsp .  water , 1/4 c .  apple cider vinegar , 1/4 c .  sugar , 1/4 c .  ketchup , 1/4 c .  apple jelly , 1/8 c .  soy sauce , 1 Tbsp .  lemon juice . Allow wings to brown .  Combine remaining ingredients , mixing well .  Pour this over wings .  Simmer for 20 minutes .

question: I have boiling water lemon jello milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lemon Graham Cracker Pie with 1 (12 oz . ) can evaporated milk , chilled , 1 small pkg .  lemon jello , 1 c .  boiling water . Here's the instruction : Combine jello and water .  Let cool but not set .  Whip evaporated milk until thick in a large bowl .  Add juice of 1 lemon .  Beat in 3/4 cup of sugar .  Add cooled Jell-O mix .  Pour into 2 graham cracker shells .  Sprinkle with graham cracker crumbs or "sprinkles . " Place in refrigerator until set .

question: I have parmesan cheese butter bacon . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Bacon Wraps with butter flavored rectangular crackers , grated Parmesan cheese , bacon slices , cut in half . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 225° .  Take each half slice of bacon and lay flat .  Lay one cracker on top in center of bacon so that bacon can wrap around cracker .  Pour Parmesan cheese in center on cracker .  Wrap bacon around cheese and cracker carefully .  Lay cracker on ungreased cookie sheet , ends of bacon down .  Bake for 2 hours .

question: I have oleo sour cream egg sugar regular cream cheese flour pineapple salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pineapple Sheet Pie with 2 1/2 c .  flour , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1 egg , 1 tsp .  salt , 2 regular or 1 large vanilla pudding , 2 cans crushed pineapple (or pie filling) , 8 oz .  cream cheese , 1 pt .  sour cream , 2 sticks oleo . Here's the instruction : Mix flour , sugar , salt , egg and oleo with mixer until well blended .  Pat in cookie sheet .  Bake at 350° for 20 minutes .

question: I have baking powder sugar vanilla coffee baking soda eggs flour cocoa milk vegetable oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Grandma'S Moist Chocolate Cake And Frosting with 2 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 2 tsp .  baking soda , 3/4 c .  cocoa , 2 c .  sugar , 1 c .  milk , 1 c .  vegetable oil , 3 eggs , beaten , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  hot strong coffee . Here's the instruction : Sift dry ingredients together .  Add milk , oil , eggs and vanilla .  Beat well .  Add coffee .  Blend completely .  Batter will be thin . question: I have nutmeg brown sugar cloves cinnamon cider allspice . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hot Spiced Cider with 1 tsp .  allspice , 2 sticks cinnamon , 10 whole cloves , 2 qt .  cider , 2/3 c .  brown sugar , dash of nutmeg . Here's the instruction : Tie allspice , cinnamon and cloves in cheesecloth bag .  Heat cider and sugar .  Add spice bag and simmer for 10 minutes .  Serve hot in mugs with a dash of nutmeg .

question: I have potatoes cajun seasoning nonstick cooking spray egg whites . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fat-Free Cajun French Fries with 5 large potatoes (with skin or peeled , as desired) , 2 Tbsp .  Cajun seasoning , 2 egg whites , nonstick cooking spray (i . e .  , Pam) . Here's the instruction : Slice washed potatoes .  Place in bowl .  Mix in 2 tablespoons Cajun seasoning .  Stir in unbeaten egg whites , coating the potatoes .  Place mixture in sprayed pan(s) and bake at 350° .  Turn potatoes with a spatula every 15 minutes until done .  This gives them a crunchy , browned exterior .  Cooking time is 45 to 60 minutes .

question: I have sugar lemon jello gelatin hot water orange peel cranberries cold water nuts celery orange juice . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cranberry Relish with 1 c .  cranberries , ground , 1 c .  sugar , 1/4 c .  orange juice , 1 tsp .  orange peel , 1 pkg .  lemon jello , 1/2 c .  hot water , 1/2 c .  cold water , 1/2 c .  nuts , 1/2 c .  celery , 1 envelope plain gelatin , 1/4 c .  cold water , 1/2 c .  hot water . Here's the instruction : Mix first 4 ingredients; let stand overnight .  Add lemon jello , dissolved in hot water .  Add cold water , nuts , celery and plain gelatin dissolved in 1/4 cup cold water and 1/2 cup hot water .

question: I have vanilla pecans cocoa confectioners sugar butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fudge Surprise with 4 lb .  confectioners sugar , 1 c .  cocoa , 3 c .  chopped pecans , 1 lb .  pasteurized processed cheese cut into pieces , 2 c .  butter or margarine cut into pieces , 1 Tbsp .  vanilla extract . Here's the instruction : Sift confectioners sugar and cocoa into a very large bowl; stir in pecans .  Stirring frequently , melt cheese in the top of a large double boiler over simmering water .  Add butter to melted cheese , stirring until butter melts; stir in vanilla .  Add melted cheese mixture to sugar mixture .  Stir until well blended .  Press into a 10 1/2x15 1/2 jellyroll pan .  Cover and chill until firm .  Cut into 1 inch squares .  Store in an airtight container in a cool place .  Yield: about 12 1/2 dozen pieces .

question: I have california blend chicken rice cream of mushroom soup cheddar cheese cornflakes margarine milk chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Vegetable Casserole with 1 box chicken Rice-A-Roni , 3 c .  cooked chicken , 1 (16 oz . ) pkg .  California Blend vegetables , cooked , 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 1 can milk , 1 cube margarine , 1 c .  grated mild Cheddar cheese , 3/4 c .  crushed cornflakes . Here's the instruction : Spread Rice-A-Roni in a 9 x 13-inch pan .  Place chicken on rice .  Put vegetables on chicken .  Heat soup , milk and margarine until margarine is melted .  Pour soup mixture over everything .  Sprinkle cheese on top .  Cover with foil and bake at 350° for 45 minutes .  Remove foil .  Sprinkle cornflakes over top of dish and put back in oven , uncovered , for 10 minutes .  Enjoy!

question: I have sour cream salmon cheddar cheese mushrooms egg noodles cream-style cottage cheese green onion dill weed . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Salmon Noodle Romanoff with 1 (7 3/4 oz . ) can salmon , 1 (6 oz . ) pkg .  egg noodles , 1/2 c .  sour cream , 1 (4 oz . ) can sliced mushrooms , drained , 1 c .  cream-style cottage cheese , 3 Tbsp .  chopped green onion , 1/4 tsp .  dill weed , 1 c .  grated Cheddar cheese . Bake at 350° for 15 to 20 minutes .  Serves 4 .

question: I have egg baking powder sugar blueberries flour milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Blueberry Muffins with 1 3/4 c .  flour , 1/3 c .  sugar , 2 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 c .  blueberries , 3/4 c .  milk , 1 egg , 1/3 c .  melted butter . Here's the instruction : In a large bowl , combine flour , sugar , baking powder and salt .  Stir in blueberries .  Add milk , eggs and butter; mix just until dry ingredients are moistened .  The batter will be lumpy .  Do not overbeat .  Spoon batter into 12 (2 1/2-inch) greased muffin cups .  Bake at 400° for 25 minutes or until tops spring back when lightly touched .  Serve warm .

question: I have containers mushrooms mozzarella cheese onion parsley flakes bread crumbs butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Stuffed Mushrooms with 1 stick butter , 1 c .  bread crumbs , 2 containers mushrooms (fresh) , 1 c .  Mozzarella cheese , 1 tsp .  parsley flakes , 1 onion , chopped . Here's the instruction : Melt butter in frying pan .  Stir in bread crumbs , parsley flakes and onion until moist .  In cookie sheet , place button of mushroom .  Take the stem off .  Cut it in small pieces .  Place stem pieces in frying pan with bread mixture .  Cook over low heat until they turn tan .  Place in button of mushroom 1 teaspoon of this filling .  Sprinkle with cheese .  Bake at 350° for 10 to 15 minutes .

question: I have tomatoes mozzarella cheese cheddar cheese eggs onion parmesan cheese flour milk unbaked pie crusts garlic salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Quick Quiche with 2 c .  grated Cheddar cheese , 2 c .  grated Mozzarella cheese , 1 minced onion , 3 eggs , 1 c .  milk , 1 Tbsp .  flour , dash of salt , garlic powder to taste , sliced tomatoes , Parmesan cheese , unbaked pie crusts . question: I have condensed milk egg vanilla extract cold margarine brown sugar flour nuts chocolate chips . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Championship Chocolate Chip Bars with 1 1/2 c .  unsifted flour , 1/2 c .  firmly packed brown sugar , 1/2 c .  cold margarine or butter , 1 (12 oz . ) pkg .  chocolate chips , 1 (14 oz . ) can Eagle Brand sweetened condensed milk (not evaporated milk) , 1 egg , 1 tsp .  vanilla extract , 1 c .  chopped nuts . question: I have sour cream lemon juice crab sticks onion cream cheese mayonnaise . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have american cheese corn sugar pepper margarine milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Corn-Cheese Delight with 4 c .  whole corn , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  pepper , 1/4 c .  sugar , 1 stick margarine , 1 small can evaporated milk , 6 slices American cheese .
