question: I have bread pepper lemon juice eggs salmon onions milk vegetable oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sour cream bacon shredded cheese parkay margarine irish potatoes . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs pecans all-purpose cocoa butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar frozen lemonade water . Give me some cooking ideas .

Serve immediately .

question: I have thin slices swiss cheese butter chicken breasts stuffing . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Delight with 6 chicken breasts , 6 thin slices Swiss cheese , 1 can cream of mushroom soup plus 1 can water , heated until smooth , 2 c .  Pepperidge Farm stuffing , 1/2 stick melted butter . Here's the instruction : Place chicken in greased casserole .  Season with salt and pepper .  Place slice of cheese on each breast . question: I have oleo tomatoes bell pepper croutons onion water cheese grated cheese zucchini salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have cream of chicken soup cheddar cheese onion buttered bread crumbs almonds . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sour cream sugar shortening baking soda cake flour unbeaten egg salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cinnamon Twists with 1 c .  sour cream , 3 Tbsp .  sugar , 2 Tbsp .  shortening , 1/8 tsp .  baking soda , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 large unbeaten egg , 1 cake crumbled , compressed yeast or 1 pkg .  dry yeast * , 3 c .  flour . Here's the instruction : Boil together sugar , milk , butter and salt for 1 minute .  Remove from heat and add peanut butter and vanilla .  Stir until smooth .  Add oatmeal and mix together . question: I have frozen green lima beans brown sugar chili powder onion lean ground beef catsup pork pinto . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Three Bean Casserole with 1 can pinto or kidney beans , 1 can or 1 pkg .  frozen green lima beans , 1/2 c .  brown sugar , 1 Tbsp .  chili powder , 1 can pork and beans , 1/4 c .  catsup , 1 small onion , 1 lb .  lean ground beef . Here's the instruction : Scramble the beef and onion together .  Add other ingredients and bake at 350° for 45 minutes .

question: I have jeremiah chronicles numbers flour nahum milk butter honey salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Scripture Cake with 4 1/2 c .  1 Kings 4:22 (flour) , 1 c .  Judges 5:25 (last clause; butter) , 2 c .  Jeremiah 6:20 (sugar) , 2 c .  1 Samuel 30:12 (raisins) , 2 c .  Nahum 3:12 (figs) , 2 c .  Numbers 17:8 (almonds) , 3 Tbsp .  1 Samuel 14:25 (honey) , 2 Tbsp .  Amos 4:5 (baking powder) , 1/2 c .  Judges 4:19 (last clause; milk) , 6 Jeremiah 17:11 (eggs) , pinch of Leviticus 2:13 (salt) , 2 Chronicles 9:9 (spice) or 1 tsp .  allspice . Here's the instruction : Follow Solomon's advice for making good boys and you will have a good cake (Proverbs 23:14 - beat well) .  Cream butter , sugar and honey until well blended .  Add eggs , one at a time , beating well after each addition .  Sift flour .  Measure and sift 4 1/2 cups together with dry ingredients .  Cut raisins , figs and almonds; set aside after rolling in flour .  Add dry ingredients alternately with milk to creamed mixture .  Blend and beat well .  Fold in fruit and nuts .  (Add 1 teaspoon vanilla , if desired . ) Turn batter into greased tube pan or rectangular pan .  Bake at 325° for 1 hour and 35 to 40 minutes .  Cool slightly and remove from pan .

question: I have chocolate cake powdered sugar pecans cream cheese coconut butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make German Chocolate Upside-Down Cake with 1 c .  pecans , 1 c .  coconut , 1 box German chocolate cake mix , 2 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , softened , 1 stick butter , softened , 1 box powdered sugar . Mix cream cheese , butter and powdered sugar together .  Pour mixture over cake mix .  Don't spread all the way to the edge .  Bake at 350° for 35 minutes .

question: I have pistachio fruit cocktail colored marshmallows pineapple containers mandarin oranges flaked coconut . Give me some cooking ideas .

Put in large dish and chill .

question: I have potatoes butter grated cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Stuffed Hot Dogs with 4 to 5 mashed potatoes , butter , salt , pepper and diced onion to suit taste , 10 hot dogs , grated cheese . question: I have cumin chicken bouillon tomatoes chicken breasts green peppers picante onion water chilies shredded cheese corn tortillas tomato juice garlic beef bouillon vegetable oil . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oil sugar nutmeg eggs baking soda cinnamon mace flour nuts pumpkin milk allspice salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have bacon tomatoes garlic salt basil thyme onions some carrot zucchini . Give me some cooking ideas .

Cover and stir often over medium heat .  Takes about 1 hour .  Add bacon last 15 minutes .

question: I have sugar pecans fresh cranberries orange apples pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cranapple Relish with 1 orange , 5 or 6 apples , unpeeled , 1 (1 lb . ) bag fresh cranberries , washed , 2 c .  sugar or less , 1 (20 oz . ) can crushed pineapple , drained , 1/2 c .  chopped pecans . Refrigerate overnight .  Yields 2 quarts .  Enjoy your turkey .

question: I have sour cream bacon cream of mushroom soup beef chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Supreme with 1 jar dried beef , 8 to 10 chicken breasts (skinless and boneless) , 8 to 10 bacon slices , 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 1 c .  sour cream . question: I have bay leaf pepper nutmeg onion mushrooms water thyme white wine parsley rice shrimp butter green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have flour margarine sugar . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Date Bars with 2 blocks margarine , 2 c .  flour , 1/2 c .  sugar . Here's the instruction : Mix together and bake 12 to 15 minutes at 325° .

Hold finger over a 3/8 or 1/2-inch funnel hole and fill funnel with batter .  Have oil heated to 375° .  Release finger and drop batter in a circular motion , starting in center to form a spiral .  Repeat with more dough , forming more cakes , until pan is crowded .  Fry until puffy and golden brown .  Remove from oil with slotted spoon and drain on paper towel .  Cool slightly and dust with powdered sugar .  Makes about 24 .

question: I have nutmeg cream of mushroom soup pecans mushrooms rice butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mushroom Rice Casserole with 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 1 small can sliced mushrooms , 1 c .  broken pecans , toasted , 1/2 c .  melted butter , 1 c .  rice , salt to taste , 1 tsp .  nutmeg . Here's the instruction : Cook rice as directed .  Mix in butter and nutmeg .  Mix mushrooms with soup and salt to taste .  In casserole , alternate soup and rice , ending with soup .  Bake at 350° for about 20 minutes .  Add toasted pecans before taking from oven .  Serves 6 .

question: I have sweet milk whiskey marshmallows nuts whipped cream . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Light Dessert with 20 marshmallows , 1 c .  nuts , 1 c .  sweet milk , 1/4 c .  whiskey , 1/2 c .  whipped cream , 1 c .  chopped nuts . Here's the instruction : Melt marshmallows in heated milk and put in refrigerator until thickens .  Add whipped cream and nuts to marshmallows and milk .  Mix , stirring well .  Add whiskey .  Mix and cover with chocolate decorations .  Freeze , if desired .

question: I have potatoes onion mushroom soup water carrots hamburger . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hamburger Hot Dish with 1 lb .  hamburger , 1 can mushroom soup , 1/2 can water , 1 onion , chopped , 4 carrots , sliced , 2 potatoes , sliced . Here's the instruction : Place hamburger in the bottom of a small roaster or casserole .  Place onion , carrots and potatoes over the meat .  Mix soup and water together and pour over vegetables and hamburger .  Season with salt and pepper; bake for 1 hour in a 350° oven .

question: I have clams pasta parmesan cheese clam juice parsley garlic olive oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make White Clam Sauce with 2 cans chopped or minced clams , 1/4 to 1/2 c .  reserved clam juice , 1 large clove minced garlic , 2 Tbsp .  olive oil , 1/4 c .  chopped parsley , salt and pepper to taste , grated Parmesan cheese , pasta of choice . Here's the instruction : In a hurry? Need a quick , low-fat dinner? Try this .

question: I have sugar vanilla powdered sugar pecans flour chocolate kisses butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Snowball Surprises with 1/2 lb .  butter , softened , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  finely chopped pecans , 15 oz .  chocolate kisses , 1/2 c .  sugar , 2 c .  flour , powdered sugar . Here's the instruction : Beat butter , sugar and vanilla until light and fluffy .  Add flour and	nuts .  Blend well .  Chill dough .  Remove foil from kisses .  Shape dough around kisses using 1 tablespoon for each .  Roll to form ball , covering kiss completely .  Place on ungreased cookie sheet .  Bake at 350° for 12 minutes until set but not brown .  While warm, sprinkle with powdered sugar .  Store in covered container .

question: I have chocolate flavored drink powdered sugar milk powdered creamer . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Instant Creamy Hot Chocolate with 1 large jar powdered creamer , 1 (8 qt .  size) box nonfat dry milk powder , 1 (2 lb . ) box chocolate flavored drink mix , 1 c .  powdered sugar . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients thoroughly and store in an airtight container .  Use 1/3 cup of the mixture in a cup of hot water .

question: I have celery salt sugar salt pepper garlic salt water onions rice ground meat worcestershire sauce tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Oven Porcupines with 1 lb .  ground meat , 1/2 c .  uncooked rice , 1/3 c .  water , 1/8 tsp .  garlic salt , 15 oz .  tomato sauce , 2 Tbsp .  Worcestershire sauce , 1/3 c .  chopped onions , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  celery salt , 1/8 tsp .  pepper , 1 c .  water , 1 tsp .  sugar . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 350° .  Mix meat , rice , 1/3 cup water , onion , salt , garlic and pepper .  Shape into round balls .  Place balls in an ungreased baking dish (8 x 8 x 2-inch) .  Stir together remaining ingredients and pour over meatballs .  Cover with foil and bake 45 minutes .  Uncover and bake 15 minutes longer .

question: I have vanilla brown sugar soda crackers milk graham crackers chocolate chips butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Soda Cracker Bars with soda crackers , 1 1/2 c .  brown sugar , 1 1/2 c .  crushed graham crackers , 1/2 c .  milk , 3/4 c .  butter , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  chocolate chips , 3 tsp .  butter . Here's the instruction : Line bottom of 9 x 13-inch pan with soda crackers .  Mix brown sugar , cracker crumbs , milk and butter .  Bring to a slow boil and cook 7 minutes .

question: I have sour cream graham cracker crust sugar vanilla eggs cream cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make My Favorite Chocolate Cake with 2 lb .  cream cheese , 1/2 c .  sour cream , 1 3/4 c .  sugar , 4 eggs , 1 tsp .  vanilla , graham cracker crust . Here's the instruction : Blend first 5 ingredients well .  Can use graham cracker crust in 9 x 12-inch pan or cheese cake pan .  Pour into prepared crust .  Bake 1 1/2 hours at 325° .  Turn off oven and let sit 20 minutes .  Cool completely and refrigerate .  Top with fresh fruit or canned pie filling before serving .

question: I have black cherries lemon jello black cherry jello water nuts pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Coca Cola Salad with 1 pkg .  lemon jello , 1 pkg .  black cherry jello , 2 c .  hot water , 1 c .  chopped nuts , 1 can black cherries , 1 can pineapple chunks . Here's the instruction : Dissolve jellos and hot water together .  When mixture begins to thicken add nuts , cherries and pineapple .  Refrigerate and allow to congeal .

question: I have flour pecans butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Baskin-Robbins Pie with 1 stick butter , melted , 1 c .  flour , 1/2 c .  pecans , crushed , dash of salt . Here's the instruction : Mix well and bake in a 9-inch pie pan at 350° for 20 minutes .  Remove and let cool .

question: I have eggs cheddar cheese onion corn bread frozen broccoli butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli Corn Bread with 1 box Jiffy corn bread mix , 1 (10 oz . ) box frozen broccoli , drained , 1 small onion , chopped , 4 eggs , beaten , 1 stick butter , melted , 2 c .  Cheddar cheese , shredded . Here's the instruction : Melt butter in a 9 x 13-inch baking dish .  Beat eggs .  Add all other ingredients to the beaten eggs .  Pour excess butter into mixture and mix well .  Pour into buttered baking dish .  Bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes .

question: I have oil sugar water flour yeast milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Super Quick Rolls with 1/4 c .  lukewarm water , 1 pkg .  dry yeast , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 2 c .  self-rising flour , 1 c .  milk , 1/2 c .  Mazola oil . Here's the instruction : Mix water , yeast and sugar until dissolved .  Add flour , milk and oil .  Stir until all flour is moist .  Batter will look lumpy .  Bake at once in well buttered muffin pans at 475° for about 15 minutes , or until browned .

question: I have tomatoes ham hocks onion bay leaves pinto beans paprika garlic olive oil . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Judias Estofadas(Pinto Bean Soup)   with 1 lb .  bag pinto beans , 1 large onion , cut in half , 3 large ripe tomatoes , peeled and halved , 5 large cloves garlic , 4 bay leaves , 2 Tbsp .  olive oil , 2 ham hocks , 2 Tbsp .  paprika . Here's the instruction : In a 5-quart pan , add 3 quarts of water and all ingredients , except garlic , olive oil and paprika .  (Mash garlic; mix with paprika and olive oil and add to the beans after beans are tender . ) Add water as needed .  Serves 6 .

question: I have potatoes pork chops . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pork Chops And Scalloped Potatoes with 2 pork chops , 2 medium potatoes , peeled and cut up . Here's the instruction : Place cut up potatoes in casserole .  Pour about 1/4 cup milk over potatoes .  Salt and pepper .  Place pork chops on top of potatoes and salt and pepper .  Cover and bake at 350° for 1 hour .

question: I have buttermilk green chilies eggs cheddar cheese cornbread mix vegetable oil cream-style . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mexican Cornbread with 1 (17 oz . ) can cream-style corn , 1 c .  buttermilk , 1/2 c .  vegetable oil , 2 eggs , beaten , 1 c .  cornbread mix , 1 (4 oz . ) can chopped green chilies , drained , 1 1/2 c .  (6 oz . ) shredded Cheddar cheese . Here's the instruction : Combine corn , buttermilk , oil and eggs; mix well .  Stir in cornbread mix .  Pour half of batter into a greased 9-inch square pan; sprinkle with green chilies and half of cheese .  Pour remaining half of batter over top and sprinkle with remaining cheese .  Bake at 350° for 45 to 50 minutes or until done .  Cut into squares .  Yields 9 .

question: I have cottage cheese pecans pineapple fruit cocktail . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fruit Delight with 1 can fruit cocktail , drained , 1 can crushed pineapple , 24 oz .  carton cottage cheese , 1 large carton Cool Whip , 2 (3 oz . ) pkg .  Jell-O (mixed fruit or strawberry-banana) , pecans . Here's the instruction : Mix together cottage cheese , dry Jell-O and drained fruit .  Fold in Cool Whip and all the pecans you can afford .  This can be made 1 or 2 days ahead and kept in the refrigerator .  Serves 6 to 8 .

question: I have buttermilk oleo sugar vanilla eggs soda bananas flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Banana Slat Cake with 2 sticks oleo , 2 c .  sugar , 4 eggs , beaten , 3 lg .  ripe bananas , mashed , 1-1/2 tsp .  vanilla , 2-1/2 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  soda , 4 Tbsp .  buttermilk , pinch salt . Here's the instruction : Cream oleo with sugar and blend well; add beaten eggs to mixture .  Add vanilla and bananas to creamed mixture .  Sift and measure flour with soda and sift again .  Add milk and dry ingredients alternately to creamed mixture .  Bake in 9x13-inch pan for 1 hour at 325° .

question: I have vinegar sugar head red cabbage cloves water apples bay leaf salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Red Cabbage with 1 medium head red cabbage , 2 c .  water , 1 tsp .  salt , 2/3 c .  vinegar , 2 apples , sliced thin , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 1 bay leaf , 1/4 tsp .  cloves . Here's the instruction : Boil together for about 1 hour until tender .

question: I have oil egg water skinless milk rice bread crumbs cream of asparagus soup . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Crispy Chicken With Asparagus Sauce with 4 skinless , boneless chicken breast halves , 1 egg , slightly beaten , 1/2 c .  dry bread crumbs , 2 Tbsp .  oil , 1 can cream of asparagus soup , 1/3 c .  milk , 1/3 c .  water , hot cooked rice with chopped parsley . Here's the instruction : In pie plate , dip chicken into egg; coat with bread crumbs .  In skillet over medium low heat , cook chicken 15 minutes or until browned on both sides and no longer pink .  Remove; keep warm .  In same skillet over low heat , combine soup , milk and water .  Serve with rice .  Serves 4 .

question: I have light corn syrup sugar vanilla cocoa milk butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hot Fudge Sauce with 3/4 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  Hershey's cocoa , 1 can (5 oz . ) evaporated milk , 1/3 c .  light corn syrup , 1/3 c .  butter , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Combine sugar and cocoa in small saucepan; blend in evaporated milk and corn syrup .  Cook over medium heat , stirring constantly , until mixture boils .  Boil and stir one minute .  Remove from heat; stir in butter and vanilla .  Serve warm .

question: I have cabbage caraway seed green beans chicken broth onions carrots parsley butter american cheese slices salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make "Good Friday" Vegetable Soup with 1/4 c .  butter , 3 medium carrots , sliced , 2 medium onions , 1 c .  shredded cabbage , 1/4 c .  chopped parsley , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 2 (13 3/4 oz . ) cans chicken broth , 1 (9 oz . ) pkg .  French-cut green beans , 1/2 tsp .  caraway seed , 1 (16 oz . ) pkg .  American cheese slices . Here's the instruction : In covered Dutch oven or saucepan (4-quart) over medium heat , cook butter , carrots , onions , cabbage , parsley and salt for 20 minutes , stirring occasionally .  Add chicken broth , green beans and caraway seed .  Reduce to low heat , cover and simmer 15 minutes or until vegetables are fork-tender .

question: I have buttermilk egg baking powder shortening brown sugar ground nutmeg soda flour ground cinnamon . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cowboy Coffee Cake with 1 1/4 c .  sifted all-purpose flour , 1 c .  brown sugar , 1/3 c .  shortening , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1/4 tsp .  soda , 1/4 tsp .  ground cinnamon , 1/4 tsp .  ground nutmeg , 1/2 c .  buttermilk , 1 beaten egg . Here's the instruction : Mix flour , sugar , salt and shortening until crumbly; take out 1/4 cup .  To remaining crumbs , add baking powder , soda and spices; mix well .  Pour into one greased and floured 8 x 1 1/2-inch round pan; top with reserved crumbs .  Bake at 375° for 25 to 30 minutes .  Serve warm .  Makes one cake .

question: I have spinach bacon eggs herb stuffing mix water cheese sausage butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Bacon Spinach Roll-Ups with 1 stick butter , 1/3 c .  water , 2 c .  herb stuffing mix , 1/2 c .  mild sausage , uncooked , 1 c .  Parmesan grated cheese , 2 pkg .  frozen chopped spinach , cooked and well drained , 2 eggs , lightly beaten , 1 lb .  bacon . Here's the instruction : Melt butter in the water .  Remove from heat .  Stir in stuffing and add the rest of the ingredients , except bacon .  Chill at least one hour .

question: I have cream of coconut frozen coconut cool whip rum flavoring milk butter pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pina Colada Cake with 1 Yellow Butter Cake Mix , 1 pkg .  frozen coconut , 1 can cream of coconut , 1 can eagle brand milk , 1 large carton cool whip , 1 (8 oz . ) can crushed pineapple , 2 teaspoons rum flavoring . Here's the instruction : Mix cake mix as directed on box except put the crushed pineapples instead of water .  Bake and cool .  After the cake has cooled .  Punch holes in cake with wooden spoon .  Mix the cream of coconut and eagle brand milk together and pour over cake and then top with cool whip and loose coconut .

question: I have sugar frozen raspberries cream cheese water pretzels raspberry jello butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Raspberry Pretzel Salad with 2 1/2 c .  crushed pretzels (crumbs) , 1 c .  melted butter , 3 Tbsp .  sugar , 1 large container Cool Whip , 8 oz .  cream cheese , 1 c .  sugar , 2 pkg .  raspberry jello , 2 c .  hot water , 2 pkg .  frozen raspberries (not the loose frozen raspberries) . Here's the instruction : Mix crumbs , butter and 3 tablespoons sugar; press in pan .  Bake for 10 minutes at 350° .  Cool .  Cream the cream cheese and sugar until smooth .  Spread on pretzel crust .  Dissolve jello in hot water; add frozen raspberries .  Let stand until thick and pour over top .  Let set .

question: I have pepper eggs baking potatoes milk paprika butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Duchess Potatoes with 10 medium baking potatoes , peeled , 1/4 c .  butter or margarine , 1/4 c .  milk , 3/4 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 2 large eggs , lightly beaten , 2 Tbsp .  butter or margarine , melted , paprika . Here's the instruction : Cook potatoes in boiling water to cover 15 minutes or until tender .  Drain and mash .  Stir in butter and next 3 ingredients .  Let cool 10 minutes .  Stir in eggs .  Spoon mixture into a large decorating bag fitted with a large star tip .  Pipe 14 (2-inch) rosettes onto a lightly greased baking sheet .  Drizzle with melted butter and sprinkle with paprika .  Bake at 350° for 15 minutes or until lightly browned around the edges .

question: I have marshmallows nuts butter pineapple yams . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Easy Glazed Yams with 2 (17 or 23 oz . ) cans yams or sweet potatoes , drained , 3/4 c .  Bama pineapple or peach preserves , 1/4 c .  chopped nuts , 1/2 to 1 c .  miniature marshmallows , 1 Tbsp .  butter . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Arrange yams in ungreased 1 1/2-quart shallow baking dish .  Spoon preserves evenly over yams .  Top with nuts , marshmallows and butter .  Bake 25 minutes or until hot .  Refrigerate leftovers .

question: I have sugar eggs lemon extract flour butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make 7-Up Pound Cake with 3 sticks butter , 3 c .  sugar , 5 eggs , 3 c .  flour (plain) , 3/4 c .  7-Up , 2 Tbsp .  lemon extract . Here's the instruction : Cream together the butter and sugar for 20 minutes .  Add eggs , one at a time .  Add flour and lemon extract .  Fold in 7-Up .  Pour into well greased 12 cup Bundt pan .  Bake at 325° .

question: I have mashed banana baking powder vanilla eggs baking soda cinnamon water flour walnuts butter liquid sweetener . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sugarless Banana Walnut Cake with 2/3 c .  mashed banana , 1/2 c .  butter or margarine , softened , 3 eggs , 2 c .  flour , 2 tsp .  baking powder , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 3/4 c .  water , 1 c .  chopped walnuts , 2 Tbsp .  liquid sweetener , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Mix bananas and butter together until creamy; add eggs .  Beat well .  Combine flour , baking powder , soda and cinnamon .  Add to banana mixture alternately with water , beating well after each addition .  Stir in nuts .  Spoon into a greased baking pan .  Bake at 350° for 30 minutes or until cake tests done .

question: I have tabasco cream of chicken soup chicken breasts pepper soy sauce accent cream of mushroom soup pet milk onion mushrooms sharp cheese pimento almonds butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken And Asparagus Casserole Dish(A Good Company Dish)   with 6 whole chicken breasts (I use 4 whole chicken breasts) , 1 medium onion , chopped , 1/2 c .  butter , 1 (8 oz . ) can mushrooms , 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 1 (5 1/3 oz . ) can Pet milk , 1/2 lb .  sharp cheese , grated , 1/4 tsp .  Tabasco , 2 tsp .  soy sauce , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  pepper , 1 tsp .  Accent , 2 Tbsp .  pimento , chopped , 2 cans green tip asparagus , 1/2 c .  slivered almonds . Here's the instruction : Boil chicken breasts in seasoned water until tender .  Cool , debone and tear bite size pieces .  Set aside .  Saute onion in butter and add remaining ingredients , except asparagus and almonds .  Simmer sauce until cheese melts .  To assemble: place a layer of chicken in a large casserole dish , a layer of asparagus and a layer of sauce .  Repeat layers ending with sauce .  Top with almonds .  Bake at 350° until bubbly .  Do not add liquid even if it looks dry .  If large breasts are used this will serve 12 .  It also freezes well .

question: I have baking powder vanilla shortening brown sugar eggs soda flour rice krispies coconut white sugar rolled oats salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Krispy Krunch with 1 c .  shortening , 1 c .  white sugar , 1 c .  brown sugar , 2 eggs , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 2 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  soda , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 2 c .  old fashioned rolled oats , 2 c .  Rice Krispies , 1 c .  coconut or nuts or half and half of each . Here's the instruction : Cream together first five ingredients .  Sift together flour , soda , baking powder and salt; then add to first set of ingredients .  Mix remaining ingredients with first mixture .  With buttered hands , mold into balls about the size of walnuts .  Place on greased cookie sheet .  Bake at 350° for 12 to 15 minutes .  Makes about 100 cookies .

question: I have maraschino cherries peaches oranges sugar . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Peach And Orange Marmalade with 6 lb .  peaches (8 c . ) , 6 lb .  sugar (8 c . ) , 2 large oranges , 1 large bottle maraschino cherries . Here's the instruction : Crush peaches .  Put oranges through coarse blade of food chopper .  Add sugar and cook one hour .  Add syrup from cherries and chopped cherries just before marmalade is cooked .  Pour in hot jars and seal .

question: I have pepper lemon juice garlic powder margarine paprika chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Golden Baked Chicken with 2 1/2 lb .  chicken pieces , skinned , 1/4 c .  melted margarine , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1/2 tsp .  paprika , 1/8 tsp .  pepper , 1/8 tsp .  garlic powder . Here's the instruction : Place chicken on a rack in a shallow baking dish .  Combine remaining ingredients and brush on chicken .  Bake at 370° for 1 hour .  Brush chicken with mixture once or twice during baking .

question: I have american cheese macaroni cream of mushroom soup eggs mushrooms onion cream of celery soup milk chicken salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Overnight Chicken Casserole with 1 (7 oz . ) pkg .  raw macaroni , 2 c .  milk , 1 can cream of celery soup , 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 1 (12 oz . ) can mushrooms , 1/2 lb .  grated American cheese , 2 c .  diced , cooked chicken , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 small onion , finely chopped , 3 hard-boiled eggs , chopped . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients in	a large bowl . 	Cover and place in refrigerator overnight .  Remove from refrigerator 1 hour before baking .  Stir well and spoon into 1 1/2 quart casserole .  Bake in preheated 350° oven for 1 hour . 	Serves 6 .

question: I have fresh mushrooms parsley chives tarragon tarragon vinegar olive oil . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Marinated Fresh Mushrooms with 1 lb .  fresh mushrooms , wash , trim off ends and slice lengthwise , 3/4 c .  olive oil , 3 Tbsp .  tarragon vinegar , 1 tsp .  chopped parsley , 1 tsp .  chopped chives , 1/2 tsp .  dried tarragon , crushed . Here's the instruction : Combine all ingredients; mix well .  Marinate at least 3 hours or overnight .

question: I have almond sugar crisco baking powder vanilla eggs flour milk lemon butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Velvet Pound Cake with 1/2 lb .  butter , 1/2 c .  Crisco , 5 eggs , 3 c .  flour (cake) , 3 c .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1 c .  milk , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 tsp .  lemon , 1 tsp .  almond or flavor desired . Here's the instruction : Mix butter and Crisco , cream with sugar and eggs .  Mix 1/2 cup of milk and flour , then add other half cup of milk .  Add flavors and baking powder .  Beat .  Bake 1 1/2 hours at 300° .

question: I have nut meats shortening brown sugar water flour yeast oatmeal boiling water salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Oatmeal Bread with 1 pkg .  yeast , 1/2 c .  lukewarm water , 2 c .  uncooked oatmeal , 1/2 c .  brown sugar , 2 Tbsp .  shortening , 2 tsp .  salt , 2 c .  boiling water , 4 c .  flour , 1/2 c .  nut meats . Here's the instruction : Dissolve yeast in lukewarm water .  Pour boiling water over oatmeal , shortening , sugar and salt .  Mix well .  Let cool until lukewarm .  Stir in dissolved yeast .  Add nut meats and 3 1/4 cups of flour .  Cover and set in warm place and allow to double in size .  Place remaining flour on board and knead until it is all worked in .  It will seem stiff .  Set in warm place until more than double in bulk .  Divide into loaves .  Makes 2 large or 4 small loaves .  Let raise .  Bake at 350° for 45 to 50 minutes .

question: I have sugar vanilla pudding coconut yellow cake mix pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Coconut Sheet Cake with 1 box yellow cake mix , 1 c .  sugar , 1 (18 oz . ) crushed pineapple , not drained , 1 (8 oz . ) Cool Whip , 1 small instant vanilla pudding , coconut . Here's the instruction : Mix and bake cake as directed .  Boil pineapple , juice and sugar for 5 minutes .  Prick holes in hot cake and pour boiled mixture over top of cake .  Prepare pudding and spread on cooled cake .  Top with Cool Whip and coconut .

question: I have cream of chicken soup chicken breasts cream of mushroom soup paprika cream of celery soup rice butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken And Rice Casserole with 1/2 c .  plus 2 Tbsp .  melted butter , 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 1 can cream of celery soup , 1 1/4 c .  uncooked rice , 3 chicken breasts , halved , paprika . Here's the instruction : Combine 1/2 cup butter and soups in saucepan .  Heat; stir until smooth .  Add rice .  Spread in 9 x 13-inch baking dish .  Lay chicken breasts on top , skin side up .  Brush with melted butter .  Sprinkle with paprika .  Bake at 275° for 2 hours and 30 minutes .  Makes 6 servings .

question: I have shrimp salad dressing parsley flakes cream cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Shrimp Sandwiches with 1 can small shrimp , 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , 1/4 c .  Catalina salad dressing , parsley flakes . Here's the instruction : Soften cream cheese and add salad dressing .  Drain shrimp and add to cheese mixture and add a few parsley flakes .  Makes great party sandwiches .

question: I have baking powder sugar vanilla eggs flour milk almond extract butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Coconut Cake with 1 c .  butter or margarine , 2 c .  sugar , 3 c .  sifted Swans Down cake flour , 3 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 4 eggs , 1 c .  milk , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1/2 tsp .  almond extract . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Cream butter; gradually add sugar , creaming until light and fluffy .  Sift flour with baking powder and salt .  Add eggs one at a time to creamed mixture , beating well after each addition .  Add flour mixture alternately with milk and flavorings , beating after each addition until smooth .  Pour batter into three greased and floured 9 x 2-inch cake pans .  Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes .  Cool in pans 10 minutes .  Remove from pans; finish cooling on racks .

question: I have ida o'brien potatoes sour cream black pepper onion margarine cheddar cheese soup cream of mushroom . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Potato Casserole with 1 stick margarine , melted , 1 can Cheddar cheese soup , 1 can cream of mushroom , 1 c .  sour cream , 1/4 c .  chopped onion , 1/4 tsp .  black pepper , 1 bag Ore Ida O'Brien potatoes . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients together in bowl except potatoes , then add potatoes .  Pour into casserole dish .  Top with crumbled potato chips .  Bake at 350° for 1 hour or until brown .

question: I have sugar green tomatoes water celery apple cider vinegar pickling lime whole cloves pickling spice salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sweet Green Tomato Pickles with 7 lb .  green tomatoes , thinly sliced , 2 gal .  water , 2 c .  pickling lime , 9 c .  apple cider vinegar , 10 c .  sugar , 1 tsp .  salt , 3 tsp .  pickling spice , 1 tsp .  whole cloves , 1 tsp .  celery seed . Here's the instruction : In a large plastic container , soak tomatoes in water and lime mixture for 24 hours .  Rinse well and soak in cold water 3 hours .  Combine vinegar , sugar and salt in another container .  Place pickling spice , cloves and celery seed in cheesecloth bag .  Add to vinegar mixture .  Set aside .  Drain water from tomatoes; pour vinegar mixture over the tomatoes .  Soak overnight .  Next morning , simmer mixture until the tomatoes are transparent (about 50 minutes) .  Fill in hot sterilized jars and process in boiling water bath 5 minutes .

question: I have cream of chicken soup velveeta cheese chicken breasts bell pepper chili powder onion doritos garlic ro-tel tomatoes . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mexican Chicken with 4 large chicken breasts , 2 cans cream of chicken soup , 1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes , 1 c .  chopped bell pepper , 1 c .  chopped onion , 1 Tbsp .  chili powder , 1 Tbsp .  garlic powder (not garlic salt) , 1 c .  grated Velveeta cheese , 1 large bag Doritos . Here's the instruction : Boil chicken , peel off skin .  Remove from bone .  Mix soup , tomatoes , bell pepper , onion , garlic powder , chili powder and 1/2 cup of cheese .  Mix well .  Grease large Pyrex pan , line bottom with Doritos and then place chicken on top of Doritos .  Pour mixed ingredients over chicken .  Bake at 350° for 30 minutes .  Remove and pour remaining Doritos and cheese over top .  Put in oven until cheese melts .

question: I have pepper cream of mushroom soup bacon bits onion green beans milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Bacon And Green Bean Casserole with 2 (16 oz . ) cans green beans , drained , 1 c .  cream of mushroom soup , 3/4 c .  milk , 1 can French fried onion rings , 1 (2 oz . ) jar real bacon bits , 1/8 tsp .  pepper . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 350° .  In bowl , combine beans , soup , milk , 1/2 can onions , 1/2 jar bacon bits and pepper; pour into 1 1/2-quart casserole dish .  Bake 30 minutes .  Top with remaining onions and bacon bits .  Bake 5 minutes longer .

question: I have oil sour cream eggs vanilla instant pudding pecans water yellow cake mix chocolate chips sweet chocolate . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Better Than Sex Cake with 1 box yellow cake mix , 4 eggs , 1 small box vanilla instant pudding , 1 (4 oz . ) pkg .  German sweet chocolate , grated , 1/2 c .  oil , 1/2 c .  water , 8 oz .  sour cream , 6 oz .  pkg .  chocolate chips , 1/2 c .  chopped pecans . Here's the instruction : Combine the first 7 ingredients in a large bowl .  Beat at medium speed for 4 minutes .  Stir in chocolate chips and nuts .  Bake in greased and floured tube pan at 350° for 55 minutes .  Cool in pan for 10 minutes before removing .

question: I have celery salt cream of chicken soup bell pepper noodles cream of mushroom soup cheddar cheese onion flour margarine milk chicken salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Tetrazzini with 2 c .  boiled chicken , 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  noodles , 1/2 c .  chopped onion , 1/2 c .  chopped bell pepper , 1/4 c .  margarine , 1/2 tsp .  celery salt , salt and pepper to taste , 3 tsp .  flour , 2 c .  milk , 1/2 c .  Cheddar cheese , 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 1 can cream of chicken soup . Here's the instruction : Cook noodles according to package .  Saute onions and bell pepper in margarine .  Stir in flour slowly until thick .  Add seasonings and cheese; stir until melted .  Add 2 cups milk , soups , chicken (chopped) , and noodles .  Turn into shallow baking dish and cover with bread crumbs .  Bake at 400° for 15 to 20 minutes or until browned on top .

question: I have water cold water orange jello carrots pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sunshine Salad with 1 large pkg .  orange jello , 1 c .  hot water , 1 c .  cold water , 1 c .  crushed pineapple , drained , 1 c .  grated carrots . Here's the instruction : Dissolve jello in hot water , add cold water; stir .  Add pineapple; allow to cool but not gel .  Add carrots and stir to distribute evenly .  Place in refrigerate to congeal .

question: I have celery salt sour cream tomato oregano lemon juice cayenne pepper onion clove garlic avocado . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Guacamole Viva with 1 large avocado , 3 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1/2 c .  sour cream , 1 clove garlic , minced , 1 small onion , finely chopped , 1 ripe tomato , chopped , 1/2 tsp .  celery salt , 1/2 tsp .  oregano , cayenne pepper to taste . Here's the instruction : Peel and mash avocado with a fork in a medium glass bowl .  Add lemon juice and sour cream , mixing well .  Stir in garlic , onion and tomato .  Season with celery salt , oregano and cayenne pepper .  Place avocado pit in the center; cover and chill until serving .  Remove pit before serving .

question: I have corn light corn syrup brown sugar baking soda margarine peanuts salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Microwave Caramel Corn with 3 qt .  popped corn (1/2 c .  kernels) , 1 1/2 c .  peanuts (optional) , 1 c .  packed brown sugar , 1 stick margarine , 1/4 c .  light corn syrup , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  baking soda . Here's the instruction : Pop corn in air popper .  Place popcorn and peanuts in double brown grocery bag; set aside .  Combine sugar , butter , syrup and salt in glass bowl .  Microwave on High 3 to 4 minutes , stirring after each minute , until mixture boils .  Microwave 2 minutes more .  Stir in soda .  Pour syrup mixture over popcorn in bag .  Close bag; shake well .  Microwave 1 1/2 minutes on High; shake .  Microwave 1 1/2 minutes on High; shake .  Pour into roasting pan .  Cool to separate .

question: I have spaghetti bacon fresh parsley eggs mushrooms clove garlic grated cheese green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pasta Carbonara with 1 lb .  bacon , 1 c .  mushrooms , sliced , 1 clove garlic , 1 green pepper , cubed , 2 eggs , 1/2 c .  grated cheese , 2 Tbsp .  fresh parsley , 1 lb .  spaghetti . Here's the instruction : Take 1 pound of bacon and cut into cubes; brown .  Add 1 cup sliced mushrooms , garlic and green pepper; saute with bacon .  Set aside and save fat in pan .  In a spaghetti bowl , beat 2 eggs .  Add parsley and grated cheese .  Cook 1 pound of spaghetti .  Save 1/2 cup of water .  Fold spaghetti into egg mixture .  Let set 3 minutes .  Add 1/2 cup of boiling water; mix well .  Heat first mixture of bacon and vegetables; pour over spaghetti .

question: I have chocolate instant pudding cream cheese oreo cookies confectioners sugar milk butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Dirt Dessert with 1/2 stick butter (oleo) , 1 c .  confectioners sugar , 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , 1 (6 1/2 oz . ) pkg .  chocolate instant pudding , 3 c .  milk , 1 (12 oz . ) tub Cool Whip , 1 1/2 lb .  Oreo cookies , crushed . Here's the instruction : Mix the first 3 ingredients in one bowl .  Mix the pudding , milk and Cool Whip in a large bowl , then blend and fold cream cheese mixture into Cool Whip mixture .  Layer cookie crumbs with the chocolate pudding combination in a clear glass container and decorate as you see fit .  Can be served with a little toy shovel .  You can end with a crumb mix on top and put an artificial flower in center .

question: I have chili sauce onion soup mustard pork ground beef ketchup . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Grandma Liskawa'S Pork And Beans with 1 1/2 lb .  ground beef , 5 (15 1/2 to 16 oz . ) cans pork and beans , 2 pkg .  Lipton onion soup mix , 1 1/2 c .  ketchup , 3/4 c .  chili sauce (Heinz) , 3 Tbsp .  prepared mustard . Here's the instruction : Brown ground beef .  Drain .  Add beans and remaining ingredients .  Mix well .  Bake at 370° for about 1 hour or until nice and bubbly , stirring some .

question: I have oregano pepper parmesan cheese jack cheese chicken breasts per garlic powder parsley butter bread crumbs . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Kiev with 1 to 2 chicken breasts per person , 1/2 c .  dry bread crumbs , 1/2 c .  grated Parmesan cheese , 1 1/2 tsp .  oregano , 1/2 tsp .  garlic powder , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 4 tsp .  butter , 1 tsp .  chopped parsley , 4 oz .  Jack cheese , 5 tsp .  melted butter . Here's the instruction : Place breasts between waxed paper; pound until 1/4-inch thick .  In pie pan , combine the next 5 ingredients .  In bowl , mix butter , parsley and 1/2 teaspoon oregano .  Spread mixture onto breasts .  Lay strip of cheese (1 1/2 x 1/2-inch) along width of breast .  Roll and secure with toothpicks .  Dip in melted butter; roll in crumbs .  Place in pan lined with foil , seam side down .  Drizzle with remaining butter .  Bake , uncovered , in a 425° oven for 30 minutes , or until chicken is no longer pink inside .

question: I have oleo black pepper cayenne pepper paprika shrimp garlic worcestershire sauce salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Barbecue Shrimp with 5 lb .  raw shrimp , 5 sticks oleo or butter , 5 gloves garlic , minced , 1 Tbsp .  paprika , salt to taste , 3 Tbsp .  black pepper , 1 tsp .  cayenne pepper , 1 Tbsp .  Worcestershire sauce . Here's the instruction : Combine all ingredients .  Put in pan under broiler .  Turn frequently (every 3 or 4 minutes) .  Cook 30 to 40 minutes .  Serves 5 to 6 .

question: I have baking powder lard flour milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Indian Tacos with 6 c .  unsifted flour , 1 Tbsp .  baking powder , 1 Tbsp .  salt , 1/2 c .  dry milk , 6 Tbsp .  lard or shortening . Here's the instruction : Mix together dry ingredients , add lard or shortening and mix until crumbly .  Begin adding water until a nice soft dough .  Roll on floured board to desired size .  Poke hole in the middle .  Either fry in frying pan with 1 inch of oil or electric fryer .  Brown to desired color , turn over and fry on the other side and drain .

question: I have sugar low-fat milk pepper green onions mayonnaise fresh vegetables lemon peel chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Garden Chicken Salad with 3/4 c .  Hellmann's light or reduced-fat mayonnaise dressing , 3 Tbsp .  low-fat milk , 2 Tbsp .  chopped green onions , 1 tsp .  grated lemon peel (optional) , 1 tsp .  sugar , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 6 c .  cut up fresh vegetables , lettuce leaves (to line platter) , 1 lb .  boneless , skinless chicken breast , grilled and sliced . Here's the instruction : To make dressing , in a small bowl , combine first 6 ingredients .  In a large bowl , toss vegetables with half of dressing .  Arrange on lettuce-lined platter .  Top with chicken .  Serve with remaining dressing .  Makes 4 servings .

question: I have baking powder sugar vanilla eggs flour milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Crepes(French)   with 1 1/2 c .  all-purpose flour , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 Tbsp .  sugar , 2 c .  milk , 2 eggs , 1/2 tsp .  vanilla , 2 Tbsp .  butter . Here's the instruction : Mix flour , sugar , baking powder and salt together in a bowl .  Stir in remaining ingredients .  Beat mixture until smooth .

question: I have onion celery cream of celery soup margarine parsley milk herb stuffing chicken salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Casserole with 3 to 4 c .  cooked , cut up chicken , 1 c .  chopped celery , 2 Tbsp .  onion , finely chopped , 2 Tbsp .  parsley , chopped , 2 (10 oz . ) cans cream of celery soup , 1 soup can milk , 1 c .  margarine , melted , 1 (8 oz . ) bag Pepperidge Farm herb stuffing , salt and pepper to taste . Here's the instruction : Saute celery and onion in small skillet with small amount of margarine .  Mix soup and milk together in small bowl .  Combine all ingredients (except 1/2 cup stuffing) in a large bowl .  Place in a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish .  Top with reserved stuffing .  Bake at 400° for 20 to 30 minutes .

question: I have green chilies oil ground cumin cayenne pepper ground oregano chicken breast fresh garlic onions seasoning salt onion salt chicken stock white northern beans . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make White Chili with 2 lb .  white Northern beans , 4 lb .  chicken breast , 1 (27 oz . ) green chilies , 1 1/2 Tbsp .  fresh garlic , 1 1/2 c .  diced onions , 1/4 c .  oil , 1 gal .  chicken stock , 3/4 Tbsp .  ground cumin , 1 Tbsp .  ground oregano , 1 Tbsp .  onion salt , 1/2 Tbsp .  cayenne pepper , 1/2 Tbsp .  seasoning salt . Here's the instruction : Cook beans .  Cook chicken and cut up into small pieces .  Save broth .  Combine beans , chicken , chilies , garlic , onions , oil , chicken stock , cumin , oregano , salt , onion salt and pepper .  Simmer until desired thickness .

question: I have rice oleo beef consomme . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Brown Rice with 1 stick oleo , 1 c .  raw rice , 2 cans beef consomme . Here's the instruction : Brown rice in a little butter .  Add rest of butter and beef consomme .  Put in 350° oven for 1 hour or until rice is done .  May add chopped onions and pepper .

question: I have campbell's golden spicy mustard brown sugar celery herb seasoned mix margarine skinless herb seasoned stuffing . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Golden Corn Stuffing Bake with 1 (10 3/4 oz . ) can Campbell's golden corn soup , 1/2 c .  finely chopped celery and onions , 1 1/2 c .  Pepperidge Farm herb seasoned mix , 2 c .  herb seasoned stuffing , 4 skinless , boneless chicken breast halves , 1 tsp .  packed brown sugar , 1 tsp .  margarine , melted , 1 tsp .  spicy mustard . Here's the instruction : Combine soup , celery and onions in a 9-inch greased pie plate .  Spoon stuffing mixture in .  Arrange chicken over stuffing mixture .  Press lightly into stuffing .  Combine sugar , margarine and mustard .  Spread evenly over chicken .  Bake at 400° for 25 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink .  Garnish with fresh sage , if desired .

question: I have egg sugar baking powder marshmallows shortening eggs light brown sugar flour nuts semi-sweet chocolate chips salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mom'S Cake with 1/2 c .  shortening , 1 c .  sugar , 1 egg (whole) , 2 eggs , separated , 1 1/2 c .  plain flour , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1 c .  chopped nuts , 1/2 pkg .  semi-sweet chocolate chips , 1 c .  marshmallows (small) , 1 c .  light brown sugar . Here's the instruction : Cream shortening and sugar .  Beat in whole egg and 2 egg yolks .  Sift flour , baking powder and salt .  Combine 2 mixtures; blend .  Grease and flour 13 x 9-inch pan .  Sprinkle nuts , chocolate pieces and marshmallows over batter .  Beat 2 egg whites very stiff .  Fold in brown sugar .  Spread over cake .  Bake 30 to 40 minutes .

question: I have onion cream cheese nuts mayonnaise parsley ground cooked ham dry mustard hot sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Crunchy Cheese Ball with 1 pkg .  (8 oz . ) cream cheese , softened , 1/4 c .  mayonnaise , 2 c .  ground cooked ham , 2 Tbsp .  chopped parsley , 1 tsp .  minced onion , 1/4 tsp .  dry mustard , 1/4 tsp .  hot sauce , 1/2 c .  chopped nuts . Here's the instruction : Beat cream cheese and mayonnaise until smooth .  Stir in next 5 ingredients .  Cover; chill several hours .  Form into ball; roll in nuts to coat .  Serve with crackers .

question: I have potatoes oil beef chuck black pepper onion water carrots parsley paprika salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hungarian Gulya'S with 1 lb .  beef chuck , 1 Tbsp .  salt , 1 medium onion , 2 Tbsp .  oil , 1 tsp .  paprika , 3 carrots , 2 tsp .  parsley , 1 qt .  water , 4 medium potatoes , 1/4 tsp .  black pepper . Here's the instruction : Cut beef into 1-inch squares .  Add 1 1/2 teaspoons salt .  Chop the onion fine and brown in oil .  Add beef and paprika .  Let beef simmer in its own juice for 1 hour .  Add sliced carrots and chopped parsley .  Simmer for 1/2 hour .  Add water , diced potatoes and remaining 1 1/2 teaspoons salt .  Simmer until potatoes are done; add black pepper .

question: I have vanilla brown sugar sour cream . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Brown Sugar Sauce with 1 c .  packed brown sugar , 1/3 c .  sour cream or heavy sweet cream , 1/2 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Add sugar to cream gradually , stirring constantly .  Add vanilla; beat thoroughly .  Serve over pound cake , ice cream or use as a fresh fruit dip .

question: I have tomatoes tomato paste green peppers allspice cloves bay leaves onions italian cheese garlic olive oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Italian Spaghetti Sauce with 2 cans tomatoes , 4 cans tomato paste or puree , 8 Tbsp .  Italian cheese , grated , 4 oz .  olive oil , 2 small green peppers , chopped , 8 cloves garlic , ground , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 4 medium onions , ground , 1/2 tsp .  cloves , 4 bay leaves , 1/2 tsp .  allspice . Here's the instruction : Combine and cook 2 1/2 to 4 hours .

question: I have semi-sweet chocolate vanilla marshmallows nuts milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Rocky Road Candy with 1 1/2 lb .  marshmallows , 12 oz .  semi-sweet chocolate , 1 can Eagle Brand milk , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 2 c .  chopped nuts . Here's the instruction : Cut the marshmallows in quarters and put into a very large bowl in double boiler .  Melt chocolate .  When melted , add milk and keep mixing until smooth .  Add the vanilla and stir .  Let cool slightly .  Add nuts .  Pour over marshmallows and mix .  Put in shallow loaf pan lined with waxed paper and let cool in refrigerator overnight .

question: I have sugar bananas flour orange jello cherries pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fruit Pie with 1 can cherries , 1 can crushed pineapple , 1/4 c .  flour , 1 c .  sugar , 1 pkg .  orange jello , 5 sliced bananas . Here's the instruction : Bring cherries and pineapple to a boil , then add flour and sugar mixture .  When thickened , add jello (dry) .  When cool , add sliced bananas .  Serve with Cool Whip .  Makes two 8-inch pies .

question: I have buttermilk baking powder sugar baking soda eggs raisins flour butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Gram'S Irish Soda Bread with 1 1/2 c .  raisins , 4 c .  flour , sifted , 1/2 tsp .  baking soda , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1 tsp .  salt , 3 Tbsp .  sugar , 1/2 c .  butter (room temperature) , 1 1/2 c .  buttermilk , 2 eggs , beaten . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 450° .  Mix raisins with sifted flour , baking soda , baking powder , salt and sugar .  Cut in butter with a pastry blender until consistency of corn meal .  Gradually add buttermilk and eggs .  Mix gently until just moistened .  Knead lightly until smooth on a floured board and shape into a round loaf .  Put dough in a greased round baking pan .  With a sharp knife cut a cross in top of dough .  Bake 10 minutes at 450°; reduce heat to 350° and bake 45 minutes .  Cool on wire rack .  Slice and dunk in a cup of hot tea .

question: I have vanilla shortening nutmeg baking soda cinnamon brown sugar eggs oats raisins flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Aunt Sharon'S Chewy Oatmeal Cookies with 1 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  baking soda , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/4 tsp .  nutmeg , 3/4 c .  shortening , softened , 1 1/3 c .  firmly packed brown sugar , 2 eggs , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 2 c .  oats (uncooked) , 1 c .  raisins . Here's the instruction : Sift together all dry ingredients except sugar .  Add shortening , sugar , eggs and vanilla .  Beat until smooth , about 2 minutes .  Stir in oats and raisins .  Drop by teaspoonful onto greased cookie sheet .  Bake in preheated oven at 350° for 12 to 15 minutes .  Makes 3 1/2 dozen .

question: I have bisquick hot sausage extra sharp cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sausage And Cheese Balls with 1 lb .  hot sausage , 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  extra sharp cheese , 3 c .  Bisquick . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients together and form into balls .  Bake .

question: I have oil wax beans sugar lemon juice garbanzo beans water red kidney beans green beans . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Favorite Four Bean Salad with 1 can red kidney beans , 1 can green beans , 1 can wax beans , 1 can garbanzo beans , 1/2 c .  oil , 1 c .  lemon juice , 2/3 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  water . Here's the instruction : Mix kidney beans , green beans , wax beans and garbanzo beans .  Marinate overnight .  Add onion rings just before serving for crispness .

question: I have baking powder powdered sugar flour margarine milk pie filling . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Kart-Wheels with 1 1/2 c .  all-purpose flour , 1/2 c .  margarine or butter , softened , 1/4 c .  powdered sugar , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 2 Tbsp .  milk , 1 c .  pie filling or jam (any flavor) . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 375° .  Mix flour , margarine , powdered sugar , baking powder and just enough milk until dough forms .  If dough seems dry , mix in more milk one teaspoon at a time .  Divide dough into 6 equal parts .  Shape each part into a ball .  Place on an ungreased cookie sheet .  Flatten slightly .  Make an indention 1 3/4 inches in diameter and about 3/4-inch deep in center of each .  Fill each indention with about 2 tablespoons pie filling .

question: I have sugar instant chicken soy sauce green onions lemon juice pepper stalks celery cooking oil mushrooms water cornstarch frozen pea pods rice shrimp lemon peel green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lemon Shrimp Oriental with 1 1/4 lb .  shrimp in shells , 1 c .  water , 2 Tbsp .  cornstarch , 2 Tbsp .  soy sauce , 1 tsp .  sugar , 1 tsp .  instant chicken bouillon granules , 1/4 c .  sliced green onions , 1 (6 oz . ) pkg .  frozen pea pods , thawed , 1/2 tsp .  finely shredded lemon peel , 3 to 4 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1/8 tsp .  pepper , 2 Tbsp .  cooking oil , 2 c .  sliced fresh mushrooms , 3 stalks celery , bias sliced , 1 medium green pepper , cut in strips , hot cooked rice . Here's the instruction : Thaw shrimp , if frozen and drain well .  Peel and devein shrimp .  For sauce , stir together water , cornstarch , soy sauce , sugar , bouillon granules , lemon peel and juice and pepper .  Set aside .  Preheat a wok or large skillet over high heat .  Add 1 tablespoon of the oil .  Add mushrooms , celery and green pepper; stir-fry for 3 minutes .  Add green onion and stir-fry for 1 minute more .  Remove vegetables from wok .  Add remaining oil .  Add half of shrimp to hot wok .  Stir-fry 2 to 3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink .  Remove and stir-fry remaining shrimp .  Return shrimp to wok .  Push from center .  Stir sauce .  Add to center of the wok .  Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly .  Add vegetables and pea pods .  Stir to coat mixture with sauce .  Cook and stir for 1 minute .  Serve over rice .

question: I have oleo egg sugar vanilla flour nuts colored sugar . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Melt Away Bars with 1 c .  soft oleo , 1 c .  sugar , 1 egg , separated , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 2 c .  flour , 1 c .  chopped nuts , colored sugar . Beat egg whites until frothy .  Spread over mix .  Sprinkle with colored sugar and 1/2 cup nuts .  Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes until golden brown .  Cool and cut into squares or bars .

question: I have buttermilk vinegar sugar baking powder vanilla eggs red food coloring soda wesson oil flour cocoa . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Red Velvet Cake with 2 c .  Wesson oil , 2 1/2 c .  plain flour , 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 1 c .  buttermilk , 2 eggs , 2 tsp .  cocoa , 2 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1 tsp .  vinegar , 1 oz .  red food coloring , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Grease and flour pans .  (Makes three (9-inch) layers . ) Mix all ingredients together and bake at 350° for 30 minutes .

question: I have ground pork pepper eggs onion ground chuck clove garlic sweet basil parsley milk dry mustard bread crumbs salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Savory Meat Loaf with 1 lb .  ground chuck , 1 lb .  ground pork , 1 medium onion , diced , 1 clove garlic , crushed , 1 1/4 c .  bread crumbs , 1/3 c .  milk , 1 tsp .  dry mustard , 1 Tbsp .  parsley , 1 tsp .  sweet basil , 2 eggs , 2 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper . Here's the instruction : Soak bread pieces in milk .  Combine all ingredients to mixed meat .  Form into loaf; place in greased loaf pan .  Bake at 350° for 1 3/4 hours .

question: I have white sugar vanilla brown sugar pecan halves white karo syrup milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pecan Pralines I with 1 c .  white sugar , 1 c .  brown sugar (1/2 light and 1/2 dark) , 1 dash salt , 1/2 c .  milk , 2 Tbsp .  white Karo syrup , 2 Tbsp .  butter , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 1/2 c .  pecan halves . question: I have brook pebbles children grassy field . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Recipe For Preserving Children with 1 large grassy field , 2 or 3 dogs , some pebbles , 1/2 doz .  children , 1 pinch brook . Spread over all a deep blue sky and bake in a hot sun .  When brown , remove and set to cool in a bathtub .  Now , go on with your cooking .

question: I have head lettuce vinegar bacon sugar sharp cheese mayonnaise cauliflower . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cauliflower Salad with 1 head lettuce , 1 head cauliflower , broken into pieces , 1 lb .  bacon , fried and crumbled , 2 c .  mayonnaise , 1 tsp .  vinegar , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 lb .  sharp cheese . Let stand in refrigerator 24 hours , then mix and serve .

question: I have cream of chicken soup soft tortillas cream of mushroom soup onion grated cheese chicken garlic butter green pepper ro-tel tomatoes . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make King Ranch with 1/4 c .  diced onion , 1/4 c .  diced green pepper , 1/4 c .  butter , 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 1 lb .  grated cheese , 2 1/2 c .  boiled chicken , 1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes with green chilies , 1/8 tsp .  garlic powder or 1/4 tsp .  garlic clove , diced , 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  soft tortillas . question: I have condensed milk cream of coconut coconut white . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Coconut Cake with white or yellow cake mix , 1 can Eagle Brand sweetened condensed milk , 1 small can cream of coconut , sweetened grated coconut . Let sit until cake is warm .  Pour the cream of coconut over cake .  Sprinkle with coconut .

question: I have cream of chicken soup chicken breasts milk curry powder lemon juice mayonnaise grated cheese buttered bread crumbs frozen broccoli . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Linda'S Broccoli Casserole with 4 whole chicken breasts , 2 pkg .  frozen broccoli , 2 cans cream of chicken soup , 1/2 c .  grated cheese , 2/3 c .  mayonnaise , 1/3 c .  evaporated milk , 1 tsp .  curry powder , 1 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1 c .  buttered bread crumbs . Here's the instruction : Cook chicken and cut up .  Cook broccoli and drain .  Mix all ingredients and pour into greased casserole .  Bake at 350° for 30 to 45 minutes .  Freezes well .

question: I have chocolate cake mix containers kahlua . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Death By Chocolate with 1 chocolate cake mix , 1 c .  Kahlua , 4 pkg .  Jell-O chocolate mousse , 2 large containers Cool Whip , 4 Skor candy bars . Here's the instruction : You may cut this recipe in half , it makes quite a bit .  Also , you can omit the Kahlua!

question: I have oil sugar vanilla nutmeg eggs cinnamon soda ground cloves pecans flour apples salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fresh Apple Cake with 1 c .  oil , 2 c .  sugar , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 tsp .  ground cloves , 3 eggs , 3 c .  plain flour , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  nutmeg , 1 c .  chopped pecans , 3 c .  peeled and diced apples . question: I have baking powder sugar vanilla eggs flour margarine salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pizzelle(Italian Cookies)   with 2 c .  flour , 2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 c .  margarine , pinch of salt , 1/4 c .  sugar , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 3 eggs . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients together .  Drop by teaspoon on waffle pizzelle maker .  Cook about 30 seconds .

question: I have celery soup oysters . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Oyster Stew with 1 can celery soup , 1/2 pt .  small oysters . Here's the instruction : Heat can of soup to boiling point .  Add oysters .  Bring to a boil , taste and serve .

question: I have curry powder lemon juice honey mandarin oranges lamb chops orange juice vegetable oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Glazed Lamb Chops with 4 to 6 lamb chops , 3/4-inch thick , salt and pepper to taste , 2 Tbsp .  vegetable oil , 1/2 tsp .  curry powder , 1/2 c .  orange juice , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 4 Tbsp .  honey , 1 (11 oz . ) can mandarin oranges , drained . question: I have egg onion green pepper catsup milk rice ground beef butter bread crumbs pineapple salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

Turn into a 1 1/2-quart souffle dish .  Bake , uncovered , at 350° until knife inserted just off center comes out clean , 30 to 35 minutes . Here's the instruction : Grate the cheeses together .  Butter baking dish and put open , seedless chiles flat on the bottom of pan .  Then put cheeses over the top , then do another layer of chiles , etc .  Finish with cheese on top .  Mix together in bowl the flour , milk , eggs and salt .  Pour this mixture over chiles and cheese .  Bake 45 minutes at 350° .  This is for a 9 x 13-inch pan .  For a smaller serving , you may cut recipe in half .  You will be surprised how much this dish tastes like the true Mexican Chili Rellenos .

question: I have cream of chicken soup sour cream onion flour margarine herb dressing frozen broccoli salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli Supreme with 10 oz .  chopped frozen broccoli , 1/2 c .  sour cream , 1 Tbsp .  chopped onion , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 1/2 stick margarine , 1 Tbsp .  flour , 3/4 c .  herb dressing , salt and pepper to taste . Here's the instruction : Cook broccoli; drain .  In a bowl , mix soup , sour cream , flour , onion , salt and pepper .  Heat .  Remove from heat .  Add broccoli; stir gently .  In a saucepan , melt margarine and add dressing .  Mix well .  Pour broccoli mixture into a 2-quart casserole dish .  Top with dressing mixture .  Bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes .  Serves 6 .

question: I have black beans brown sugar red fresh ground pepper water sour cream lemon juice green onions ham bone sherry olive oil salt cayenne oregano ground cumin parsley yellow onions garlic bay leaf . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Black Bean Soup with 1/2 c .  olive oil , 4 cloves minced garlic , 1 lb .  black beans , 3 qt .  water , 1 1/2 tsp .  dry oregano , 1 1/2 tsp .  salt , pinch of cayenne , 1/2 medium red or green bell pepper , chopped , 1 1/2 tsp .  brown sugar (or more , if desired) , sour cream , 1 1/2 c .  chopped yellow onions , 1 meaty ham bone , 1 Tbsp .  plus 1/2 tsp .  ground cumin , 1 bay leaf , 1 tsp .  fresh ground pepper , 3 Tbsp .  chopped , fresh parsley , 1/8 c .  dry sherry (or more , if desired) , 1 1/2 to 3 tsp .  lemon juice (add to taste) , green onions , chopped . Here's the instruction : Soak the black beans in water overnight .  Heat oil in a Dutch oven .  Add onions and garlic and cook over low heat until vegetables are tender , about 10 minutes .  Drain the beans .  Add the beans to the Dutch oven .  Add the ham bone and the water .  Stir in 1 tablespoon of cumin , oregano , bay leaf , salt , pepper , cayenne and 1 tablespoon of parsley .  Bring to a boil , reduce heat and cook , uncovered , until beans are very tender and the liquid is reduced by about 3/4 .  This will take 1 1/2 to 2 hours .  If it requires a longer cooking time , the beans were probably old .  Transfer ham bone to plate and cool slightly .  Pull off any remaining meat with your fingers and shred .  Return meat to pot .  Stir in remaining parsley , red pepper , cumin , sherry , brown sugar and lemon juice .  Simmer for another 30 minutes .  Taste .  Correct seasoning and serve very hot .  Garnish with dollop of sour cream and top with a sprinkle of green onions .

question: I have potatoes onion water hamburger salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hamburger Round-Up with 1 lb .  hamburger meat , 4 medium potatoes , seasoning to taste (can use seasoning salt) , 1 small onion , 1/4 c .  water . Here's the instruction : Place meat , seasoning , onion and water in skillet over low fire .  Slice potatoes thin and place on top .  Put lid on skillet and cook until potatoes are done .  Stir into meat and simmer for 5 minutes .

question: I have buttermilk sugar vanilla nutmeg eggs cinnamon soda cloves preserves pecans flour allspice vegetable oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fig Preserve Cake with 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 2 c .  all-purpose flour , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  nutmeg , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 tsp .  allspice , 1/2 tsp .  cloves , 1 c .  vegetable oil , 3 eggs , 1 c .  buttermilk , 1 Tbsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  fig preserves , chopped , 1/2 c .  chopped pecans or walnuts . Pour warm Buttermilk Glaze over warm cake .

question: I have green olives green onions flour tortillas cream cheese celery salad dressing sweet pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Christmas Party Pinwheels with 2 pkg (8 oz .  each) cream cheese , softened , 1 pkg (4 oz . ) ranch salad dressing mix , 1/2 cup minced sweet pepper , 1/2 cup minced celery , 1/4 cup sliced green olives , 1/4 cup sliced green onions , 2 to 4 (10 inch) flour tortillas . question: I have mixed candied fruit sugar eggs cinnamon soda pecans flour dates brandy butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fruitcake Cookies with 1 1/2 c .  flour (unsifted) , 1 tsp .  soda , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 c .  butter or margarine , 3/4 c .  sugar , 2 eggs , 1 c .  mixed candied fruit , 1 c .  chopped dates , 3/4 c .  chopped pecans , 1 tsp .  brandy extract (vanilla may be used) . question: I have sugar flour milk peaches butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Peach Cobbler with 1 stick butter , melted , 2 large cans peaches , 1 c .  sugar , 1 c .  self-rising flour , sifted , 1 c .  whole milk . Here's the instruction : Melt butter in a 13 x 9-inch pan .  Put sliced , drained peaches in butter .  Mix together sugar , flour and milk .  Pour this batter over peaches . question: I have beer all-purpose shrimp vegetable oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Beer Battered Fried Shrimp with 1/2 c .  all-purpose flour , 1/2 c .  beer , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 1/2 lb .  unpeeled , large fresh shrimp , vegetable oil . Here's the instruction : Combine flour , beer and salt in a small bowl .  Peel and devein shrimp .  Rinse under cold running water and pat dry with paper towels .  Pour oil into a saucepan to a depth of 2-inches .  Heat to 375° .  Dip shrimp , 1 at a time , into batter and drop into hot oil .  Fry , turning once , 1 minute or until lightly browned . question: I have oil sugar baking powder vanilla eggs cinnamon soda flour nuts zucchini salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Zucchini Bread with 3 eggs , 2 c .  sugar , 1 c .  oil , 3 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  salt , 2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 c .  nuts , 2 c .  zucchini , 3 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Mix together first 3 ingredients and beat well .  Sift dry ingredients together and add to the first mixture .  Stir in zucchini , nuts and vanilla . question: I have slivered almonds green onions red pepper celery clove garlic chicken broth carrot brown rice salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Brown Rice Pilaf with 2 c .  chicken broth , 1 c .  brown rice (uncooked) , 1/2 c .  grated raw carrot , 1/2 c .  finely chopped celery , 1/4 c .  finely chopped green onions , 1 clove garlic , minced , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  red pepper , 3 Tbsp .  slivered almonds , toasted . Here's the instruction : Bring broth to a boil in a heavy saucepan .  Stir in rice and rest of ingredients , except almonds . question: I have fresh broccoli fresh parsley lemon juice crescent roll swiss cheese onion fully cooked ham mustard . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli Ham Ring with 2 (8 oz .  each) tubes refrigerated crescent roll dough , 1 1/2 c .  (6 oz . ) shredded Swiss cheese , 1/4 lb .  fully cooked ham , diced (about 1/2 c . ) , 2 1/4 c .  chopped fresh broccoli , 1 small onion , chopped , 1/4 c .  minced fresh parsley , 2 Tbsp .  Dijon mustard , 1 tsp .  lemon juice . Here's the instruction : Unroll crescent roll dough and place triangles on a 12-inch pizza pan , forming a ring with pointed ends facing outer edge of pan and wide ends overlapping . question: I have brown sugar egg peanut butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Easy Peanut Butter Cookies with 1 (11 oz . ) box pie crust mix , 1 c .  firmly packed light brown sugar , 1/2 c .  peanut butter , 1 large egg . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 375 degrees .  Combine all ingredients in bowl of food processor , fitted with steel blade .  Process until mixture clings together .  (You can use a mixer , if desired . ) Shape dough into balls about 1 inch in diameter .  Place on an ungreased cookie sheet .  Press with a fork in a criss-cross pattern .  If the fork sticks to the cookie dough , dip it in sugar and then press .  Bake for 8 to 10 minutes .  Remove from pan immediately and cool on a rack .

question: I have buttermilk sugar eggs soda flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Swedish Pancakes with 4 eggs , separated , 2 c .  buttermilk , 1 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  salt , 2 tsp .  sugar , 1/4 tsp .  soda . Here's the instruction : Beat egg whites and fold in last .  Make small pancakes .

question: I have sugar lemon juice cold cola water nuts cherry pie filling pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cherry Cola Salad with 3/4 c .  water , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1 can cherry pie filling , 1 large can crushed pineapple , undrained , 1 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1 c .  cold cola (Pepsi or Coke) soft drink , 1/2 c .  chopped nuts . question: I have cream of mushroom soup onion tortilla chips grated cheese ground beef ro-tel tomatoes . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oregano penne pasta parmesan cheese onion boneless skinless chicken breast black olives nonstick cooking spray garlic fresh basil olive oil . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mediterranean Chicken And Penne with Nonstick cooking spray , 2 tsp .  olive oil , 1/2 onion (peeled and finely diced) , 2 cloves garlic (minced) , 1 lb .  boneless skinless chicken breast , 8 oz .  penne pasta , 8 pitted black olives (sliced) , 1/4 c .  chopped fresh basil , 1 tsp .  oregano , 1/4 c .  grated Parmesan cheese . Here's the instruction : Liberally spray large nonstick skillet with cooking spray .  Add oil and heat over medium heat .  Add garlic and onions .  Heat until soft (approximately 3-4 minutes) .  Fill large saucepan with 2 inches of water .  Place chicken breast in steaming basket or stainless steal saucepan with lid .  Bring water to boil and steam chicken for 7 minutes .  Remove from heat and let set in steam until fully cooked .  Remove chicken from basket and let cool .  When cool , cut into 1 inch chunks .  Meanwhile , cook penne according to packaging .  Drain and keep warm .  Add chicken chunks , olives , basil , and oregano to skillet with onions .  Turn to medium heat for 5 minutes .  In large bowl , toss chicken with hot penne pasta .  Sprinkle top with cheese and serve .

question: I have tomatoes italian seasoning mozzarella cheese crackers onions zucchini salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Italian Zucchini Casserole with 3-4 medium zucchini , cut 1/4 inch thick , 3-4 onions , sliced , 3-4 tomatoes , sliced , 1 lb .  mozzarella cheese , sliced , Italian seasoning , salt and pepper , Ritz crackers . question: I have egg regular mozzarella cheese parmesan cheese cheddar cheese ricotta cheese hamburger . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oleo sugar peanut butter milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Peanut Butter Fudge with 2 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  milk , 1 stick oleo , 2 or 3 Tbsp .  peanut butter . Here's the instruction : Mix sugar , milk and oleo; cook to soft ball stage .  Add peanut butter and beat .  Pour onto greased plate .

question: I have potatoes bacon sugar vinegar pepper onion water celery flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make German Potato Salad with 6 medium sized potatoes , 8 slices bacon (strips) , 3/4 c .  chopped onion , 2 Tbsp .  flour , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 1 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  celery seed , dash of pepper , 3/4 c .  water , 1/3 c .  vinegar (I use white but other may be used) . Here's the instruction : Boil potatoes with the skins on .  Peel and slice thinly .  Fry slowly in large skillet the bacon .  Drain on paper towel .  Saute in the bacon fat until golden the onion . Makes 6 to 8 servings .

question: I have shortening flour pork sausage buttermilk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sausage Pinwheels with 2 1/2 c .  self-rising flour , 1/2 c .  shortening or butter , 1 1/3 c .  buttermilk , 1 lb .  pork sausage . Here's the instruction : Crumble and brown sausage; drain fat .  Cut butter or shortening into flour until coarse crumbs form .  Add buttermilk and stir until dough clings together . Slice into 1-inch slices .  Place cut side down on ungreased baking sheet .  Bake at 350° for 10 to 15 minutes .

question: I have egg black pepper onion light bread tomato ketchup ground beef green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Meat Loaf with 1 lb .  ground beef , 2 slices light bread , crumbled , 1 small onion , 1 small green pepper , 3/4 c .  tomato ketchup , 1 egg , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  black pepper . question: I have potatoes niblets corn ground beef onion soup mix salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Shepherd'S Pie with 2 lb .  ground beef , 1 pkg .  onion soup mix , 2 cans Niblets corn , mashed potatoes (or instant mashed) , salt and pepper . question: I have oil sugar vanilla eggs baking soda pecans water flour dates pumpkin ground cinnamon salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have almond fresh peaches sugar nutmeg cinnamon pastry flour butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Double Crust Peach Cobbler with 8 cups fresh peaches , peeled and sliced , 2 c sugar , 4 Tbsp flour , 1/4 tsp nutmeg , 1/4 tsp cinnamon , 1 tsp almond extract , 1/3 c melted butter , Pastry for double-crust pie , you can use refrigerated ready made crust . question: I have potatoes pepper frozen lima beans onion chicken broth margarine tomato juice whole kernel corn chicken worcestershire sauce salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oleo vanilla brown sugar eggs soda flour nuts white sugar lemon chocolate chips . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have potatoes bacon onion water milk cream-style salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Corn Chowder with 3 slices bacon , chopped , 3 Tbsp .  chopped onion , 1 1/4 c .  cut up potatoes , 1 c .  water , 2 c .  cream-style corn , 3 c .  milk , 1/2 tsp .  salt . question: I have bread pepper eggs onion celery margarine sage chicken broth salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have vinegar sugar pepper onion shell macaroni carrots mayonnaise milk green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have lemon juice brown sugar apples green grapes oranges banana pineapple grand marnier . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Winter Fruit Bowl with 1 (8 oz . ) can pineapple chunks , 1/4 c .  packed brown sugar , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1 tsp .  Grand Marnier flavoring (if desired) , 2 apples , 2 oranges , peeled , 2 c .  seedless green grapes , 1 banana . Here's the instruction : Drain juice from pineapple into 1-cup glass measure . question: I have gelatin bell peppers onion water celery cream cheese nuts mayonnaise olives cream of tomato soup . Give me some cooking ideas .

Knox gelatin , 1/2 c .  cool water , 1 c .  mayonnaise , 1 1/2 c .  chopped celery , 1 Tbsp .  chopped bell peppers , 1 small bottle stuffed olives , 3 (3 oz . ) cream cheese , 1 c .  cream of tomato soup , 1 tsp .  grated onion , 1 c .  chopped nuts . question: I have liquid smoke garlic salt red pepper morton tender quick salt ground beef coarse black pepper regular salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hickory Stick with 5 lb .  ground beef , 5 tsp .  Morton Tender Quick salt , 2 1/2 tsp .  regular salt , 1 tsp .  liquid smoke , 1/2 tsp .  red pepper , 2 1/2 tsp .  garlic salt , 2 tsp .  coarse black pepper , 2 1/2 tsp .  mustard seed . question: I have velveeta cheese tater cream of mushroom soup onion ground beef . Give me some cooking ideas .

Mix 1/2 can soup and 1/2 can water and pour over Tater Tots .  Garnish top with cheese .  Cover with foil and bake at 425° for 45 minutes .

question: I have buttermilk oleo egg sugar vanilla brown sugar baking soda flour nuts . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Toffee Coffee Cake with 1 c .  brown sugar , 1 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  oleo or butter , 2 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 1 c .  buttermilk , 1 egg , 1/2 c .  chopped nuts , 6 small Heath bars .
