question: I have olive chicken breasts black pepper fresh chives chicken broth parsley brandy lemon mustard butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Breasts Diane with 8 small boneless chicken breasts , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  black pepper , 2 Tbsp .  olive or salad oil , 2 Tbsp .  butter or margarine , 3 Tbsp .  chopped fresh chives or green onions , juice or 1/2 lemon or lime , 2 Tbsp .  brandy or cognac (optional) , 3 Tbsp .  chopped parsley , 2 tsp . question: I have buttermilk flour shortening . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Top Of Stove Biscuits with 3 c .  self-rising flour , 1 1/2 c .  buttermilk or milk or water , 1/2 c .  shortening . Here's the instruction : Make hole in center of flour with knuckles .  Put shortening in the mix as in regular biscuits .  Then pinch off enough for size of biscuit .  Roll up in hand .  Place in slightly greased frying pan (on top of stove); continue with rest of dough .  Cook on low heat , covered with lid until lightly brown on bottom , then turn over to other side .  Let top side brown , uncover about 5 minutes before done .  Makes 6 to 8 biscuits .  Cooking time approximately 45 minutes .

question: I have oil sugar eggs baking soda cinnamon pecans apple pie filling flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Apple Nut Ring with 1 1/3 c .  oil , 2 c .  sugar , 2 eggs , 3 c .  flour , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 can apple pie filling , 1 c .  chopped pecans . Here's the instruction : Beat together first three ingredients .  Mix together in separate bowl all dry ingredients .  Add oil mixture to dry mixture .  Puree apple pie filling and add to mixture along with chopped pecans .  Bake at 350° in greased and floured tube pan for 1 hour and 15 minutes .  Freezes well .

question: I have sugar vanilla cherry graham cracker crumbs eggs cream cheese butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cream Cheese Fruit Squares with 1 1/2 c .  sugar , divided in half , 1/3 c .  butter , 1 1/2 c .  graham cracker crumbs , 8 oz .  cream cheese , 4 eggs , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 can fruit topping mix (cherry , blueberry , apple or boysenberry) . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 375° .  Mix 3/4 cup sugar and butter .  Heat .  Add crumbs .  Press into 13 x 9-inch pan and set aside .  Beat cream cheese .  Add eggs , 3/4 cup sugar and vanilla .  Pour fruit mix over crust , then cream cheese mixture .  Bake 45 to 50 minutes .  Chill thoroughly before serving .  May garnish with whipped cream or small amounts of fruit .

question: I have campbell's cream onions milk chicken salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Mushroom Casserole with 6 to 8 pieces chicken or amount needed , 1 can Campbell's cream of mushroom soup , 1 can evaporated milk , salt and pepper to taste , 1 can French fried onions . Here's the instruction : Wash chicken thoroughly .  Dry with paper towel .  Lay chicken pieces in a casserole dish .  Sprinkle with salt and pepper .  Combine half the onions with the soup and milk .  Pour over chicken .  Bake in 350° oven for 45 minutes or until chicken is done .  Sprinkle remaining onions over top and return to oven for 5 minutes .

question: I have sugar baking powder grape juice eggs soda pecans flour candied pineapple red allspice candied cherries butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fruit Rocks with 2 1/2 qt .  pecans , 1 lb .  candied cherries , 1/2 lb .  red and 1/2 green , cut in small pieces , 1 lb .  candied pineapple , cut in small pieces , 2 1/2 sticks butter , 1 1/2 c .  granulated sugar , pinch of soda , 6 eggs , 3 c .  plain flour , 2 oz .  grape juice , 3 tsp .  baking powder , 1 tsp .  allspice . Here's the instruction : Mix nuts , fruit and flour until flour covers nuts and fruit good .  Add other ingredients and let batter stand 30 minutes , then drop from small spoon onto a cookie sheet .  Bake approximately 12 to 15 minutes in 350° oven .

question: I have orange zest ground pepper sweet onion romaine lettuce balsamic vinegar orange juice watercress oranges mustard olive oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Green Salad With Orange Dressing with 1/4 c .  fresh orange juice , 2 Tbsp .  balsamic vinegar , 2 tsp .  grated orange zest , 1 tsp .  Dijon mustard , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  ground pepper , 1 1/2 Tbsp .  olive oil , 2 c .  romaine lettuce , 1/2 bunch watercress , 1/2 small sweet onion , 2 navel oranges . Here's the instruction : Mix orange juice , vinegar , orange zest , mustard , salt , pepper and olive oil .  Shake and refrigerate; if possible make a day or two ahead .  Toss romaine and watercress with dressing .  Arrange small salad plates or use one bowl .  Peel and slice the oranges .  Thinly slice small sweet onion and arrange along with orange slices on top of lettuce .

question: I have sugar baking powder baking soda eggs flour milk overripe bananas butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Banana Bread with 5 overripe bananas , 4 c .  flour (all-purpose) , 4 c .  sugar , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  baking soda , 1/4 tsp .  baking powder , 5 eggs , 1 large Tbsp .  butter or margarine , 1 c .  milk . Here's the instruction : In mixing bowl , put bananas and beat until smooth; add eggs , butter , salt , baking powder , soda , flour , sugar and milk .  Grease three 9-inch aluminum loaf pans .  Heat oven to 350°; cook about 45 minutes or until top of bread is brown .

question: I have sausages your favorite your favorite beer . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Drunken Dogs with 1 bottle your favorite barbecue sauce , 1 can your favorite beer , Little Smokies sausages (as many as will swim comfortably in sauce) . Here's the instruction : Put everything in slow cooker .  Set on low heat until evening , stirring several times .

question: I have sugar regular biscuits brown sugar cinnamon butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Monkey Bread with 4 cans regular biscuits , 3/4 c .  brown sugar , 1/4 c .  sugar , 3 Tbsp .  cinnamon , 1 - 2 sticks butter . Here's the instruction : Mix sugars and cinnamon .  Cut each biscuit into quarters and roll each piece in mixture and put in ungreased bundt pan .  Pour remaining mixture over biscuits .  Melt butter and pour over the top .  Bake at 350° for approximately 45 minutes or until it looks done .

question: I have oil baking soda molasses eggs whole wheat flour boiling water honey salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make No Yeast Whole Wheat Bread with 4 c .  whole wheat flour , 1 tsp .  salt , 5/8 tsp .  baking soda , 1/4 c .  oil , 1/4 c .  molasses , 1/4 c .  honey , 2 eggs , 1 c .  boiling water , minus 2 tsp .  . Here's the instruction : Mix first three ingredients .  Add oil , molasses and honey .  Mix well .  Add 2 eggs and boiling water .  May be hot!

question: I have orange sherbet orange ginger ale . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Orange Punch with 2 pkg .  orange Kool-Aid , 1 large bottle ginger ale , chilled , 1 pt .  orange sherbet . Here's the instruction : Prepare Kool-Aid as directed on package .  Mix in ginger ale .  Stir in sherbet just before serving .  Yields 15 servings .

question: I have sour cream onion applesauce worcestershire sauce salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Raw Vegetable Dip with 2 c .  applesauce , 1/2 pt .  sour cream , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 2 Tbsp .  minced onion , 1 tsp .  Worcestershire sauce . Here's the instruction : Slowly cook applesauce about 5 minutes to evaporate some of the liquid; chill .  Combine all ingredients; mix well .  Use for any fresh vegetable of your choice .

question: I have lean stew meat cream of mushroom soup onion soup . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Crock-Pot Beef Tips And Gravy with 1 1/2 lb .  lean stew meat , 1 can onion soup , 1 can cream of mushroom soup . Here's the instruction : Lightly brown meat .  Put in crock-pot with soups .  Cook on low heat about 8 hours .  Serve over noodles or rice .

question: I have sugar vanilla brown sugar eggs baking soda applesauce raisins nuts flour almond extract butter oatmeal . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Applesauce Cookies with 1/2 c .  butter , 3/4 c .  sugar , 3/4 c .  brown sugar , 1 tsp .  almond extract , 2 eggs , 1 c .  chopped nuts and/or 1 c .  raisins , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  applesauce , 2 c .  flour , 1 1/2 c .  oatmeal , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 1 c .  raisins . Here's the instruction : Cream butter and sugars .  Add almond extract , eggs , vanilla and applesauce .  Mix well .  Blend in flour , oatmeal and baking soda .  If desired , add nuts and/or raisins .  Drop by teaspoonfuls onto nonstick cookie sheets .  Bake at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes .  Yield: 3 dozen cookies .

question: I have baking powder shortening brown sugar raisins flour nuts milk rolled oats salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Oatmeal Bars with 1/2 c .  shortening , 3/4 c .  firmly packed brown sugar , 1 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/8 tsp .  salt , 3/4 c .  milk , 1 c .  rolled oats , 3/4 c .  seedless raisins , 1/2 c .  nuts . Here's the instruction : Cream sugar and shortening .  Sift flour , baking powder and salt .  Add alternately with milk to creamed mixture .  Add oats , raisins and nuts .  Mix well .  Spread in greased 8 x 8 x 2-inch pan .  Bake at 350° for 45 minutes .  Cool; cut into bars .

question: I have vinegar pepper soy sauce catsup clove garlic pork tenderloin . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chinese Pork Slices with 1 lb .  pork tenderloin , 1/4 c .  soy sauce , 1 Tbsp .  catsup , 1 1/2 tsp .  vinegar , 1/8 tsp .  pepper , 1 clove garlic , crushed . Here's the instruction : Cut meat lengthwise in half .  Mix remaining ingredients in medium bowl .  Add meat and turn to coat on all sides .  Cover and refrigerate , turning meat occasionally , at least 8 hours .

question: I have corn sugar eggs flour milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Corn Pudding with 3 eggs , 2/3 c .  sugar , 2 Tbsp .  flour , 1 (16 oz . ) can creamed corn , 4 Tbsp .  butter , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 c .  evaporated milk . Here's the instruction : Beat together eggs , sugar and flour .  Combine with corn , butter , salt and milk .  Pour into a greased 1-quart casserole .  Bake at 300° for 50 minutes .  Yields 4 servings .

question: I have sugar eggs mayonnaise cider vinegar mustard salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Potato Salad Dressing with 2 eggs , beaten , 1 Tbsp .  prepared mustard , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/3 c .  cider vinegar , 1 tsp .  salt , 3 Tbsp .  Kraft mayonnaise or Miracle Whip salad dressing . Here's the instruction : Cook eggs , sugar , vinegar and salt over double boiler , stirring often , until it thickens .  Remove from heat .  Add mustard and mayonnaise .  Pour over salad .

question: I have oleo brown sugar soda white karo popcorn cream of tartar . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Popcorn Crunch with 6 qt .  popcorn , 2 sticks oleo , 2 c .  brown sugar , 1/2 c .  white Karo , 1/2 tsp .  cream of tartar , 1/2 tsp .  soda . Here's the instruction : Boil oleo , brown sugar , white Karo and cream of tartar for 5 minutes; take off heat and stir in soda and popcorn .  Pour into loaf pan and bake at 250° for 1 hour .  Stir every 15 minutes .

question: I have mushrooms cream of mushroom soup undiluted wild rice pork sausage turkey butter bread crumbs worcestershire sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Company Casserole with 1 1/2 cups wild rice , 1 - 4 oz .  can cut mushrooms , undrained , 2 cans cream of mushroom soup undiluted , 1 teaspoon worcestershire sauce , 1 pound bulk pork sausage , 12 large slices Turkey or Chicken in bite size pieces , 1 1/2 cups day-old bread crumbs , 1/4 cup butter . Here's the instruction : Cook rice according to package directions .  Meanwhile , in skillet cook sausage until brown , break in bits and pour off fat .  Stir in mushroom soups , mushrooms , worcestershire sauce and meat .  Put all together in greased baking dish .  Cover with buttered crumbs .  Bake for 30 minutes at 375 degrees .

question: I have bread egg sugar vanilla nutmeg brown sugar cinnamon egg whites milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Old Fashioned Bread Pudding with 1/4 c .  sugar , 1 egg , 1/4 c .  brown sugar , 10 slices bread , 3 egg whites , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1/4 tsp .  nutmeg (optional) , 2 tsp .  sugar , 1 1/2 c .  milk , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/4 tsp .  cloves (optional) . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Spray baking dish with nonstick cooking spray .  Lay the slices of bread in baking dish in two rows , overlapping them like shingles .  In a mixing bowl , beat together the egg , egg whites , milk , sugar , brown sugar and vanilla .  Pour the egg mixture over the bread .  In a small bowl , stir together the remaining ingredients .  Sprinkle mixture over the bread .  Bake 30 to 35 minutes until it has browned on top and is firm to touch .  Makes 9 servings .

question: I have egg baking powder sugar vanilla shortening flour milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Busy Day Cake with 1 2/3 c .  flour , 1 c .  sugar , 2 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1/2 c .  shortening , 2/3 c .  milk , 1 egg , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Sift dry ingredients together .  Add milk , egg , vanilla and shortening .  Mix well .  Bake at 375° for 30 minutes .

question: I have baking powder crisco milk vanilla eggs light brown sugar flour white sugar black walnuts butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Walnut Cake with 1 c .  butter (2 sticks) , 1/2 c .  Crisco , 1 lb .  light brown sugar , 1 c .  white sugar , 5 eggs , 1 c .  milk , 1 Tbsp .  vanilla , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1 c .  black walnuts chopped (1/4 lb . ) , 3 c .  flour (plain) . Here's the instruction : Cream together butter , Crisco , brown and white sugar .  Add flavoring .  Add eggs , one at a time , mix well after each .  Mix flour , baking powder and salt .  Add dry mix and milk to egg mix , start with dry mix and add milk , end with dry .  Stir in walnuts .  Pour into 10-inch well-greased and floured pan .  Bake at 325° for 90 minutes , start in cold oven .

question: I have bouillon potatoes beer flour/water water rosemary onions pork shoulder carrots . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Beer Stew(Pork)   with 2 lb .  pork shoulder , diced (fat to brown it) , 1 can beer , 1/2 c .  water , 1 tsp .  rosemary , 4 onions , quartered , 2 c .  bouillon , 2 c .  cooked potatoes (big chunks) , 1 3/4 c .  cooked carrots , 1/4 c .  flour/water to make paste . Here's the instruction : Brown pork .  Add beer , water and rosemary .  Simmer , covered , 30 minutes .  Add onions and cook 30 minutes more .  Meanwhile , cook potatoes and carrots (salted) together until done .  Add these and bouillon to stew pot .  Blend flour and water to make a paste and add to stew .

question: I have butterscotch ice cream topping instant chocolate pudding crust pecan halves cold milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chocolate Turtle Pie with 1 prepared Oreo cookie pie crust .  (deep dish , if available) , 1 small pkg .  instant chocolate pudding , 1 container Cool Whip , 3/4 cup pecan halves , 1 1/2 cups cold milk , 3/4 cup butterscotch ice cream topping . Here's the instruction : Bring butterscotch to a boil in saucepan , stirring constantly .  Pour 3/4 cup butterscotch into crust .  Then place a layer of pecans in the bottom .  Chill for about 5 minutes so sauce can harden .  Meanwhile , mix pudding with milk .  Pour into crust on top of pecans .  Chill .  Right before serving , drizzle a little butterscotch on top of pudding and top with Cool Whip and sprinkle chopped pecans on top .

question: I have sugar cornmeal eggs flour margarine yeast milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Grandma Steve'S Cornmeal Dinner Rolls with 1/3 c .  cornmeal (uncooked) , 1/2 c .  margarine , 1/2 c .  sugar , 2 c .  milk , 1 tsp .  salt , 2 eggs , beaten , 2 tsp .  sugar , 2 pkg .  yeast , softened in 1/4 c .  lukewarm water , 4 to 5 1/2 c .  flour . Here's the instruction : Cook the first 5 ingredients until thick; cool until lukewarm .  Add the eggs , 2 teaspoons sugar and the softened yeast .  Mix well , then add the flour .  Knead well; place in greased bowl .  Let rise for 1 hour or more .  Punch down; roll out .  Cut with biscuit cutter .  Let rise until doubled in a greased pan .  Bake at 365° for 15 minutes .

question: I have pepper onion ground chuck milk your favorite barbecue sauce bread crumbs salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hurry-Up Meat Loaves with 1 1/2 lb .  ground chuck , 1 c .  fine dry bread crumbs , 3 Tbsp .  finely chopped onion , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 1 (5 oz . ) can evaporated milk , 3/4 c .  your favorite barbecue sauce . Here's the instruction : Combine first 6 ingredients , stirring until mixture is thoroughly blended .  Shape mixture into 6 loaves .  Place loaves on rack of a greased broiler pan .  Spoon barbecue sauce over loaves .  Makes 6 loaves .

question: I have pepper soy sauce liquid smoke worcestershire deer meat garlic salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Deer Jerky with deer meat (1/8-inch slices) , salt , pepper , garlic powder , soy sauce , Worcestershire , liquid smoke . Here's the instruction : Cover bottom of pan with meat strips .  Liberally salt , pepper and garlic .  Sprinkle with soy sauce .  Cover with Worcestershire sauce .  Repeat layers if necessary .  Make sure meat is submerged .  Cover and refrigerate 24 to 48 hours .  Place foil on oven racks; shape an edge .  Lay meat in single layer , edge to edge .  Brush with liquid smoke .  Dry in 150° to 175° oven until bends , but does not break , about 5 hours .

question: I have pimiento condensed cream mayonnaise parsley milk whole kernel corn . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Creamy Corn Soup with 1 (10 1/2 oz . ) can condensed cream of chicken soup , 1 1/2 c .  milk , 1/2 c .  mayonnaise , 1 (16 oz . ) can whole kernel corn , chopped pimiento , snipped parsley . Here's the instruction : In a sauce pan , heat soup , milk , mayonnaise and corn (with liquid) , stirring occasionally .  Garnish with pimiento and parsley .  Makes 5 servings (1 cup each) .

question: I have condensed milk graham cracker crumbs peanut butter margarine semi-sweet chocolate chips . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Double Delicious Cookie Bars with 1/2 c .  margarine , 1 1/2 c .  graham cracker crumbs , 1 (14 oz . ) can condensed milk , 1 (12 oz . ) pkg .  semi-sweet chocolate chips , 1 c .  peanut butter chips . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Melt margarine in a 9 x 13-inch pan in oven .  Sprinkle crumbs over margarine .  Pour condensed milk evenly over crumbs .  Top with chips; press down firmly .  Bake 25 minutes or until lightly brown .  Cool .  Cut into bars .  Makes 24 to 36 .

question: I have buttermilk brown sugar cinnamon butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Monkey Bread with 4 cans (10 biscuits in each) buttermilk biscuits , 1 1/2 sticks butter or margarine , 3 c .  brown sugar , 4 Tbsp .  cinnamon . Here's the instruction : Combine the brown sugar and the cinnamon .  Divide the mixture in half and put into two separate bowls .  Melt one stick of butter or margarine in small pan over low heat .  Tear each biscuit into three pieces and roll into balls .  Dip the balls in the melted butter and then into one bowl of the brown sugar and cinnamon mixture .  Roll around to coat evenly .  Put into an ungreased Bundt pan .

question: I have white sugar cooking oats vanilla extract peanut butter cocoa walnuts milk butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make No-Bake Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies with 2 c .  white sugar , 1/2 c .  milk , 1/4 c .  butter , 2 Tbsp .  unsweetened cocoa powder , 3 c .  quick cooking oats , 1/2 c .  peanut butter , 1 tsp .  vanilla extract , 1 c .  walnuts , chopped (optional) . Here's the instruction : Combine the sugar , milk , butter and cocoa in a saucepan and bring to a boil , cooking 1 minute .  Remove from heat and add the remaining ingredients .  Stir and mix well .  Drop by teaspoons onto wax paper , letting them stand for 30 minutes before serving .

question: I have tomatoes soy sauce celery chicken cider vinegar butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Baked Chicken Wings with 16 chicken wings , 1 Tbsp .  butter or oleo , 1/2 c .  canned chopped tomatoes with liquid , 1/2 c .  finely chopped celery , 1/2 Tbsp .  soy sauce , 1/2 Tbsp .  cider vinegar , 1/2 tsp .  salt . Here's the instruction : Wash the chicken wings and pat dry .  In skillet , saute chicken wings in melted butter until lightly browned .  Arrange in oiled baking dish .  Add tomatoes with liquid and celery .  In separate bowl , mix together soy sauce , vinegar and salt .  Pour over chicken .  Bake at 375° for about 30 minutes or until tender .  Serves 4 .  May be doubled to serve 8 .

question: I have cream sherry scallops mushrooms freshly ground pepper onions parsley milk mustard butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Scallop Stew with 1 stick butter , 1 lb .  onions , thinly sliced , 1/2 lb .  mushrooms , thinly sliced , 2 lb .  scallops , 4 c .  milk , 1/2 tsp .  Dijon mustard , 1/4 c .  cream sherry , 1 Tbsp .  chopped parsley , freshly ground pepper . Here's the instruction : Heat the butter in a heavy pot and stir in the onions and mushrooms .  Cook them slowly , stirring occasionally for 20 to 25 minutes or until soft .  Add the scallops and cook for 3 minutes , stirring constantly .  Add milk and meat slowly without boiling .  Stir in the mustard , sherry and parsley .  Sprinkle with freshly ground pepper just before serving .  Serve with crusty French bread and chilled frascati wine .

question: I have oil pepper pork cornstarch garlic salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Scrumptious Pork Steak(Toms Favorite)   with 3 Tbsp .  veg .  oil , 4 pork steaks , salt , pepper , garlic powder , 4 Tbsp .  cornstarch . Here's the instruction : Put vegetable oil in frying pan (black iron skillet is best) .  Add pork steaks , sprinkle generously with salt , pepper , garlic powder and brown on both sides .  When browned remove from pan and set aside .  Add 2-3 cups of water to drippings in pan , add salt to taste .  Bring to a slow boil and add cornstarch which has been diluted with water .  Stir until thickened , put pork steaks back in pan with gravy and cover .  Simmer about 1 1/2 -2 hours or until real tender .  Serve with mashed potatoes .

question: I have sugar red food coloring cinnamon cold water flour cut rhubarb . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Rhubarb Crisp with 4 c .  cut rhubarb , unpeeled (1/2 inch) , 1 c .  sugar , 1/4 c .  unsifted flour , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon or more to taste , 1/2 c .  cold water , red food coloring . Here's the instruction : Pour mixed dry ingredients over rhubarb pieces in a bowl .  Add cold water and mix together .  Add food coloring .  Pour into a greased pan .  Cover with topping .

question: I have egg sugar nutmeg baking soda cinnamon raisins water flour vegetable shortening walnuts salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Raisin Spice Squares with 2 c .  sifted all-purpose flour , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 tsp .  nutmeg , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 c .  raisins , 2 c .  water , 1 egg , 1/2 c .  vegetable shortening , 1 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  chopped walnuts . Here's the instruction : Grease a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan .  Heat oven to 350° .  Boil raisins rapidly in 2 cups water in uncovered medium sized saucepan for 10 minutes .  Transfer to large bowl .  Cool to lukewarm .  Stir in egg , then shortening and sugar .  Sift flour and dry ingredients together and add .  Add raisin mixture and nuts .  Bake for 25 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean .  Cool completely .  Frost with orange icing .

question: I have vanilla powdered sugar pecan chips flour chocolate chips butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chocolate Pecan Puffs with 2 1/4 c .  flour , 1/2 lb .  butter , 1/2 c .  powdered sugar , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 3/4 c .  pecan chips , 1/4 c .  chocolate chips . Here's the instruction : Melt butter; add to flour .  Mix well .  Add powdered sugar , vanilla , pecan chips and chocolate chips; mix well .  Chill for 30 minutes .  Roll mixture into small balls .  Bake at 400° for 10 minutes .  Roll in powdered sugar .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs pet milk pecans flour cocoa butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chocolate Pecan Pie with 3 c .  sugar , 2 Tbsp .  flour , 2 Tbsp .  cocoa , 4 eggs , 1 stick butter , 1 c .  Pet milk , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  pecans , 1 c .  oatmeal (instant or quick cooking) . Here's the instruction : Stir or whisk liquids; add dry ingredients .  Pour into 2 unbaked pie shells .  Bake at 350° for 45 minutes .  (Middle of pie should shake and not be too firm) .  Do not overbake!

question: I have green chilies sour cream tomatoes green onions lean ground beef taco seasoning mix cheese beans olives avocado . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Layered Taco Dip with 1 lb .  lean ground beef , 1 (4 oz . ) can chopped green chilies , 1 (16 oz . ) Borden sour cream , 1 pkg .  taco seasoning mix , 1 (16 oz . ) can refried beans , 1 (6 oz . ) frozen avocado dip , thawed , shredded cheese , chopped tomatoes , sliced green onions , ripe olives . Here's the instruction : In skillet , brown meat; pour off fat .  Add chilies .  In small bowl , combine sour cream and taco seasoning .  In 8-inch spring-form pan or on large plate , spread beans .  Top with meat mixture , sour cream mixture and avocado dip .  Cover; chill .  Garnish and serve with tortilla chips .  Refrigerate leftovers .

question: I have egg sugar vanilla baking powder xxxx sugar flour dates nuts milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Date Bars with 1 egg , 1 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  milk , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  flour , 2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 3/4 c .  cut-up dates , 1 c .  nuts , xxxx sugar . Here's the instruction : Mix together egg , sugar and milk .  Add remaining ingredients (except xxxx sugar) .  Bake in a well-greased pan , 7 x 11-inch , at 350° for 30 minutes .  Dust top with xxxx sugar and cut in squares .

question: I have sugar fresh red chili cucumbers cilantro onion white vinegar . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Thai Cucumber Salad with 2 firm cucumbers , 1 Tbsp .  shredded fresh red chili , 1/4 c .  sugar , 5 Tbsp .  white vinegar , chopped onion to taste , cilantro leaves to taste . Here's the instruction : Trim ends of cucumbers and scrape with fork to make a decorative pattern .  Quarter the cucumbers lengthwise and remove seeds .  Cut them crosswise into thin slices .  Put in bowl and add chili .  In small saucepan , combine sugar and vinegar; bring to boil .  Cook , stirring , until the sugar has dissolved .  Cool to room temperature and pour sauce over the cucumber mixture .  Chill and sprinkle with cilantro .  Serves 4 .

question: I have velveeta cheese cream of chicken soup onion chicken broth ro-tel doritos chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mexican Chicken with 1 chicken or 1 pkg .  chicken breasts , onion , 1/2 lb .  Velveeta cheese , 2 cans cream of chicken soup , 1 can Ro-Tel or salsa , 1 c .  chicken broth , 10 oz .  pkg .  Doritos . Here's the instruction : Cook and bone chicken .  Place in casserole dish .  Then slice onion on chicken .  Slice Velveeta on chicken and onion .  In a bowl , mix soup and Ro-Tel , 1 cup chicken broth and 1/2 of 10 ounce package Doritos (whole) .  Pour mixture over chicken , onion and cheese .  On top , put rest of Doritos .  Bake 30 minutes at 350° .

question: I have cake flour oil sugar baking powder vanilla extract eggs milk butter peanuts salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Granny'S Fruit Cake with 2 2/3 c .  cake flour , 2 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 3/4 c .  butter or margarine , 1 3/4 c .  sugar , 4 eggs or equivalent egg substitute , 1 c .  milk or skim milk , 2 tsp .  vanilla extract , 1/3 c .  oil , 1/2 c .  each: peanuts or mixed nuts , walnuts , pecans , almonds , raisins , mixed dried fruit or anything else you like . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Sift together flour , baking powder and salt .  Set aside .  Cream butter and sugar .  Add eggs to creamed mixture .  Combine milk , vanilla and oil in a measuring cup .  Alternate flour mixture and milk mixture until batter is blended .  Process the fruit/nut mixture until small pieces .  Fold into batter .  Bake in two 9-inch cake pans 35 to 40 minutes or Bundt pan 50 minutes .

question: I have sugar baking powder eggs blueberries flour margarine milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Wild Blueberry Bread with 2 eggs , 1 c .  sugar , 1 c .  milk , 4 Tbsp .  margarine , 3 c .  flour , 4 tsp .  baking powder , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 1/2 c .  blueberries . Here's the instruction : Melt the margarine .  Set aside .  Beat the eggs .  Gradually add sugar to eggs .  Add the melted margarine .  Add the cup of milk .  Combine dry ingredients and add them .  Mix dough until flour is just blended .  Fold berries into dough .  Pour into well-greased loaf pan .  Sprinkle top with sugar to give a sparkle .  Bake for one hour in a 350° oven .

question: I have pineapple cake mix instant vanilla pudding cream cheese cold milk pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .

Cool Whip . Here's the instruction : Bake cake mix as directed in 3 pans .  Combine pudding mix , milk and cream cheese . question: I have cherries pecans pineapple yellow cake . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have bell pepper macaroni salt pepper onion water ground beef worcestershire sauce tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have golden raisins golden delicious apples brown sugar ginger ale . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Ginger Ale Baked Apples(Heart Healthy)   with 4 Golden Delicious apples , 4 Tbsp .  golden raisins , 4 tsp .  brown sugar , 1/2 c .  ginger ale . Here's the instruction : Using a melon baller , core apples without cutting through the bottom .  Stand apples in a baking dish just large enough to hold them . Serve warm or chilled , accompanied by ice cream or topped with whipped cream .

question: I have chilli powder cream cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have buttermilk egg sugar ginger baking soda molasses cinnamon pecans ground cloves flour pumpkin margarine salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

Here's the instruction : Combine flour and sugar; cut in margarine with pastry blender until mixture is crumbly .  Stir in pecans .  Press 1 1/4 cups mixture into bottom of ungreased 9-inch square pan; set aside .  Combine remaining crumb mixture , buttermilk and next 8 ingredients; beat at low speed with electric mixer until blended .  Pour over crumb mixture and bake at 350° for 40 minutes or until a wooden toothpick inserted in center comes out clean .

question: I have vinegar tomatoes red pepper white pepper onion celery chitterlings salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have pepper parmesan cheese basil margarine parsley bread crumbs paprika lean fish . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Parmesan Perch with 1 lb .  ocean perch or lean fish fillets , 2 Tbsp .  dried bread crumbs , 1 Tbsp .  grated Parmesan cheese , 1 tsp .  dried basil leaves , 1/2 tsp .  paprika , dash of pepper , 1 Tbsp .  margarine , melted , 2 Tbsp .  snipped parsley . Here's the instruction : Move oven rack to position slightly above middle of oven .  Heat oven to 500° .  Mix ingredients except margarine and parsley .  Brush one side of fish with margarine . Bake uncovered until fish flakes easily with fork , about 10 minutes .  Sprinkle with parsley .  Serve .

question: I have biscuit mix sausage . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sausage Rolls with 2 c .  biscuit mix , 1 lb .  sausage , uncooked . Here's the instruction : Prepare biscuit mix as directed on package for biscuits . question: I have pepper shredded cheese flour white wine milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Quick Cheese Sauce In The Microwave with 1 Tbsp .  butter , 1 Tbsp .  flour , salt , pepper , 1 Tbsp .  white wine , 1 c .  milk , 1/4 c .  shredded cheese . question: I have pie shells pink lemonade cream cheese frozen strawberries . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have tomatoes potato pepper onion mushrooms worcestershire sauce paprika rice butter chicken green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have egg sugar vanilla shortening cinnamon flour cornflakes apples milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have eggs sugar vanilla milk . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have potatoes string beans tomato soup onions hamburger salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hungry Man'S Casserole with 1 lb .  hamburger , 1 can tomato soup , 1 small jar pickled onions , 1 (16 oz . ) can string beans , 6 medium potatoes , salt and pepper to taste . question: I have egg sugar water flour yeast butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Yeast Rolls with 1/4 c .  water (hot tap water) , yeast , 1/4 c .  butter or margarine , 1 1/4 tsp .  salt , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 1 c .  hot water , 1 egg , 2 3/4 c .  sifted flour . question: I have potatoes onion celery beef shoulder roast carrots . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have egg vanilla brown sugar baking soda pecans flour milk semi-sweet chocolate chips butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oleo sugar oats eggs brown sugar cinnamon soda water flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have potatoes clam liquor clams pepper onion salt pork parsley milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar cream of tartar water . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fondant with 2 c .  sugar , 1/8 tsp .  cream of tartar , 1/2 c .  water . Here's the instruction : Combine sugar and cream of tartar .  Stir until sugar is dissolved .  Cover pan and boil 5 minutes , allowing steam to dissolve any grains of sugar on sides of pan .  Uncover and boil without stirring to soft ball stage .  Wipe all crystals from the sides of the pan with a damp cloth .  Pour into shallow pan , plate or onto a marble slab which has been rinsed with cold water .  Cool to room temperature .  Beat only until stiff enough to knead .  Knead until smooth .  Place in bowl , covered with a damp cloth or with waxed paper and allow to stand for 24 hours before using .

question: I have cabbage vinegar sugar celery mayonnaise carrot salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar shell lemon juice meringue lemon rind cornstarch butter boiling water egg yolks salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lemon Meringue Pie(I Make This Often, It'S Good!)   with 1 c .  sugar , 1/4 c .  cornstarch , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1 1/2 c .  boiling water , 2 egg yolks , 1/3 c .  lemon juice , 1 tsp .  lemon rind , 1 Tbsp .  butter , 1 baked pie shell , meringue . Here's the instruction : Combine sugar , cornstarch and salt .  Add water very gradually and cook in double boiler in boiling water until it cooks and thickens , stirring constantly .  Beat egg yolks and pour hot mixture over them gradually , stirring constantly .  Just before removing from heat , add lemon juice , rind and butter .  Mix well and pour into crust . question: I have egg sugar all-purpose water cold water vegetable shortening yeast cornmeal salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Italian French Bread with 3 tsp .  yeast , 2 c .  warm water , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 3 tsp .  salt , 2 Tbsp .  vegetable shortening , 6 c .  all-purpose flour , 1 egg white , 1 Tbsp .  cold water , cornmeal . Here's the instruction : Stir yeast in warm water until dissolved .  Stir in 3 cups of the flour , sugar , salt and shortening .  Beat until smooth .  Beat in remaining flour (3 cups of flour) to make a stiff dough .  Knead dough for 5 minutes , until smooth and elastic , using flour to keep from sticking .  Place dough in a greased bowl and cover with towel and let rise in a warm place for about 45 minutes .  Punch down dough and let rise another 30 minutes .  Punch dough again .  Knead 1 minute .  Divide into 3 even pieces .  Roll each piece jelly roll fashion and place on large greased cooking sheet 2 inches apart seam side down .  Sprinkle with cornmeal .  Let rise , covered , for 30 minutes .  Make cuts on top of bread .  Beat egg white with cold water .  Brush over each loaf .  Place pan of hot water on bottom shelf in oven .  Place loaves on shelf above .  Bake in hot oven (400°) for 30 minutes or until loaves are golden brown and sound hollow when tapped .  Remove from cookie sheet and cool on wire racks .

question: I have buttermilk sugar eggs soda orange slice candy flour dates walnuts coconut butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Orange Slice Cake with 3 1/2 c .  plain flour , 1/2 tsp .  soda , 1 lb .  orange slice candy , cut up , 1 (8 oz . ) pitted dates , chopped , 2 c .  walnuts or pecans , 1 c .  butter or margarine , 2 c .  sugar , 1 (4 1/4 oz . ) can coconut , 4 eggs , 1 tsp .  soda , 1/2 c .  buttermilk . Pour into a greased and floured tube pan .  Bake at 300° for 1 hour and 45 minutes .

answer: you can make Vegetable Dip with 1/2 c .  sour cream , 1/2 c .  Cheez Whiz , 1/2 c .  mayonnaise , 1 Tbsp .  Worcestershire sauce , 1 Tbsp .  dry instant Lipton onion soup . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients and refrigerate .  Serve with variety of fresh vegetables .

question: I have sugar shortening oats eggs molasses cinnamon soda raisins flour nuts salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Oatmeal Molasses Drop Cookies with 1 1/4 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  melted shortening , 2 eggs , 6 Tbsp .  molasses , 1 3/4 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  or less salt , 2 c .  quick oats , 1/2 c .  chopped nuts , 1 c .  raisins . question: I have sesame seed scallops soy sauce vegetable oil lime juice ground ginger honey . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Honey-Lime Sea Scallops(For The Microwave)   with 1 lb .  scallops , 3 Tbsp .  lime juice , 1 Tbsp .  vegetable oil , 1 Tbsp .  honey , 1 Tbsp .  low-sodium soy sauce , 1/4 tsp .  ground ginger , 2 Tbsp .  sesame seed . Here's the instruction : Combine ingredients .  Add scallops and toss to coat .  Cover and refrigerate 1 hour (stir occasionally) .  Remove scallops from marinade .  Reserve .  Thread scallops on 4 skewers .  Place skewers in shallow microwave dish and cover with plastic wrap .  Vent corner .  Cook 3 to 4 minutes on High (100%) .  Rotate dish 1/4 turn halfway .  Let stand 2 minutes .

question: I have cream of chicken soup pimiento bell pepper onion water rice chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken And Rice Casserole with 1 c .  raw rice , 6 pieces raw chicken , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 1 can water , 1 small onion , chopped , 1 small bell pepper , chopped (optional) , 2 Tbsp .  chopped pimiento (optional) . Here's the instruction : Spread rice in bottom of large casserole .  Put chicken on top of rice .  Mix soup and water and pour over chicken .  Add onions and other ingredients if desired .  Cover .  Bake at 350° about 1 to 1 1/4 hours or until chicken and rice are tender .

question: I have vanilla egg yolk shortening brown sugar flour nuts milk chocolate bar . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Toffee Bars with 1 c .  shortening (may use 1/2 c .  butter) , 1 c .  brown sugar , 1 egg yolk , 1 Tbsp .  vanilla , 2 c .  flour , 1/2 lb .  milk chocolate bar , 1/2 to 3/4 c .  nuts , chopped well . question: I have sugar bananas vanilla pudding coconut pineapple yellow cake . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Best Cake In The World with 1 yellow cake mix , 1 c .  sugar , 1 small instant vanilla pudding , coconut , chopped nuts and chopped maraschino cherries for decoration , 1 (20 oz . ) can undrained crushed pineapple , 4 sliced bananas , 12 oz .  carton Cool Whip . question: I have potatoes eggs ham cheese mayonnaise . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Ham Casserole with 1 1/2 to 2 c .  chopped up ham , 10 medium potatoes , 6 hard-boiled eggs , 1/2 lb .  cheese (your choice; Cheddar or Jack , etc . ) , 2 c .  mayonnaise . question: I have pepper soy sauce tabasco sauce water flour mushroom cheese onions green beans milk accent seasonings butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Green Bean Casserole with 1/2 c .  butter , 1/4 c .  flour , 1 1/2 c .  milk , 1 3 oz .  can mushroom , 3/4 c .  cheese (velveeta) , 1/4 tsp .  tabasco sauce , 2 tsp .  soy sauce , 1/3 c .  onions , 1 tsp .  salt , dash of pepper , 1 tsp .  accent seasonings , 2 cans of green beans , 1 can of water chestnuts . question: I have rinsed lentils tomatoes sugar pepper bay leaf cloves onions sausage vegetable oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have nutmeg brown sugar flour apples butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Apple Pie Candied Crust with 5 to 6 apples , 1 c .  brown sugar , 1 c .  sifted flour , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/8 tsp .  nutmeg , 1/2 c .  butter . Here's the instruction : Slice apples directly into pie plate .  Mix remaining ingredients to a crumbly consistency and spread on top of apples .  Bake for 1 hour at 350° .

question: I have head lettuce bacon dry hidden valley ranch dressing cheese mayonnaise cauliflower frozen peas . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Seven Layer Salad with 1 head lettuce , torn in small pieces , 1 box frozen peas , 1 head cauliflower , torn up , 8 to 10 strips bacon , crisped and broken , 1 pkg .  dry Hidden Valley ranch dressing , 1 pt .  mayonnaise , shredded cheese . Here's the instruction : Layer first six ingredients in large salad bowl .  Cover and refrigerate overnight .  Add cheese and toss before serving .

question: I have tabasco cumin oregano tomatoes salt lean chili ground beef brown sugar chili powder onion garlic tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Microwave Chili with 2 lb .  lean chili ground beef , 1 (16 oz . ) can tomatoes , cut up , 2 Tbsp .  chili powder , 2 tsp .  cumin seed , 1 tsp .  dried oregano , 1 Tbsp .  brown sugar , 1/4 to 1/2 tsp .  Tabasco , 1 onion , chopped , 2 cloves garlic , mashed , 2 (8 oz . ) cans tomato sauce or 1 (8 oz . ) can tomato sauce and 1 c .  beef broth or consomme , salt to taste . Here's the instruction : Combine meat , onion and garlic in a large casserole .  Cover and cook at High setting for 10 minutes or until meat loses its reddish color , stirring once or twice .  Add remaining ingredients , mixing thoroughly .  Cover casserole and heat until mixture comes to a boil .  Reduce microwave temperature to Slow or Defrost and cook for about 1 hour , stirring a few times .  After cooking , allow chili to stand for a few minutes before serving .

question: I have mixed candied fruit sugar baking powder nutmeg eggs cinnamon baking soda pecans light brown sugar flour canned applesauce milk vegetable oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Applesauce Pecan Bread with 2 eggs , 1 cup canned applesauce , 1 cup sugar , 1/3 cup vegetable oil , 3 Tbsp .  milk , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/4 tsp .  nutmeg , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 2 cup flour , 1 cup finely chopped pecans , 1/2 cup mixed candied fruit , if desired , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/4 cup light brown sugar , 1/4 cup chopped pecans . Here's the instruction : Beat eggs until foamy , stir in applesauce , sugar , oil and milk .  Gradually add dry ingredients , stir in nuts and candied fruit .  Spread in greased 9 x 5 x 3 inch pan .  Sprinkle on top cinnamon , brown sugar and chopped pecans , press lightly with hand .  Bake 350° for 1 hour .  Can sprinkle confectionary sugar to cover top last 1/2 hour if too brown .

question: I have unflavored gelatin green onions cream of mushroom soup crab meat cream cheese cold water celery pimentos mayonnaise salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Crab Mold(Dip)   with 1/4 c .  mayonnaise , 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 6 oz .  cream cheese , 1 envelope unflavored gelatin , 3 Tbsp .  cold water , 3 green onions , chopped , 1/4 c .  chopped celery , 1 small jar chipped pimentos , dash of salt and pepper or seasoning of choice (Mrs .  Dash is good) , 1 (7 oz . ) can crab meat . Here's the instruction : Cream mayonnaise and cream cheese together .  Warm soup in small pan .  Dissolve gelatin in water and add to soup .  Add onions , celery , pimentos and seasonings into cream cheese mixture .  Pour soup into cream cheese mixture; stir well .  Add crab; mix well .  Pour into a mold .  Refrigerate 1 hour or more .  Can serve from bowl like a dip or loosen by setting mold in hot water until side of mixture loosens from mold pan , then turn onto dish and serve with crackers or vegetables .

question: I have cloves instant vanilla pudding cinnamon nutmeg . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fruit Dip with 3 oz .  pkg .  instant vanilla pudding , 8 oz .  Cool Whip , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 tsp .  cloves , 1/2 tsp .  nutmeg , 2 to 3 Tbsp .  Amaretto . Here's the instruction : Mix dry pudding mix with Cool Whip and add spices .  Stir in the Amaretto to taste .  Serve with fresh fruit dippers .

question: I have soy sauce lemon juice onion cream cheese nuts tiny shrimp paprika mustard . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Shrimp Cheese Ball with 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , softened , 1/2 tsp .  prepared mustard , 1 tsp .  soy sauce , 1 tsp .  grated onion , 1 tsp .  lemon juice , dash of paprika , 1 (4 1/2 oz . ) can tiny shrimp , drained , chopped nuts . question: I have egg sugar vanilla extract cherry graham cracker crumbs cream cheese margarine . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sour milk oil vanilla brown sugar eggs cinnamon baking soda flour cocoa margarine walnuts white sugar allspice chocolate chips zucchini salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

Here's the instruction : Cream together sugars , eggs , margarine and oil .  Add vanilla and sour milk .  Add dry ingredients and mix well .  Add zucchini and mix . question: I have bananas cold water cake cubes orange juice vanilla pudding strawberries boiling water cold milk strawberry jello . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Gelatin Trifle with 1 small strawberry jello , 3/4 c .  boiling water , 1/2 c .  cold water , ice cubes , 1 c .  sliced strawberries , 1 c .  sliced bananas , 2 c .  1/2-inch pound cake cubes , 1/4 c .  orange juice , 1 1/2 c .  cold milk , 1 small instant vanilla pudding , 1/2 c . question: I have pepper light cream onion mushrooms flour parsley bread crumbs rice butter chicken salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

Here's the instruction : Drain mushrooms; reserve liquid .  Combine liquid and enough hot water to make 1 cup .  Add bouillon cube .  Saute onion and mushrooms in butter in skillet; stir in flour .  Gradually add bouillon and cream .  Cook over medium heat until mixture thickens .  Add rice , chicken , parsley , salt and pepper .

question: I have salt green peppers shortening water onions rice tomato juice ground beef . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Spanish Rice with 1/2 c .  diced onions , 2 Tbsp .  shortening , 1 1/2 to 2 c .  tomato juice , 1/2 c .  water , 2 medium diced green peppers , 1 1/2 lb .  ground beef , 1 c .  cooked rice , salt and pepper to taste . Here's the instruction : Brown onions lightly in shortening .  Add meat .  Break up particles so meat mixture is very fine .  When brown , drain and add peppers , tomato juice and water .  Add rice .  Season to taste , stirring well .  Bring to a boil .  Reduce heat .  Let simmer about 30 minutes or until peppers are tender .

question: I have potatoes oil onion flour beef salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Old Fashioned Pot Roast with 3 to 5 lb .  roast (beef or pork) , salt and pepper , 3 to 4 Tbsp .  flour , 2 Tbsp .  oil , 1 medium onion , sliced or quartered , potatoes and carrots . Here's the instruction : Trim roast; salt and pepper .  Sprinkle with flour and pat all sides of roast to be sure it is well coated with seasonings and flour .  Heat oil in a Dutch oven; brown all sides of the roast , remove and set aside .  If there is not enough oil remaining in the Dutch oven , add a little more and make a roux by browning some of the remaining flour in the oil and then adding water .  Return roast to pan with the onion; cover and bring to a slow boil .  Lower heat and cook slowly for 1 to 2 hours depending on size of the roast .  The last 30 minutes , add potatoes and carrots .  Serve with rice and salad for a full meal .

question: I have green chilies sour cream bacon baking soda yellow cornmeal eggs cheddar cheese cream-style salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mexican Cornbread with 1 c .  yellow cornmeal , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  baking soda , 1/3 c .  melted bacon grease or oil , 1 (8 oz . ) carton sour cream , 1 (15 oz . ) can cream-style corn , 2 eggs , beaten , 1 c .  grated Cheddar cheese , 1 (4 oz . ) can chopped green chilies . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 375° .  Grease an 8 x 11-inch pan .  Combine cornmeal , salt and soda; blend well .  Stir in bacon grease .  Add sour cream , corn and eggs , mixing well .  Spoon half of the batter into prepared pan .  Sprinkle with cheese and chilies .  Cover with remaining cornbread batter .  Bake at 375° for 35 to 40 minutes or until golden brown .

question: I have sugar eggs crackers milk butter cream-style . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar water fresh cranberries nuts apples o pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have peas bacon pepper onion water celery bay leaves carrots . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs nuts flour cocoa margarine . Give me some cooking ideas .

answer: you can make Applesauce Bread with 1 3/4 c .  flour , 2/3 c .  sugar , 2 tsp .  baking powder , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 c .  margarine , chilled , 1 c .  granola cereal , 2 eggs , 1 c .  applesauce , 1/2 c .  raisins . question: I have corn eggs flour cracker crumbs milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs chocolate crust whipped cream butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make French Silk Pie with 3/4 c .  sugar , 1 oz .  chocolate , melted , 2 eggs , 1/2 c .  butter (not margarine) , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 8-inch pie crust , whipped cream . question: I have sugar vanilla oats peanut butter cocoa milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sour cream sugar vanilla salt eggs baking soda lemon extract flour margarine orange extract . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sour Cream Pound Cake with 1 c .  soft margarine , 6 eggs , 1/4 tsp .  baking soda , 1 c .  cultured sour cream , 1/2 tsp .  orange extract , 2 2/3 c .  sugar , 3 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  lemon extract , 1/2 tsp .  vanilla . Add eggs , one at a time , beating for 1 minute after each addition , then 2 minutes more after all eggs have been added .  Sift together flour , baking soda and salt .  Add to sugar mixture alternately with sour cream , beginning and ending with flour .  Add flavorings and beat until well blended .  Pour into 10-inch Bundt pan and bake for 1 1/2 hours at 350° .  Cool on rack for 15 minutes before removing from pan .  Sprinkle with powdered sugar when cool .

question: I have vanilla ice cream coconut cream milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lucy Anne'S Quick Dessert with 1/2 gal .  vanilla ice cream , 2 small pkg .  coconut cream instant pudding , 1/2 to 1 c .  milk . question: I have potatoes flour butter milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lefse(Norwegian)   with 4 medium Russet potatoes , mashed , 1/3 stick butter , 3 Tbsp .  milk , 1 c .  flour . Here's the instruction : Add mashed potatoes , butter and milk .  Let cool .  Once cool , add 1 cup flour .  Knead until smooth .  Heat electric frypan to 400° .  Take a large spoonful and roll it out until it is flat and thin (but thick enough to pick up with a spatula) .  "Fry" dry (no oil in pan); turn and bake other side .  Should have light brown spots , but be soft and flexible .

question: I have oil sugar crisco baking powder vanilla eggs flour cocoa milk crunchy peanut butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Peanut Butter Pound Cake with 1/2 c .  crunchy peanut butter , 1/4 c .  oil , 1 c .  Crisco , 2 1/2 c .  sugar , 5 eggs , 3 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 c .  milk , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 1/2 Tbsp .  cocoa . Here's the instruction : Cream the peanut butter , oil , Crisco and sugar .  Add eggs one at a time .  Add flour , baking powder , salt , milk and vanilla; mix well . Put pan of water under cake to keep moist while baking .  Bake 1 1/2 hours at 325° .

question: I have sour cream california cream of mushroom soup cheddar cheese onions . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have grated sharp beer accent parmesan cheese celery flour margarine carrots onions dry mustard chicken stock salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have unsweetened applesauce vanilla nutmeg eggs cinnamon soda cooking oil raisins water flour liquid sweetener . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Diabetic Cake with 2 c .  water , 2 c .  raisins , 1 c .  unsweetened applesauce , 2 eggs , 2 Tbsp .  liquid sweetener , 3/4 c .  cooking oil , 1 tsp .  soda , 2 c .  flour , 1 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 tsp .  nutmeg , 1 tsp .  vanilla . question: I have concentrate boiling water lavender . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lavender Lemonade with 12 oz .  can lemonade concentrate , 1/4 cup lavender (can get at health food store) , 2 cups boiling water . question: I have oil warm water active dry yeast flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have marshmallows coconut milk fruit cocktail . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have pecans cream cheese shallots beef worcestershire sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Beefy Cheese Ball with 1 jar chipped beef , chopped fine , 12 oz .  softened cream cheese , 1/2 cup finely chopped shallots , 1 Tbsp .  Worcestershire sauce , 1/2 cup pecans , ground . Here's the instruction : Combine all ingredients except nuts .  Shape into a ball and roll in nuts .  Chill and serve with wheat crackers .

question: I have sour cream baking powder sugar vanilla extract eggs cinnamon blueberries flour unsalted margarine milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fresh Berry Coffee Cake with 1 1/2 c .  sifted flour , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1/2 c .  unsalted margarine , softened , 1 c .  sugar , 2 eggs , 1 tsp .  vanilla extract , 3 Tbsp .  sour cream , 1/3 c .  milk , 1 1/2 c .  blueberries , 1/3 c .  sugar , 1/4 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 3 Tbsp .  butter , softened . Here's the instruction : Sift 1 1/2 cups flour , baking powder and salt into bowl .  Cream 1/2 cup margarine and 1 cup sugar in mixer bowl until smooth .  Add eggs 1 at a time , mixing well after each addition .  Add vanilla and sour cream; mix well .  Add flour mixture alternately with milk , mixing well after each addition and beginning and ending with flour mixture .  Spoon half the batter into greased 9-inch baking pan .  Top with blueberries , then remaining batter .  Combine remaining 1/3 cup sugar , 1/4 cup flour and cinnamon in small bowl; mix well .  Cut in butter until crumbly .  Sprinkle over batter .  Bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes or until golden brown .  Cool on wire rack for 5 minutes .  Serve warm .  Yield: 9 servings .

question: I have egg green onions salmon onion vegetable oil milk butter bread crumbs . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar chocolate powder espresso egg whites ladyfingers mascarpone cheese marsala salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Tirami Su with 1 lb .  Mascarpone cheese , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 lb .  sugar , 5 egg whites (Egg Beaters are okay) , 2 Tbsp .  Marsala , 1 pkg .  ladyfingers (Italian) , 1/2 c . Blend into egg mixture .  Add Marsala; beat until fluffy .  Place enough ladyfingers to cover bottom of dish .  Brush with sweetened Espresso (do not soak cookies) . question: I have egg mozzarella cheese parmesan cheese herb seasoned croutons italian sausage cream-style tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla baking powder unsalted butter eggs cinnamon fresh strawberries flour milk apricot preserves salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

Here's the instruction : Cream oleo , peanut butter , sugars , egg and vanilla .  Add flour , salt and soda sifted together first .  Shape into balls and drop in mini muffin pans .  Bake 10 minutes at 375° .  Push candy in cookies as soon as you take them out of oven .  Push until just top of candy shows .  Cool 10 minutes in pan and remove .

question: I have sugar grated apples raspberry jello oranges cranberry salad . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cranberry Salad with cranberry salad , 1 pkg .  raspberry jello , 2 small oranges , 1 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  grated apples . Here's the instruction : Grind cranberries; add rind of oranges and cut up oranges .  Mix well with sugar and let stand overnight; set jello and when it begins to thicken , add the cranberry mixture , apples and nuts .

question: I have cream of chicken soup sour cream pepper frozen hash browns onions grated sharp butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hash Brown Casserole with 1 (2 lb . ) pkg .  frozen hash browns , 1 c .  diced onions , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 8 oz .  grated sharp Cheddar cheese , 2 c .  sour cream , 1/4 c .  melted butter , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  pepper . Here's the instruction : Let potatoes thaw for 30 minutes .  Mix all ingredients together in a large bowl .  Place in greased 9 x 13-inch baking dish .  Bake at 350° for 1 hour .

question: I have orange marmalade apple pie filling sweet potatoes cranberry sauce apricot preserves . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cranberry-Apple Sweet Potatoes with 5 to 6 medium sweet potatoes , peeled , or 2 (18 oz . ) cans , drained , 1 (21 oz . ) can apple pie filling , 1 (8 oz . ) can whole cranberry sauce , 2 Tbsp .  apricot preserves , 2 Tbsp .  orange marmalade . Here's the instruction : Cut sweet potatoes into bite size pieces .  In a large saucepan , cook potatoes , covered , in enough boiling salted water to cover , about 15 minutes , or until tender (disregard this step if using canned potatoes) .  Drain and set aside .  Spread pie filling in an 8 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish .  Arrange cooked fresh or canned sweet potatoes atop .  In a small mixing bowl , stir together cranberry sauce , apricot preserves and orange marmalade; spoon over sweet potatoes .  Bake , uncovered , in a 350° oven for 20 to 25 minutes , or until heated through .  Serves 6 to 8 .

question: I have potatoes pepper cheddar cheese onion flour margarine milk paprika dry mustard salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Scalloped Potatoes with 1/3 c .  margarine , 1/2 c .  minced onion , 1/3 c .  flour , 3 c .  milk , 2 1/2 c .  grated Cheddar cheese , 1 Tbsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  dry mustard , 1/8 tsp .  pepper (black) , 10 c .  thinly sliced potatoes , 1/4 tsp .  paprika . Here's the instruction : In medium saucepan , melt margarine .  Add onion and saute until soft .  Stir in flour .  Cook over low heat for 1 minute .  Gradually add milk , stirring constantly .  Cook over medium heat until slightly thickened and begins to boil .  Add 1 cup cheese , salt , mustard and pepper .  Remove from heat; stir until cheese is melted .

question: I have sour cream sugar pecan marshmallows cream cheese pineapple bing cherries . Give me some cooking ideas .

Here's the instruction : Mix cream cheese , sour cream and sugar until fluffy .  Drain pineapple and cherries .  Add remaining ingredients to cream cheese mixture .  Chill well .  May be made the day before .

question: I have corn chips egg tomatoes cheddar cheese onion chili with beans water chopped lettuce enchilada sauce green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chili Strata with 1 slightly beaten egg , 3/4 c .  water , 1 (12 oz . ) pkg .  corn chips , 2 (15 1/2 oz . ) cans chili with beans , 1 (20 oz . ) can enchilada sauce , 3/4 c .  chopped green pepper , 1/3 c .  chopped onion , 2 c .  shredded Cheddar cheese , 4 c .  chopped lettuce , 2 c .  chopped tomatoes . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 350° .  Mix egg and water .  Crush 4 cups corn chips .  Add egg mixture to crushed chips .  Spread in lightly greased 13 x 9-inch baking dish . Bake 5 minutes more .  Top with lettuce and tomatoes .  Serve with remaining sauce .  Serves 6 to 8 .

question: I have sugar baking powder vanilla brown sugar eggs unsweetened chocolate squares flour unsalted butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Basic Brownies with 4 oz .  unsweetened chocolate squares , 1 c .  unsalted butter , 1 c .  packed brown sugar , 1 c .  granulated sugar , 3 eggs , 1 c .  all-purpose flour , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Melt chocolate and butter over low heat .  Add brown sugar and stir to dissolve .  Let cool .  Beat granulated sugar and egg .  Add chocolate mixture , flour , baking powder and vanilla , stirring just enough to mix .  Pour into greased 13 x 9-inch pan .  Bake in preheated oven at 325° for about 30 to 35 minutes .  Makes 12 .

question: I have potatoes water flour cheese margarine milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Scalloped Potatoes with 1 stick margarine , 4 Tbsp .  flour , 1 1/2 c .  milk , 1 c .  water (off boiled potatoes) , 6 slices cheese , 5 sliced potatoes . Here's the instruction : Boil potatoes and medium onion; boil until tender .  Pour water off potatoes except 1 cup .  Melt margarine; add flour , milk and water off boiled potatoes and salt .  Cook until thick .  Pour over sliced potatoes; add cheese , more potatoes , sauce , cheese and more potatoes until all is gone .  Cook at 350° for 1 hour .

question: I have pecans celery raspberry jello cranberry sauce pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have fresh pork tomatoes pepper brown sugar cinnamon water cornstarch beans white sugar ketchup dry mustard salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pork And Beans To Can with 8 1/2 lb .  beans , 1/3 c .  salt , 3 1/2 lb .  fresh pork , 8 qt .  tomatoes , 2 lb .  brown sugar , 1 lb .  white sugar , 2 tsp .  dry mustard , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 qt .  ketchup , 2 qt .  water , 1 tsp .  pepper , 1/2 c .  cornstarch . question: I have bulk sausage corn meal tomatoes kernel corn olives eggs chili powder cheddar cheese onion fat clove garlic milk ground beef salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have corn eggs frozen broccoli stove top stuffing butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli Corn Casserole with 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  frozen broccoli , 2 cans creamed corn , 1 pkg .  Stove Top stuffing , 3 Tbsp .  butter , 3 beaten eggs . question: I have flour sugar butter apples . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Apple Fritters with 1 whole c .  ??? , 1 c .  flour , sugar to taste , 1 Tbsp .  butter , 2 to 3 large apples , peeled and sliced thin . question: I have egg sugar salad oil water flour fresh shrimp salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Carol'S French Fried Shrimp with 1 c .  sifted all-purpose flour , 1/2 tsp .  sugar , 1 c .  ice water , 2 lb .  fresh shrimp , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 slightly beaten egg , 2 Tbsp .  salad oil . Here's the instruction : Combine ingredients , except shrimp; beat .  Peel shell from shrimp , leaving last section and tail intact (optional) . question: I have spinach green onions chicken broth garlic vegetable oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have potatoes sugar salt pepper onion water flour cider vinegar bacon strips . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make German Potato Salad with 5 bacon strips , 3/4 c .  chopped onion , 2 Tbsp .  all-purpose flour , 2/3 c .  cider vinegar , 1 1/2 c .  water , 1/4 c .  sugar , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/8 tsp .  pepper , 6 c .  sliced , cooked , peeled potatoes . question: I have sour cream eggs bay seasoning cheddar cheese onion crust salmon mayonnaise dill . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fantastic Salmon Pie with baked single pie crust , 3 eggs , 1/2 c .  shredded Cheddar cheese , 1 tsp .  old bay seasoning , 8 oz .  sour cream , 1 Tbsp .  grated onion , 1 can salmon , 1/4 c .  mayonnaise , 1/4 tsp .  dill . Here's the instruction : Bake pie crust at 400° for 10 minutes , set aside; drain salmon saving liquid; spread salmon on a plate to flake and remove bones; beat 3 eggs; add cheese , old bay , sour cream , onion , dill and mayonnaise; stir in salmon and 1/2 c .  of salmon liquid; stir mixture well and pour into baked crust; bake at 325° for 45 minutes or until knife comes out clean; serve warm with vegetable of choice .

question: I have sugar lemon juice eggs lemon rind cornstarch margarine . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lemon Curd with 2 c .  sugar , 1 c .  margarine , 3 Tbsp .  grated lemon rind , 2/3 c .  lemon juice , 2 tsp .  cornstarch , 4 eggs , lightly beaten . question: I have egg sugar vanilla extract california walnuts all-purpose unsweetened chocolate confectioners sugar double acting baking powder butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla marshmallow cream parkay margarine nuts milk semi-sweet chocolate chips . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fantasy Fudge with 3 c .  sugar , 3/4 c .  Parkay margarine , 2/3 c .  evaporated milk , 1 (12 oz . ) pkg .  semi-sweet chocolate chips , 1 (7 oz . ) jar marshmallow cream , 1 c .  chopped nuts , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Stir together margarine , sugar and milk in a heavy 2 1/2 to 3-quart saucepan .  Bring to a boil , stirring constantly . question: I have oregano pepper eggs green pepper milk shredded monterey crescent rolls brown salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

Tender Quick meat cure salt , 2 Tbsp .  liquid smoke , 1 c .  water , 1/4 tsp .  onion powder , 1/2 tsp .  pepper , 1/8 tsp .  garlic powder , 1 tsp .  peppercorns , 1/4 tsp .  mustard seed . question: I have egg sugar vanilla all-purpose lemon pudding margarine confectioners sugar . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Luscious Lemon Bars with 3/4 c .  (1 1/2 sticks) margarine , 3/4 c .  sugar , 1 egg , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 2 1/4 c .  all-purpose flour , 1 c .  (1/2 can) lemon pudding and pie filling , confectioners sugar . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 375° .  In large mixing bowl with electric mixer , beat margarine , sugar , egg and vanilla until well blended .  Mix in flour until incorporated .  Divide dough in half .  With your hand , shape each section of dough into a log about 14 inches long and 1 1/2 inches wide .  Place on greased baking sheet . question: I have torn spinach greens vinegar bacon egg sugar eggs onion water salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hot Spinach Salad with 3 to 4 bacon slices , diced , 1 egg , slightly beaten , 3 Tbsp .  sugar , 1 Tbsp .  vinegar , water , 4 c .  torn spinach greens , 1/2 small onion , chopped , salt and pepper to taste , hard-cooked eggs , sliced .
