question: I have tomato onion ground beef potato chips velveeta shells tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cheese And Beef Casserole with 1 pkg .  Velveeta shells and cheese dinner , 1/2 c .  chopped tomato , 1 lb .  ground beef , 1 (8 oz . ) can tomato sauce , 1/2 c .  crushed potato chips , 1/4 c .  chopped onion . Here's the instruction : Prepare dinner as directed on package .  Add tomato; mix lightly .  Brown meat; drain .  Stir in tomato sauce and onion .  Spoon dinner mixture into a 1 1/2-quart casserole .  Top with meat mixture .  Sprinkle with chips .  Bake at 350° for 20 minutes , or until thoroughly heated .

question: I have oregano tomato paste salt onion ground chuck parsley garlic olive oil tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Spaghetti Sauce with 2 lb .  ground chuck , 4 large cans tomato sauce , 1 large can tomato paste , 2 Tbsp .  olive oil , 1 large diced onion , 1 c .  dried parsley , 1/2 tsp .  oregano , 2 tsp .  crushed garlic , salt and pepper to taste . Here's the instruction : In a large saucepan , brown beef and drain fat .  Add oil , sauce , paste , onion , salt , pepper , parsley , oregano and garlic .  Bring to a boil , then simmer 1 1/2 hours .  Stir frequently .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs brown sugar pecans flour milk sweet potatoes butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sweet Potatoes with 3 c .  sweet potatoes , mashed , 1 c .  sugar , 2 eggs , beaten , 2/3 c .  milk , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 6 Tbsp .  melted butter , 1 c .  brown sugar , 1 Tbsp .  flour , 6 Tbsp .  melted butter , 1 c .  chopped pecans . Here's the instruction : Bake uncovered 45 minutes at 350° .

question: I have vinegar sugar bell pepper salad oil onion tomato soup carrots mustard worcestershire sauce salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Marinated Carrots with 2 lb .  carrots , 1 bell pepper , 1/2 c .  salad oil , 1 c .  sugar , salt and pepper to taste , 1 tsp .  Worcestershire sauce , 1 medium onion , 1 small can tomato soup , 3/4 c .  vinegar , 1 tsp .  mustard . Here's the instruction : Peel and slice carrots .  Cook in salt water (don't overcook) until tender .  Drain well .  Chop pepper and add to carrots .  Combine remaining .  Pour over carrots while still warm .  Marinate 2 to 3 days .  Drain well before serving .  Liquid may be reused .  Keeps up to 2 weeks in refrigerator .

question: I have buttermilk baking mix pepper eggs cheddar cheese onion broccoli milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Impossible Broccoli Pie with 2 pkg .  frozen chopped broccoli (10 oz . ) , 3 c .  shredded Cheddar cheese (12 oz . ) , 2/3 c .  chopped onion , 1 1/3 c .  milk , 3 eggs , 3/4 c .  buttermilk baking mix , 3/4 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 400° .  Grease pie plate (10 x 1 1/2-inches) .  Rinse broccoli to thaw; drain .  Mix broccoli , 2 cups of the cheese and onion in pie plate .  Beat milk , eggs , baking mix , salt and pepper until smooth (15 seconds in blender on high or for 1 minute with hand beater) .  Pour into plate .  Bake approximately 25 to 35 minutes (or until knife comes out clean) .  Top with remaining cheese .  Bake just until the cheese is melted (approximately 1 to 2 minutes longer) .  Let stand 5 minutes .  Garnish with tomato slices .

question: I have o frozen strawberries marshmallows white . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Strawberry Upside-Down Cake with 8 oz .  miniature marshmallows , white or yellow cake mix , 4 c .  mashed , fresh of frozen strawberries , 1 small box strawberry Jell-O . Here's the instruction : In a greased 9 x 13-inch pan , spread marshmallows evenly .  Prepare cake mix as directed on box .  Pour over marshmallows .  Mix dry jello and strawberries together .  Spoon over cake mix .  Bake at 350° for 45 to 50 minutes .

question: I have sugar eggs pecan halves maple syrup butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pecan Pie with 2 large eggs , 1/3 cup sugar , 1/4 cup melted butter , 1 cup dark amber maple syrup , 3/4 cup pecan halves , pinch of salt . Here's the instruction : Beat eggs , add sugar , salt , butter and syrup .  Beat together .  Add nuts .  Pour into 8-inch pastry-lined pie dish .  Bake at 375 for about 40 minutes .

question: I have condensed milk coconut extract whiskey chocolate syrup vanilla eggs almond extract instant coffee . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Irish Cream with 4 large eggs , 1 1/2 c .  whiskey , 1/2 tsp .  instant coffee , 1 Tbsp .  chocolate syrup , 1 (14 oz . ) can sweetened condensed milk , 1/2 tsp .  coconut extract , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1/8 tsp .  almond extract . Here's the instruction : Mix in blender 2 minutes; refrigerate .

question: I have pears lemons sugar crystallized ginger . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Ginger Pears with 10 lb .  pears , 8 lb .  sugar , 4 oz .  crystallized ginger , 6 lemons . Here's the instruction : Pare fruit; cut in thin slices after removing core .  Mix pears and sugar .  Place over low heat in large kettle .  Stir until sugar is melted and syrup formed .  Simmer until fruit is clear , stirring occasionally .  Add grated rind of 2 lemons and juice of all 6 .  Add ginger , cut in small pieces; simmer until thick .  Put in sterilized jelly glasses; cover with paraffin , or seal in sterilized pint jars while hot .  Yields approximately 18 glasses .

question: I have oyster crackers light oil dry hidden valley lemon pepper garlic dill weed . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Snack Crackers with 2 pkg .  oyster crackers , 1/2 to 2 tsp .  garlic or seasoned salt , 2 tsp .  dill weed , 1 c .  light oil , 1 pkg .  dry Hidden Valley Ranch dressing , 1/2 tsp .  lemon pepper (optional) . Here's the instruction : Mix crackers and oil until oil is well soaked into crackers .  Add remaining ingredients .  Stir until evenly coated .  Heat in oven at 250° for 45 minutes or so , stirring every 15 minutes .

question: I have sugar cinnamon peeled apples flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Apple Crisp with 3 c .  sliced peeled apples , 1 c .  sugar , 1 rounded Tbsp .  flour , 1 pinch salt , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon . Here's the instruction : Mix ingredients and put in baking pan .  Top with following mixture .

question: I have vanilla flavoring eggs light brown sugar flour nuts butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Blonde Brownies with 1 stick butter , 1 pkg .  light brown sugar , 3 eggs , 2 c .  self-rising flour , nuts (as desired) , 1 tsp .  vanilla flavoring . Here's the instruction : Mix; bake at 325° .

question: I have frozen corn milk pepper provolone cheese cheddar cheese onion water cream of potato soup broccoli carrot butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cheesy Vegetable Soup with 2 Tbsp .  chopped onion , 1 Tbsp .  butter , 1 c .  frozen corn , 1/2 c .  chopped broccoli , 1/2 c .  shredded carrot , 1/4 c .  water , 1 can cream of potato soup , 1 c .  milk , 1/2 c .  shredded Cheddar cheese , 1 oz .  Provolone cheese , cut up , dash of pepper . Here's the instruction : In medium saucepan , cook onion in butter until tender , Add corn , broccoli , carrots and water .  Bring to boil; reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes or until vegetables are tender .  Stir in soup , milk , cheeses and pepper .  Cook and stir over medium heat until cheeses are melted and mixture is heated through .

question: I have cheddar cheese parsley flakes cream cheese nuts onions garlic . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cheese Balls with 1 lb .  Cheddar cheese , 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , 2 shakes garlic powder , 2 Tbsp .  minced onions , 1/2 c .  nuts , finely chopped , parsley flakes . Here's the instruction : Grate and mix cheeses together .  Add garlic powder and minced onions .  Chill mixture until easy to form into balls .  Roll in parsley flakes and chopped nuts .

question: I have apple egg baking powder sugar oats brown sugar cinnamon flour milk vegetable oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Apple Oat Muffins with 1 1/4 c .  quick or old-fashioned oats , 1 1/4 c .  all-purpose flour , 1 c .  finely chopped apple , 1/3 c .  firmly packed brown sugar , 1 Tbsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 c .  milk , 1 egg , 1/4 c .  vegetable oil , 1 Tbsp .  granulated sugar , 1/4 tsp .  cinnamon . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 425° .  Combine oats , flour , apple , brown sugar , baking powder , salt and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon .  Add milk , egg and oil , mixing just until dry ingredients are moistened .  Fill greased muffin cups 2/3 full .  Mix granulated sugar and 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon; sprinkle scant 1/4 teaspoon over each muffin .  Bake 15 to 18 minutes or until golden brown .

question: I have egg onion cream-style corn cracker crumbs milk vegetable soup hamburger . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Seven-In-One Hot Dish with 1 lb .  hamburger , browned with onion , 1 onion , 1 can cream-style corn , 1 can vegetarian vegetable soup , 1 c .  milk , 1 egg , 1 c .  cracker crumbs (reserve some for top) . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients together .  Top with reserved cracker crumbs .  Bake at 350° for 1 hour .  Serves 4 to 6 .

question: I have cream of chicken soup egg noodles cheese milk white chicken meat . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Casserole with 1 pkg .  egg noodles , 2 cans cream of chicken soup , 6 to 8 slices cheese , 1 can white chicken meat , 2 soup cans milk . Here's the instruction : Boil noodles until tender .  In a different pan (while noodles are cooking) , put the cream of chicken soup and the 2 soup cans full of milk .  Mix well .  Cook over heat until ready , then add the chicken and cheese .  Drain the noodles .  Mix in with the cream mixture .

question: I have tomatoes mixed vegetables hamburger onion soup mix orzo . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Beef Vegetable Soup with 1 lb .  hamburger , 1 (16 oz . ) can stewed tomatoes , drained , 1 (16 oz . ) can mixed vegetables , drained , 1 pkg .  onion soup mix , 1 c .  orzo . Here's the instruction : Brown hamburger; drain fat off .  Add remaining ingredients .  Use empty 16-ounce can to add 5 cans water to mixture .  Bring to boil .  Reduce heat and simmer 30 to 45 minutes .  Very filling soup .

question: I have whipped cream cottage cheese o oranges pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Orange Salad with 1 container cottage cheese (regular) , 1 small box orange Jell-O , 1 large can crushed pineapple , 1 can Mandarin oranges , 1 pt .  whipped cream plus 1 tsp .  vanilla or 18 oz .  Cool Whip . Here's the instruction : Add orange Jell-O to cottage cheese .  Drain crushed pineapple and Mandarin oranges and fold in .  Whip whipped cream and add vanilla or use Cool Whip .

question: I have baking powder sugar crisco vanilla eggs flour milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Christmas Sugar Cookies with 2 eggs , 2 c .  sugar , 1 c .  Crisco , 1 c .  milk , 4 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 4 c .  flour . Here's the instruction : Cream the eggs , Crisco and sugar , then add dry ingredients alternately with milk; mix well .  Chill dough overnight or a couple of hours .  Roll out and cut into desired shapes .  Bake in a 350° oven for 8 to 10 minutes or until light brown .  Frost when cool .  Makes about 3 dozen .  If the cookies are rolled out thin , they will be harder than they would be if rolled thicker .

question: I have egg tomatoes extra lean ground beef white onion chili powder langostinos crust butter tomato sauce parmesan cheese vegetable bouillon margarine beans elbow macaroni cumin kidney beans cayenne pepper shredded lettuce cheddar cheese onion macaroni shells tomato salsa basil flour milk light cream paprika ground cinnamon salt oregano pepper column clove garlic ground raw turkey parsley red wine garlic worcestershire sauce . answer: you can make Taco Pizza with 1 white onion , chopped , 1 lb .  extra lean ground beef , chili powder , garlic powder , cumin , cayenne pepper , paprika , salt and pepper , 1/2 c .  tomato salsa , 1/3 c .  low fat refried beans , 1 pizza crust , 2 tomatoes , diced , 1 1/2 c .  shredded lettuce , 1 c .  low fat Cheddar cheese , 2 c .  langostinos or other shellfish , cooked , 1/2 c .  butter , 1/2 c .  milk , 1/2 c .  half and half or light cream , 1 column Ritz crackers , loosely crushed , 1 can (14 1/2 oz . ) diced peeled tomatoes , 1 medium onion , chopped , 1 clove garlic , minced , 1 Tbsp .  basil , chopped or dried , 1 Tbsp .  or to taste Worcestershire sauce , 4 vegetable bouillon cubes dissolved in 4 c .  boiling water , 1 can (16 oz . ) kidney beans , drained and rinsed , 1 c .  medium macaroni shells or other similar pasta , 4 oz .  packaged dried cut ziti (1 1/3 c . ) or elbow macaroni (1 c . ) , 1 lb .  ground raw turkey , lamb or beef , 1 medium onion , chopped (1/2 c . ) , 2 cloves garlic , minced , 1 (8 oz . ) can tomato sauce , 1/4 c .  dry red wine or beef broth , 2 Tbsp .  snipped parsley , 1/2 tsp .  dried oregano , crushed , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  ground cinnamon , 1/2 c .  grated Parmesan cheese , 3 Tbsp .  margarine or butter , 3 Tbsp .  all-purpose flour , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 1 1/2 c .  milk , 1 egg , beaten , 1/4 c .  Parmesan cheese , ground cinnamon (optional) . Here's the instruction : Cook pasta according to directions .  Drain pasta; rinse with cold water .  Drain again .  Meanwhile , in a large skillet cook turkey , lamb or beef , onion and garlic until meat is brown and onion is tender .  Drain fat .  Stir in tomato sauce , wine or beef broth , parsley , oregano , salt and cinnamon .  Bring to boiling; reduce heat .  Simmer , uncovered , for 5 minutes .  Remove from heat .  Stir in 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese

question: I have oil sugar vanilla eggs baking soda bananas flour nuts salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Banana Nut Bread with 1/2 c .  oil , 1 c .  sugar , 2 eggs , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 2 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 3 to 4 bananas (ripe) , 1 c .  chopped nuts . Here's the instruction : In a medium bowl , cut up bananas and then beat smooth with a mixer; set aside .  In a large bowl , combine oil , sugar , eggs and vanilla; beat smooth .  Alternating with bananas , add dry ingredients .  You may use a spoon .  Stir in the walnuts .  Pour into greased bread tins .  Bake at 350° for 50 to 60 minutes .  Done when a toothpick comes out clean .  Top may crack .

question: I have tomato condensed cream tuna cheddar cheese flour onions milk frozen broccoli . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Tuna Tortilla Roll-Ups with 1 (10 3/4 oz . ) can condensed cream of celery soup , 1 c .  milk , 1 (9 1/4 oz . ) can tuna , drained and flaked , 1 (10 oz . ) pkg .  frozen broccoli spears , thawed , drained and cut into 1-inch pieces , 1 c .  (4 oz . ) shredded Cheddar cheese , 1 (2 . 8 oz . ) can Durkee French fried onions , 6 to 7-inch flour or corn tortillas , 1 medium tomato , chopped . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  In small bowl , combine soup and milk; set aside .  In medium bowl , combine tuna , broccoli , 1/2 cup cheese and 1/2 cup French fried onions .  Stir in 3/4 cup soup mixture .

question: I have green chilies eggs cheddar cheese milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chilie Squares with 2 cans green chilies , 10 oz .  shredded Cheddar cheese , 4 eggs , 4 Tbsp .  milk . Here's the instruction : Chop 2 cans of chilies into the bottom of an 8 x 8-inch pan .  Top with 10 ounces shredded Cheddar cheese .  Mix eggs and milk together; pour over top of the chilies and cheese .  Cut into squares .  Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes , until golden brown .

question: I have potatoes cream of chicken soup sour cream cheddar cheese onion bread crumbs butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Janean'S Potatoes with 6 to 7 medium potatoes , 1 c .  grated Cheddar cheese , 1 Tbsp .  dry onion , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 1/2 c .  melted butter plus 1/4 c .  melted butter , 16 oz .  sour cream , 1 c .  cracker or bread crumbs . Here's the instruction : Boil the potatoes in skins about 1/2 hour .  Cool in refrigerator , then peel and grate .  Mix together potatoes , Cheddar cheese , dry onion , soup , 1/2 cup melted butter and sour cream .  Press into greased 13 x 9-inch pan .  Before baking , sprinkle cracker (or bread) crumbs and pour 1/4 cup melted butter over top .  Bake at 350° for 30 minutes .

question: I have cabbage vinegar sugar peppers carrots mayonnaise paprika salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make El'S Cole Slaw with 2 peppers , 2 carrots , 2 small heads cabbage , 6 Tbsp .  sugar , 6 Tbsp .  vinegar , 6 Tbsp .  mayonnaise , salt to taste , sprinkle of paprika . Here's the instruction : Shred cabbage , carrots and peppers .  (Can use large package of shredded cole slaw , but add peppers to it . ) Salt to taste .

question: I have crisp rice cereal dipping chocolate margarine confectioners sugar crunchy peanut butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Crispy Peanut Butter Centers with 2 c .  crunchy peanut butter , 1/2 c .  margarine , 1 lb .  confectioners sugar , 3 c .  crisp rice cereal , dipping chocolate . Here's the instruction : Combine peanut butter , margarine and confectioners sugar in a large bowl .  Blend together well .  Add rice cereal and blend into peanut butter mixture .  Form into 3/4-inch balls and dip in dipping chocolate .

question: I have tart pie cherries bread cubes water prunes orange apples duck butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Goose Or Duck And Sweet Dressing with 3 lb .  dressed duck , 1 1/2 c .  apples , diced , 1/3 c .  warm water , salt to taste , 1 c .  prunes , soaked but not cooked , 3 Tbsp .  butter or fat , 3/4 c .  tart pie cherries , 3 c .  bread cubes , juice of 1 orange . Here's the instruction : Melt fat and saute apples until tender; add all other ingredients and cover .  Steam about 8 to 10 minutes .  If cherries are very tart add 1 tablespoon sugar .  Stuff bird and truss .  Bake with breast up until brown , then turn over .  Do not prick skin .  I make a double recipe and tie what is leftover in a cloth and put in the pan with the duck .

question: I have eggs flour 's secret ingredients chocolate chips vegetable oil . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chocolate Chocolate Chip Cookies with 1 pkg .  Betty Crocker supreme brownie mix (includes a pouch of Hershey's chocolate syrup) , 1/4 c .  flour , 2 eggs , 1/4 c .  vegetable oil , 6 oz .  chocolate chips , Mick's secret ingredients (an extra squeeze of Hershey's syrup from the refrigerator!) . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients together with spoon .  Drop by spoonfuls onto cookie sheet .  Bake 8 to 9 minutes at 375° .  Mmmm! They're sooo yummy!

question: I have frozen strawberries strawberry preserves cool whip frozen pound cake milk chocolate pudding . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Strawberry Chocolate Trifle with 1 pkg .  of instant chocolate pudding mix , 2 cups of milk , 2 cups frozen pound cake (thawed) , 2 cups frozen strawberries , 1 cup of strawberry preserves , cool whip . Here's the instruction : Mix pudding according to package directions .  Chill .  Cut cake into 1 inch cubes .  Place 1/2 of the cake into glass bowl .  Stir strawberries and preserves together .  Spoon 1/2 of strawberry mixture over cake .  Pour 1/2 of pudding over strawberries .  Repeat this procedure again until all is used .  Garnish with cool whip and fresh strawberries .

question: I have picante sauce horseradish onion cream cheese mayonnaise shrimp . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fiesta Shrimp Dip with 2 (4 1/2 oz . ) cans shrimp , rinsed and drained or 1 (10 oz . ) pkg .  frozen , cooked shrimp , thawed , 1 (3 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , softened , 1/2 c .  Thousand Island dressing , 1/4 c .  mayonnaise , 1/3 c .  picante sauce , 2 Tbsp .  grated onion , 1 tsp .  horseradish , 2 Tbsp .  thinly sliced green onion tops . Here's the instruction : Finely chop shrimp , reserving a few whole shrimp for garnish .  Combine chopped shrimp with remaining ingredients , except green onion .  Mix well .  Spoon into serving bowl; garnish with green onion and reserved shrimp .  Chill .  Serve with assorted crackers , chips or vegetable dippers .  Makes about 2 1/2 cups dip .

question: I have corn meal butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make No Fat Oven-Fried Squash with 4 or 5 squash , corn meal , fat-free butter flavored cooking spray . Here's the instruction : Wash and prepare squash .  Coat both sides of squash with corn meal .  Spray baking sheet generously with cooking spray .  Spread squash evenly on baking sheet .  Spray squash generously with cooking spray .  Salt and pepper to taste .  Bake at 400° for 20 minutes .

question: I have vanilla cinnamon non-caloric cocoa milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mexican-Style Hot Chocolate with 3 Tbsp .  unsweetened cocoa powder , non-caloric liquid sweetener equal to 3 Tbsp .  sugar , 3 1/2-inches cinnamon stick , 3 c .  skim milk , 1/4 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Combine cocoa , non-caloric sweetener , cinnamon stick and 2/3 cup water .  Bring to boil , stirring constantly; boil 1 minute longer .  Stir in skim milk .  Cook until heated through (do not boil) .  Add vanilla; remove cinnamon stick .  Beat with rotary beater .  If desired , garnish with additional cinnamon sticks .  Makes 4 servings .

question: I have cheddar cheese onion ground beef spaghetti sauce zucchini . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Zucchini Casserole with 1 c .  sharp Cheddar cheese , melted to pour on top , 1 1/2 c .  spaghetti sauce , 1 lb .  ground beef , 1 small onion , chopped , 1 large zucchini . Here's the instruction : Cook zucchini in salt water 10 minutes; drain well .  Brown meat and onion in skillet .  Place zucchini in 2 1/2-quart casserole; pour spaghetti and meat into casserole and mix together .  Pour melted cheese over the top and bake covered for 35 minutes at 400° .

question: I have liquid pimiento sugar lemon juice onion pecans white vinegar water celery gelatine salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Asparagus Aspic with 3/4 c .  sugar , 1 c .  water , 1/2 c .  white vinegar , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 2 envelopes Knox gelatine , 1 c .  finely chopped celery , 2 Tbsp .  grated onion , 1/4 c .  lemon juice , 1 small jar pimiento , chopped and drained , 1/2 c .  chopped pecans , 1 large can asparagus , chopped , 1/4 c .  asparagus liquid . Here's the instruction : Boil for 3 minutes the first 3 ingredients .  Dissolve 2 envelopes Knox gelatine in 1/2 cup cold water and add to boiled mixture .  Cool until syrupy .  Add remainder of ingredients .  Combine and refrigerate .  Serves 6 to 8 .

question: I have sugar almond flavoring eggs cold water flour cream of tartar . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sunshine Cake with 8 eggs , 1 1/4 c .  sugar , 1 c .  flour , sifted , 1 Tbsp .  cold water , 1 1/4 tsp .  cream of tartar , 1 1/2 tsp .  almond flavoring . Here's the instruction : Beat egg whites to peak .  Add pinch of salt .  Put in 1/2 of the cream of tartar .  When half beaten , sift in the sugar .  Add 1 tablespoon water into yolks , then beat until thick .  Fold together whites , yolks and flavoring .  Add flour and remaining cream of tartar .  Bake in an ungreased tin , wet with cold water .  Bake 1 hour at 300° .  Remove carefully , turning tin upside down to cool .

question: I have mixed spices cucumbers sugar cider vinegar . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sweet Pickles with 15 medium cucumbers (whole) , 2 Tbsp .  mixed spices , 8 c .  sugar , 4 c .  cider vinegar . Here's the instruction : Cover cucumbers with boiling water each morning for 4 mornings and on the 5th morning , chunk into cubes .  Heat spices , sugar and vinegar and pour over pickles .  Let set 48 hours .  Heat and can .  Takes 7 days to complete .

question: I have vinegar pepper brown sugar chili powder onion water celery pork clove garlic margarine buns ketchup salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Barbecued Pork Sandwiches with 1/2 c .  chopped onion , 1/4 c .  chopped celery , 1 clove garlic , minced , 2 Tbsp .  margarine , 1 c .  ketchup , 1/2 c .  water , 2 Tbsp .  brown sugar , 1 Tbsp .  vinegar , 3/4 tsp .  chili powder , 1/4 tsp .  salt , dash of pepper , 12 thin slices cooked pork , 6 hamburger buns , split and toasted . Here's the instruction : In a medium skillet , cook onion , celery and garlic in margarine until tender , but not brown .  Stir in ketchup , water , brown sugar , vinegar , chili powder , salt and pepper .  Simmer , uncovered , for 10 to 15 minutes .  Add pork; heat through .  Serve meat on buns with sauce .

question: I have cranberry sauce onion soup red wine french dressing . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Company Chicken with 6 to 8 skinless , boneless chicken breast halves , 1 can whole berry cranberry sauce , 4 oz .  French dressing , 1/4 c .  dry red wine , 1/2 pkg .  dry onion soup mix . Here's the instruction : Place chicken pieces in 9 x 13-inch pan .  Mix other ingredients and pour over chicken .  Bake at 350° for 1 hour .  Serve with rice on side .

question: I have sugar vanilla heavy cream eggs cold water sprinkling of chocolate sprinkles ladyfingers semi-sweet chocolate morsels . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chocolate Mousse with 12 oz .  Nestle semi-sweet chocolate morsels , 6 Tbsp .  cold water , 4 Tbsp .  sugar , 6 eggs , separated , 1 1/2 pt .  heavy cream , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 2 pkg .  ladyfingers (unfilled type) , sprinkling of chocolate sprinkles , 2 Tbsp .  sugar . Here's the instruction : Make one day in advance! Line bottom of spring-form pan with wax paper (trace pan bottom onto wax paper; cut and fit into pan bottom) .  Melt chocolate morsels and 6 tablespoons water in double boiler .  Add sugar .  Remove from heat .  Add 6 egg yolks .  Beat egg whites until stiff .  Fold into chocolate mixture .  (Do in large bowl . ) Beat 1 pint heavy cream , adding vanilla .  Fold into chocolate mixture .  Line bottom and sides of pan with ladyfingers (there will be a couple of leftover ones) to form picket fence .  Chill overnight .  Two hours before serving , beat 1/2 pint heavy cream with 2 tablespoons sugar .  Pour over mousse , then sprinkle with chocolate sprinkles immediately before serving .

question: I have pepper lemon juice cinnamon onion powder celery garlic powder thyme marjoram paprika chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Gail'S Spicy Baked Chicken with 1/2 c .  lemon juice , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 1 1/2 tsp .  garlic powder , 1 1/2 tsp .  onion powder , chicken (enough to feed your family) , 3/4 tsp .  paprika , 1 1/2 tsp .  thyme , 1/2 tsp .  marjoram , 1/2 tsp .  celery seed , 1/4 tsp .  cinnamon . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Mix seasonings together .  Put chicken on cookie sheet or baking sheet .  Pour lemon juice over it .  Sprinkle seasonings evenly over chicken .  Bake for 1 hour .  (Skin may be removed before seasoned with lemon juice and seasonings . )

question: I have ginger lemon juice soy sauce brown sugar orange juice white wine chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Wing Drumsticks with 4 lb .  chicken wings , tips cut off and split at joint , 1/4 c .  white wine , 1/4 c .  soy sauce , 1/2 c .  orange juice , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 8 drops Tabasco , 6 Tbsp .  brown sugar , 1 tsp .  ginger . Here's the instruction : Prepare chicken wings .  Combine remaining ingredients .  Pour over chicken wings; marinate at least 4 hours .  Line baking pan with foil .  Add chicken and marinade .  Bake at 250° for 3 1/2 hours .

question: I have noodles semi-sweet chocolate chips peanuts . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Haystacks with 1 (12 oz . ) pkg .  semi-sweet chocolate chips , 1 c .  Spanish peanuts , 1 to 2 c .  chow mein noodles . Here's the instruction : Heat chocolate chips in saucepan over low heat , stirring frequently , until melted .  Stir in peanuts and noodles until evenly coated; remove from heat .  Drop by teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper .  Refrigerate until firm .  Makes about 3 dozen cookies .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs brown sugar cinnamon soda water flour nuts oatmeal butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Oatmeal Bread with 2 c .  water , 1 1/2 c .  oatmeal , 1 1/2 sticks butter , 3 eggs , 2 c .  flour , 1 1/2 c .  brown sugar , 1 c .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 1/2 tsp .  soda , 1/4 tsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  nuts . Here's the instruction : Bring water to a boil; add oatmeal and butter .  Let stand 20 minutes , covered .  Add eggs; mix well .  Blend remaining ingredients except nuts .  Add to oats; mix well . question: I have sugar eggs spice apple pie filling ground cinnamon . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs flour cocoa milk butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Creamy Chocolate Pie(Makes 2 Pies)   with 2 c .  sugar , 3 c .  milk (Pet or Carnation) , 6 eggs , separated , 4 Tbsp .  flour , 2 Tbsp .  cocoa , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 2 Tbsp .  butter or oleo . Here's the instruction : In a heavy saucepan , combine flour , cocoa , sugar , beaten egg yolks and milk .  Cook over medium heat , stirring constantly until mixture thickens . question: I have egg sugar vanilla extract egg yolk water flour nuts almond extract butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Butter Cookies with 1 c .  softened butter or margarine , 3/4 c .  sugar , 1 whole egg , 1 egg yolk , 1 tsp .  vanilla extract , 1/4 tsp .  almond extract , 2 3/4 c .  sifted all-purpose flour , 1 egg , 1 Tbsp .  water , chopped nuts , candied cherries and colored sugar . Here's the instruction : Work butter in bowl until creamy; gradually add sugar and beat until fluffy .  Add the whole egg , egg yolk , vanilla and almond extract; beat thoroughly .  Add flour and mix well .  Chill at least 2 hours or longer .  Heat oven to 350° .  Divide dough into 4 equal portions and roll out 1 portion at a time , leaving remainder in refrigerator .  Place dough on floured board; cover with a sheet of floured waxed paper to prevent sticking and roll out 1/8-inch thick .  Carefully remove waxed paper and cut dough into desired shapes with a floured cookie cutter .  Place cookies 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets .  Continue rolling and cutting until all the dough is used .  Beat together the egg and water and brush over tops of unbaked cookies before garnishing with nuts , cherries and colored sugar .  Bake 10 to 12 minutes .  Cool on wire racks .  Makes about 3 1/2 dozen cookies .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs cinnamon peanut butter soda raisins flour margarine milk oatmeal salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make After School Cookies with 1 1/2 c .  raisins , 1 1/2 c .  margarine , 2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  peanut butter , 3 beaten eggs , 3 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 3/4 tsp .  soda , 2 tsp .  cinnamon , 5 Tbsp .  milk , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 1 1/4 c .  oatmeal . question: I have sugar vanilla krispies baking powder semi-sweet chocolate bits eggs light brown sugar baking soda pecans flour butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

Crisco (butter flavor is good) , 1 c .  sugar , 1 c .  light brown sugar , firmly packed , 2 eggs , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 2 c .  quick-cooking oatmeal or Rice Krispies , 1 pkg . question: I have egg yolks sour cream sugar baking apples cinnamon yellow cake mix butter flaked coconut . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Apple Kuchen with 1/2 c .  butter , softened , 1 pkg .  yellow cake mix , 1/2 c .  flaked coconut , 6 tart baking apples , pared and sliced , 1/2 c .  sugar , 2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 c .  dairy sour cream , 2 egg yolks or 1 whole egg . question: I have vanilla milk shortening margarine white sugar salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Out Of This World Frosting with 3/4 c .  milk , 1 c .  white sugar , 1 stick margarine , 1/2 c .  shortening , pinch of salt , 2 tsp .  vanilla . question: I have red chilies tomatoes lemon juice lemons jack cheese jicama longhorn cheese avocados red onion . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oil sugar soy sauce onion stew meat beef broth water garlic powder cornstarch cauliflower green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Oriental Beef Stew with 2 Tbsp .  oil , 1 1/2 to 2 lb .  stew meat , 3 c .  beef broth , 1 bag frozen cauliflower , 1 green pepper , in chunks , 1/4 c .  soy sauce , 1/8 tsp .  garlic powder , 2 to 3 Tbsp .  cornstarch , 1/2 tsp .  sugar , 1/4 c .  water , 1 c .  chopped onion . question: I have egg sugar brown sugar soda fruit cocktail flour walnuts salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fruit Cocktail Cake with 1 1/2 c .  flour , 1 c .  sugar , 1 tsp .  soda , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 egg , 1 (No .  303) can fruit cocktail , 1/2 c .  brown sugar , 1/2 c . question: I have q lemon juice cayenne pepper liquid smoke horseradish onion pecans cream cheese parsley worcestershire sauce salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have stewing beef condensed cream mushrooms onion soup . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have coffee creamer nestles sugar milk . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have potatoes egg onion cracker crumbs tomato sauce ground beef green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sour cream chicken breasts mushroom soup paprika salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have beef stock tomatoes macaroni pepper onion mixed vegetables salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Vegetable Stock Soup with 3 c .  beef stock or ham stock , 1 c .  macaroni , 2 tsp .  salt , 1 pkg .  mixed vegetables , 1 large can tomatoes , 1 small onion , 1 tsp .  pepper . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients in a large pot .  Chop onion real fine .  Add more or less salt and pepper .  Cook for 1 hour or until done .

question: I have pudding angel food cake whipping cream pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Whipped Cream Cake with 1 (box or bought) angel food cake , 3 or 4 half pt .  whipping cream , 1 small pkg .  Jell-O instant pudding (French vanilla) , 1 can crushed pineapple , drained . Here's the instruction : Make the cake according to box .  Cool .  With a bread knife or electric knife , slice into 3 or 4 layers .  Whip cream until peaks form .  Fold in dry pudding .  Then fold in drained pineapple .  Spread between layers , top and sides .  Refrigerate .  Can decorate top with mandarin orange slices .

question: I have oleo egg sugar lemon jello pepper carnation milk vanilla onion cream cheese meal graham crackers lemon boiling water . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Potato Cakes with few dashes of pepper , 1 medium onion , meal and flour (enough to make out in patties) , 1 egg (if desired) , 1 1/2 sticks oleo (room temperature) , 3 pkg .  graham crackers , 1 pkg .  lemon jello , 1 c .  boiling water , 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , 1 c .  granulated sugar , 1 can Carnation milk , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 1/2 tsp .  lemon . Here's the instruction : Roll crackers and mix with butter .  Use one-half for bottom crust and press into a 6 x 12 x 2-inch pan .

question: I have powdered sugar nondairy creamer milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Instant Hot Chocolate Mix with 8 qt .  size nonfat dry milk , 6 oz .  nondairy creamer (dry) , 2 lb .  can Nestle Quik , 1/2 c .  powdered sugar . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients thoroughly and store in airtight container .  Dissolve 1/3 cup mix in 1 cup hot water .  Contains 120 calories/cup - no fat .

question: I have sugar vanilla water orange juice milk cubes . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Orange Julius with 1/2 can frozen orange juice concentrate , 1/3 c .  water , 1/2 c .  skim milk , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 1/2 Tbsp .  vanilla , 6 ice cubes . Here's the instruction : Blend all ingredients in blender , adding more ice if needed for consistency .

question: I have velveeta cheese bread pepper eggs milk mustard salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Egg Bake with 1 can Spam , cubed , 3/4 lb .  Velveeta cheese , 8 slices bread , cubed , 8 eggs , 4 c .  scalded milk , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  pepper , 1 tsp .  mustard . Here's the instruction : Place cubed bread in a 9 x 13-inch greased pan .  Sprinkle over the cubed Spam (may use ham or browned sausage links) .  Beat eggs; add spices and milk .  Mix and pour over bread .  Sprinkle on grated cheese .  Refrigerate overnight .  Bake 1 hour at 325° .

question: I have green chiles bread parmesan cheese mayonnaise . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Parmesan Bread with 1 loaf French bread , 1 c .  Parmesan cheese , 1 (4 oz . ) can chopped green chiles , 3/4 c .  mayonnaise . Here's the instruction : Split bread horizontally .  Mix all ingredients together and spread on both sides of bread .  Place under broiler until lightly brown and bubbly , approximately 10 minutes .

question: I have green chilies cream of chicken soup sour cream green onions cream of mushroom soup cheddar cheese chicken flour tortilla salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sour Cream Enchiladas with 1 can cream of mushroom soup , Salt , pepper and garlic to taste , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 2 c .  chopped , cooked chicken , 2 c .  grated cheddar cheese , 1 c .  chopped green onions , 1 can chopped green chilies , 1 c .  sour cream , Flour tortilla . Here's the instruction : Combine soups , chicken , chilies , sour cream , salt , pepper , and garlic .  Simmer for a few minutes .  Place a small amount on a limp flour tortilla .  Sprinkle with a few green onions and cheese .  Roll tortilla and place in baking dish .  Repeat with desired number of tortillas .  Pour remaining sauce over tortillas .  Sprinkle remaining cheese and onions on top .  Bake at 350° until bubbly (about 30 minutes) .

question: I have sugar brown sugar margarine milk baking mix peaches ground cinnamon . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Easy Peach Cobbler with 1/4 c .  margarine , 4 c .  peeled and sliced peaches , or half peaches and half nectarines , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1 Tbsp .  plus 2/3 c .  variety baking mix , 1/2 tsp .  ground cinnamon , 2 Tbsp .  firmly packed brown sugar , 2 Tbsp .  milk . Here's the instruction : In a quart shallow casserole , combine peaches , sugar , 1 tablespoon baking mix and cinnamon .  In medium bowl, mix remaining 2/3 cup baking mix with brown sugar .  Cut in margarine until mixture is size of small peas .  Stir in milk until moistened; drop by spoonful onto peaches .  Bake at 400° for 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted into crust comes out clean .  Let stand 5 minutes .  Makes about 6 servings .

question: I have sugar sandies vanilla eggs breyers golden vanilla ice cream chocolate walnuts butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Ice Cream Pie with 16 Pecan Sandies , 1/2 c .  walnuts , 2/3 c .  butter , 3 sq .  chocolate , 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 3 eggs , separated into yolks and whites , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1/2 gal .  Breyers golden vanilla ice cream , 2 large Heath bars . Here's the instruction : Crush Pecan Sandies and walnuts .  Melt butter and chocolate; add sugar .  Beat until smooth; add 3 egg yolks and vanilla .  Fold in 3 egg whites (beaten stiff) .  Place half crumb mixture into a 9 x 15-inch pan .  Spread chocolate mixture over this .  Chill 2 hours .  Spread ice cream over top and sprinkle remaining crumbs on top of this .  Crush Heath bars .  Spread on top .  Freeze overnight .

question: I have ground red pepper egg pork loin italian style seasoned bread crumbs parmesan cheese flour garlic powder ground pecans milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Spicy Pecan Parmesan Pork Or Chicken with 4 boneless pork loin slices or 4 boneless skinless chicken breast fillets , 1 egg , beaten , 1/3 c .  milk , 1/4 to 1/2 tsp .  ground red pepper , 1/4 tsp .  garlic powder , 1/3 to 1/2 c .  Italian style seasoned bread crumbs , 1/3 to 1/2 c .  flour , 1/3 c .  ground pecans , 1/3 c .  Parmesan cheese . Here's the instruction : Between 2 sheets of plastic/wax wrap , pound meat to 1/4-inch thickness .  Combine egg , milk , pepper and garlic in bowl .  In another bowl , combine bread crumbs , pecans and Parmesan .  Coat meat in flour .  Dip slices into egg mixture , then coat with crumb mixture .  Place on greased baking sheet .  Bake approximately 30 minutes at 375° or until done .

question: I have golden raisins oil sour cream egg baking powder sugar nutmeg baking soda cinnamon powdered sugar flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Raisin Doughnut Puffs with 1 egg , 1/3 c .  sour cream , flour , 1 tsp .  baking powder , dash of salt , oil (for deep frying) , 1 Tbsp .  cinnamon (optional) , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1 1/2 c .  all-purpose flour , 1/2 tsp .  baking soda , dash of nutmeg , 1/2 c .  golden raisins , 1/2 c .  sugar , powdered sugar . Here's the instruction : In mixing bowl , beat egg .  Gradually add sugar and beat until very light .  Stir in sour cream .  Combine flour , baking soda , baking powder , nutmeg and salt .  Stir in the raisins .  Add to egg mixture , stirring until smooth .  Chill dough 1 hour or more .  Roll out on lightly floured board to 1/2-inch thickness .  Cut with a round cutter 1 to 1 1/2-inches in diameter .  Make an "x" slash on top of each with a sharp knife .  Fry in hot oil at 375° for 2 to 3 minutes or until golden and cooked through the middle .  Mix sugar and cinnamon .  Dust the hot cooked puffs with mixture or dust with plain powdered sugar .

question: I have bisquick pork sausage cheddar cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Porky Balls with 1 lb .  bulk pork sausage , 1 lb .  grated Cheddar cheese , 3 1/2 c .  Bisquick . Here's the instruction : Mix by hand .  Shape into balls (walnut-size) .  Bake in 425° oven until brown , approximately 15 to 20 minutes .

question: I have powdered sugar cream cheese maple flavoring butter peanuts . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Maple Peanut Clusters with 8 oz .  cream cheese , 8 oz .  butter , 3 lb .  powdered sugar , 1 tsp .  maple flavoring , peanuts (omitted) . Here's the instruction : Mix cream cheese , butter , powdered sugar and maple flavoring together real well .  Put in refrigerator and chill .  Form in balls and dip in chocolate .  Mix peanuts and chocolate and put a cluster on top of each one .

question: I have tomatoes pepperoni slices mozzarella cheese parmesan cheese onion mushrooms salsa shell macaroni pork sausage pepperoncini salad peppers ground beef spaghetti sauce green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make My Friend Joyce'S "Bathtub Casserole" with 1 lb .  ground beef , 1 lb .  mild pork sausage , 1 medium onion , chopped , 1 green pepper , chopped , 1 (3 1/2 oz . ) pkg .  pepperoni slices , chopped , 1 (28 oz . ) can crushed tomatoes , 1 (26 1/2 oz . ) can spaghetti sauce , 1 (16 oz . ) jar mild salsa , 1 (4 1/2 oz . ) can sliced mushrooms , drained , 1 (10 oz . ) jar pepperoncini salad peppers , drained and sliced , 1 (16 oz . ) pkg .  shell macaroni , cooked , 1 c .  Parmesan cheese , grated , 4 c .  Mozzarella cheese , shredded (1 lb . ) . Here's the instruction : Cook ground beef and next 3 ingredients in a large skillet over medium heat , stirring , until meat browns and crumbles .  Drain well; set aside .  Combine chopped pepperoni and next 5 ingredients in a large bowl; stir in meat mixture and cooked pasta shells .  Spoon half of mixture into 2 lightly greased 11 x 7 x 1 1/2-inch baking dishes .  Sprinkle with half of Parmesan and Mozzarella cheeses .  Top with remaining pasta mixture .  Bake at 350° for 30 minutes or until heated; top with remaining cheeses .  Bake 5 additional minutes .

question: I have buttermilk sugar eggs flour butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Buttermilk Pie with 1 pt .  buttermilk , 1/2 c .  butter , 3 eggs , separated , 4 Tbsp .  flour , 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 2 unbaked pie shells . Here's the instruction : Cream butter , sugar and egg yolks; add flour .  Beat well .  Add buttermilk and stir well .  Add well beaten egg whites .  Stir enough to mix .  Bake as any custard pie in unbaked shell .  Tastes very much like Coconut Custard Pie .

question: I have pepper lemon juice onions cream haddock fillets mustard worcestershire sauce salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Haddock In Cream with 1 1/2 lb .  haddock fillets , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1 tsp .  prepared mustard , 1/2 tsp .  Worcestershire sauce , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 3 small onions , 1 c .  cream . Here's the instruction : Mix lemon , pepper , salt , mustard and Worcestershire sauce .  Mix with cream and pour over fish .  Add onions and bake at 400° for 30 minutes .

question: I have tomatoes macaroni white onion chili powder celery tomato sauce ground beef green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Angie Weis' Prize Winning Chili with 1 lb .  ground beef , 1 large white onion , 2 to 3 ribs celery , 3 c .  cooked macaroni , 1 small green pepper , salt and pepper , 3 cans tomatoes (Mexican style) , 1 can tomato sauce , chili powder (Texas style) . Here's the instruction : Brown ground beef; drain well .  Use 2 to 3 tablespoons beef fat to saute chopped onion , celery and green pepper .  Add tomatoes; mash with potato masher .  Add hamburger , macaroni and as much tomato sauce as needed .  Also , add desired amount of salt , pepper and chili powder (and a few dashes of Tabasco sauce , if desired) .  Simmer at least 30 minutes .  (You may need to add additional tomato sauce and/or water . ) No beans! Enjoy!

question: I have condensed milk vanilla powdered sugar paraffin wax pecans margarine coconut chocolate chips . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Martha Washington Balls with 2 (1 lb . ) boxes powdered sugar , 1 can condensed milk , 1 stick margarine , softened , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 2 c .  chopped pecans , 12 oz .  chocolate chips , 1/4 lb .  paraffin wax , 1 small bag coconut . Here's the instruction : Mix margarine , sugar , milk , vanilla , pecans and coconut .  Roll into marble-size balls .  Put in freezer while chocolate is melting .

question: I have wieners water mixed vegetables ground beef onion gravy mix tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hobo Stew(Easy)   with 1 lb .  ground beef , 2 wieners , diced , 1 envelope onion gravy mix , 1 (8 oz . ) can tomato sauce , 1 (1 lb . ) can mixed vegetables , 1 c .  water . Here's the instruction : Brown beef; drain off fat .  Add vegetables , tomato sauce , water , gravy mix and wieners .  Cook on medium-high until hot and bubbly .  I double this recipe for my family .

question: I have pepper eggs flour fine cracker crumbs cheese milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Asparagus Casserole with 1 (1 lb .  4 oz . ) can asparagus spears , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 1/2 c .  fine cracker crumbs , 1/2 c .  (1/8 lb . ) cheese , grated , 1 Tbsp .  flour , 2 Tbsp .  butter , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/2 c .  evaporated milk , 2 hard-boiled eggs , chopped . Here's the instruction : Drain asparagus , reserving liquid .  Melt butter; blend in flour , salt and pepper .  Add evaporated milk to asparagus liquid (enough to make 1 1/2 cups . ) Stir into flour mixture; blend until smooth .  Cook 2 minutes .  Spread asparagus in bottom of greased shallow 1 1/2-quart casserole .  Reserve a few asparagus spears for top .  Sprinkle half cracker crumbs over asparagus .  Add eggs and half of sauce .  Sprinkle with remaining crumbs .  Arrange rest of asparagus spears over top .  Pour remaining sauce over top .  Sprinkle with grated cheese .  Bake in 350° oven about 30 minutes or until casserole is bubbly .

question: I have oil egg baking powder sugar shortening nutmeg cloves cinnamon flour pumpkin milk cream of tartar salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pumpkin Muffins with 1 egg , 3/4 c .  milk , 1 Tbsp .  oil , 1/2 c .  pumpkin (may use home prepared) , 2 c .  flour , 1/4 tsp .  nutmeg , 4 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt (scant) , 1/4 tsp .  cloves , 1/2 tsp .  cream of tartar , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 c .  shortening . Here's the instruction : Mix together egg , milk , oil and pumpkin .  Mix dry ingredients .  Cut shortening into dry ingredients .  Stir in wet ingredients .  Bake at 400° for 20 minutes .  Makes 12 to 16 .

question: I have bread oregano pepper eggs parmesan cheese water garlic powder parsley ground beef salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Barbara'S Meatballs with 4 slices bread , 1/2 c .  water , 2 eggs , 1 lb .  ground beef , 1/4 c .  Parmesan cheese , 2 Tbsp .  parsley , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  oregano , 1/4 tsp .  garlic powder , 1/4 tsp .  pepper . Here's the instruction : Soak bread in water for 2 to 3 minutes .  Add eggs and mix well .  Add remaining ingredients .  With wet hands , form meat mixture into small balls .  Bake in pan at 350° for 20 minutes .  Add to spaghetti sauce .

question: I have bean dip sour cream sack favorite tortilla tomatoes green onions guacamole dip black olives cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Layered Taco Dip with 1 can bean dip , 1 carton guacamole dip , 1 carton sour cream , mixed with 1/2 pkg .  taco seasoning , 1 small can diced black olives , 1 small bunch green onions , chopped , 3 tomatoes , chopped , lettuce , shredded , shredded Cheddar and Monterey Jack cheese , large sack favorite tortilla chips . Here's the instruction : Layer in 9 x 13 x 2 pan or dish in order listed .  Serve with chips .

question: I have sugar vanilla bananas cornstarch whipped cream milk butter egg yolks salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Vanilla Cream Pie with 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 3 Tbsp .  cornstarch , 2 3/4 c .  milk , 2 to 3 egg yolks , beaten slightly , 1 Tbsp .  butter , 1 1/2 tsp .  vanilla , sliced bananas , whipped cream . question: I have oil sugar eggs cinnamon soda flour apples salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Apple Cake with 3 eggs , 1 3/4 c .  sugar , 2 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 2 c .  sliced apples , 1/4 c .  oil . question: I have lentils onion water salt pork carrot garlic beef bouillon bay leaf salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Brown Lentil Soup with 1 lb .  lentils , 1 lb .  salt pork or smoked ham , 1 small onion , diced , 1 carrot , diced , 1 bay leaf , salt and pepper , crushed garlic cloves to taste , water , 4 cubes beef bouillon . Here's the instruction : Soak lentils overnight .  Drain .  Place lentils in a deep pot .  Add salt pork , onion , carrot , bay leaf , salt and pepper .  Add enough water to cover .  Add bouillon cubes .  Bring to a boil .  Reduce heat and simmer 1 hour .

question: I have tomato paste white balsamic vinegar olive oil orzo pasta . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mediterranean Orzo with 1 1/2 c .  orzo pasta , 1 Tbsp .  olive oil , 3 Tbsp .  sun-dried tomato paste , 1 Tbsp .  white balsamic vinegar . Here's the instruction : Cook orzo according to directions .  Drain .  Add remaining ingredients .

question: I have sugar lemon juice heavy cream brown sugar egg whites flour nuts margarine strawberries . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Frosty Strawberry Squares(Mrs. Martin)   with 1 c .  sifted flour , 1/4 c .  brown sugar , 1/2 c .  chopped nuts , 1 stick margarine , melted , 2 egg whites , 1 c .  sugar , 2 c .  strawberries or use 1 (10 oz . ) pkg .  frozen strawberries , partially thawed (reduce sugar to 1/2 c . ) , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1/2 pt .  heavy cream , whipped . Here's the instruction : Stir together first 4 ingredients and spread evenly in shallow baking dish .  Bake at 350° for 15 to 20 minutes , stirring occasionally .  Let cool .  Sprinkle 2/3 of the crumbs in a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan .  In a large mixing bowl , beat the egg whites , sugar , strawberries and lemon juice at high speed until very stiff peaks form .  Fold in the heavy cream (whipped) .  Pour over crumbs in pan .  Sprinkle remaining 1/3 crumbs over top .  Freeze overnight .  Cut into squares .  Garnish with dash of whipped cream and a whole strawberry .

question: I have pepper mozzarella eggs parmesan cheese water cottage cheese ground beef spaghetti sauce salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Virgina'S Easy Bake Lasagna with 1 lb .  ground beef , 1 1/2 c .  water , 3 c .  Mozzarella , 2 eggs , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 32 oz .  spaghetti sauce , 2 c .  cottage cheese , 1/2 c .  grated Parmesan cheese , 1 tsp .  salt . Here's the instruction : Brown meat and drain .  Add sauce and water and simmer 10 minutes .  Combine rest of ingredients in separate bowl and mix well .  In large pan , layer as follows: 1 cup meat sauce on bottom , layer of lasagna pasta , 1 1/2 cups of meat sauce , 1/2 cup cheese mix , lasagna pasta , 1 1/2 cups meat sauce , 1/2 cheese , lasagna pasta and rest of meat sauce .  Bake at 350° for 55 to 60 minutes , covered , then 10 minutes uncovered .

question: I have graham cracker crust lime juice concentrate milk cream cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Key Lime Pie with 1 (8 oz . ) cream cheese , 1/2 c .  lime juice concentrate , 1 (8 oz . ) Cool Whip , 1 can Eagle Brand milk , 1 graham cracker crust . Here's the instruction : Combine first 4 ingredients .  Pour into pie crust and chill .

question: I have white syrup sugar vanilla nuts cocoa milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Never Fail Fudge with 4 c .  sugar , 5 Tbsp .  cocoa , 1 c .  evaporated milk , 2/3 c .  white syrup , 1/8 tsp .  salt , 1/4 lb .  butter or oleo , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 2 c .  chopped nuts . Here's the instruction : Combine sugar , cocoa , syrup and milk .  Stir well .  Add salt and butter .  Place on medium heat and bring to a rapid boil , as soon as mixture begins to boil , time for 6 minutes .

question: I have kidney beans vinegar sugar salad oil onion celery green beans beans . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Four Bean Salad with 1 can lima beans , 1 can green beans , 1 can waxed beans , 1 can dark kidney beans , 1 med .  onion , chopped , 1 stalk celery , chopped , 1 c .  sugar , 3/4 c .  vinegar , 1/2 c .  salad oil . Here's the instruction : Drain and combine beans , onion and celery .  Combine salad oil , vinegar and sugar and mix well .  Pour over bean mixture and chill .

question: I have sugar eggs lard water flour yeast boiling water salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Break-Away Bread with 1 c .  lukewarm water , 1 c .  boiling water , 1 tsp .  salt , 2 beaten eggs , 2 pkg .  yeast , 1 c .  lard , 3/4 c .  sugar , 6 c .  plain flour . Here's the instruction : Dissolve yeast in lukewarm water .  Put lard in large mixing bowl and pour boiling water over , stir until dissolved .  Add salt , sugar , eggs , flour and yeast; mix well . question: I have oleo egg vanilla powdered sugar pecans pineapple salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Millionaire Pie with 2 c .  powdered sugar , 1 egg , 1/4 tsp .  vanilla , 1 medium Cool Whip , 1/2 c .  chopped pecans , 1 stick oleo , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1 can drained pineapple , 2 baked pie shells . question: I have sugar honey eggs brown sugar pecans flour butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Honey Nut Bars with 1 1/4 c .  flour , 1/3 c .  sugar , 1/4 lb .  butter , 1 c .  chopped pecans , 2 eggs , 1 c .  brown sugar , 1/4 lb .  butter , melted , 2 Tbsp .  honey . question: I have mozzarella cheese campbell's cream onions milk sausage pasta frozen peas . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Baked Penne And Smoked Sausage with 1 (16 oz . ) pkg .  Hillshire Farm smoked sausage , 1 (10 3/4 oz . ) can Campbell's cream of celery soup , 1 1/2 c .  milk , 4 c .  cooked penne pasta (2 1/2 c .  uncooked) , 1 c .  shredded Mozzarella cheese , 1 1/2 c .  French's Cheddar French fried onions , 1 c .  frozen peas . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 375° .  Cut sausage into 1/4-inch slices and brown in skillet; drain . Bake 3 minutes , until golden .

question: I have sugar baking powder shortening white corn meal eggs cracklins flour milk yellow corn meal salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cornbread with 1 c .  yellow corn meal , 1 c .  flour , 1/4 c .  sugar , 1 tsp .  salt , 2 tsp .  shortening , 1 c .  white corn meal , 2 eggs , 1 c .  milk , 8 tsp .  baking powder , 1 c .  crushed cracklins . Here's the instruction : In a large bowl mix all ingredients together , except cracklins; beat for 1 minute .  Add cracklins .  Grease a 12-inch iron skillet or a 13-inch Pyrex dish .  Pour mixture into pan .  Bake at 350° for 30 minutes or until golden brown .

question: I have tomatoes tomato paste onions tomato sauce garlic hamburger chili mix salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chilli with 3 lbs hamburger , 2 large onions , chopped , 1 large can tomatoes , 2 pkg .  chili mix , salt and pepper , 1 small can tomato paste , 1 small can tomato sauce , garlic salt . Here's the instruction : Brown hamburger and onions , drain fat off .  Add other ingredients and cook until done .  Serve warm .

question: I have walnuts sugar chocolate chips egg whites . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cathie Mcmahon'S Forgotten Cookies with 2 egg whites (room temperature) , 2/3 c .  sugar , 6 oz .  bag chocolate chips , 1 c .  chopped walnuts . Here's the instruction : Beat egg whites until fluffy .  Gradually add sugar .  Beat until very stiff .  Fold in chocolate chips and chopped nuts .  Grease cookie sheet .  Drop by teaspoonfuls onto the sheet .  Preheat oven to 350° (must be a preheated oven!) .  Place cookies in oven and turn the oven off! Leave the cookies in the oven for 12 hours .  Don't open the oven door .  Get to make at night and go to sleep .

question: I have egg lard flour milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Never Fail Pie Crust with 5 c .  flour , 2 c .  lard , 2 tsp .  salt , 1 egg , milk . Here's the instruction : Mix flour , lard and salt up good .  Beat egg in cup; add enough milk to finish filling cup .  Pour egg and milk mixture over flour and lard mixture .  Work all together good .  You can roll these out and put in pans and freeze .  Freezes very good .  Makes about 7 crusts according to pan size .

question: I have lemon juice red grapes green onions chunk breast of chicken celery mayonnaise lemon yogurt pasta . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lemon Chicken Salad with 2 c .  uncooked corkscrew pasta , 1 1/2 c .  lemon yogurt , 1/3 c .  mayonnaise , 2 tsp .  lemon juice , 3 (5 oz . ) cans chunk breast of chicken , drained and flaked , 1 c .  seedless red grapes , 1/2 c .  sliced green onions , 1/2 c .  sliced celery . Here's the instruction : Cook pasta; rinse in cold water and drain .  In a large bowl , combine yogurt , mayonnaise and lemon juice .  Stir in chicken , pasta , grapes , onions and celery .

question: I have sugar crescent dinner rolls water cherry pie filling butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cherry Cobbler with 1 pkg .  crescent dinner rolls , 1 can cherry pie filling , 1/2 can water , butter or margarine , sugar to taste . Here's the instruction : Cook rolls according to directions .  Heat pie filling with water , sugar and butter and spread over a layer of rolls which have been placed in a baking dish .

question: I have potatoes baking powder eggs flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Raw Potato Pancakes with 3 medium raw potatoes , grated , 2 eggs , separated , 1 1/2 Tbsp .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1 tsp .  salt . Here's the instruction : Beat egg yolks; stir in grated potatoes and a mixture of flour , baking powder and salt .  Mix well .  Beat egg whites until rounded peaks form .  Fold into potato mixture . question: I have flour egg sugar pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pineapple Pie - Nana'S Secret Recipe with 1 (16 oz . ) can crushed pineapple , 1 egg , 1 c .  sugar , 2 Tbsp .  flour , 2 (8-inch) pie crusts . Here's the instruction : Combine pineapple and juice , egg , sugar and flour in a saucepan; stir over medium heat until thickened .  Pour into pie crust and cover with second crust .
