question: I have pepper instant chicken fresh parsley green onions long grain rice water fresh garlic carrots almonds butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Springtime Garden Pilaf with 2 1/4 c .  water , 1/4 c .  butter or margarine , 2 Tbsp .  instant chicken bouillon , 1/4 tsp .  salt , pinch of pepper , 1/4 tsp .  minced fresh garlic , 1 1/4 c .  uncooked long grain rice , 1/2 c .  finely chopped carrots , 1/2 c .  sliced almonds , toasted , 1/4 c .  chopped fresh parsley , 2 Tbsp .  sliced green onions . Here's the instruction : In 2-quart saucepan bring water , butter , chicken bouillon , salt , pepper and garlic to a full boil (5 to 7 minutes) .  Add rice and carrots; return to a full boil .  Reduce heat to low; simmer until rice is tender , 25 to 30 minutes .  Stir in remaining ingredients .  Makes eight 2/3 cup servings .

question: I have sour cream sugar marshmallows fruit cocktail cherries mandarin oranges pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Five Cup Salad with 1 small can mandarin oranges , 1 jar cherries , 1 small can pineapple chunks , 1 large (8 oz . ) can fruit cocktail , 1 pt .  sour cream , 1 small bag miniature marshmallows , 1/4 c .  sugar . Here's the instruction : Drain all fruit .  Mix with sour cream , marshmallows and sugar .  Refrigerate .

question: I have cookie dough cream cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fruit Pizza with 1 pkg .  cookie dough (sugar cookie) , 18 oz .  pkg .  cream cheese , 1/2 container Cool Whip . Here's the instruction : Spread cookie dough on a lightly greased pizza pan .  Bake and cool .  Combine cream cheese and Cool Whip .  Spread mixture on cool cookie crust .  Then top with fruit .

question: I have soba noodles snow peas scallions cold turkey sesame oil parsley . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Turkey And Soba Noodle Salad with 1 (12 oz . ) pkg .  soba noodles , 3 Tbsp .  sesame oil , 2 c .  snow peas , trimmed , 2 c .  cooked cold turkey , cut into strips , 3 scallions , finely chopped , 1/2 c .  chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley . Here's the instruction : Cook the soba noodles according to package instructions .  Drain .  Rinse with cold water .  Drain again .  Transfer to a large bowl and toss with sesame oil .  Place the snow peas in a colander and pour boiling water over them .  Rinse with cold water and drain .  Add the snow peas , turkey , scallions and parsley to the noodles and toss .  Gradually add the Peanut Sauce and gently toss together until well combined .  Serve the noodle salad chilled or at room temperature .  Serves 6 .

question: I have equal amount blackberries . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Old Fashioned Blackberry Jam with 1 gal .  blackberries , equal amount of sugar . Here's the instruction : Measure blackberries that have been cleaned and washed .  Crush well and add an equal amount of sugar in a large kettle .  Mix well .  Bring to a quick boil and cook rapidly , stirring often .  Cook until large bubbles appear .  Ladle into jars and seal .

question: I have sugar baking powder salad oil nutmeg cinnamon water egg whites flour carrots black walnuts egg yolks salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Carrot Cake with 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 1 c .  salad oil , 3 egg yolks , 2 1/2 Tbsp .  hot water , 1 3/4 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  nutmeg , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1 c .  grated carrots (fine) , 1 c .  black walnuts , chopped , 3 egg whites . Here's the instruction : Mix together and beat well sugar , salad oil , 3 egg yolks and hot water and then add flour , cinnamon , soda , salt , nutmeg and baking powder .  Add carrots and walnuts .  Fold in beaten egg whites .  Bake in greased and floured tube pan for 45 minutes at 350° .  This needs no icing .

question: I have egg baking powder sugar flour milk crunchy peanut butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Peanut Butter Bread with 2 c .  flour , 1 c .  sugar , 1 tsp .  salt , 2 tsp .  baking powder , 1 c .  crunchy peanut butter , 1 egg , 1 c .  milk . Here's the instruction : Mix flour , sugar , salt and baking powder .  Add peanut butter , working into dry ingredients .  Add 1 egg , beaten with milk .  Mix gently; do not beat .  Bake 1 hour in small loaf pan at 350° .  Use toothpick to check doneness .  Top usually cracks .

question: I have cake flour sugar vanilla eggs lemon country butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Old Fashioned Pound Cake with 2 c .  cake flour , 6 eggs , 1/2 lb .  country butter , 1 2/3 c .  sugar , juice of lemon , 1 tsp .  vanilla (may use 1/2 tsp .  almond) . Here's the instruction : Cream butter and sugar; add eggs , one at a time .  Fold in flour .  Add flavorings and lemon juice .  Bake at 325° for 1 to 1 1/2 hours in greased tube pan .

question: I have cold water lemon juice from sugar water . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fresh Lemonade with 1 c .  sugar , 1 c .  hot water , 1 c .  lemon juice from fresh squeezed lemons , cold water . Here's the instruction : To make 2 quarts , dissolve sugar in hot water .  Add lemon juice and remaining water .  Add lemon peel if desired .  Serve over ice .

question: I have egg sugar vanilla nutmeg milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Eggnog with 1 egg , beaten well , 1 c .  milk , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 1/4 tsp .  vanilla , nutmeg (optional) . Here's the instruction : Add egg to milk; beat well . 	Add sugar and vanilla .  Pour into tall glass and sprinkle nutmeg on top .

question: I have oleo sugar ginger eggs cinnamon cloves pumpkin milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pumpkin Dessert with 1 large 2 1/2 lb .  can pumpkin or 3 c .  fresh , 4 eggs , 1 c .  evaporated milk , 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 tsp .  ginger , 1/2 tsp .  cloves , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 large yellow or white cake mix , 1 1/2 sticks oleo . Here's the instruction : Mix first 8 ingredients .  Spread in greased 9 x 13-inch pan .  Sprinkle one large white or yellow cake mix "dry" evenly over pumpkin .  Drizzle melted oleo over dry cake .  Bake at 425° for 15 minutes .  Reduce heat to 350° and bake for 45 minutes .  Bake until knife comes out clean .  Top with Cool Whip .

question: I have onion catsup chicken gumbo soup ground beef mustard . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Souper Burgers with 1/2 c .  onion , 1 to 1 1/2 lb .  ground beef , 1 can chicken gumbo soup , 1/4 c .  catsup , 1 Tbsp .  mustard . Here's the instruction : Brown onion and ground beef .  Drain off fat .  Add soup , catsup and mustard .  Heat until thoroughly warm .  Season to taste .  Serve on buns or over rice .

question: I have packets splenda sugar vanilla cream cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Dreamsicle Delight(Sugar-Free)   with 1 large pkg .  sugar-free orange Jell-O , prepared as directed and chilled for about 30 minutes , 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , softened (room temperature) , 3 packets Splenda , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : While Jell-O is chilling , whip cream cheese with mixer until smooth and creamy .  Add Splenda and vanilla .  Add chilled Jell-O and whip into cream cheese until well blended .  Pour into Jell-O mold or bowl .  Cover and refrigerate until set , about 2 to 3 hours .  Serve with whipped cream .

question: I have tomato chicken breasts onion green pepper mushrooms clove garlic olive oil zucchini . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Garden Stir-Fry with 2 boneless and skinned chicken breasts , 2 Tbsp .  olive oil , divided , 1 clove garlic , minced , 1 medium onion , chopped , 1 medium zucchini , sliced , 1 green pepper , cut into strips , 1 c .  sliced mushrooms , 1 medium tomato , cut into wedges , 2 c .  spaghetti , cooked . Here's the instruction : Cut chicken breasts diagonally into thin strips .  Heat one tablespoon oil in large skillet or wok .  Stir-fry chicken strips and garlic until chicken loses its pink color .  Remove from pan and set aside .  Heat the remaining tablespoon of oil .  Stir-fry the onion , zucchini and green pepper for 3 minutes .  Add mushrooms and tomatoes .  Continue to stir-fry an additional 3 minutes .  Return chicken to skillet .  Add spaghetti .  Stir-fry until heated through .  Serves 3 to 4 .

question: I have lemon juice salmon eggs onion cream of celery soup bread crumbs . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Salmon Loaf with 1 lb .  salmon , 1 can cream of celery soup , 1 c .  bread crumbs , 2 eggs , beaten , 1/4 c .  onion , chopped , 1 Tbsp .  lemon juice . Here's the instruction : Drain salmon; add it to the other liquids .  Mix everything together .  Bake in loaf pan for 1 hour at 375° .  Let stand 10 minutes before serving .

question: I have sugar nutmeg eggs rum flavoring milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Holiday Eggnog with 6 eggs , 2/3 c .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 pt .  half and half , 1 pt .  milk , nutmeg , 1 to 2 Tbsp .  rum flavoring . Here's the instruction : If using blender , cut recipe in half .

question: I have vanilla brown sugar soda flour nuts oatmeal chocolate chips butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Neiman-Marcus Cookies(Recipe May Be Halved)   with 2 c butter , 24 oz chocolate chips , 4 c flour , 2 c brown sugar , 2 tsp soda , 1~ tsp salt , 18 oz Hershey bar grated , 5 cups blended oatmeal , 2 tsp vanilla , 3 c chopped nuts-your choice . Here's the instruction : Measure oatmeal , and blend in a blender to a fine powder .  Cream the butter and both sugars .  Add eggs and vanilla , mix together with flour , oatmeal , salt , baking powder , and soda .  Add chocolate chips , Hershey bar , and nuts .  Roll into balls and place two inches apart on a cookie sheet .  Bake for 10 minutes in 375 degree oven .  Makes 112 cookies .

question: I have cream of chicken soup chicken soy sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Easy Chicken Dinner with 2 (6 oz . ) cans chicken , drained , 2 cans cream of chicken soup , 2 Tbsp .  soy sauce . Here's the instruction : Combine ingredients in saucepan and heat thoroughly on low heat .  Stir until heated .  Serve over rice .  Serves 4 .

question: I have pecans orange jello cheese mandarin oranges pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Orange Jello Salad with 1 (11 oz . ) can mandarin oranges , drained , 1 lb .  small curd cottage cheese , 1 large tub Cool Whip , 1 (8 oz . ) can crushed pineapple , drained , 1 large box orange jello (dry) , 1 c .  chopped pecans (optional) . Here's the instruction : Mix cottage cheese , Cool Whip and jello well .  Add remaining ingredients and mix well .  Cool at least 2 hours .

question: I have sugar water pecan halves orange juice italian olive oil . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Delicious Pecans with 6 c .  pecan halves , 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  orange juice , 1/2 c .  water , 1/4 c .  Italian olive oil . Here's the instruction : In a 12-inch skillet , combine all ingredients .  Cook over medium heat , stirring often , until liquid disappears and nuts have a glazed appearance .  Pour onto a long pan covered with wax paper .  Separate nuts quickly , using a fork .  Cool completely .  Store in covered container .  Refrigerate or freeze for longer preservation .

question: I have eggs sugar vanilla milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Flan(Spanish Custard)   with 8 eggs , 1 c .  sugar , 1 qt .  milk , 1 Tbsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Beat eggs well; add sugar , milk and vanilla and mix well .  Brown sugar in pan you are going to bake it in .  Pour everything in it and set in a pan of water .  Bake for 1 hour at 375° , then cool it and turn over to serve .

question: I have fat flour thin baking potatoes salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Baked Potatoes In Blankets with 1 lb .  round steak , cut thin , 5 medium baking potatoes (about 2 lb . ) , 1/3 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 Tbsp .  fat . Here's the instruction : Pound the round steak with edge of heavy saucer or meat pounder and cut into pieces the proper size to wrap around the potatoes .  Rub a small amount of salt on the peeled raw potatoes and wrap the pieces of steak around them , fastening them with toothpicks .  Roll in the flour mixed with the salt and brown in hot fat .  Place in a greased covered casserole; cover and bake in a moderately slow oven (325°) for 1 hour and 20 minutes or until potatoes are done .  From time to time during the baking , pour on a small amount of hot water to prevent drying of the steak .  If desired , catsup may be put over the meat a few minutes before serving and if any liquid remains in the bottom of the casserole , it may be served as gravy .

question: I have sugar baking powder pepper coffee eggs molasses cloves cinnamon nutmeg flour anise seed margarine salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Christmas Cookies with 1/2 c .  margarine , 1 c .  sugar , 2 eggs , 1/2 c .  molasses , 1/2 c .  strong coffee , 3 1/2 c .  flour , sifted , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 1/2 tsp .  cloves , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  nutmeg , 2 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 2 Tbsp .  anise seed . Here's the instruction : Mix margarine , sugar , eggs and molasses .  Mix in coffee .  In a separate bowl , mix together flour , pepper , cloves , cinnamon , salt , nutmeg , baking powder and 2 tablespoons anise seed .  Mix dry ingredients into coffee mixture .  It will be sticky so add a little more flour to make dough stiff .  Roll out thin .  Cut with cookie cutters .  Bake at 350° and watch carefully .  Make a thin frosting of powdered sugar , water and a drop of vanilla .  Frost first , then use colored sprinkles .

question: I have potatoes garlic salt sour cream cream cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make K T'S Potato Casserole with 6 to 8 servings prepared instant potatoes or use leftover potatoes , 8 oz .  cream cheese , 1 c .  sour cream , 1 tsp .  garlic salt . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients and put in greased casserole .  Sprinkle with chives and paprika (optional) .  Bake 30 minutes at 350° .

question: I have sour cream cake mix eggs nuts kahlua crisco oil chocolate bits . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Kahlua Cake with 1 box devil's food cake mix , 4 eggs , 3/4 c .  Crisco oil , 1 c .  sour cream , 1 c .  Kahlua , 1 c .  chocolate bits , 1 c .  nuts . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients together .  Bake at 350° for 55 minutes in tube pan .

question: I have brussels yellow onion balsamic vinegar garlic butter olive oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Brussels Sprouts With Balsamic Vinegar with 1 1/2 lb .  fresh Brussels sprouts , 2 Tbsp .  olive oil , 2 cloves garlic , peeled and sliced , 1/4 c .  balsamic vinegar , 1 medium yellow onion , peeled and thinly sliced , 2 Tbsp .  butter , salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste . Here's the instruction : Trim off the stems and remove any limp leaves from Brussels sprouts .  Blanch the sprouts in boiling water to cover for 5 minutes .  Drain and rinse under cold water to stop the cooking .  Heat a large frying pan and add the olive oil , garlic and onion .  Saute a few minutes until the onion just becomes tender .  Add the blanched drained Brussels sprouts .  Saute a few minutes until the Brussels sprouts are cooked to your liking .  Add the vinegar and toss so that all the sprouts are coated with vinegar .  Add the butter and salt and pepper to taste and toss together again .  Serves 6 to 8 .

question: I have pecans sugar orange-flavored gelatin pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pineapple-Buttermilk Salad with 1 (20 oz . ) can crushed pineapple , undrained , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 1 (6 oz . ) or 2 (3 oz . ) pkg .  orange-flavored gelatin (I use sugar-free jello) , 1 (8 oz . ) container Cool Whip , 1 c .  chopped pecans . Here's the instruction : Combine pineapple and sugar in a saucepan; bring to a boil , stirring until dissolved .  Cool .  Add buttermilk and stir until combined .  Fold in whipped topping and pecans .  Spoon into a 12 x 8 x 2-inch Pyrex dish and chill until firm .  Cut salad into squares to serve .  Yields 12 servings .

question: I have white syrup sugar butter water . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Popcorn Balls with 2 c .  sugar , 1 c .  white syrup , 1 c .  water , 3 Tbsp .  butter . Here's the instruction : Boil to a soft crack stage when dropped into cool water .  Pour over 8 to 10 quarts popcorn (salted) .  When cool enough to handle , grease hands and make into balls .

question: I have cold water boiling water salt yellow cornmeal . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Polenta with 3 c .  boiling water , 1 c .  yellow cornmeal , 1 c .  cold water , 1 tsp .  salt . Here's the instruction : Mix cornmeal , cold water and salt together .  Add to the 3 cups boiling water .  Cook until done , about 20 minutes .

question: I have sugar vanilla extract peanut butter kisses biscuit baking mix milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Easy Peanut Butter Cookies with 1 can Eagle Brand condensed milk , 3/4 c .  peanut butter , 2 c .  biscuit baking mix , 1 tsp .  vanilla extract , sugar , Hershey's Kisses . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 375° .  In large bowl , beat milk and butter until smooth .  Add biscuit mix and vanilla; mix well .  Shape into 1-inch balls .  Roll in sugar .  Place 2-inches apart on an ungreased baking sheet .  Do not flatten .  Bake 6 to 8 minutes or until lightly browned (do not overbake) .  Press Hershey's Kisses in center of each ball immediately after baking .  Cool .  Store tightly covered at room temperature .

question: I have tightly packed dandelion blossoms sugar cake yeast raisins orange lemon boiling water . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Dandelion Wine with 2 1/2 qt .  tightly packed dandelion blossoms , picked in full bloom (April) , 4 qt .  boiling water , 3 qt .  sugar , 1 lb .  seedless raisins , 1 orange , 1 lemon , 1/2 cake yeast . Here's the instruction : Wash blossoms well and drain .  In a large container with cover , pour boiling water over dandelion blossoms and let stand overnight .  The next morning , strain out blossoms and discard them .  Return liquid to container and add sugar .

question: I have graham cracker crust vanilla eggs powdered sugar chocolate almonds whipping cream unsalted butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make French Chocolate Pie(Serves 6)   with 1/4 lb .  unsalted butter , 1 c .  powdered sugar , 2 sq .  chocolate , melted , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 3 eggs , graham cracker crust , 1/2 c .  whipping cream , toasted almonds . Here's the instruction : Cream butter and sugar .  Add melted chocolate and vanilla .  Add one egg at a time , beating 3 minutes after each .  Prepare favorite graham cracker crust and bake .  Cool .  Add filling and refrigerate .  When ready to serve , cover pie with whipped cream and toasted almonds .

question: I have buttermilk pepper cucumbers onion salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cucumber Soup with 2 medium cucumbers , 1/4 c .  buttermilk , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/8 tsp .  pepper , 1 Tbsp .  finely minced onion , 2 c .  buttermilk . Here's the instruction : Pare 1 cucumber .  Cut both into slices (reserve 6 slices for garnish , refrigerate wrapped) .  Pour 1/4 cup buttermilk and 1/2 cucumber slices into blender , beat until smooth , add remaining slices , salt , pepper and onion .  Beat until smooth .  Stir in remaining buttermilk .  Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours or very cold .  Serves 6 to 8 .  Add garnishes before serving .  (Cut up chives may also serves as garnishes . )

question: I have chicken salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Poached Chicken with 3 lb .  chicken (whole) , salt . Here's the instruction : Wash chicken with cold water .  Place in a large saucepan .  Add water halfway up the chicken with 1/2 teaspoon salt for every quart of water .  Cover; simmer for 1 hour , turning once or twice .  Cool chicken in the broth and refrigerate until needed .

question: I have o rhubarb sugar . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Rhubarb Jam with 10 c .  sliced rhubarb , 8 c .  sugar , 3 boxes Jell-O (strawberry) . Here's the instruction : Cook the rhubarb and sugar over low heat until sugar dissolves .  Boil hard for 10 minutes .  Add the Jell-O and boil 3 minutes .  Skim and put in jars .  Seal .

question: I have vinegar oregano sugar pepper soy sauce water garlic bay leaf . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Vinaigrette Dressing with 4 oz vinegar , 2 oz water , 1 oz soy sauce , garlic powder , oregano , pepper , bay leaf , sugar or splenda . Here's the instruction : In a jar that has a lid , sprinkle in herbs to the amount you choose and then the liquids .  Shake well and chill .

question: I have pepper onion water poultry seasoning rice ground beef tomato sauce salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Rice And Beef Porcupines with 1 lb .  ground beef , 1/2 c .  raw rice , well washed , 3 Tbsp .  chopped onion , 1/2 tsp .  poultry seasoning , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 1 tsp .  salt , 2 cans Hunts tomato sauce , 1 c .  water . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients except tomato sauce and water .  Form mixture into 10 or 12 small balls .  Brown them lightly in uncovered saucepan; drain off excess fat .  Add tomato sauce and water .  Cover tightly; simmer 45 to 50 minutes or until rice is tender .  Serve with pan gravy .

question: I have sugar cranberries eggs flour nuts butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cranberry Pie with 2 c .  cranberries , 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  chopped nuts , 2 eggs , 1 c .  flour , 1/2 c .  butter , melted . Here's the instruction : Spread cranberries over bottom of greased 10-inch pie plate .  Sprinkle with 1/2 cup sugar and nuts .  Beat eggs well .  Add remaining 1 cup sugar gradually and beat until thoroughly mixed .  Add flour and melted butter .  Beat well .  Pour batter over cranberries .

question: I have frozen strawberries strawberry-banana pineapple bananas . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Jello Salad with 1 large box strawberry-banana Jell-O , 4 bananas , mashed , 1 can (medium) crushed pineapple , 1 (16 oz . ) box frozen strawberries , 1 (8 oz . ) container Cool Whip . Here's the instruction : You can use less water than directions call for to mix Jell-O , then use the pineapple juice and strawberry juice .  Mix Jell-O and let cool .

question: I have summer squash bell pepper onion lean ground beef salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Summer Squash Casserole with 1 lb .  lean ground beef , 1 med .  onion , sliced , 1/2 bell pepper , chopped , 5 - 6 med .  summer squash , sliced , salt & pepper to taste . Here's the instruction : Add squash to boiling water and cook until tender .

question: I have black pepper tuna eggs ripe olives cracker crumbs milk whole kernel corn . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Tuna-Ripe Olive Loaf with 1 c .  cracker crumbs , 1 1/2 c .  milk , 3 eggs , slightly beaten , 2 (6 1/2 or 7 oz . ) cans tuna , 1/2 c .  ripe olives , chopped , dash of black pepper , 1 (12 oz . ) can whole kernel corn , drained . Here's the instruction : Combine crumbs , milk and heat to boiling .  Cook , stirring constantly about 1 minute .  Remove from heat; add small amount of eggs and mix well .  Stir into balance of hot mixture .  Add remaining ingredients .  Mix well .  Pour into greased 8 1/2 x 4 1/2 x 2 1/2-inch loaf pan .  Place in shallow pan of hot water (approximately 1-inch deep) .  Bake at 375° for 1 hour .  Serve hot with sliced ripe olives .  Makes 6 servings .

question: I have egg sugar sweet butter ground walnuts flour . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Butter Rolls with 1/2 c .  ground walnuts , 1/2 lb .  flour , 1/2 lb .  sweet butter , 1/4 lb .  sugar , 1 egg . Here's the instruction : Combine all ingredients and work dough until nice and smooth .  Roll out; cut in squares .  Fill with nut or prune filling .  Roll and shape into horns .  Bake in moderate oven for 20 minutes .  Apricot jam also works well for filling .

question: I have sour cream sugar lemon juice flour pie crust egg yolks pineapple salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Erline'S Pineapple Pie(Icebox)   with 1 large can crushed pineapple , 1/4 c .  flour , 3/4 c .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1 small carton sour cream , 2 egg yolks , 1 (9-inch) pie crust , baked . Here's the instruction : Combine pineapple , flour , sugar , salt , lemon juice and sour cream .  Cook slowly until thick .  Cook an additional 2 minutes .  Remove from heat .  Beat 2 egg yolks and add small amount of mixture .  Transfer to pot of filling .  Cook additional 2 minutes .  Bake in 9-inch pie shell with meringue until light brown .

question: I have shank portion brown sugar yellow mustard ground cloves . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Baked Ham with 6 to 8 lb .  shank portion , 1/2 c .  brown sugar , 1 tsp .  ground cloves , 2 tsp .  yellow mustard . Here's the instruction : Bake ham according to instructions on package; usually 350° for 20 minutes per pound .  Mix brown sugar , mustard and cloves and pour over top and sides of ham .  Return to oven and bake 20 minutes more .  Let sit 30 minutes before slicing .  Refrigerate leftovers for another meal or to make sandwiches .

question: I have egg substitute cake flour sugar baking powder vanilla extract vegetable cooking spray brown sugar margarine orange juice milk ground cinnamon cooking apples salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fresh Apple Coffee Cake with 4 c .  unpeeled , finely chopped cooking apples , 1/2 c .  unsweetened orange juice , divided , 1 1/2 tsp .  ground cinnamon , 1 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  margarine , softened , 1 (8 oz . ) carton frozen egg substitute , thawed , 1/4 c .  skim milk , 3 c .  sifted cake flour , 2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 2 1/2 tsp .  vanilla extract , vegetable cooking spray , 2 Tbsp .  brown sugar . Here's the instruction : Combine apples , 1/4 cup unsweetened orange juice and cinnamon in a bowl; stir well and set aside .

question: I have oil nutmeg eggs flour milk lemon butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Grandpa Nystrom'S Swedish Hotcakes with 6 eggs , beaten until fluffy , 1 qt .  milk , 1 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 c .  oil , 2 eggs , lightly beaten , 1/2 c .  milk , 1/2 c .  flour , pinch of nutmeg , 2 Tbsp .  butter , 2 Tbsp .  juice of fresh lemon . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 425° .  Melt butter in the oven in an ovenproof dish .  I use glass pie pan .  Mix ingredients in bowl .  When butter is melted , pour in batter .  Bake for about 15 to 20 minutes until golden brown and puffed .  Sprinkle with powdered sugar and lemon .  We top with fresh fruit , too .  Serve immediately .  Serves one or two .

question: I have oil sour cream sugar baking powder eggs meal cream-style . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sour Cream Cornbread with 1 (8 . 5 oz . ) can cream-style corn , 1 small carton sour cream , 2 eggs , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 1/2 c .  oil , 1 c .  self-rising corn meal , 2 tsp .  baking powder . Here's the instruction : Combine corn , sour cream, eggs, sugar and oil .  Beat well .  Add corn meal and baking powder .  Mix well .  Pour in a greased 10-inch baking dish .  Bake	at 400° for 30 minutes or until top is golden brown .  Serve warm .

question: I have lemon juice vegetable cooking spray brown sugar cornstarch orange juice sweet potatoes . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Glazed Sweet Potatoes with 1 lb .  sweet potatoes , peeled and cut into 1/2-inch thick slices , vegetable cooking spray , 1 Tbsp .  cornstarch , 1 Tbsp .  brown sugar , 3/4 c .  unsweetened orange juice , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice . Here's the instruction : Place potatoes in a 1-quart casserole , coated with cooking spray .  Combine cornstarch and brown sugar in a small bowl .  Add orange and lemon juices , stirring well .  Pour over potatoes .  Cover and bake at 425° for 40 minutes or just until potatoes are tender and glaze is thickened .

question: I have cabbage egg pepper lemon juice brown sugar onion milk tomato sauce ground beef worcestershire sauce salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Crock-Pot Cabbage Rolls with 12 Large Cabbage Leaves , 1 Egg (beaten) , 1/4 c .  Milk , 1/4 c .  Finely Chopped Onion , 1 tsp .  Salt , 1/4 tsp .  Pepper , 1 lb .  Lean Ground Beef , 1 c .  Cooked Rice , 1 (8 oz . ) can Tomato Sauce , 1 Tbsp .  Brown Sugar , 1 Tbsp .  Lemon Juice , 1 tsp .  Worcestershire Sauce . Here's the instruction : Immerse cabbage leaves in large kettle of boiling water for about 3 minutes or until limp; drain .  Combine egg , milk , onion , salt , pepper , beef and cooked rice .  Place about 1/4 cup meat mixture in center of each leaf; fold in sides and roll ends over meat .  Place in crock-pot .  Combine tomato sauce with brown sugar , lemon juice and Worcestershire sauce .  Pour over cabbage rolls .  Cover and cook on low 7 to 9 hours .  Makes 6 servings .

question: I have cream sherry sour cream eggs poppy seed vanilla instant pudding wesson oil yellow cake mix . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Poppy Seed Cake with 1 pkg .  yellow cake mix , 4 eggs , 1/2 c . question: I have sugar cinnamon walnuts apples bread crumbs butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have eggs cheddar cheese milk sausage crescent rolls salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have pepper pork roast water flour prepared mustard salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pork Roast And Mustard Gravy with 1 pork roast , 2 or 3 tsp .  prepared mustard , 2 Tbsp .  flour , salt to taste (while cooking) , pepper to taste (while cooking) , 1/4 c .  water . Here's the instruction : Place pork roast in a Dutch oven .  Salt and pepper to taste and cover with water .  Bring to a boil over medium-high heat , then turn heat down to medium .  Cook thoroughly , 1 to 1 1/2 hours .  Remove from heat and slice .  Place slices in an ovenproof casserole dish and sprinkle with a little more pepper .  Place in a 325° oven for 15 to 20 minutes .  While roast is in oven , bring 1 1/2 cups of broth to a boil .  Dissolve 2 tablespoons of flour in 1/4 cup water .  Stir into boiling broth .  Keep stirring to keep lumps from forming .  Add mustard and cook until smooth .  Gravy may be poured over roast , or served separately .

question: I have egg white vanilla whole strawberries granulated sugar nonfat yogurt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have vanilla extract instant vanilla pudding mix brown sugar eggs baking soda flour white sugar chocolate chips butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Just Right Chocolate Chip Cookies with 2/3 c .  butter or margarine , 2/3 c .  butter flavored Crisco , 3/4 c .  white sugar , 3/4 c .  brown sugar , packed , 2 eggs , 2 tsp .  vanilla extract , 3 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 (3 1/2 oz . ) pkg .  instant vanilla pudding mix , 1 (12 oz . ) pkg .  chocolate chips . question: I have vanilla shortening brown sugar eggs soda flour peanuts salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Salted Peanut Cookies with 1 c .  shortening (part butter) , 1 1/2 c .  brown sugar , packed , 2 eggs , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 3 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  soda , 2 c .  salted peanuts . question: I have shortening flour salt sourdough starter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sourdough Biscuits(Potato Starter)   with 1 c .  sourdough starter , 1 Tbsp .  shortening , 1 tsp .  each: salt , sugar and soda , 3 or 4 c .  flour . Here's the instruction : Place flour in bowl .  Make a well in the center; add sourdough starter .  Stir in salt , soda and sugar;	add shortening .  Gradually mix in enough flour to make a stiff dough .  Pinch off dough for 1 biscuit at a time .  Form a ball; roll it in melted shortening .  Crowd the biscuits into a round 8-inch cake pan; allow to rise in a warm place for 30 minutes before baking .  Bake at 425° until golden brown .

question: I have lentils soy sauce eggs stalks celery onion vegetarian chicken bread crumbs . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have cinnamon fresh green beans lamb shoulder onions tomato sauce garlic salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have frozen red raspberries pecans vanilla ice cream boiling water red raspberry jello . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla powdered sugar pecans flour butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have cream of chicken soup black pepper corn bread crumbs onion cold water butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have egg whites orange roughy flour bread crumbs salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have whole pink chicken breast halves tarragon leaves sherry butter whipping cream . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have shortening brown sugar molasses water cold water flour yeast oatmeal boiling water salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have light corn syrup sugar vanilla extract white vinegar cream of tartar butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

Stir in scallions , spinach , tomatoes and parsley with salt and pepper .  Cover pan and simmer gently for 10 minutes .

question: I have sugar pepper caraway seed green cabbage margarine chicken broth parsley . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Braised Cabbage With Caraway with 1 1/2 lb .  green cabbage , 1 tsp .  margarine , 1 Tbsp .  minced fresh parsley , 1 tsp .  sugar , pepper to taste , 1/2 c .  chicken broth , 1/2 tsp .  caraway seed . question: I have kidney beans bacon green lima beans garlic salt brown sugar white onions beans cider vinegar dry mustard butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have graham crackers oleo powdered sugar peanut butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have potatoes pepper hot water shortening celery flour carrots onions beef stew meat bay leaf green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Old-Fashioned Beef Stew with 1/2 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 2 lb .  beef stew meat , cut into 1-inch pieces , 2 Tbsp .  shortening , 6 c .  hot water , 3 pared medium potatoes , cut into 1-inch pieces , 4 carrots , cut into 1-inch pieces , 1 green pepper , cut in strips , 1 c .  celery , cut into 1-inch pieces , 1/2 c .  diced onions , 1 Tbsp .  salt , 2 beef bouillon cubes , 1 bay leaf . question: I have sugar nutmeg cinnamon ground cloves apple juice apples . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Apple Butter with 4 lb .  apples , 1 c .  apple juice or cider , 2 c .  sugar , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 tsp .  nutmeg , 1/2 tsp .  ground cloves . Here's the instruction : Wash and core apples; cut in 8ths .  Put 1/3 cup cider or apple juice and 5 or 6 pieces of apple into blender .  Cover and process until smooth . Cook over low heat about 45 minutes , stirring slightly .  Pour into jars .  Process 10 minutes in boiling water .

question: I have oil zucchini sugar vanilla eggs cinnamon raisins flour nuts pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Zucchini Bread with 3 c .  self-rising flour , 2 c .  sugar , 2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 3 eggs , 1 c .  oil , 1 c .  crushed pineapple , 2 c .  grated zucchini , 1/2 c .  raisins , 1/2 c .  nuts or walnuts . question: I have chicken breasts freshly ground black pepper lime herbes butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Supremes Of Chicken With Herbes De Provence with 1 Tbsp .  butter , 2 tsp .  herbes de Provence or a mixture of any or all of the following: dried marjoram , thyme , savory , sage , fennel , basil , rosemary , lavendar , 1/2 tsp .  freshly ground black pepper , 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts , 1/2 tsp .  salt , juice of 1 lime (about 2 tsp . ) . question: I have pepper lemon juice onion flour thyme margarine chicken broth parsley chicken olive oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lemon Chicken With Thyme with 3 Tbsp .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 4 chicken breast fillets , 2 Tbsp .  olive oil , 1 Tbsp .  margarine , 1 medium chopped onion , 1 c .  chicken broth , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1/2 tsp .  thyme , 1 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 2 Tbsp .  chopped parsley . Here's the instruction : Mix flour , salt and pepper in bag .  Rinse chicken and pat dry .  Place in bag; shake to coat well . Stir in remaining tablespoon of lemon juice in juices in skillet .  Pour over chicken; sprinkle with parsley .  Garnish with lemon wedges .  Serve with rice .  Serves 4 .

question: I have unflavored gelatin sugar shell lemon juice heavy cream egg whites egg yolks salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lemon Chiffon Pie with 4 beaten egg yolks , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  lemon juice , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 Tbsp .  unflavored gelatin (1 envelope) , 1 tsp .  grated lemon peel , 1/2 c .  sugar , 4 stiff-beaten egg whites , 1 baked pie shell , 1/2 c .  heavy cream , whipped . Here's the instruction : Combine egg yolks , 1/2 cup sugar , lemon juice and salt .  Cook in	double	boiler	until thick, stirring constantly .  Soften gelatin in cold water . 	Add to cooled mixture . 	Add lemon peel and cool until partially set .  Beat remaining 1/2 cup sugar into egg whites and fold into cooled mixture .  Pour into baked shell and	chill . 	Spread	with whipped cream , sweetened .

question: I have egg sugar bell pepper pepper cheddar cheese pecans onion water cracker crumbs mayonnaise butter yellow squash salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Squash Casserole #3 with 2 lb .  yellow squash , sliced , 1/2 c .  chopped onion , 3/4 c .  water , 3/4 c .  shredded Cheddar cheese , 1/2 c .  chopped pecans , 1/2 c .  mayonnaise , 1/4 c . question: I have macaroni cream of mushroom soup cheddar cheese onion milk mustard . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have vanilla crackers eggs cream cheese white sugar blueberry pie filling butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have + bread crumbs chicken butter honey . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Honey-Mustard Chicken with 4 boneless skinless Chicken Breast halves (1 lb . ) , 1 c .  dry Bread Crumbs , 1 tsp .  + 2 Tbsp .  Dijon Mustard , divided , 3 Tbsp .  Honey , 2 Tbsp .  Butter or Margarine . Here's the instruction : Flatten Chicken to 1/4 inch thickness .  In a shallow bowl , combine Bread Crumbs and 1 teaspoon Mustard . question: I have mushroom stems chicken breasts green onions teriyaki sauce red potatoes vegetable oil . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have buttermilk baking powder shortening soda flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have condensed milk bittersweet chocolate maraschino cherry juice pecans maraschino cherries semi-sweet chocolate morsels . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have cabbage sugar red pepper onion white vinegar celery salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cole Slaw with 1 head cabbage , chopped fine , 1 c .  celery (fine) , 1/2 c .  onion , chopped , 1 medium green or red pepper , 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  white vinegar , 2 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  celery seed , 1/2 tsp .  mustard seed . question: I have pepper chicken fryer garlic salt rosemary sweet basil white wine parsley butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Herb Roasted Chicken with 4 lb .  chicken fryer , 1 tsp .  garlic salt , 1/2 c .  melted butter , 1/2 c .  dry white wine , 1 tsp .  crushed rosemary , 1 tsp .  sweet basil , crushed , 1 tsp .  chopped parsley , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper . question: I have sugar nutmeg cinnamon water whipped cream unsweetened chocolate milk instant coffee salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mexican Chocolate with 3 oz .  unsweetened chocolate , 1/2 c .  sugar , 3 Tbsp .  instant coffee , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 tsp .  nutmeg , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1 1/2 c .  water , 4 c .  milk , whipped cream . question: I have white kidney beans oregano tomato paste brown sugar onion mustard red kidney beans italian sausage butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have chocolate cake pecans margarine milk caramels . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have mixed citrus fruit amount . Give me some cooking ideas .

Holding fruit over a bowl to catch the juice , cut off the pith and remove the seeds , tying them in cheesecloth bag , then slice the fruit thinly . question: I have almond flavoring powdered sugar nut halves milk candied cherries . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have egg sugar baking powder vanilla fruit jam flour butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have vinegar sugar crisco egg water flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Foolproof Pie Crust with 4 c .  flour , 1 3/4 c .  Crisco , 1 Tbsp .  sugar , 2 tsp .  salt , 1 Tbsp .  vinegar , 1 egg , 1/2 c .  water . Here's the instruction : Mix flour , Crisco , sugar and salt with a pastry blender .  Mix water , egg and vinegar and pour over flour mixture .  Mix together and make a ball .  Chill 30 minutes or up to 3 days in refrigerator .  Also can be frozen until ready to use .  Makes 5 (9-inch) pie crusts .

question: I have sugar vanilla milk oats chunky peanut butter cocoa oleomargarine . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Oatmeal Fudge with 2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  milk , 2 Tbsp .  Hershey's cocoa , 1/2 c .  chunky peanut butter , 2 Tbsp .  oleomargarine , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 2 c .  oatmeal (3 minute oats) or 1 c .  oatmeal and 1 c .  nuts or coconut . Here's the instruction : Mix first three ingredients .  Mix and boil for 1 minute .  Remove from fire .  Add oleomargarine and peanut butter; dissolve .  Add vanilla , oats and nuts; stir well .  Place on wax paper .  Should make 20 or 24 pieces .

question: I have egg oats nutmeg brown sugar cinnamon soda water flour white sugar butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Oatmeal Cake with 1 c .  oats , 1 1/2 c .  boiled water , 1 c .  brown sugar , 1 c .  white sugar , 1 stick butter , 1 egg , 1 1/2 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 tsp .  nutmeg , pinch of salt . Here's the instruction : Bake at 350° for 30 minutes .

question: I have cabbage celery cukes onions mustard salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hodgepodge Pickles with 1 gal .  cukes , cut up (10 c . ) , 1 qt .  (4 c . ) cabbage , cut up , 1 lb .  (5 to 6) onions , cut up , 2 Tbsp .  salt , 1 Tbsp .  celery seed , 1 Tbsp .  mustard seed , 1 c .  prepared mustard . Here's the instruction : Put all in large pan with 5 cups sugar and 1 cup vinegar .  Stir well and let it come to a boil .  Then thicken with 5 heaping tablespoonfuls flour and 1 cup vinegar .  Mix up before adding to pan .  Stir in; let it come to a boil .  Now put in jars and seal .

question: I have well oil sugar vanilla baking powder nutmeg eggs cinnamon soda raisins flour nuts zucchini salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Spicy Pineapple Zucchini Bread with 3 eggs , 1 c .  oil , 2 c .  sugar , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 2 c .  chopped zucchini , 1 c .  well-drained crushed pineapple (natural juice) , 3 c .  flour , 2 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 3/4 tsp .  nutmeg , 1 c .  chopped nuts , 1 c .  raisins . Here's the instruction : Beat together until thick and creamy eggs , oil , sugar and vanilla .  Stir in zucchini and pineapple .  Combine flour and next 7 ingredients .  Stir gently until just blended .  Bake in two greased pans at 350° for 60 minutes .  Cool 10 minutes and turn onto rack .

question: I have oleo pepper rice krispies chicken salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Rice Krispies Chicken with 1 chicken , cut up , 4 c .  crushed Rice Krispies , 2/3 c .  melted oleo , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  pepper . Here's the instruction : Line cookie sheet with foil .  Dry chicken pieces and dip into seasoned oleo .  Roll in crumbs until well coated .  Place in pan , skin side up .  Do not crowd it .  Bake at 350° for 1 hour .  Do not cover or turn pieces while cooking .

question: I have rotelle lemon juice green onions parmesan cheese sweet basil broccoli flowerets parsley fresh cherry tomatoes garlic olive oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Rotelle Salad(A Pasta Salad)   with 3/4 c .  olive oil , 2 Tbsp .  dried sweet basil leaves , 1 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1/4 tsp .  grated lemon peel , 2 cloves garlic , minced , 3 Tbsp .  chopped parsley , 2 c .  broccoli flowerets , 1 (12 oz . ) pkg .  Rotelle , 3 c .  fresh cherry tomatoes , 1/2 c .  green onions , sliced , 1/2 c .  grated Parmesan cheese , salt and pepper to taste . Here's the instruction : Mix olive oil , lemon juice , garlic and parsley and set aside .  Cook Rotelle as directed on package , adding broccoli during last 5 minutes of cooking .  Drain and rinse in cold water to stop cooking process .  Toss Rotelle-broccoli with olive oil dressing until well coated .  Add tomatoes , green onions and cheese and toss again .  Add salt and pepper to taste .  Ripe olives can be added , if desired .  Serves 11 .

question: I have scallions stalks celery onion clove garlic margarine broccoli olive oil . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Andrea'S Vegetable Creamed Soups with 2 Tbsp .  margarine , 1 Tbsp .  olive oil , 1 coarsely chopped onion , 6 to 8 scallions with ends , cut up , 2 stalks celery (peel off strings and cut up coarsely) , 1 clove garlic , minced , broccoli , cut up or any other vegetable . Here's the instruction : Saute all except the broccoli .  Add the broccoli after all have been sauteed; add 1/8 teaspoon thyme , basil , salt and pepper to taste .  Add 6 cups water and cook uncovered until tender .  Add 1 chicken bouillon while simmering .  Cool .  Put in blender and puree .  Return to low heat and serve .  Croutons on top should be great .

question: I have sour cream cornish hens onion cornstarch brandy butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cornish Hens With Wild Rice Casserole with Cornish hens , 1 c .  onion , 1/4 c .  butter , 1 c .  brandy , 2 Tbsp .  cornstarch , 1 pt .  sour cream . Here's the instruction : Split hens (salt , pepper and paprika) .  Brown onion in butter and add hens .  Brown hens and add brandy and simmer until done .  Remove hens .  Add cornstarch to thicken and sour cream .  Heat; do not boil .

question: I have green peppers eggs parmesan cheese onions milk pan sausage bread crumbs salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Squash Casserole with 4 c .  cubed squash , 1 lb .  pan sausage , cooked , 1 c .  dry bread crumbs , 1/4 c .  chopped green peppers , 1/4 c .  chopped onions , 1/2 c .  grated Parmesan cheese , 2 eggs , beaten , 1/2 c .  milk , 1/2 tsp .  salt . Here's the instruction : Cover and cook the squash in small amount of water until tender (8 to 10 minutes); drain .  Add pan sausage (drained) , bread crumbs , green peppers , onions , cheese , eggs , milk and salt to cooked squash .  Bake in greased casserole dish at 325° for 30 to 35 minutes .  Makes 6 to 8 servings .

question: I have apple cider cinnamon red . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cinnamon Apple Cider with 1/2 gal .  apple cider , 1 c .  cinnamon red hot candy . Here's the instruction : Melt candy , stirring occasionally in microwave-safe dish .  After it turns into a liquid , mix into apple cider and heat .

question: I have vinegar sugar pickling spice cucumbers cold water lime salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lime Pickles with 2 gal .  sliced cucumbers , 3 gal .  cold water , 2 c .  lime , 2 1/2 qt .  vinegar , 7 pt .  sugar , 2 Tbsp .  salt , 1 box pickling spice (1 1/2 oz . ) . Here's the instruction : Let set overnight .  Boil together 35 minutes .  Add some green food coloring in juice .  Put into jars and seal .

question: I have soy sauce onion water celery pork sausage rice almonds . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Savory Sausage Casserole with 1 lb .  bulk pork sausage , 1 c .  uncooked rice , 2 (2 oz .  each) pkg .  dehydrated chicken noodle soup , 1/4 c .  finely chopped onion , 1 c .  sliced celery , 2 1/2 c .  water , 1 Tbsp .  soy sauce , 1/2 c .  toasted halved or slivered blanched almonds . Here's the instruction : Break apart the sausage; brown it in an ungreased skillet , pouring off any excess fat as it accumulates .  Remove from the burner .  Mix together the sausage , rice , soup , onion and celery; place in a 2-quart casserole .  Refrigerate .  When ready to bake , mix soy sauce with water and add this , with the almonds , to the casserole .  Mix all gently .  Cover; bake at 350° for 1 hour .  Serves 6 .

question: I have egg sugar nutmeg baking soda cinnamon raisins flour pumpkin walnuts vegetable oil . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pumpkin Bread with 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  vegetable oil , 1 egg , 1 (16 oz . ) can pumpkin , 2 1/2 c .  all-purpose flour , 2 tsp .  baking soda , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/4 tsp .  nutmeg , 1/4 tsp .  cloves , ground , 1 c .  chopped walnuts , 1 c .  raisins . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 350° .  Grease a 9 x 5-inch loaf pan .  Combine sugar , oil and egg .  Beat until light and fluffy .  Blend in pumpkin .  Combine flour , baking soda , cinnamon , nutmeg and cloves .  Add to pumpkin mixture .  Beat until smooth .

question: I have egg sugar bittersweet chocolate flour egg(s butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Molten Chocolate Lava Cake(Petite Gateau)   with 1/2 cup Butter , unsalted , 4 ounce(s) Bittersweet chocolate , 2 Egg(s) , 2 Egg yolk(s) , 1/4 cup Sugar , 2 tablespoon(s) Flour , all-purpose . Here's the instruction : Butter and flour 4 custard cups .  Preheat oven to 450F .  Melt butter and chocolate .  Do NOT let it boil .  Remove from heat and set aside .  Beat together the 2 eggs plus 2 yolks and the sugar , until it's light and thick .  Pour the now tepid chocolate mixture into the egg mixture , and beat to mix .  Quickly beat in the flour until just mixed in .  Pour into the custard cups .  (At this point you can refrigerate for up to 24 hours .  If you refrigerate , let return to room temp before you bake . ) Put custard cups on a baking sheet and bake at 450 degrees for 6-7 minutes .  The outside will be set up , but the top may still be slightly wiggly (technical French cooking term) .  Invert on plate , let sit for 10 seconds or so , remove custard cup .  Sprinkle with powdered sugar , and surround with a fruit sauce of you're choice .

question: I have lemon juice cinnamon water carrots walnuts butter honey . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Glazed Carrots with 2 lb .  carrots , 1/2 c .  water , 2 Tbsp .  butter or margarine , 1/4 tsp .  cinnamon , 2 Tbsp .  honey , 2 tsp .  lemon juice , 1/2 c .  chopped toasted walnuts (optional) . Here's the instruction : Peel carrots and cut into 3-inch strips .  Place in a large skillet .  Add water and butter .  Cover and cook until tender-crisp , about 5 to 10 minutes , adding more water if necessary .  When carrots are tender , liquid should be nearly gone .  Gently stir in the cinnamon , honey and lemon juice .  Simmer for a few minutes .  Add walnuts , if desired and heat for 1 minute longer .

question: I have white peppercorns sugar white vinegar bay leaves whole cloves allspice . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pickled Fish with 2 c .  white vinegar , 4 bay leaves , 1 tsp .  white peppercorns , 1 tsp .  allspice , 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 2 tsp .  mustard seed , 1 tsp .  whole cloves . Here's the instruction : Mix all of the ingredients together .  Cut fish into small pieces .  Put in very salty water; soak for 48 hours , then drain .  Put fish in clear white vinegar .  Pour brine over fish .  Boil 5 minutes and cool .  Store in refrigerator in glass jars .

question: I have mozzarella cheese bread stuffing mix skinless . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Easy with 1 pkg .  (6-oz) herb seasoned dry bread stuffing mix , 8 skinless , boneless chicken breast halves , 16 medium slices mozzarella cheese . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Prepare stuffing according to package directions .  Wash the chicken , pat dry and pound out to about a 1/2 inch thickness .  Place a slice of cheese on each breast , followed by a scoop of prepared stuffing .  Close each breast over the cheese and stuffing and hold with a toothpick .  Place stuffed breasts in a lightly greased 9 x 13 inch baking dish .  Bake for 25 minutes , or until chicken juices run clear , then place a second slice of cheese over each stuffed chicken , and bake for 2 more minutes , or until cheese is bubbly .

question: I have soy sauce onion soup jack cheese mushrooms red wine garlic butter fritos . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Stuffed Mushrooms with 1 (9 oz . ) pkg .  Jack cheese , 1 pkg .  dry onion soup mix , soy sauce , 2/3 bag Fritos , crushed , 1 cube butter , softened , red wine , garlic salt , mushrooms . Here's the instruction : Mix grated cheese with butter .  Add dry soup mix .  Add garlic salt to taste .  Add enough of liquid ingredients to hold together .  Add crushed Fritos .  This should be in paste form .  Stuff washed mushrooms .  Bake at 350° for 10 minutes or until mushrooms turn dark and butter runs out .

question: I have sugar water pineapple juice orange juice lime sherbet lime jello realemon . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Punch With Lime Sherbet with 2 (No .  2) cans orange juice , 2 (No .  2) cans pineapple juice , 8 oz .  ReaLemon , 1/2 gal .  lime sherbet , 1 pkg .  lime jello , 1 1/2 c .  water , sugar to taste (about 1 c . ) . Here's the instruction : Dissolve jello in 1 1/2 cups water; add to juices .  Add 1 quart ginger ale at serving time along with 1/2 gallon sherbet .

question: I have green chilies liquid frozen pepper garlic salt cheddar cheese onion celery flour butter worcestershire sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Southwestern Spinach with 2 (10 oz . ) pkg .  frozen , chopped spinach , 4 Tbsp .  butter or margarine , 2 Tbsp .  flour , 1 small onion , chopped , 1 stalk celery , chopped fine , 1 c .  liquid (spinach cooking water plus enough water or milk to make 1 c . ) , pepper to taste , 3/4 tsp .  garlic salt , 10 oz .  grated sharp Cheddar cheese , 1 tsp .  Worcestershire sauce , 1 (4 oz . ) can mild green chilies , chopped . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Cook spinach according to package directions; drain , reserving liquid .  Add enough water or milk to make 1 cup of liquid; set aside .  Saute onion and celery in margarine until soft .  Blend in flour and cook at least 1 minute , stirring .  Add liquid slowly , stirring constantly to avoid lumps .  Pour this mixture onto the drained spinach .  Add remaining ingredients .  Mix thoroughly .  Pour into greased baking dish .  Bake 20 minutes in oven or place in microwave for 8 to 10 minutes .

question: I have white sugar baking powder vanilla salad oil brown sugar soda water flour cocoa cherries vanilla ice cream milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hot Fudge Sundaes with 1 c .  plain flour , 2 Tbsp .  cocoa , 2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 c .  milk , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1/4 c .  cocoa , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  soda , 2 Tbsp .  salad oil , 1 c .  brown sugar , 1 3/4 c .  hot water , 3/4 c .  white sugar , vanilla ice cream , cherries . Here's the instruction : Note: Mix and bake in same pan .

question: I have oil tomatoes pepper soy sauce onion water cold water cornstarch rice garlic green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pepper Steak with 1 lb .  round steak , 2 Tbsp .  oil , 1/4 c .  chopped onion , minced garlic , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 1 beef bouillon cube , 1 can chopped tomatoes , 1 green pepper , diced big , 1 Tbsp .  cornstarch , 1/4 c .  cold water , 2 Tbsp .  soy sauce , 4 c .  cooked rice , 1 c .  hot water . Here's the instruction : Cut beef into narrow strips; brown slowly in oil 15 to 20 minutes .  Add onion , garlic , salt and pepper .  Stir , cooking 1 to 2 minutes longer .  Dissolve bouillon cube in the hot water .  Add to meat; cover skillet and simmer 20 to 30 minutes .  Add tomatoes and green pepper; cook 10 minutes longer .  Uncover skillet and combine cornstarch , water and soy sauce .  Mix and bring to a boil .  Lower heat and simmer 5 minutes or until thick and clear , stirring constantly .  Serve over hot rice .  Add extra soy sauce , if desired .

question: I have bacon sugar vinegar shredded cheese mayonnaise broccoli cauliflower red onion . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli Salad with 3 c .  broccoli , chopped , 3 c .  cauliflower , chopped , 1 medium red onion , chopped , 2 c .  fried bacon , crumbled , 2 c .  mayonnaise , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1 small pkg .  shredded cheese , 2 Tbsp .  vinegar . Here's the instruction : Mix the first 4 ingredients together .  In a bowl , mix together the remaining ingredients and pour over salad .  Chill overnight .

question: I have sugar lemon juice eggs powdered sugar flour butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lemon Bars with 1 c .  butter , softened , 2 c .  flour , 1/2 c .  powdered sugar , pinch of salt , 4 eggs , 4 Tbsp .  flour , 2 c .  sugar , 4 Tbsp .  lemon juice . Here's the instruction : Combine first 4 ingredients and pat in 9 x 13-inch cake pan; bake at 350° for 15 minutes .  Combine eggs , flour , sugar and lemon juice and pour on top of crust .  Bake at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes .  Sprinkle with powdered sugar while hot .

question: I have egg vinegar dijon style mustard pepper brown sugar onion applesauce celery ground beef bread crumbs salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Applesauce Beef Loaf with 1 c .  soft bread crumbs (about 1 1/2 slices) , 1 lb .  ground beef , 1 egg , 1/4 c .  finely chopped celery , 2 Tbsp .  finely chopped onion , 1 tsp .  Dijon style mustard , 1/2 tsp .  salt , dash of pepper , 1/2 c .  applesauce , 1 Tbsp .  brown sugar , 1 1/2 tsp .  vinegar . Here's the instruction : Blend thoroughly .  Shape into a round loaf in an 8 x 8 x 2-inch baking pan .  With a spoon , make a crater like depression in top of loaf .  Combine applesauce , brown sugar , vinegar and mustard; pour into depression .  Bake at 350° for 1 hour .  Serves 4 or 5 .

question: I have curry powder pear slices brown sugar maraschino cherries cornstarch butter pineapple apricot halves . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hot Curried Fruits with 1 (1 lb . ) can pear slices , 1 (1 lb . ) can apricot halves , 1 (14 oz . ) can pineapple chunks , 1 (4 oz . ) jar maraschino cherries , 2 Tbsp .  butter or margarine (at room temperature) , 2 Tbsp .  dark brown sugar , 1 tsp .  curry powder , 2 tsp .  cornstarch , 1/2 tsp .  grated lemon peel . Here's the instruction : Drain all fruits and turn out into 1 1/2-quart casserole and mix together lightly .  Blend together the soft butter , brown sugar , curry , cornstarch and lemon peel .  Sprinkle over fruit mixture .  Let mixture stand for several hours to draw out juices .  Bake uncovered about 1 hour at 325° .  Spoon some of the juices over fruit several times during baking .  Serve while hot .  Serves 6 .

question: I have flour sharp cheese margarine paprika olives . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Olive Cheese Balls with 1/4 lb .  sharp cheese , grated , 1/4 c .  margarine , 3/4 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  paprika , 24 olives (3 oz .  jar) . Here's the instruction : Mix first 4 ingredients as for pie crust .  Wrap around olives to form a ball .  Bake 15 minutes at 400° .  Loosen immediately .  May be reheated .

question: I have eggs cheddar cheese milk dry mustard sausage bread crumbs salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Egg-Sausage Casserole with 1 lb .  sausage , 10 eggs , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 2 c .  bread crumbs or cubes , 2 1/4 c .  milk , 1 1/2 tsp .  dry mustard , 1 1/2 c .  shredded Cheddar cheese . Here's the instruction : Crumble , brown and drain sausage .  Combine eggs , milk , mustard , and salt and beat .  Stir in bread , cheese and sausage .  Pour in 9 x 13-inch baking dish .  Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes .

question: I have nonfat dry milk sugar ground whipped cream coffee powder ground cinnamon chocolate mix . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cappuccino Coffee Mix with 1 c .  instant coffee powder , 2 1/4 c .  nonfat dry milk , 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  instant hot chocolate mix , 2 tsp .  ground cinnamon , 1 1/2 tsp .  ground or zested orange peel , whipped cream (optional) . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients .  Store in tightly sealed glass jar .

question: I have frozen peas green onion pimento parsley sweet pickle cider vinegar vegetable oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Peas Vinaigrette with 2 (10 oz . ) boxes frozen peas , 1 Tbsp .  parsley , 2/3 Tbsp .  diced pimento , 2/3 tsp .  salt , 2 Tbsp .  finely chopped sweet pickle , 1/2 c .  vegetable oil , 3 Tbsp .  cider vinegar , 2 Tbsp .  finely chopped green onion . Here's the instruction : Put peas in colander .  Pour 2 kettles boiling water over them .  Drain; combine with other ingredients .  Refrigerate .  Keeps 2 weeks .  Luncheon favorite!

question: I have peg corn onion celery celery soup beans green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Vegetable Casserole with 1 can French-style string beans , 1 can Shoe Peg corn , drained , 1/2 c .  celery , 1/2 c .  onion , 1/2 c .  green pepper , 1 can celery soup . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients together .  Cover with 1 stack crushed Ritz crackers combined with 1 stick melted margarine .  Put on top of mixed ingredients .  Bake at 350° for 45 minutes .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs soda chocolate chips dates flour cocoa margarine nuts boiling water salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Date-Chock Cupcakes with 1 (10 oz . ) pkg .  dates , chopped , 1 c .  boiling water , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 stick (1/2 c . ) margarine , 1 c .  sugar , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 2 eggs , separated , 1 1/4 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  cocoa , 1/4 tsp .  salt , chocolate chips , finely chopped nuts . Here's the instruction : Mix soda and water and pour over dates; let cool .  Cream margarine and sugar; add vanilla , egg yolks and cooled dates; mix well .  Sift together and add dry ingredients .  Fold in stiffly beaten egg whites .  Fill muffin pans half full .  Sprinkle tops with finely chopped nuts and 4 or 5 chocolate chips .  (If miniature muffin tins are used add only 3 chips . ) Bake at 350° for 25 minutes or until done .  (I use the paper muffin cups to line the tins . )

question: I have onion soup soy sauce water chestnuts chicken flavored bouillon granules long grain rice water hair spaghetti butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Noodle-Rice Casserole with 1/4 c .  butter , 2 c .  water , 3/4 oz .  angel hair spaghetti , broken into 1 1/2 inch pieces , 1 c .  long grain rice (uncooked) , 3/4 tsp .  chicken flavored bouillon granules , 1 (10 1/2 oz . ) can French onion soup (undiluted) , 2 tsp .  soy sauce , 1 (8 oz . ) can sliced water chestnuts , drained . Here's the instruction : Melt butter in large skillet .  Add spaghetti; cook until golden brown , stirring constantly .  Remove from heat .  Stir in remaining ingredients .  Pour into a lightly greased 8-inch square baking dish .  Bake uncovered at 350° for 40 to 50 minutes .

question: I have sugar vanilla brown sugar cream cheese apples . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Apple Dip with 6 Granny Smith apples , sliced , 12 oz .  cream cheese , softened , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1 c .  brown sugar , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Arrange apple slices around plate .  Combine cream cheese , sugar , brown sugar and vanilla in a bowl .  Mix well .  Place in middle of plate .

question: I have sugar eggs wesson oil water yeast salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make 3 Hour Sunday Rolls with 2 pkg .  yeast , 2 whole eggs , 1/4 c .  Wesson oil , 2 c .  lukewarm water , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1 tsp .  salt . Here's the instruction : Mix the above 6 ingredients together .  Add enough flour to make a thick dough batter .  Let set for 1 hour .  Make into rolls and let set for 1 or more hours to rise .  Grease top of rolls with oleo .  Bake at 400° for about 15 to 20 minutes .

question: I have bell pepper macaroni onion mushrooms ground beef tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Slomgolian with 1 lb .  ground beef , 1/2 c .  chopped onion , 1/3 c .  chopped bell pepper , small can sliced mushrooms (or use fresh) , 15 oz .  can tomato sauce , 2 c .  cooked elbow macaroni . Here's the instruction : Brown ground beef .  Saute onion and bell pepper with meat (also mushrooms if fresh) .  Drain excess grease .  Season with garlic salt and black pepper .  Add tomato sauce and mushrooms (drained if canned) to skillet .  Simmer , covered , about 10 minutes .  Add macaroni (slightly undercooked) .  Cover and simmer about 5 more minutes .  Add a little water if it gets too dry during the simmering .  This is good leftover .

question: I have orange sherbet orange gelatin mandarin oranges water . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Orange Sherbet Salad with 2 (3 oz . ) pkg .  orange gelatin , 2 c .  hot water and orange juice , 1 c .  mandarin oranges , 1 pt .  orange sherbet . Here's the instruction : Using juice from the mandarin oranges as part of liquid , dissolve gelatin in the hot water .  Add other ingredients and mix well .  Chill .  Miniature marshmallows may be added to mixture .

question: I have sugar vanilla lemon flavoring almond flavoring eggs nutmeg raisins cornstarch milk rice . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Creamy Rice Pudding with 3 eggs , 1 c .  sugar , 2 c .  milk , 1 1/2 tsp .  cornstarch , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1/2 tsp .  lemon flavoring , 1/2 tsp .  almond flavoring , 1 to 1 1/2 c .  cooked rice , 1 c .  raisins (optional) , nutmeg . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 325° .  Beat eggs; add sugar and beat well .  Add milk , cornstarch and flavorings .  Mix well .  Stir in rice , raisins and nutmeg to taste .  Pour in 2-quart baking dish .  Sprinkle with additional nutmeg .  Set in pan of hot water .  Bake for 2 hours , until knife inserted comes out clean .  Stir several times while baking to prevent raisins and rice from settling to bottom .

question: I have buttermilk oil egg sugar vanilla cinnamon soda flour dates pumpkin nuts . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pumpkin Cookies with 1 c .  pumpkin , 1 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  oil , 1 egg , 2 c .  self-rising flour , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 Tbsp .  buttermilk , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  dates , 1/2 c .  nuts . Here's the instruction : Combine ingredients and drop by teaspoonfuls on cookie sheet .  Bake at 375° for 10 to 12 minutes .

question: I have cream of chicken soup crackers butter fryer . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Easy Chicken Casserole with 1 fryer or pieces of chicken of your choice , 1 (10 oz . ) can cream of chicken soup , 1/2 stick melted butter or margarine , Ritz crackers . Here's the instruction : Place chicken in dish .  Cover with soup (do not dilute) .  Pour melted butter over top .  Bake at 375° for 1 hour or until lightly brown and tender .

question: I have sour cream bread gouda cheese horseradish corned beef sweet pickle relish . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Gouda Cheese Spread with 1 (8 oz . ) baby Gouda cheese , shredded , 1/2 c .  finely chopped corned beef , 1/4 c .  sour cream , 2 Tbsp .  sweet pickle relish , 2 tsp .  horseradish , rye or pumpernickel bread (party size) . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients together .  Return to the shell of baby Gouda .  Serve on bread .

question: I have cream of chicken soup pepper onion celery broccoli milk rice salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cheezy Broccoli with 20 oz .  frozen chopped broccoli , 1 c .  milk , 1 (16 oz . ) jar Cheez Whiz , 1/2 c .  chopped onion , 2 c .  Minute rice , 2 cans cream of chicken soup , 1 Tbsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  pepper , 1 c .  chopped celery . Here's the instruction : Combine rice , soup , milk , cheese , salt and pepper .  Microwave on High 2 to 4 minutes until cheese melts and can be blended easily .  Add onion , celery and broccoli and stir .  Divide into 2 lightly greased dishes .  Microwave each 12 to 14 minutes on High .

question: I have potatoes bacon onion broth water salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Clam Chowder with 12 clams and broth , 3 large potatoes , 1 onion , diced , salt and pepper , 2 or 3 strips bacon , 1 1/2 qt .  water . Here's the instruction : Cut up fine or grind clams .  Dice potatoes .  Add onion , salt and pepper to taste .  Cook until potatoes are tender .  Fry bacon to crisp .  Remove bacon and pour essence in pot .  Let simmer for about 10 minutes .

question: I have sugar vanilla powdered sugar kisses flour nuts butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have shrimp bread crumbs chicken granules mushrooms flour gruyere cheese parsley milk sherry butter crepes salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have consideration kind deeds . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have white sugar bacon water chestnuts soy sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have light rum cream of coconut orange juice pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pina Colada Sherbet with 15 or 16 oz .  can cream of coconut , 15 oz .  can crushed pineapple , with juice , 1 c .  orange juice , 1/4 c .  light rum . Here's the instruction : In blender , mix coconut , undrained pineapple , orange juice and rum .  Blend until nearly smooth .  Pour in 9 x 5 x 3-inch dish or 13 x 9-inch pan .  Cover and freeze until firm .  Take out and break into pieces .  Put half at a time in blender .  Process until fluffy .  Put in container and freeze until firm .  Makes 5 cups .

question: I have onion water celery orange corned beef carrot pickling spice . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Corned Beef In Foil with 3 to 4 lb .  corned beef , 1/4 c .  water , 2 Tbsp .  pickling spice , 1 orange , sliced , 1 onion , sliced , 1 celery stalk with leaves , 1 carrot , sliced . Here's the instruction : Soak corned beef in water to cover for 1/2 hour or longer if deeply corned .  Place a large sheet of heavy-duty foil on a shallow pan .  Remove corned beef from water and pat dry to remove any salt on surface .  Place in center of foil and pour over it 1/4 cup fresh water .  Sprinkle with the spice and arrange orange slices and vegetables over and around the meat .  Bring long ends of foil up over meat and seal with a tight double fold .  Seal other ends , turning them up so liquid can not run out .  Bake in a 300° oven for 4 hours .  Remember , always slice meat across the grain .

question: I have packets equal unflavored gelatin orange juice pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have garlic salt mushrooms mushroom soup onions rice vegetable oil . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have pepper cheddar cheese onion celery flour breadcrumbs carrots parsley milk dry mustard butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cheese Scalloped Carrots with 2 lb .  carrots , sliced , 2 Tbsp .  butter , 1/2 c .  finely chopped celery , 1/4 c .  finely chopped onion , 2 Tbsp .  all-purpose flour , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  dry mustard , dash of pepper , 1 1/2 c .  milk , 1 c . Here's the instruction : Cook carrots in boiling salted water to cover for 8 to 10 minutes , or until tender .  Drain and set aside .  Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a heavy saucepan over low heat . Combine breadcrumbs and remaining ingredients; sprinkle over carrot mixture .  Bake at 350° for 25 minutes .  Yields 6 to 8 servings .

question: I have buttermilk sugar vanilla crisco lemon flavoring eggs soda flour margarine butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have regular cooking vanilla pudding mix powdered sugar peanut butter maple flavoring milk chocolate chips butterscotch chips milk butter peanuts . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have baking powder sugar flour milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Butter Dips with 1/4 c .  butter , 1/4 c .  flour , 2 tsp .  sugar , 2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt (optional) , 2/3 c .  milk . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 450° .  In a 9 x 9 x 2-inch pan , melt butter in oven .  Remove when melted .  Mix flour , sugar , baking powder and salt in a bowl .  Add milk . question: I have pepper onion stewing chicken celery parsley carrot salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have chitterlings pig red peppers celery chicken broth seasoning salt yellow onions green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have romano cheese noodles mozzarella cheese parmesan cheese eggs parsley ricotta cheese spaghetti sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cheesy Lasagne with 3 c .  Ricotta cheese , 1 c .  Mozzarella cheese , divided , 1/2 c .  grated Parmesan cheese , 1/2 c .  grated Romano cheese , 2 eggs , lightly beaten , 2 tsp .  chopped parsley , 9 lasagne noodles , 3 c .  spaghetti sauce . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Combine in large bowl Ricotta , Parmesan , Romano and 1/2 Mozzarella cheese .  Add eggs and parsley .  Soak noodles in cold water for 10 minutes .  In pan , spread 1/2 cup sauce , then place 3 noodles on top .  Spread 1/3 Ricotta filling over noodles .  Pour 1 cup sauce over cheese filling .  Repeat layers , ending with sauce .

question: I have oil zucchini soy sauce beef cubes button mushrooms peppers cornstarch ginger root onions shrimp garlic butter worcestershire sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Skewered Shrimp(For 4)   with 1/4 lb .  beef cubes , 4 Tbsp .  Worcestershire sauce , 1 doz .  large shrimp (20 count per lb .  minimum size) (raw is better but precooked is okay) , 2 cloves garlic , 2 inches ginger root , 2 onions , 3 peppers , 2 small zucchini , 1 doz .  small whole button mushrooms , 4 Tbsp .  butter , 2 Tbsp .  oil (olive or sesame) , 4 Tbsp .  soy sauce , 1 Tbsp .  cornstarch , slaked in 2 Tbsp .  cool water (add water to cornstarch) . question: I have eggs mozzarella cheese flour chopped spinach spaghetti sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Spinach Patties with 1 can chopped spinach , 2 eggs , 4 Tbsp .  flour , spaghetti sauce , 1 1/2 c .  Mozzarella cheese . Bake at 425° for 10 to 15 minutes , or until cheese is brown .

question: I have cream of mushroom soup water celery thawed broccoli onions rice butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli Casserole with 1 pkg .  thawed broccoli , chopped , 1 small jar Cheez Whiz , 1/2 c .  onions , 1/2 c .  celery , 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 1/2 can water , 1 1/2 c .  uncooked Minute rice , 1 stick butter , dash of salt and pepper . Here's the instruction : Mix together in a 2-quart casserole and bake in a 350° oven approximately 30 minutes or until done .

question: I have cake mix pumpkin margarine walnuts . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pumpkin Dump Cake with 1 large can Libby's pumpkin , 1 Duncan Hines spice cake mix , 1/4 c .  margarine , melted , 3/4 c .  chopped walnuts . Here's the instruction : Prepare pumpkin according to directions on can label to make pie filling for two pies (requires eggs , sugar , spices and 2 cans evaporated milk) .

question: I have sour cream shortening parsley flakes water flour sage pork chops onions salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pork Chops Supreme with 6 pork chops , 3/4 tsp .  sage , 1/2 tsp .  seasoned salt , 2 Tbsp .  shortening , 1 beef bouillon cube , 1/4 c .  water , 2 medium onions , sliced , 1/2 c .  sour cream , 1 Tbsp .  flour , 2 Tbsp .  parsley flakes . Here's the instruction : Rub chops with sage and salt .  Brown in hot shortening .  Drain .  Dissolve bouillon cubes in water .  Add bouillon and onions to pork chops .  Cover and simmer 30 minutes .  Place pork chops on serving platter .  Combine sour cream , flour and parsley flakes in separate bowl .  Slowly add meat drippings .  Return this mixture to skillet .  Cook and stir until desired consistency .  Serve over chops .

question: I have cream of chicken soup chicken breasts margarine cream of celery soup cornbread mix . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Dressing Casserole with 1 pkg .  Pepperidge Farm cornbread mix , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 1 can cream of celery soup , 1 stick margarine , 4 to 6 chicken breasts (I use the boneless chicken) . Here's the instruction : Stew and bone chicken (save broth from chicken) .  Mix melted margarine with cornbread mix .  Put a little less than half of the mix in bottom of casserole .  Put half of chicken on top .  Dilute celery soup with a can of broth and pour over chicken .  Repeat layers , using chicken soup diluted with 1 can chicken broth .  Sprinkle top with crumb dressing mix .  Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes .

question: I have sweet butter eggs parmesan cheese frozen spinach stuffing cubes . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Spinach Balls with 2 (10 oz . ) pkg .  frozen spinach , cooked and well drained , 2 c .  Pepperidge Farm stuffing cubes (herb) , 3 eggs , beaten , 3/4 c .  sweet butter , melted , 1 c .  Parmesan cheese . Here's the instruction : To the beaten eggs add the melted butter and cheese , then add stuffing cubes and let them soften in egg mixture about 5 minutes .  Add spinach and mix well .  Roll into small balls and bake at 350° for 15 minutes .  Makes about 50 spinach balls .

question: I have brown gravy sauce pepper soy sauce onion mushrooms water celery cornstarch bean sprouts hamburger butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hamburger Chow Mein with 1/4 c .  butter or margarine , 1 lb .  hamburger , 1 medium onion , chopped , 2 tsp .  salt , dash of pepper , 2 c .  celery , diced , 1 1/2 c .  water , 1 Tbsp .  La Choy brown gravy sauce , 2 (16 oz . ) cans La Choy bean sprouts , drained and rinsed , 1 small can mushrooms , drained , 2 Tbsp .  cornstarch , 2 Tbsp .  La Choy soy sauce . Here's the instruction : Brown meat and onion in butter .  Add salt , pepper , celery and water .  Cover and simmer 20 minutes .  Add bean sprouts .
