question: I have pecans onion cream cheese pineapple green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cheese Ball with 2 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , 1 (No .  2) can crushed pineapple , 5 Tbsp .  onion , 4 Tbsp .  green pepper , 1 c .  chopped pecans . Here's the instruction : Mix all together .  Roll in chopped pecans .  Can be shaped into ball or logs .  Refrigerate .

question: I have pasta parmesan cheese fresh mushrooms italian salad dressing yellow onion black olives broccoli parsley cherry tomatoes green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pasta Salad with 1 (12 oz . ) box pasta , cooked and drained , 1 qt .  cherry tomatoes , 2 small cans black olives , sliced , 1 large green pepper , 1 medium yellow onion , 1 bunch each: broccoli and cauliflower , 1 qt .  fresh mushrooms (optional) , 1 large bottle zesty Italian salad dressing , 2 lb .  grated Parmesan cheese , fresh parsley . Here's the instruction : Cook pasta as directed .  Drain and rinse in cold water .  Combine tomatoes (halved or quartered) , green pepper (chopped) , broccoli , cauliflower , mushrooms and parsley . question: I have sour milk sugar baking powder eggs baking soda bananas flour nuts butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Banana Bread with 1/2 c .  butter , 1 c .  sugar , 2 eggs , 2 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  baking soda , 2 to 3 Tbsp .  sour milk , 1 1/2 c .  mashed bananas (3) , 1/2 c .  nuts . Here's the instruction : Cream butter and sugar .  Add eggs .  Add dry ingredients .  Add milk and bananas .  Add nuts , cherries and chocolate chips if you wish . question: I have potatoes cheddar cheese onions butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Grilled Potatoes In A Package with 2 potatoes per packages , sliced onions and peppers (any other veggies you prefer) , 1 Tbsp .  butter , salt and pepper to taste , sliced American or cheddar cheese . Here's the instruction : Tear off a piece of non-stick foil about 10-12 inches long .  Peel and cut the potatoes , add the sliced onions and peppers , along with the tablespoon of butter and salt and pepper into the center of the foil .  Fold the foil and close it tightly at the top and on the sides .  Cook it on the grill on low for approximately 30 minutes .  Once the potatoes are done , open the packet (be careful of the steam) , put slices of the cheese on the potatoes and close the packet up so it can melt .

question: I have water flour yeast yellow cake mix butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Danish Yeast Rolls with 2 pkg .  yeast , 2 1/2 c .  warm water , 1 box yellow cake mix , 5 1/2 c .  flour , 1 1/2 tsp .  salt , butter , brown sugar , nuts and cinnamon . Here's the instruction : Dissolve yeast in water , add cake mix , flour and salt .  Mix and let rise for 1 hour .  Punch down and roll out into oblong .  Cover with butter , sugar , cinnamon and nuts .  Roll up and slice about 2 inches thick .  Place on cookie sheet , let set about 20 minutes .  Bake at 350° for approximately 20 minutes .

question: I have oregano sugar salt parmesan cheese mushrooms onion white pepper clove garlic olives butter tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Baked Halibut, Italian Style with 4 halibut steaks , 1/3 c .  chopped onion , 1/2 clove garlic , minced , 2 Tbsp .  butter or margarine , 1 (8 oz . ) can tomato sauce , 1 (4 oz . ) can mushrooms , 1/4 c .  sliced olives , 1/2 tsp .  oregano , 1/2 tsp .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  salt , dash of white pepper , 1/4 c .  grated Parmesan cheese . Here's the instruction : Place fish in greased baking dish .  Saute onion and garlic in butter until onion is tender .  Add tomato sauce , mushrooms , olives , oregano , sugar , salt and pepper .  Heat through .  Pour over halibut and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese .  Bake at 350° for 25 minutes .  Serves 4 to 6 .

question: I have cream of chicken soup chicken breasts cream of mushroom soup cream of celery soup rice butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Baked Chicken Breasts with 4 large chicken breasts , split , 1/2 c .  butter , salt and pepper , 1 c .  raw rice , 1 can undiluted cream of mushroom soup , 1 can undiluted cream of chicken soup , 1 can undiluted cream of celery soup . Here's the instruction : Dip the chicken pieces in melted butter or brush with butter and season with salt and pepper .  Mix rice with soups and spread in a shallow , buttered casserole .  Top with chicken breasts and bake at 300° for 2 hours .

question: I have bread light brown sugar cinnamon regular butterscotch pudding walnuts butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Butterscotch Pull-Apart with 1 1/2 loaves frozen bread dough or 1 pkg .  frozen roll dough , 1 (3 3/4 oz . ) pkg .  regular butterscotch pudding mix , 1 c .  light brown sugar , 1 c .  sliced walnuts , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 c .  melted butter or margarine . Here's the instruction : Let frozen dough thaw until pliable .  Grease a 12-cup Bundt (tube ) pan .  Sprinkle 1/2 cup of the brown sugar on bottom of pan .  Top with walnuts and set aside .  In small bowl , combine pudding mix , remaining 1/2 cup brown sugar and cinnamon .  Cut thawed dough into 24 pieces (rolls do not need to be cut) .  Dip each piece in melted butter , then roll in butterscotch mixture .  Arrange dough balls on top of nut mixture in pan .  The pan should be filled at least half-way with dough .

question: I have pepper eggs cheddar cheese onion bisquick baking mix broccoli milk chicken salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken, Cheese And Broccoli Pie with 1 pkg .  frozen chopped broccoli , 3 c .  shredded Cheddar cheese , 1 1/2 c .  cut up cooked chicken , 2/3 c .  chopped onion , 1 c .  milk , 3 eggs , 3/4 c .  Bisquick baking mix , 3/4 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 400° .  Grease pie plate (10 x 1 1/2-inches) .  Rinse broccoli under cold water to thaw; drain .  Mix broccoli , 2 cups of the cheese , chicken and onion in plate .  Beat milk , eggs , baking mix , salt and pepper until smooth .  Pour into plate .  Bake until knife inserted in center comes out clean , 25 to 35 minutes .  Top with remaining cheese .  Bake just until cheese is melted .  Makes 6 to 8 servings .

question: I have sour cream beef gravy noodles mushrooms catsup sherry ground beef . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Speedy Stroganoff with 1 lb .  ground beef , 3/4 c .  beef gravy , 1 (4 oz . ) can sliced mushrooms , 2 Tbsp .  catsup , 2 Tbsp .  dry sherry , 1/2 c .  sour cream dip with onion , hot cooked noodles or rice . Here's the instruction : In a saucepan , brown hamburger and drain .  Stir in gravy .  Stir in undrained mushrooms and catsup .  Add 1 cup water .  Cover; bring to boiling .  Simmer , covered , 15 minutes .  Stir in wine .  Gradually blend 1 cup beef mixture into sour cream dip .  Return to saucepan .  Heat through .  Do not boil .  Serve over noodles .  Sprinkle with paprika .

question: I have cheddar cheese green onion tomato soup long grain rice broccoli flowerets salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make 6 Layer Casserole with 2 c .  long grain rice , cooked , 2 c .  cooked ham , diced , 1 c .  sliced onion , 2 c .  broccoli flowerets , 1 (15 oz . ) can tomato soup , mixed with equal part half and half , 1 c .  shredded sharp Cheddar cheese mixed with 1 c .  Mozzarella , salt and pepper to taste , green or red pepper slices (garnish) . Here's the instruction : Butter a large casserole .  Cook broccoli and green onion in a small amount of water with dash of salt for 5 to 6 minutes .  Drain well .  Mix soup and half and half in bowl .  In casserole , layer rice , broccoli , green onions and ham .  Pour soup mixture over; top with shredded cheese .  Bake at 375° for approximately 35 minutes or until cheese is melted and light brown .  Serve hot from oven with salad and rolls .  Makes 4 to 6 servings .

question: I have instant vanilla pudding orange jello orange juice oranges boiling water cold milk pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Orange Pineapple Salad with 1 large pkg .  orange jello , 2 c .  boiling water , 1 small can orange juice , 1 large can crushed pineapple (do not drain) , 1 can Mandarin oranges , drained , 1 small pkg .  instant vanilla pudding , 1 c .  cold milk , 1 small carton Cool Whip . Here's the instruction : Blend well the jello and boiling water .  Add the next three ingredients and let it gel .

question: I have baking powder sugar crisco vanilla eggs flour milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Strawberry Shortcake with 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  Crisco , melted , 2 eggs , 2 tsp .  baking powder , 1 1/2 c .  flour , 1 c .  milk , 2 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Add , in the order listed , and mix well .  Pour into oblong baking pan or dish .  Bake at 375° for 40 minutes .  Cool and add fresh strawberries and milk , if so desired .

question: I have oleo onion mushrooms water beef broth rice . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Brown Rice with 1 c .  rice , 1 stick oleo , onion , garlic , celery salt and paprika , 1 can beef broth , 1/2 c .  water , 1 can (small) mushrooms , sliced . Here's the instruction : Saute rice , spices and butter .  Add other ingredients and cook , covered , at 350° for 1 hour .

question: I have cake flour baking powder sugar vanilla eggs milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lazy Daisy Cake with 2 eggs , 1 c .  sugar , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  cake flour , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1/2 c .  milk , 2 Tbsp .  butter . Here's the instruction : Combine first 3 ingredients and beat well , then add dry ingredients which have been sifted together .  Scald milk and add butter .  Combine the 2 mixtures and beat well .  Pour into square , flat pan and bake in moderate oven at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes .  Remove from oven and add frosting , then return to hot oven for frosting to brown .

question: I have potatoes hamburger onion . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hamburger Casserole with 2 lb .  hamburger , 1 onion , thinly sliced , 3 potatoes , thinly sliced . Here's the instruction : Layer 1 pound hamburger , onion , potatoes and 1 pound hamburger .  Cook 35 to 45 minutes at 350° .  Drain and cover with a 10 ounce package of Cheddar cheese .

question: I have red wine vinegar bacon oregano tomatoes black pepper heavy cream salmon parmesan cheese red pepper onion garlic pasta . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Alaska Canned Salmon Carbonara with 8 oz .  pasta , 6 slices bacon , diced , 1/2 onion , chopped , 3 large cloves garlic , minced , 2 tsp .  oregano , 1/2 tsp .  black pepper , 1/4 to 1/2 tsp .  red pepper , 2 (14 oz . ) cans diced tomatoes , 3 Tbsp .  red wine vinegar , 1 (14 3/4 oz . ) can Alaska salmon , drained and broken in bite-size pieces , 1/3 to 1/2 c .  heavy cream , shredded Parmesan cheese . Stir in salmon and cream; heat through .  Serve over hot pasta and garnish with Parmesan .

question: I have egg sugar baking powder shortening nutmeg blueberries flour milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Blueberry Cake("Local Bake-Off Winner")   with 3 Tbsp .  shortening , 3/4 c .  sugar , 1 egg , beaten , 3/4 c .  milk , 1 3/4 c .  flour , 2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  nutmeg , 1 1/3 c .  floured fresh blueberries . Here's the instruction : Cream shortening and sugar .  Then add egg and milk .  Beat until smooth .

question: I have oil ginger paste black pepper frozen peas head cabbage turmeric garlic salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cabbage And Peas with 1 small head cabbage , shredded , 1 c .  frozen peas , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  black pepper , 1 Tbsp .  oil , 1 tsp .  ginger paste (optional) , 1 tsp .  garlic paste or 1 clove chopped garlic , 1/2 tsp .  turmeric (optional) . Here's the instruction : In a bowl , microwave peas for 4 minutes , covered .  Heat oil in a 10-inch skillet .  Add ginger and garlic .  Add peas and cabbage .  Stir-fry on medium-low heat until crisp-tender .  Add salt and black pepper .  (Do not overcook when cabbage is soft . )

question: I have sugar vanilla crackers pecans egg whites . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pecan Ritz Pie with 20 Ritz crackers , crumbled , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  chopped pecans , 3 egg whites , beaten , 1/2 c .  sugar , 3/4 tsp .  vanilla . Add first bowl of dry ingredients and fold together gently with large spoon .  Pour into 9-inch pie plate .  Bake at 325° for 30 minutes .

question: I have sour cream condensed cream pepper garlic salt onion mushrooms flour margarine hamburger salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hamburger Stroganoff with 1/2 c .  chopped onion , 1/2 stick margarine , 2 Tbsp .  flour , 1 lb .  hamburger , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , garlic salt (optional) , 1 (8 oz . ) can sliced mushrooms , 1 can condensed cream of chicken soup , 1 c .  sour cream . Here's the instruction : Brown hamburger , onion and garlic salt; drain off fat .  Add flour , salt , pepper and mushrooms (juice and all) .  Cook for 5 minutes .  Add soup; simmer for 10 minutes .  Add sour cream; heat through .  Serve over hot buttered noodles .

question: I have semi-sweet chocolate pecans walnuts cashews butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chocolate Nut Clusters with 1/2 lb .  semi-sweet chocolate , 1 oz .  melted butter , 1/2 c .  cashews , 1/2 c .  pecans , 1/2 c .  walnuts . Here's the instruction : Melt chocolate in double boiler; add butter and stir .  Stir in nuts .  Drop by teaspoons on waxed paper .  Refrigerate until hard .

question: I have bean dip sour cream cheddar cheese cream cheese taco mix . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Taco Dip with 1 can bean dip , 1 pkg .  cream cheese , softened , 1/2 pkg .  taco mix , 8 oz .  sour cream , Cheddar cheese and peppers . Here's the instruction : Mix bean dip , cream cheese , taco mix and sour cream with a hand mixer .  Pour into a casserole dish .  Grate cheese and sprinkle on top .  Garnish with peppers .  Bake at 350° for 15 to 20 minutes .  Serve hot with nacho chips .

question: I have mixed veggies cheese velveeta cheese macaroni water . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make My Own Self with 1 box Velveeta cheese macaroni and broccoli , 1 can albacore tuna in water , drained , 1 bag frozen (steamed) mixed veggies , shredded cheese (Mozzarella or Colby) . Here's the instruction : Kids love this; with your help , they can prepare dinner .  Make macaroni and cheese according to directions .  Steam veggies and drain .  Fluff tuna with fork in small bowl or big bowl if children are doing it .  Mix first three ingredients together and sprinkle with cheese .  Bake , uncovered , for 30 minutes .

question: I have pizza sauce pepper garlic salt mozzarella cheese shredded lettuce onion mushrooms italian style milk ground beef . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pizza Meatballs with 1 lb .  ground beef , 1 c .  Italian style fine dry bread crumbs , 1/2 c .  milk , 2 Tbsp .  instant minced onion , 1 tsp .  garlic salt , 1/8 tsp .  pepper , 4 oz .  Mozzarella cheese , cut into 24 (1/2-inch) cubes , 1 (15 oz . ) jar pizza sauce , shredded lettuce (optional) , sliced mushrooms (optional) . Here's the instruction : Combine ground beef , bread crumbs , milk , onion , salt and pepper; mix well .  Cover each cube of cheese with about 1 tablespoon of meat mixture , carefully sealing all around .  Place meatballs in a lightly greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish . question: I have red wine vinegar sugar salt onion worcestershire sauce green pepper celery pepper sauce carrots dry mustard whole kernel corn olive oil tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Carrot Salad with 1 lb .  carrots , peeled and sliced , 1 (16 oz . ) can tomato sauce , 1 c .  granulated sugar , 1/2 c .  olive oil (extra light) , 3/4 c .  red wine vinegar , salt and pepper to taste , 1 tsp .  dry mustard , 1 tsp .  Worcestershire sauce , dash of hot pepper sauce , 1/2 c .  chopped onion , 1/2 c .  chopped green pepper , 1 (16 oz . ) can whole kernel corn , drained , 1/2 c .  chopped celery . Here's the instruction : Boil carrots in water or cook in small amount of water in microwave just until tender; drain and place in 2-quart covered casserole .  Add onion , green pepper , corn and celery .  Combine the remaining ingredients; heat 3 minutes in the microwave on High .  Stir and pour over vegetables .  Cool , cover and marinate overnight in the refrigerator .  Makes 12 servings .  This salad will keep in the refrigerator at least one week .

question: I have vanilla eggs lemon extract flour confectioners sugar butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Old-Fashioned Pound Cake with 3 sticks butter , 1 lb .  confectioners sugar , 6 eggs , 2 c .  flour , 1 Tbsp .  lemon extract , 1 Tbsp .  vanilla extract . Here's the instruction : Cream together the butter and confectioners sugar .  Add the whole eggs , one at a time , beating each in well .  Gradually add the flour , beating continually .  Add lemon and vanilla extracts and mix thoroughly .  Put batter in greased Bundt pan and bake at 325° for 45 to 50 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean .

question: I have celery salt bread cubes eggs stalks celery water poultry seasoning margarine onions chicken salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chick Stakes Dressing with 2 qt .  dry bread cubes , 1/2 pt .  water , 8 chicken bouillon cubes , 1/2 doz .  large onions , 6 stalks celery , 2 cans chicken stakes (Fry Chick) , 1 Tbsp .  salt , 2 tsp .  poultry seasoning , 1 tsp .  savory or celery salt , 6 eggs , 1 1/2 cubes margarine . Here's the instruction : Place bread cubes in large mixing bowl and add enough water to soak and soften (about 1/2 pint) .  In a cup of warm water , soak 8 chicken bouillon cubes .  Into another bowl , mix onions cut fine and celery cut into medium pieces .  Add chicken steaks , salt , poultry seasoning and savory or celery salt .  Beat eggs and mix with broth from stakes and add to the mixture .  Now add the mixture to the softened bread crumbs .  Melt margarine; add and mix well .  Pour into well-greased casserole dish .  Bake about 2 hours at 350° or until golden brown .  Can be served with mushroom sauce , if desired .

question: I have cream of chicken soup cream of mushroom soup stove top stuffing chicken frozen peas . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken-Dressing Casserole with 1 chicken , 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 1 pkg .  Stove Top stuffing , 1 pkg .  frozen peas . Here's the instruction : Cook and debone chicken .  In a 13 x 9-inch baking dish , combine soups .  Lay chicken on top of soups .  Put in frozen peas .  Mix stuffing by directions on box; spread over chicken mixture .  Cover with foil and bake at 350° for 30 minutes .  Good to make ahead and freeze .

question: I have egg ginger hot water baking soda cloves cinnamon flour light molasses butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Old Fashioned Molasses Cake with 1 1/2 c .  sifted all-purpose flour , 1 1/2 tsp .  baking soda , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 tsp .  ginger , 1/4 tsp .  cloves , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1 egg , beaten , 1/2 c .  butter , melted , 1 c .  light molasses , 1/2 c .  hot water . Serve warm .  It's a very good cake .

question: I have baking powder sugar flour margarine corn starch peaches salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Peach Cobbler with 4 Tbsp .  margarine , 3/4 c .  sugar , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 c .  flour , fresh peaches , 1 c .  sugar , 1 Tbsp .  corn starch , 1/4 tsp .  salt . Here's the instruction : Mix together margarine , 3/4 c .  sugar , baking powder , salt , and flour .  Put fresh peaches in bottom of 9x9 baking dish .  Put batter on top of peaches .  Mix together sugar , cornstarch , and salt , and put over batter .  Pour in 1 c .  boiling water .  Do not mix .  Bake 350° .

question: I have condensed milk egg ground nutmeg rum flavoring whipping cream . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Magic Eggnog Sauce with 1 egg , 1 1/3 c .  sweetened condensed milk , 1/2 tsp .  rum flavoring , 1/2 tsp .  ground nutmeg , 1 pt .  whipping cream . Here's the instruction : Beat eggs until foamy in top of a double boiler; stir in condensed milk .  Cook over hot , not boiling , water 10 minutes .  Stir rum flavoring and nutmeg; fold in whipped cream .  Serve hot or cold over fruitcake or ice cream .  Yield: about 2 cups .

question: I have vanilla baking soda light brown sugar eggs flour banana butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Banana Bread with 2 1/2 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 1/2 c .  light brown sugar , 3 c .  banana , mashed , 1 1/2 tsp .  baking soda , 3/4 c .  butter , 2 large eggs , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Combine baking soda , flour and salt with wire whisk .  Cream butter and sugar together .  Add eggs , banana and vanilla; beat until medium thick .  Add flour mixture . question: I have chicken breasts fresh parsley eggs parmesan cheese cooking oil chicken broth lemon marsala wine butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have haddock fillet pepper soy sauce water cornstarch ginger root carrots broccoli shrimp garlic olive oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla marshmallow creme nuts margarine milk semi-sweet chocolate pieces salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have eggs light brown sugar orange slices pecans flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have peas tuna mushroom soup egg noodles fresh mushrooms . Give me some cooking ideas .

Here's the instruction : Boil noodles until done , drain .  Add tuna , drained , soup and 1 1/2 cans of water .  Drain and add peas and mushrooms .  Mix thoroughly and simmer until warm .  Salt and pepper to taste .  Quick and delicious .

question: I have cabbage ground red pepper sugar tart apples season-all nutmeg pecans onions cider vinegar butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sauteed Cabbage And Apples with 2 large tart apples , 1/3 c .  butter , 8 c .  coarsely shredded cabbage , 1/4 c .  chopped instant onions , 1 tsp .  Season-All , 1/2 tsp .  nutmeg , 3 Tbsp .  cider vinegar , 2 tsp .  sugar , dash of ground red pepper , 1/4 c .  chopped pecans or walnuts (optional) . Here's the instruction : Peel , core and chop apples .  Melt butter (bacon drippings may be used if you prefer) .  Add apples , cabbage , onions , Season-All and nutmeg .  Mix well .  Cover and cook over low heat 20 minutes , stirring frequently .  Combine vinegar , sugar and red pepper .  Add to cabbage .  Cook 5 minutes longer .  Stir in nuts or serve with nuts sprinkled over top .  This is one of those dishes you will find even better when reheated .  Excellent served with pork , duckling , goose and game .  Serves 4 to 5 .

question: I have oil sugar vanilla eggs powdered sugar baking soda flour cream of tartar butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mrs. Barrett'S Sugar Cookies with 1 c .  sugar , 1 c .  powdered sugar , packed , 2 sticks butter , 1 c .  oil , 2 eggs , 5 c .  plain flour , 1 Tbsp .  baking soda , 1 Tbsp .  cream of tartar , 2 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Mix all ingredients together until smooth .  Grease cookie sheets or use parchment paper .  Bake 8 to 10 minutes , until lightly browned .  Cookies are very light and will melt in your mouth .

question: I have egg capful whiskey thyme cheese fresh black pepper capful red deli ground beef ketchup bread crumbs salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Manhattan Meat Loaf with 1 lb .  93% ground beef , 1 egg , 1 c .  plain bread crumbs , ketchup , salt to taste , fresh black pepper to taste , 1/4 tsp .  thyme , 1 capful whiskey , 1 capful red vermouth , 6 slices cheese (American , Swiss , Cheddar) , 6 slices deli baked ham . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Spray cookie sheet with Pam .  Spread wax paper on counter .  Roll hamburg into a large ball .  Place hamburg on wax paper .  Punch a hole in hamburg with fist .  Crack and drop egg into well .  Ring the top of well with ketchup .  Ring the bottom of well with bread crumbs .  Season with salt , pepper and thyme .  Sprinkle on the whiskey and vermouth .  Knead entire mixture until all is combined .  Add more bread crumbs , if necessary .  Spread out 18-inch wax paper .  Transfer mixture to wax paper .  Roll out in a rectangle 5 x 9 x 1/4-inch .  Alternate ham and cheese slices .  Roll up like a jelly roll .  Tuck in all corners .  Place on greased sheet .  Bake 1 hour .

question: I have sugar crisco baking powder eggs flour anise seed white wine milk lemon . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Domenica'S Ciambellone with 1 c .  Crisco , 1 1/4 c .  sugar , 3 eggs , 1/2 c .  milk , 2 - 3 c .  flour , 1/2 c .  white wine , 1 tsp .  anise seed , rind from 1 lemon , 3 tsp .  baking powder . Here's the instruction : Mix sugar , Crisco; add eggs and beat well .  Add anise , lemon rind , milk , baking powder and flour .  Last , add wine to batter and beat well .  Pour batter into tube pan .  If desired; sprinkle batter with sugar or confetti .  Bake at 350° for 1 hour .

question: I have red wine vinegar chili powder ground cloves mace ground black pepper tomatoe sauce unsweetened baker's chocolate nutmeg cinnamon water ground chuck coriander onions paprika turmeric allspice ketchup honey salt ground cumin ground cardamom marjoram garlic bay leaf . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cincinnati-Style Chili with 1 lb .  fine ground chuck , 2 medium onions , 2 cloves garlic , minced , 1 c .  tomatoe sauce (I'm from Indiana; Dan Quale spelling mode) , 2 Tbsp .  ketchup (or is it catsup?) , 1 c .  water , 1 Tbsp .  red wine vinegar , 1 tsp .  honey , 1/2 oz .  unsweetened Baker's chocolate , grated , 1 Tbsp .  chili powder , 1 Tbsp .  paprika , 1 tsp .  ground black pepper , 1/2 tsp .  ground cumin , 1/2 tsp .  turmeric , 1/2 tsp .  marjoram , 1/2 tsp .  allspice , 1/4 tsp .  nutmeg , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/4 tsp .  ground cloves , 1/4 tsp .  mace , 1/4 tsp .  coriander , 1/4 tsp .  ground cardamom , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 dry bay leaf , crumbled . Cover and simmer on low heat for 1 hour .

question: I have head lettuce bacon sugar cheddar cheese celery salad dressing red onion green pepper frozen peas . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make 7 Layer Salad with 1 large head lettuce , 1 green pepper , diced , 1 small red onion , diced , 1 c .  celery , diced , 10 oz .  pkg .  frozen peas , 1/2 lb .  bacon , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 1/2 lb .  grated Cheddar cheese , 2 c .  salad dressing . Here's the instruction : Place the first 5 ingredients in a large salad bowl .  Layer them; do not mix them together .  Spread over 2 cups salad dressing to seal in the 5 ingredients .  Sprinkle 2 tablespoons sugar over salad dressing .  Fry 1/2 pound bacon until very crisp , then cool , crumble and sprinkle over the top .  Also sprinkle 1/2 pound grated Cheddar cheese .  Cover and chill for 8 hours .

question: I have instant vanilla pudding powdered sugar cream cheese oreo cookies milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Oreo Cookie Dessert with 1 (20 oz . ) pkg .  Oreo cookies , 1 (8 oz . ) cream cheese , 2 c .  powdered sugar , 2 small pkg .  instant vanilla pudding , 3 c .  milk , 1 (8 oz . ) Cool Whip . Here's the instruction : Put cookies in blender or food processor to crumble up fine , then set aside .  Cream the cream cheese and powdered sugar , then set aside .  Mix pudding and milk together , then add cream cheese mixture to the pudding mix .  Fold in Cool Whip .  In 9 x 13-inch dish , put a layer of Oreo mixture , then pudding mix; repeat this until all used up ending with Oreo mixture on top .

question: I have soy sauce coriander seed brown sugar ground black pepper pork chops garlic . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Grilled Coriander Pepper Pork Chops with 2 cloves garlic , crushed , 1 Tbsp .  crushed coriander seed , 1 Tbsp .  coarsely ground black pepper , 1 Tbsp .  brown sugar , 3 Tbsp .  soy sauce , 4 boneless pork chops (about 1-inch thick) . Here's the instruction : Heat outdoor grill .  Combine all ingredients except pork chops .  Place chops in shallow dish and pour marinade over them .  Marinate 30 minutes .  Drain pork , discarding marinade .  Grill chops over indirect medium-hot heat 12 to 15 minutes , turning once .

question: I have low-fat mayonnaise basmati rice salt lemon juice green onion celery low-fat sour cream avocado . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Avocado Rice Salad with 1 1/2 c .  cubed avocado , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1 1/2 c .  cubed , cooked chicken* , 1 1/4 c .  cooked Basmati rice , 1/2 c .  finely chopped celery , 1 tsp .  chopped green onion , 1 tsp .  salt , 2 plus Tbsp .  low-fat sour cream , 2 plus Tbsp .  low-fat mayonnaise . Here's the instruction : * Four small to medium-size breast halves on a plate covered with plastic lid will cook in 5 minutes in microwave .

question: I have cream of chicken soup sour cream water chestnuts crackers cheddar cheese onions paprika butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Vidalia Onion Casserole with 6 medium onions , sliced , 1 pt .  sour cream , 1 can water chestnuts , 1/2 tsp .  paprika , 1/4 c .  butter , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 2 c .  Cheddar cheese , grated , 2 c .  Ritz crackers , crushed . Here's the instruction : In greased casserole , arrange onions .  Mix together other ingredients except cracker crumbs and pour over onions .  Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes .  Top with cracker crumbs .

question: I have buttermilk ground red pepper baking powder sugar cheddar cheese ham egg whites flour cooking spray butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Ham And Cheese Scones with 2 c .  all-purpose flour , 1 Tbsp .  baking powder , 2 tsp .  sugar , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  ground red pepper , 3 Tbsp .  chilled butter , cut into small pieces , 3/4 c .  (3 oz . ) shredded reduced-fat extra-sharp Cheddar cheese , 3/4 c .  finely chopped 33% less-sodium ham (3 oz . ) , 3/4 c .  fat-free buttermilk , 2 large egg whites , cooking spray . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 400° .  Lightly spoon flour into dry measuring cup; level with a knife .  Combine flour , baking powder , sugar , salt and pepper in a large bowl .  Cut in butter with a pastry blender or 2 knives until mixture resembles coarse meal .  Stir in cheese and ham .  Combine buttermilk and egg whites , stirring with a whisk .  Add to flour mixture , stirring just until moist .  Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface; knead lightly 4 to 5 times with floured hands .  Pat dough into an 8-inch circle on a baking sheet coated with cooking spray .  Cut dough into 8 wedges , cutting into but not through dough .  Bake at 400° for 20 minutes or until lightly browned .  Makes 8 servings .

question: I have sugar pepper eggs onion flour butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Squash Fritters with 2 c .  grated yellow squash , 1 Tbsp .  grated onion , 1 tsp .  sugar , 1 tsp .  salt , 6 Tbsp .  flour , 2 beaten eggs , 2 Tbsp .  melted butter , 1/4 tsp .  pepper . Here's the instruction : Combine squash , sugar , salt , flour , onion and pepper .  Add beaten eggs and melted butter; mix .  Drop by tablespoons onto oiled griddle .  Cook on both sides until brown .  Serve immediately .

question: I have chili sauce eggs grape jelly ground beef garlic salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cocktail Meatballs with 2 lb .  ground beef , 2 eggs , 1 or 2 cloves garlic , mashed or 1/2 tsp .  garlic powder , salt and pepper , 1 (12 oz . ) bottle chili sauce , 6 oz .  grape jelly . Here's the instruction : Combine ground beef with eggs , garlic , salt and pepper to taste .  Form into walnut-size balls .  Brown in a skillet with a little margarine or oil , if necessary .

question: I have vinegar sugar eggs pineapple juice flour cherries grapes walnuts apples oranges pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Extra-Ordinary Ambrosia with 2 c .  diced apples , 1 c .  chunk pineapple , 1 c .  grapes , halved , 1 c .  oranges , cut up , 1/2 c .  cherries , halved , 1 c .  chopped walnuts , 2 eggs , well beaten , 1 c .  pineapple juice , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1 Tbsp .  flour , 1 Tbsp .  vinegar . In a large bowl , blend all fruits and nuts .  Pour egg sauce over fruit mix; blend well .  Chill and serve .

question: I have white syrup vanilla brown sugar baking soda cereal butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sweet Chex-Mix with 1 c .  brown sugar , 1 stick butter , 1/2 c .  white syrup , 1/2 tsp .  baking soda , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 box Chex cereal . Here's the instruction : Mix brown sugar , butter and syrup .  Boil for 3 to 4 minutes in microwave .  Add baking soda and vanilla; stir it up good .  Spray paper bag with Pam .  Pour box of cereal in bag , then add mixture .  Stir up good .  Put in microwave and cook on Full power for 1 1/2 minutes .  Shake bag well .  Put back in 1 1/2 minutes .  Shake well again .  Put back in 1 minute more , then shake .  Pour onto wax paper .

question: I have pepper soy sauce cream of mushroom soup green beans onions milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Green Bean Bake with 3 c .  cooked green beans (cut or French-style) , 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 1 tsp .  soy sauce , 1 (3 1/2 oz . ) can French fried onions , 1/2 c .  milk , dash of pepper . Top with remaining onions and continue baking for 5 minutes .  Makes 4 to 6 servings .

question: I have new ginger soy sauce light brown sugar clove garlic sesame oil . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Steak Teriyaki with 4 small (3/4-inch) New York strip steaks , 1 1/4 c .  light brown sugar , 1 c .  light soy sauce , 1 1/2-inch piece fresh ginger , peeled and grated , 1/2 clove garlic , 1/8 tsp .  sesame oil . Cover and refrigerate at least 3 hours or overnight .  Turn steaks occasionally .

question: I have rice celery soup cheese broccoli . Give me some cooking ideas .

Bake at 425° for 20 to 25 minutes .

question: I have mozzarella cheese rigatoni pizza sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pizzaria with 1 pkg .  rigatoni , 1 jar Pizza Quick or any pizza sauce , 1 ball Mozzarella cheese , grated , all your favorite pizza toppings * . Here's the instruction : *Onions , olives , mushrooms , tomatoes , bell peppers , pepperoni , sausage , Canadian bacon , etc .

question: I have oregano macaroni pepperoni slices mozzarella cheese onion water basil garlic powder ground beef tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pizza Casserole with 1 lb .  ground beef , 1 onion , chopped , 2 c .  macaroni (uncooked) , 2 (8 oz . ) cans tomato sauce , 1/4 c .  water , 1/2 tsp .  garlic powder , 1/2 tsp .  basil , 1/2 tsp .  oregano , 8 oz .  pkg .  Mozzarella cheese , shredded , 1/2 pkg .  pepperoni slices . Here's the instruction : Brown ground beef and onion in large skillet; drain grease .  Add tomato sauce , water , spices and macaroni .  Mix thoroughly .  In greased 8 x 10-inch casserole dish , layer one-half of beef mixture and top with half of cheese . question: I have cream of chicken soup stuffing mix chicken breasts cream of mushroom soup butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Casserole with 4 large chicken breasts , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  stuffing mix , 1/2 c .  butter or margarine , melted . Here's the instruction : Cook chicken .  Remove from broth .  Strain broth , reserving 2 2/3 cups .  Bone chicken and cut in small pieces .  Combine chicken soup with 1/2 of broth; mix well .  Combine mushroom soup with remaining broth and mix well .  Combine stuffing mix and butter .  Reserve 1/4 for garnish .  Spoon 1/2 of remaining stuffing into greased 13 x 9-inch pan .  Now layer chicken , soup mixture , chicken , mushroom soup mixture and remaining stuffing mixture .  Cover and refrigerate overnight .  Remove casserole from refrigerator 15 minutes before baking .  Uncover and bake at 350° for 30 to 45 minutes .  Serves 8 to 10 .

question: I have sugar vanilla cherry cream cheese graham crackers . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make No-Bake Cheesecake with graham crackers (whole) , 2 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 3/4 c .  sugar , 13 oz .  Cool Whip , 1 to 2 cans cherry or favorite pie filling . Here's the instruction : Line a 9 x 13-inch pan with graham crackers .  Soften cream cheese and beat with vanilla and sugar .  Fold in Cool Whip .  Pour over crackers .  Top with pie filling .  Refrigerate at least 4 hours before serving .

question: I have sugar red food coloring water cornstarch strawberry gelatin unsweetened strawberries salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fresh Strawberry Pie with 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 1 1/2 c .  water , 1/4 c .  cornstarch , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1 (3 oz . ) pkg .  strawberry gelatin , red food coloring (as desired) , unsweetened strawberries . Here's the instruction : Combine sugar , water , cornstarch and salt; cook until clear .  Remove from heat; add red food coloring and gelatin .  Stir well and allow to cool .  Put strawberries in prebaked pie shell .  Pour sauce over berries and chill top with whipped cream or Cool Whip; serve .

question: I have velveeta cheese milk crackers cream of broccoli soup broccoli cauliflower mayonnaise butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli-Cauliflower Bake with 1 bunch broccoli , 1 head cauliflower , 1 pkg .  Ritz crackers , 1 can cream of broccoli soup , 1 lb .  shredded Velveeta cheese , 1 stick butter , 1 c .  mayonnaise , 1 c .  milk , dash of salt and pepper . Here's the instruction : Cook or steam vegetables until almost done .  Mix soup with milk and mayonnaise .  Beat for 2 minutes .  Melt butter .  Crumble crackers in fine pieces . question: I have garlic salt parmesan cheese cream cheese milk frozen broccoli chicken salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cheesy Chicken Casserole with 2 (10 oz . ) pkg .  frozen broccoli spears , thawed , 2 c .  milk , 2 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  garlic salt , 1 1/2 c .  grated Parmesan cheese , 10 to 12 slices cooked chicken or turkey . Here's the instruction : Cut broccoli spears into bite size pieces and place in bottom of greased crock-pot .  In saucepan , blend milk , cream cheese , salt , garlic salt and Parmesan cheese over low heat until melted and smooth .  Pour one cup over broccoli; top with sliced chicken .  Pour remaining sauce over chicken .  Cover and cook on low 4 to 6 hours .  Serves 4 to 6 .

question: I have buttermilk sugar vanilla baking soda eggs water flour cocoa butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Wet Chocolate Cake with 2 c .  flour , 2 c .  sugar , 2 sticks butter , 4 Tbsp .  cocoa , 1 c .  warm water , 1/2 c .  buttermilk , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 2 eggs , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Sift together flour and sugar .  In saucepan add butter , cocoa and warm water .  Bring to boil and pour over dry ingredients .  Mix well , then add buttermilk , baking soda , eggs and vanilla .  Mix well .  Pour in large oblong pan .  Bake at 350° for 40 minutes .

question: I have sugar vanilla nutmeg brown sugar cinnamon applesauce raisins flour cornstarch cherries walnuts apples butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mr. Bill'S Fruit Crisp with 8 cooking apples , 1 1/4 c .  applesauce , 1 can cherries , 3/4 c .  raisins , 1 c .  sugar , 1 1/4 c .  cornstarch , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/2 tsp .  nutmeg , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  chopped walnuts , 1 c .  flour , 1 c .  brown sugar , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , pinch of salt , pinch of nutmeg , 1 1/4 sticks butter . Here's the instruction : Peel , core and slice apples .  Add applesauce , cherries and raisins .  Combine sugar , cornstarch , cinnamon and nutmeg , then add to fruit .  Stir in vanilla .

question: I have syrup cream butter white sugar . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Vanilla Cream Caramels with 2 c .  white sugar , 2 c .  dark Karo syrup , 1 c .  butter , 2 c .  cream , half and half or evaporated milk . Here's the instruction : Stir the sugar , Karo , butter and 1 cup cream over low heat until sugar dissolves .  Cook , stirring constantly , over medium heat to 240° .  Reduce heat .  Add slowly the second cup of cream .  Increase heat to medium and bring to 245° .  Pour at once , without scraping , onto buttered 9 x 13-inch pan or marble slab (with sides) .  (Scrape bottom and sides of pan onto a second buttered pan; this candy will be more brittle , but is still great for eating . )

question: I have lemon juice heavy cream swiss cheese mushrooms whitefish flour shallots wine butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Whitefish Poached In Wine with 2 1/2 lb .  whitefish , 1 1/2 c .  wine and water (50-50) , 2 Tbsp .  chopped shallots , mushrooms , 1 c .  or to taste , sauteed in butter , 3 Tbsp .  butter , 2 1/2 tsp .  flour , 1/2 c .  heavy cream , 1/4 c .  shredded Swiss cheese , lemon juice , salt and pepper to taste . Here's the instruction : In buttered pie pan put 1 tablespoon shallots on bottom , layer fish on top in single layer .  Cover with remaining shallots and the mushrooms , dot with butter , salt and pepper .  Pour wine and water over just barely to cover .  Bring to low simmer on stove; cover with wax paper coated with butter .  Put in bottom third of oven , preheated to 350° for 8 to 12 minutes .

question: I have others own faults kind deeds prayers sacrifice consideration . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Happiness Cake with 1 c .  good thoughts , 3 c .  forgiveness for others , 1 c .  consideration , 2 c .  sacrifice , 1 c .  kind deeds , 2 c .  own faults , well beaten , 4 c .  prayers . Here's the instruction : Mix thoroughly; add tears of joy , sorrow and sympathy .  Flavor with love and kindly service .  Fold in 4 cups of prayers , faith and enthusiasm; spread all into your daily life .  Blend well with human kindness; serve with a smile at all times and it will satisfy the hunger of many people less fortunate than ourselves .

question: I have white choc sugar baking powder vanilla oats chunks brown sugar eggs baking soda pecans flour butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cowboy Cookies with 1 c butter flavored Crisco , 1 c brown sugar , 1 c sugar , 2 eggs , 2 c flour , 1 tsp salt , 1 tsp baking soda , 1/2 tsp baking powder , 1 tsp vanilla , 2 cups old fashioned oats , 1 pkg choc chunks , 1 1/2 cups pecans , 1 block white choc (chipped up) opt . Here's the instruction : Combine all ingredients and drop by tablespoon on cookie sheet .  Bake at 350° for 12-15 minutes or until lightly browned .  You can use choc chips instead of chunks 'cause the chunks are hard to find .  Enjoy!

question: I have sugar egg whites flour walnuts butter apricot preserves egg yolks . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Apricot Meringue Bars(Makes 16 Servings)   with 1/2 c .  soft butter or margarine , 1/2 c .  sugar , 2 egg yolks , 1 1/4 c .  sifted flour , 1 c .  apricot preserves , 2 egg whites , 1/3 c .  sugar , 1 c .  finely chopped walnuts . Here's the instruction : Set oven at moderate 350° .  Blend butter , 1/2 cup sugar and egg yolks .  Work in flour .  Lightly flour hands and pat into well-greased 7 1/2 x 11 1/2-inch baking dish .  Bake 15 minutes .  Remove from oven and spread evenly with preserves .  Beat egg whites until foamy; gradually beat in 1/3 cup sugar .  Continue beating until peaks form , then fold in nuts .  Spread carefully over preserves .  Return to oven and bake 25 minutes .  Cool and cut into bars .  Makes about 16 .

question: I have cream cheese margarine chocolate pudding oreo cookies . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs pecans syrup butter ready . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Georgia Pecan Pie with 1 c .  dark Karo syrup , 1/2 c .  butter , 1 c .  whole or chopped pecans , 1/2 c .  sugar , 3 eggs , 1/2 tsp .  vanilla , 1 ready to bake pie shell . question: I have brown sugar pecans salt egg whites . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Meringues with 2 egg whites , 3/4 c .  brown sugar , firmly packed , pinch of salt , 2 c .  pecans . Here's the instruction : Beat egg whites at room temperature until stiff peaks form .  Gradually add sugar , beating until well blended .  Fold in remaining ingredients .  Drop by teaspoon onto greased cookie sheet .  Bake at 250° for 30 minutes .

question: I have oleo egg pepper cheddar cheese flour cracker crumbs milk salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Asparagus Casserole with 1 boiled egg , sliced , 1 can asparagus spears , drained , 3/4 c .  grated Cheddar cheese , 1 Tbsp .  oleo , 1 Tbsp .  flour , 1 c .  milk , salt , pepper , crushed cracker crumbs . question: I have corn vanilla corn syrup brown sugar soda butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Oven Caramel Corn with 2 c .  brown sugar , 1 c .  butter or margarine , 1/2 c .  corn syrup , 6 qt .  popped corn , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 tsp .  soda . question: I have buttermilk oil sugar eggs flour . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have ground round white bread salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have cottage cheese mozzarella noodles mushrooms cheddar ground beef . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lasagna with 1 lb .  ground beef , 1 jar spaghetti sauce with mushrooms , 1 c .  cottage cheese , 1 c .  Mozzarella , 1 c .  Cheddar , 1 box noodles . Here's the instruction : Cook noodles , then drain them .  Layer with all ingredients , starting with small amount of sauce .  Put cheese on top of each layer .  Bake at 350° for 30 minutes .

question: I have sugar baking soda eggs flour nuts mandarin oranges pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mexican Wedding Cake with 2 c .  flour , 2 c .  sugar , 2 tsp .  baking soda , 2 beaten eggs , 1 c .  chopped nuts , 1 (20 oz . ) can crushed pineapple and juice , 1 can mandarin oranges , drained . question: I have provolone cheese sauce mozzarella cheese pepperoni . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Spaghetti Bake with 1 (2 lb . ) box spaghetti , 1 to 1 1/2 cans or jars spaghetti sauce , 1 (16 oz . ) pkg .  Mozzarella cheese , 1 (16 oz . ) pkg .  Provolone cheese , 1 pkg .  pepperoni . Here's the instruction : Cook spaghetti .  Start with 1 layer of spaghetti .  Cover with sauce , then layer of cheese .  Repeat .  When finished , place pepperoni on top .  Bake until cheese melts , approximately 45 minutes .

question: I have baking powder sugar oats cold water flour peaches cherry pie filling butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Deep Dish Cherry-Peach Pie with 1 1/4 c .  flour , 1 1/4 c .  oats (quick or old-fashioned) , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 3/4 c .  butter , 2 Tbsp .  cold water , 20 oz .  can cherry pie filling , 16 oz .  can sliced peaches in juice , drained . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 400° .  Combine flour , 1 cup of oats , sugar and baking powder .  Cut 1/2 cup butter in until crumbly .  Remove 1 cup of mixture and combine with 1/4 cup oats .  Cut in 1/4 cup butter until crumbly; set aside .  Mix water and remaining oat mixture with fork , just until moistened .  Press in bottom of 9-inch deep-dish pie pan .  Bake 15 minutes .  Cool slightly .

question: I have sugar marshmallows pecans lime gelatin cottage cheese boiling water pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Jiffy Lime Salad with 1 small pkg .  lime gelatin , 1 c .  miniature marshmallows , 1 c .  boiling water , 1 c .  crushed pineapple , 1 c .  cottage cheese , 1/4 c .  sugar , 1 c .  chopped pecans . Here's the instruction : Dissolve gelatin and marshmallows in boiling water in bowl .  Cool .  Stir in remaining ingredients .  Pour into 1 1/2 quart mold .  Chill until firm .  Unmold on serving plate .  Garnish with whipped cream and cherries .

question: I have tomatoes pepper green peppers hamburg salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Stuffed Pepper For 2 with 2 Green Peppers , 1/3 lb .  Hamburg , 1 c .  cooked Rice , 2/3 tsp .  Salt , dash Pepper , 1 can Diced Tomatoes . Here's the instruction : Cut out stem and seeds from Peppers with a grapefruit knife .  Rinse Peppers out .  Boil 5 minutes .  Drain .  Mix remaining ingredients .  Stuff Peppers with mixture and bake at 350 for about 1 hour .

question: I have sugar lemon juice nonfat vanilla fresh strawberries crushed ice . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Nonfat Strawberry Smoothie with 2 c .  nonfat vanilla frozen yogurt , 1 1/2 c .  fresh strawberries , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 2 tsp .  lemon juice , 2 c .  crushed ice , additional fresh strawberries . Here's the instruction : Combine yogurt , 1 1/2 cups strawberries , sugar , lemon juice and ice in container of an electric blender; process until smooth .  Garnish with additional strawberries .

question: I have eggs powdered sugar cream cheese nuts margarine yellow cake mix . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Neiman-Marcus Bars with 1 box yellow cake mix , 3 eggs , 1 stick margarine , softened , 1 c .  chopped nuts , 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , softened , 1 box 10x powdered sugar . Here's the instruction : Mix 1 egg with margarine , nuts and cake mix by hand; pat into Pam sprayed 3 or 4-quart baking dish .  Cream the cream cheese with 2 eggs; add sugar .  Mix well; spread over cake layer .  Bake at 350° for 40 minutes .

question: I have vanilla chocolate syrup graham cracker crumbs eggs powdered sugar bananas margarine pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Banana Split Cake with 2 c .  graham cracker crumbs , 1 stick melted margarine , 2 eggs , 2 c .  powdered sugar , 2 sticks margarine , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 large can crushed pineapple , well drained , 1 large container Cool Whip , chocolate syrup , nuts and maraschino cherries , at least 5 large bananas . Here's the instruction : Mix thoroughly and press in bottom of 9 x 12-inch pan the graham crackers and 1 stick margarine .  Then layer over graham cracker crust as follows: layer of sliced bananas , layer pineapple , then Cool Whip .  Garnish with chocolate syrup , nuts and maraschino cherries .  Refrigerate at least 8 hours or longer before serving .

question: I have vinegar sugar cucumbers ground cloves celery onions turmeric salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Bread And Butter Pickles with 1 gal .  cucumbers , sliced , 8 small onions , sliced , 1 c .  salt , 5 c .  vinegar , 4 1/2 c .  sugar , 1 tsp .  ground cloves , 1 tsp .  mustard seed , 1 tsp .  celery seed , 2 tsp .  turmeric . Here's the instruction : Dissolve this and let come to a boil .  Drain cucumbers well and put in mixture .  Let come to a boil .  Should make 6 pints .

question: I have apple sugar gelatin pecans fresh cranberries mandarin oranges pineapple strawberry jello . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Christmas Cranberry Salad with 1 c .  sugar , 1 family size pkg .  strawberry jello , 1 envelope plain gelatin , 1 c .  pecans , ground , 1 lb .  fresh cranberries , cooked , 1 (No .  2) can crushed pineapple , 1 can mandarin oranges , cut in half , 1 diced apple . Here's the instruction : Follow directions on gelatin using 2 cups of boiling water and plain gelatin .  Add sugar .  Mix to dissolve .  Add the rest of the ingredients .  Mix well and chill .

question: I have oil vinegar sugar onion tomato soup worcestershire sauce carrots mustard green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Copper Dollars with 2 lb .  carrots , 1 large onion , 1 large green pepper , 1 c .  sugar , 1 can tomato soup , 3/4 c .  vinegar , 1/2 c .  oil , 1 tsp .  Worcestershire sauce , 1 tsp .  mustard , salt and pepper to taste . Here's the instruction : Peel and slice carrots into thin slices .  Steam until crisp-tender .  Slice and separate onion into rings; cut pepper into strips .  Combine carrots , onion and pepper in a large bowl .

question: I have apricot preserves chicken dressing onion soup . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sweet And Sour Chicken with 1 chicken , cut in pieces , 1 (8 oz . ) apricot preserves , 1 onion soup mix pkg .  , 1 small bottle Russian dressing . Here's the instruction : Put chicken in pan .  Mix other ingredients together .  Pour over chicken .  Bake at 325° for 1 hour and 15 minutes .  Cooked sauce can be used over rice as a side dish .

question: I have sugar brown sugar eggs soda flour chocolate chips butter crunchy peanut butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make World'S Greatest Cookie with 1 c .  butter or margarine , 1 c .  crunchy peanut butter , 1 c .  granulated sugar , 1 c .  brown sugar , 2 eggs , 2 c .  plain flour , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 (6 oz . ) pkg .  chocolate chips . Here's the instruction : In a large bowl , cream together until smooth the butter and peanut butter .  Add gradually the granulated sugar and brown sugar , creaming until blended .  Add eggs , one at a time , and beat until smooth .  Add flour and soda .  Stir in chocolate chips .  Drop from a teaspoon onto greased cookie sheet and flatten with back of teaspoon .  Bake at 325° for 15 minutes or until golden .  Makes 6 dozen .

question: I have chicken breasts rosemary clove garlic cornstarch pineapple lemon mustard worcestershire sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Baked Pineapple Chicken with 1 (20 oz . ) can pineapple slices , 1 clove garlic , crushed , 2 tsp .  cornstarch , 2 tsp .  Worcestershire sauce , 2 tsp .  Dijon mustard , 1 tsp .  rosemary , crushed , 6 half chicken breasts , boned , 1 lemon , thinly sliced . Here's the instruction : Drain pineapple; reserve juice .  Combine reserved juice with garlic , cornstarch , Worcestershire sauce , mustard and rosemary .  Arrange chicken in shallow baking dish on broiler-proof dish , skin side up .  Broil until browned .  Stir sauce; pour over chicken .  Bake at 400° for 30 minutes .

question: I have chicken breasts romano cheese extra virgin olive oil red pepper freshly ground black pepper basil garlic . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken And Penne Pasta With Kalamata Olives with about 5 Tbsp .  extra virgin olive oil , red pepper flakes , 4 to 6 garlic cloves , chopped or sliced , 3 or 4 boneless chicken breasts , freshly ground black pepper to taste , grated Romano cheese (optional) , basil leaves . Here's the instruction : Cut white meat chicken up into 1-inch pieces .  Pit the kalamata olives and cut each olive into 3 or 4 pieces .  Chop or slice garlic .  Cut the basil leaves into strips .  Begin heating a large pot of salted water to boiling .  When water begins to boil , add pasta .  Don't overcook! When done , drain pasta and put in a large pasta bowl .  Drizzle liberally with olive oil , then salt and pepper to taste (I like plenty of pepper here) and stir .

question: I have vinegar sugar eggs onion cream cheese butter green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lu Lu Paste Dip(Great For Veggies)   with 8 oz .  cream cheese , 1 small onion , minced , 1/2 green pepper , minced , 2 eggs , well beaten , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 3 Tbsp .  vinegar , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 Tbsp .  butter . Here's the instruction : Mix cream cheese , onion and green pepper together and set aside .  In saucepan , put sugar , vinegar , salt and well beaten eggs .  Cook over medium heat until thickened .  Don't let eggs cook too fast .  Remove from heat .  Add butter .  Let hot mixture cool .  Mix all ingredients together and chill .

question: I have mix eggs onion broccoli cottage cheese butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli Cornbread with 2 pkg .  Jiffy cornbread mix , 4 eggs , 2 sticks butter , melted , 1 box frozen chopped broccoli , thawed , 1 chopped onion , 1 c .  cottage cheese (add a little milk to be able to pour) . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients .  Spray dish with Pam cooking spray .  Bake at 300° to 325°° for 1 hour .

question: I have bisquick egg sugar vanilla shortening fresh fruit milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Velvet Crumb Cake with 1 1/2 c .  Bisquick , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1 egg , 1/2 c .  milk , 2 Tbsp .  shortening or oil , 1 tsp .  vanilla , fresh fruit and whipped cream or Cool Whip . Here's the instruction : Grease and flour an 8 x 8 x 2-inch square pan or a 9-inch round pan .  Beat all ingredients until well blended and pour into pan .  Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes or until wooden toothpick inserted in center comes out clean .  Cool .  Serve with fresh fruit and whipped cream or with Cool Whip as desired .

question: I have tomatoes pepper green peppers mushrooms pork clove garlic white wine olive oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Neapolitan Pork Chops with 2 Tbsp .  olive oil , 1 clove garlic , minced , 6 pork rib or loin chops (cut about 3/4 to 1-inch thick) , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 1 lb .  mushrooms , cleaned and sliced , 2 green peppers , cleaned and chopped , 1/2 c .  canned tomatoes , sieved , 3 Tbsp .  dry white wine . Here's the instruction : Heat oil in a large heavy skillet .  Add garlic and cook until lightly browned .  Season chops with salt and pepper .  Put chops in skillet and brown on both sides .  Add mushrooms , green pepper , sieved tomatoes and wine .  Cover and cook over low heat about 1 hour or until tender .  Makes 6 servings .

question: I have butter onion baking potatoes salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Baked Potatoes With Onions with 4 medium baking potatoes , 1 medium onion , cut in half lengthwise , 2 Tbsp .  butter or margarine , salt to taste , other seasonings can be used (optional) . Here's the instruction : Cut potatoes crosswise into 1/8 to 1/4-inch slices , being careful not to cut all the way through .  Slice halved onion into thin slices .  Wedge these slices into potato cuts .  Brush with melted butter and season .  Wrap tightly in foil .  Bake at 350° for 1 to 1 1/2 hours until done .  Serves 4 .

question: I have eggs sharp cheese white hominy milk garlic butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Baked Cheese Garlic Grits with 1 c .  white hominy quick grits , 1 1/2 c .  shredded sharp cheese , 1/2 c .  butter or margarine , 1/2 c .  milk , 2 eggs , well beaten , 1 small garlic clove , crushed . Here's the instruction : Prepare grits in boiling salt water .  Stir in cheese , butter or margarine , milk , eggs and garlic .  Cook over low heat until cheese is melted .  Pour into a 2-quart greased casserole .  Bake in a preheated oven at 350° for 1 hour .

question: I have tomatoes stalks celery veal bones yellow squash tomato paste frozen peas water celery peppercorns onion basil onions carrots beef salt bacon corn pepper okra white turnips marjoram parsley bay leaf pearl barley . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Okra And Corn Gumbo with 4 slices bacon , chopped , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  pepper , 1 stalk celery , chopped , 1 onion , chopped , 3 lb .  okra , 10 large tomatoes , cut up , 1 1/2 c .  corn , 1 small can tomato paste , 3 qt .  water , 2 large beef shanks (about 2 lb .  total) , 1 lb .  veal bones (optional) , 12 c .  water , 2 medium onions (whole and unpeeled) , 2 medium carrots (whole and unpeeled) , 2 stalks celery , 2 tsp .  salt , 1 bay leaf , 1/2 tsp .  marjoram , 1/2 tsp .  basil , 6 peppercorns , 1/2 c .  pearl barley , 4 small white turnips (about 1/2 lb . ) , peeled , cut into 1/4-inch rounds and quartered , 5 plum tomatoes (about 3/4 lb . ) , coarsely chopped , 1 Tbsp .  tomato paste , 1 1/2 c .  frozen peas , 1 large yellow squash (about 1/2 lb . ) , cut into matchsticks , 1/4 c .  chopped parsley . Here's the instruction : In a stockpot or large saucepan , place the beef shanks , veal bones (if using) and water .  Bring to a boil over high heat , skimming any foam that rises to the surface .

question: I have pecans raisins pretzels cheerios almond bark peanuts . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pretzels Delight with 2 to 3 c .  Cheerios , 1 c .  raisins , 1 c .  pecans , 1 c .  peanuts , 1 small bag pretzels , 2 (1 lb . ) pkg .  almond bark . Here's the instruction : Break pretzels in small pieces .  Mix all the ingredients together .  In double boiler pot melt almond bark until smooth .  Pour over the ingredients and mix well .  Make in small cluster balls and place them on a cookie sheet like you would do cookies .  Let stand for about 1 1/2 hours .  If the weather is cold there is no refrigeration needed .  If not , place in the refrigerator until chilled .

question: I have teriyaki sauce cayenne pepper fresh ginger garlic chicken salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Jerk Chicken with 3/4 c .  teriyaki sauce , 2 large garlic cloves , crushed , 1/2 tsp .  cayenne pepper , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 (3 1/2 lb . ) chicken , cut into parts , 1 Tbsp .  minced fresh ginger plus 1 1/2 tsp .  ground ginger or 2 tsp .  ground ginger . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 400° .  In a large bowl , combine teriyaki sauce , garlic , ginger , pepper and salt .  Add chicken; toss to mix well .  Lift chicken out of sauce and place in oiled baking dish , skin side down .  Bake for 45 minutes , turning once and basting frequently with remaining sauce until brown and crispy .  Can also be cooked on the grill .

question: I have buttermilk sugar vanilla eggs flour butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chess Pie with 3 eggs , 1 1/2 c .  sugar , dash of salt , 6 tsp .  buttermilk , 1 1/2 tsp .  flour , 3/4 stick butter , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Beat eggs and sugar and beat again .  Add salt , flour , buttermilk , vanilla and butter .  Mix well .  Pour into an unbaked pie shell .  Bake 45 minutes at 350° .

question: I have powdered sugar margarine vanilla cream cheese . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cream Cheese Frosting with 1 lb .  box powdered sugar , 1 (8 oz . ) cream cheese , softened , 1/2 c .  margarine , 2 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Cream together and spread on cake .  Makes enough frosting for two 9 x 13-inch cakes .  This frosting can be frozen .

question: I have pepper tabasco sauce clam juice vodka tomato juice worcestershire sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Clinton Clamdigger with 1 1/4 oz .  vodka , 2 oz .  tomato juice , 1 oz .  clam juice , dash of Tabasco sauce , dash of Worcestershire sauce , dash of pepper . question: I have oil tomatoes egg noodles water flour beef onion soup mix . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hungarian Goulash with 1 Tbsp .  oil , 1 1/2 lb .  beef , cubed , 1 pkg .  onion soup mix , 1 (12 oz . ) can stewed tomatoes , 2 Tbsp .  flour , 1 c .  water , 1/2 (16 oz . ) pkg .  egg noodles . question: I have celery onion tomatoes tabasco hot pepper sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Goody Goody Hamburger Sauce with 1 (No .  2) can crushed tomatoes , 1 medium onion , chopped very fine , 1 tsp .  celery seed , 1/2 tsp .  Tabasco hot pepper sauce . Here's the instruction : Simmer very slowly until thick and stir from time to time .  Serve on hamburgers with dill pickle slices .  Toasted buns are great .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs flour milk butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Coconut Cake with 2 sticks butter or oleo , 2 c .  sugar , 3 c .  self-rising flour , 1 c .  milk , 4 eggs , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Cream the butter and sugar .  Add one egg at a time , beating good after each addition .  Combine milk and flavoring .  Add alternately with flour .  Bake in cake pans at 350° .

question: I have chicken breasts lipton soup mix mushroom soup water rice . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Casserole with 6 chicken breasts , 1 pkg .  Lipton soup mix , 1 c .  raw rice , 1 c .  mushroom soup , 1 can water . Here's the instruction : Mix rice , onion soup mix , mushroom soup and water in dish .  Place chicken on top of rice mixture .  Bake for 1 hour at 350° .

question: I have green onions mushrooms broccoli cauliflower italian dressing mix . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Diet Fresh Green Salad with 1 bunch broccoli , 1 head cauliflower , 1 bunch green onions , 1 small jar sliced mushrooms or 1/2 c .  fresh , 1 pkg .  Good Seasons Italian dressing mix . Here's the instruction : Combine all vegetables .  You will want more broccoli than cauliflower .  Cut onions in wheels and cut up some of the blades in the salad .  Follow directions on salad dressing package and pour over salad when ready to serve .

question: I have pepper eggs onion cooking oil rice chicken salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Or (Pork) Fried Rice with 3 c .  cooked , chilled rice , 3 eggs , 1 medium onion , 1/2 tsp .  pepper , 1 lb .  chicken or pork , cut in small pieces , 1 tsp .  salt , 3 Tbsp .  cooking oil . Here's the instruction : Place cooking oil in skillet and heat .  Add cut up onion and meat .  Cook completely .  Beat eggs and mix with meat .  Add cooked rice , salt and pepper .  Cook for 5 minutes , stirring often .  Catsup or soy sauce may be added while cooking , if desired .  Serves 5 .

question: I have red pepper flour margarine cheese rice krispies salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cheese Crisps with 2 c .  grated sharp cheese , 2 sticks margarine , 2 c .  plain flour , 1/4 tsp .  red pepper , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 2 c .  Rice Krispies . Here's the instruction : Grate cheese .  Beat well with margarine .  Add dry ingredients .  Chill dough for 1 hour .  Mix in Rice Krispies .  Roll into small balls; press out with fork .  Bake on cookie sheet at 350° until slightly browned .

question: I have baking powder eggs soda cream-style corn white boiling water butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cornpatch Spoon Bread with 1 c .  boiling water , 3/4 c .  white or yellow corn meal , 3 tsp .  baking powder , 1 can cream-style corn , 2 eggs , beaten , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/2 tsp .  soda , 2 Tbsp .  butter , melted . Here's the instruction : Stir boiling water into corn meal , mixing thoroughly .  Add remaining ingredients .  Stir quickly until just mixed .  Place in very hot , generously buttered skillet or casserole .  Bake in moderate oven at 375° about 40 minutes or until nicely done .  Serves 5 to 6 .

question: I have sour cream cream of shrimp soup parsley cauliflower almonds . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Shrimply Delicious Cauliflower with 1 medium cauliflower , cooked (flowerets) , 1 can cream of shrimp soup , 1/2 c .  sour cream , 1/4 c .  toasted almonds , parsley . Here's the instruction : Cook cauliflower in salted water until tender .  Drain .  Heat soup; stir in sour cream .  Do not boil .  Season to taste .  Place flowerets in dish; pour on sauce .  Sprinkle with almonds and parsley .  Serves 6 to 8 .

question: I have sugar vanilla unsweetened chocolate milk butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Elegant Frosting with 1 1/4 c .  sugar , 1 c .  evaporated milk or heavy cream , 5 sq .  unsweetened chocolate , 1/2 c .  butter , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Combine sugar and milk in a heavy saucepan .  Bring to a boil , stirring constantly .  Reduce heat , simmer 6 minutes without stirring .  Remove from heat and add chocolate .  Stir to blend .  Stir in butter and vanilla .  Chill until mixture begins to thicken .  Beat until thick and creamy .  Makes enough to fill and frost an 8-inch or 9-inch layer cake .

question: I have potatoes sour cream cream of mushroom soup water parsley pork chops salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pork Chop And Potato Scallop with 4 pork chops , 1 can cream of mushroom soup , 1/2 c .  sour cream , 1/4 c .  water , 2 Tbsp .  parsley , 4 c .  thinly sliced potatoes , salt and pepper to taste . Top with chops .  Cover .  Bake at 375° for 1 1/4 hours .  Makes 4 servings .

question: I have baking powder sugar vanilla eggs flour unsweetened chocolate butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Brownies with 4 sq .  unsweetened chocolate , 2/3 c .  butter or margarine , 1 1/2 c .  unsifted flour , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 4 eggs , 2 c .  sugar , 2 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Melt chocolate and butter .  Mix flour with baking powder and salt .  Beat eggs well .  Gradually beat in sugar .  Blend in chocolate mix and vanilla .  Mix in flour mixture .  Spread in greased cake pan .  Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes or until done to touch .

question: I have instant vanilla pudding eggs rum lopez cream yellow cake mix vegetable oil pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pina Colada Cake with 1 pkg .  yellow cake mix , 1 (3 3/4 oz . ) pkg .  instant vanilla pudding and pie filling mix , 1 (15 oz . ) can Coco Lopez cream of coconut , 1/2 c .  plus 2 Tbsp .  rum , 1/3 c .  vegetable oil , 4 eggs , 1 (8 oz . ) can crushed well drained pineapple . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  In a large mixer bowl , combine cake mix , pudding mix , 1/2 cup cream of coconut , 1/2 cup rum , oil and eggs .  Beat on medium speed 2 minutes .  Stir in pineapple .  Pour into well-greased and floured 10-inch tube pan .  With a table knife , poke holes about 1 inch apart in cake almost to bottom .  Combine remaining cream of coconut and rum .  Pour over cake .  Chill thoroughly .  Store in refrigerator .

question: I have cranberry sauce cream of mushroom soup pork chops . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cranberry Pork Chops with 6 pork chops , 1 can whole cranberry sauce , 1 can cream of mushroom soup . Here's the instruction : Brown pork chops in small amount of oleo or olive oil .  Pour cranberry sauce over chops .  Cover with soup .  Bake covered at 350° for 1 hour .

question: I have vanilla eggs soda xxxx sugar flour cream of tartar butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Soft Butter Cookies with 2 c .  butter or margarine , 3 c .  xxxx sugar , 2 eggs , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 1/4 qt .  (5 c . ) all-purpose flour , 2 tsp .  soda , 2 tsp .  cream of tartar , 1/2 tsp .  salt . Here's the instruction : Cream butter and sugar until fluffy .  Add unbeaten eggs and vanilla .  Beat well .  Sift together dry ingredients .  Blend into creamed mixture .  Chill .  Roll on floured board and cut .  Bake at 400° for 6 minutes .

question: I have cream of chicken soup bell pepper cream of mushroom soup cheddar cheese onion celery hot sausage rice pimento . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sausage Casserole with 1 c .  rice , uncooked , 1 c .  Cheddar cheese , grated , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 1 bell pepper , chopped , 1 onion , chopped , 1 c .  celery , chopped , 4 oz .  jar chopped pimento , 1 lb .  hot sausage , 1 can cream of mushroom soup . Here's the instruction : Brown sausage and drain .  Mix all ingredients .  Place in covered dish .  Bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes .

question: I have american cheese macaroni . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Macaroni And Cheese with Kraft macaroni and cheese , American cheese . Here's the instruction : Prepare macaroni and cheese as it comes in Kraft dinner box .  Then grease a casserole dish .  Add macaroni and cheese .  Lay strips of American cheese on top and bake in 400° oven until melts and is brown .  Tastes like macaroni and cheese made from scratch .

question: I have shortening eggs flour boiling water salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cream Puff Pie with 1/2 c .  boiling water , 1/4 c .  shortening , 1/8 tsp .  salt , 1/2 c .  flour , 2 eggs . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 400° .  In a saucepan , combine the water , shortening and salt until melted .  Add flour and stir constantly until mixture leaves side of pan and forms a ball . 	Remove from heat and cool a few minutes .  Beat in eggs , one at a time , until smooth and velvety .  Spread in a greased 9-inch glass pie pan .  Be sure to grease the sides of the pan but do not spread batter on sides .  Bake 20 to 25 minutes at 400° , then reduce to 350° . 	Bake until done , about 35 to 40 minutes .  Cool away from any draft .

question: I have oleo sugar baking powder eggs cinnamon cloves baking soda ground nuts water flour pumpkin salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pumpkin Bread with 2 eggs , beaten , 1/3 c .  melted oleo , 1 1/3 c .  sugar , 1/3 c .  water , 1 c .  pumpkin , 1 2/3 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/4 tsp .  cloves , 3/4 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 1/4 tsp .  baking powder , 1 1/2 c .  ground nuts . Here's the instruction : Mix together eggs , oleo , sugar , water and pumpkin .  Sift together flour , cinnamon , cloves , salt , soda and baking powder .  Add dry ingredients and ground nuts to first mixture .  Pour into greased loaf pan and bake for 1 hour or until done .  Bake at 350° .  Makes 1 loaf .

question: I have american cheese tomato eggs shredded lettuce onion lean ground beef pastry shell flour green pepper tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cheeseburger Pie with 1 (9-inch) unbaked pastry shell , 8 slices processed American cheese , 1 lb .  lean ground beef , 1/2 c .  tomato sauce , 1/3 c .  chopped onion , 1/3 c .  chopped green pepper , 1 beef bouillon cube , 3 eggs , beaten , 2 Tbsp .  flour , chopped tomato , shredded lettuce (optional) . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 425° .  Bake pie shell 8 minutes .  Remove from oven .  Reduce oven to 350° .  Cut 6 slices cheese into pieces . Turn into prepared shell .  Bake 20 to 25 minutes .  Arrange remaining cheese slices on top .  Return to oven for 3 minutes .  Garnish with tomato and lettuce , if desired .

question: I have potatoes kidney beans oregano tomatoes onion water celery carrots parsley garlic sausage salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make German Sausage-Potato Soup with 1 lb .  smoked link sausage , 2 (16 oz . ) cans stewed tomatoes (may use tomato and green chili) , 2 cans kidney beans , 2 ribs celery , chopped , 2 medium onion , chopped , 4 medium carrots , peeled and chopped , 3 medium potatoes , peeled and chopped , 3 c .  water or broth , 1 1/2 tsp .  oregano , 1 tsp .  parsley , salt and pepper to taste , minced garlic or garlic salt to taste . Here's the instruction : Brown sausage and drain .  In large covered soup pot , combine all ingredients .  Simmer for about an hour until vegetables are cooked .  Delicious served immediately . question: I have corn syrup shortening brown sugar flour nuts . Give me some cooking ideas .

Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 375° .  Measure flour; blend with nuts .  Bring corn syrup , shortening and sugar to boil in saucepan over medium heat , stirring constantly .  Remove from heat; gradually stir in flour and nuts .  Drop batter by level teaspoonful , about 3 inches apart , on lightly greased baking sheet .  Bake only 8 to 9 cookies at a time .  Bake for 5 to 6 minutes; remove from oven and allow to stand 5 minutes before removing from baking sheet .  Makes about 4 dozen cookies .

question: I have peas noodles cream of mushroom soup parmesan cheese mushrooms tomato soup celery clove of garlic paprika ground beef chicken green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

Put in shallow baking dish (3-quart size) and bake at 350° for 3/4 to 1 hour .

question: I have cold water cornstarch sugar food coloring . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar baking powder salad oil eggs cinnamon soda lemon rind flour nuts zucchini salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sour cream sugar vanilla eggs crust cream cheese flour cocoa . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chocolate Marble Cheesecake with Graham Crust (recipe follows) , 3 pkg . question: I have nonfat dry milk regular oats nuts corn oil coconut sunflower seeds whole wheat flour honey . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have bread sugar vanilla nutmeg eggs raisins milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Bread Pudding For A Crowd(Abington Grange Supper)   with 1 gal .  milk , 8 c .  stale bread cubes * , 10 eggs , 1 c .  sugar , 2 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  nutmeg , 2 Tbsp .  vanilla , 1/2 c .  melted butter , 1 c .  raisins . Here's the instruction : Heat the milk in double boiler (I use 2 mixing bowls set in large kettles) until bubbly around the edges .  The butter can be melted in the milk . question: I have celery oysters milk rice boiling water egg yolks salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

Here's the instruction : Fill a 13 x 9-inch baking pan half full of hot tap water and place on oven rack in center of oven .  Heat oven to 325° . Pour on about 1/2 cup milk mixture .  Gently press down so slices begin to absorb milk mixture .  Place cups in pan of hot water .  Bake 25 to 40 minutes .  Makes 6 servings .

question: I have sugar peanut butter pastry shell flour cornstarch whipped cream milk egg yolks salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have unflavored gelatin sugar eggnog heavy cream brown sugar ground nutmeg eggs pecans pumpkin cream of tartar ground ginger bourbon ground cinnamon butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oil sugar warm water water flour yeast salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have heavy cream cream cheese maraschino cherries nuts salad dressing lemon jell-o pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Family Favorite Salad with 3 oz .  pkg .  lemon Jell-O , 3 oz .  pkg .  cream cheese , softened , 2 Tbsp .  salad dressing , 1 c .  crushed pineapple , drained , 1/2 c .  nuts , chopped fine , 1/2 c .  maraschino cherries , halved , 1/4 c .  heavy cream , whipped . question: I have sugar eggs vanilla wafers pecans angel margarine milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Jackson'S Vanilla Wafer Cake with 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  milk , 1 1/2 sticks margarine , 10 1/2 oz .  vanilla wafers , crushed , 6 large eggs , 7 oz .
