Bake 1 hour in middle of oven at 325° .  Cool 15 minutes before removing from pan .

question: I have condensed milk chocolate cake caramel topping bar chips . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chocolate Caramel Cake with 1 German or plain chocolate cake mix , 1 can sweetened condensed milk , 1 small jar caramel topping , 1 (8 oz . ) Cool Whip , Heath bar chips . Here's the instruction : Bake cake according to directions on box .  As soon as it comes out of the oven , poke holes in cake with handle of spoon or straw about 2-inches apart over entire cake .  Do not poke all the way through to the bottom .  Pour sweetened condensed milk into holes and over entire cake .  Top with Cool Whip and sprinkle top with Heath bar chips .  Let the cake absorb the milk and caramel before serving .  Keep refrigerated .

question: I have egg sugar lemon jello marshmallows cheddar cheese bananas pineapple juice flour boiling water whipping cream pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Company Salad with 2 pkg .  lemon jello , 1 (No .  2) can crushed pineapple , drained , 3 bananas , cubed , 1 egg , beaten , 1/2 c .  sugar , grated sharp Cheddar cheese , 3 c .  boiling water , 1 1/2 c .  mini marshmallows , 1 c .  pineapple juice , 1 1/2 Tbsp .  flour , 1/2 pt .  whipping cream . question: I have baking powder sugar nutmeg baking soda cinnamon brown sugar eggs flour pumpkin vegetable oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have pecans apple pie filling yellow cake mix butter pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Apple Dessert with 1 can apple pie filling , 1 can chunk pineapple , 1 box yellow cake mix , 1 1/2 sticks butter , 1 c .  chopped pecans . question: I have vinegar sugar pepper yellow mustard onion freshly ground black pepper celery foods elbow macaroni salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oil vanilla water flour food coloring cream of tartar salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have unshelled shrimp shell parsley garlic olive oil tomato sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have flour tortillas taco onion shredded cheese flour margarine enchilada sauce milk paprika ground beef . Give me some cooking ideas .

Old El Paso taco seasoning , 1/4 c .  margarine , 1 can enchilada sauce , 1/4 c .  flour , 2 c .  milk , 1/8 tsp .  paprika , 1 3/4 c .  shredded cheese , flour tortillas . question: I have bisquick caramel candies brown sugar nuts apples ground cinnamon butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have tomato cheddar cheese taco sauce tortilla chips beans . Give me some cooking ideas .

Cheddar cheese , shredded , 1 large bag tortilla chips . Here's the instruction : Spread beans in a thin layer in 13 x 9-inch pan .  Spread sauce evenly on top of beans .  Spread 1/2 of cheese . question: I have egg cream of chicken onion stuffing ground chuck green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Stuffing And Hamburg Dish with 2 lb .  ground chuck , 1/2 onion , a little green pepper , 1 egg , stuffing (Stove Top or your own recipe) , 2 cans cream of chicken or cream of celery . question: I have biscuit mix eggs cheddar cheese milk green chillies . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have vinegar sugar pepper onion water ground beef ketchup mustard green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Barbecue Sauce with 1 green pepper , 1 large onion , 2 lb .  ground beef , 1 Tbsp .  prepared mustard , 1 Tbsp .  vinegar , 4 Tbsp .  sugar , 1/2 c .  water , 1 (14 oz . ) ketchup , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper . Here's the instruction : In large skillet brown 1 green pepper , sliced fine , and 1 large onion , cut fine .  Then add ground beef , salt and pepper to taste .  Brown meat slowly , crumbling with a fork .  When meat is completely browned , pour off any grease that has formed .  Add mustard , vinegar , sugar , water , ketchup , salt and pepper .  Mix all ingredients with meat .  Cover and simmer 15 minutes .

question: I have sour cream egg sugar crisco vanilla cinnamon soda flour rhubarb salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Rhubarb Cake with 2 c .  thinly sliced rhubarb , 2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  Crisco , 1 egg , 1 c .  sour cream , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 2 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  vanilla . question: I have sugar white pepper egg whites white vinegar garlic powder mustard vegetable oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Low Cholesterol Mayonnaise with 2 medium egg whites , 1/2 tsp .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  mustard , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/8 tsp .  garlic powder , 1/8 tsp .  white pepper , 1 c .  vegetable oil , 2 Tbsp .  white vinegar . Here's the instruction : In beater bowl , beat the whites with the sugar , salt , mustard , garlic powder and pepper until quite foamy .  Slowly begin to add 1/2 cup oil while beating on high .  You must add oil slowly or the mixture will not emulsify .  Now add 1 tablespoon of vinegar .  Continue beating and adding oil on high until all of the oil is used .  Then beat in the last tablespoon vinegar .  Pour into covered jar and keep refrigerated .  This thickens more on chilling and is excellent for all salads .

question: I have egg lemon juice boston lettuce green onion ham celery mayonnaise hard rolls ground ginger mustard green pepper . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sweet milk sugar vanilla eggs flour cornstarch cocoa butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla fresh strawberries cream cheese graham cracker pie crust . Give me some cooking ideas .

(8 oz . ) cream cheese , softened , 1/3 c .  sugar , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 1 (8 oz . ) container whipped topping , fresh strawberries for garnish . question: I have powdered cloves vinegar sugar tomatoes black pepper red pepper onions allspice mustard salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have green onions crab meat cream cheese celery mayonnaise olives dill weed . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have baking powder eggs red pepper cooked grits cheese milk garlic butter . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs raisins milk rice ground cinnamon salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have frozen strawberries water orange juice ginger ale frozen lemonade . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have oil sugar vanilla eggs baking soda cinnamon flour walnuts apples salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fresh Apple Cake with 1 1/2 c .  oil , 2 c .  sugar , 3 eggs , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 3 c .  flour , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 1 Tbsp .  cinnamon , 3 c .  apples , peeled and cut into pieces , 1 c .  walnuts , chopped . question: I have egg sugar vanilla flour margarine salt . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have snow peas chicken breasts soy sauce water chestnuts mushrooms cornstarch chicken broth cooking sherry garlic bamboo shoots . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Lite Oriental Chicken with 1 (6 oz . ) can bamboo shoots , 2 c .  snow peas , 1 c .  sliced mushrooms , 1 (8 oz . ) can water chestnuts , rinsed and drained , 2 tsp .  minced garlic , 2 whole chicken breasts , skinned and boned , 3 tsp .  fat-free chicken broth , 1 Tbsp .  cornstarch , 2 Tbsp .  cooking sherry , 1/4 c .  low sodium soy sauce , 1/2 c .  fat-free chicken broth . question: I have sugar peanut butter butterscotch chips rice chocolate chips . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have egg yolks ground pepper tomato paste whipping cream mushrooms madeira fresh snipped tarragon shallots linguini shrimp butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Seafood Linguini with 2 c .  fresh sliced mushrooms (6 oz . ) , 4 shallots or green onions , finely chopped , 1/2 c .  butter or margarine , 1 1/2 c .  Madeira (cooking) wine , 1 Tbsp .  tomato paste (optional) , 1 Tbsp .  fresh snipped tarragon , 1/4 tsp .  salt , dash of freshly ground pepper , 10 oz .  linguini , 1 1/2 lb .  fresh , shelled shrimp (you can use crab meat and scallops or combination of all 3) , 1 1/2 c .  whipping cream , 4 egg yolks , beaten . Here's the instruction : In a 10-inch skillet , cook mushrooms and shallots in butter , uncovered , over medium-high heat for 4 to 5 minutes , or until vegetables are tender , but not brown .  Remove with slotted spoon; set aside .  Stir wine , tomato paste , tarragon , salt and pepper into butter in skillet .  Bring to boil; boil vigorously for 10 minutes , or until mixture is reduced to 1/2 cup .

question: I have corn light corn syrup sugar brown sugar water white vinegar butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Caramel Popcorn Balls with 8 cups popped corn (about 1/2 cup unpopped) , 3/4 cup granulated sugar , 3/4 cup brown sugar (packed) , 1/2 cup light corn syrup , 1/2 cup water , 1 teaspoon white vinegar , 1/4 teaspoon salt , 3/4 cup butter or margarine . Here's the instruction : Measure popped corn into large bowl .  Combine sugars , cornsyrup , water , vinegar and salt in 2 - quart sauce pan .  Heat to boiling over milium - high heat , stirring frequently .  Cook stirring constantly , to 260 degrees on candy thermometer (or until small amount of mixture dropped into very cold water forms a hard ball) .  Reduce heat to low stir in butter until melted .  Pour syrup in thin stream over corn in bowl , stirring until corn is well coated .  Cool slightly .  Butter hands; shape mixture into 3 - inch balls and place on waxed paper .  Yields approximately 16 balls .

question: I have oil egg vanilla brown sugar baking soda pecans flour margarine rice krispies white sugar oatmeal chocolate chips salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Nancy'S Chocolate Chip Cookies with 2 sticks margarine , softened , 1 c .  oil , 1 c .  white sugar , 1 c .  brown sugar , packed , 1 egg , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 3 1/2 c .  plain flour , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 1 tsp .  salt , 12 oz .  chocolate chips , 1 c .  Rice Krispies , 1 c .  oatmeal , 3/4 c .  chopped pecans . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 350° .  Cream the margarine , oil , sugars , egg and vanilla .  Mix flour , soda and salt and add to creamed mixture .  Fold in the oatmeal , chocolate chips , Rice Krispies and pecans .  Drop by rounded teaspoonful on greased cookie sheet .  Cook for 10 minutes at 350° .  Makes 10 dozen .

question: I have egg sugar ginger shortening molasses soda cinnamon flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Gingersnaps with 1 c .  sugar , 3/4 c .  shortening , 1 egg , 4 Tbsp .  molasses or sorghum , 2 c .  plus 2 Tbsp .  flour , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1 1/2 tsp .  ginger , 1/8 tsp .  salt . Here's the instruction : Cream shortening , add sugar and mix thoroughly .  Add egg and molasses; mix .  Add dry ingredients and mix thoroughly .  Chill dough .  Roll in small balls .  Roll in sugar .  Bake on greased cookie sheet at 350° .  They crack open nicely .

question: I have wish-bone italian dressing chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Baked Italian Chicken with 6 skinless breasts or you may use other parts of chicken , 1 1/2 c .  Wish-Bone Italian dressing . Here's the instruction : You will also need bags (zipper lot) .

question: I have sugar water pineapple juice orange juice ginger ale . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Best Punch with 46 oz .  can pineapple juice , 46 oz .  can orange juice , 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 2 qt .  ginger ale , 1/2 gal .  water . Here's the instruction : Mix ingredients together .  Chill and serve over crushed ice .

question: I have buttermilk berries sugar . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Italian Ice with 1 c .  sugar , 1 c .  buttermilk , 1 pkg .  berries (frozen mixed berries are the best) . Here's the instruction : Place all ingredients in a blender .  Blend until smooth and pour into plastic container .  Freeze for several hours or overnight before serving .

question: I have sugar nutmeg eggs ground cloves cooking oil flour nuts ground cinnamon . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Plum Cake with 2 c .  sugar , 1 c .  cooking oil , 2 c .  self-rising flour , 3 eggs , 2 jars Gerber baby food (plum) , 1 tsp .  ground cloves , 1 tsp .  ground cinnamon , 1/2 tsp .  nutmeg , 1 c .  nuts . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients together .  Bake at 300° for 1 hour .

question: I have oil egg cake mix orange slices pecans . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Orange Slice Cookies with 1 box Jiffy cake mix , 1 egg , 1/3 c .  oil , 1 c .  chopped pecans , 11 orange slices , chopped (candies) . Here's the instruction : Mix well .  Drop by teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheet .  Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes .

question: I have rice frozen broccoli cream of celery soup milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Rice Broccoli And Cheese Casserole with 1 large bag frozen broccoli , cauliflower and carrot mixture , cooked and drained , 1 small jar Cheez Whiz , 1 c .  Minute rice , uncooked , 1 can cream of celery soup , 1 soup can filled with 1/2 c .  milk and 1/2 c .  half and half . Here's the instruction : Mix together , pour into glass baking dish , top with bread crumbs and pats of butter .  Bake in 350° oven for 30 minutes .

question: I have green onions water chestnuts nonfat yogurt mayonnaise vegetable soup . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Spinach Dip with 1 (10 oz . ) pkg .  frozen chopped spinach , drained , 3 or 4 green onions , chopped , 2 c .  nonfat yogurt or 2 c .  sour cream , 1 pkg .  Knorr vegetable soup mix , 1/2 c .  reduced calorie mayonnaise , 1 (8 oz . ) can water chestnuts , chopped . Here's the instruction : Combine all ingredients .  Mix well and chill .

question: I have bacon egg crab meat celery parsley tomato juice bread crumbs salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Crab Meat-Bacon Rolls with salt/pepper , 1 egg , well beaten , 1 c .  dry bread crumbs , 12 slices bacon , cut in half , 1 (6 1/2 oz . ) can crab meat , flaked , 1/2 tsp .  parsley , 1/2 c .  tomato juice , 1/2 tsp .  chopped celery leaves . Here's the instruction : Mix tomato juice and egg .  Add crumbs , seasonings , parsley , celery leaves and crab meat .  Mix and roll into finger lengths .  Wrap each roll with 1/2 slice bacon .  Fasten with toothpick .  Broil , turning to brown evenly .  Makes 2 dozen .

question: I have pizza sauce mozzarella cheese onions buns ground beef . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pizza Burgers with 1 lb .  ground beef , 1/4 c .  chopped onions , 1 c .  pizza sauce , 1/2 c .  shredded Mozzarella cheese , 8 buns . Here's the instruction : Cook ground beef in large skillet until meat is brown .  Add onions and cook for 1 more minute .  Add pizza sauce and cheese to cooked hamburger .  Cook 2 minutes or until hot .

question: I have sugar vanilla extract eggs cream cheese flour butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cream Cheese Pound Cake with 2 sticks butter , 3 c .  sugar , 1 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , softened , 3 c .  flour , 6 eggs , 2 tsp .  vanilla extract . Here's the instruction : Blend together butter and sugar until fluffy .  Add cream cheese and mix lightly .  Add flour and mix well .  Add eggs and vanilla and mix about 1 minute .  Pour into nice size Bundt pan and bake for 1 hour and 5 minutes at 350° .

question: I have beef chuck tomatoes soy sauce salad oil red and/or stalks celery green onion water clove garlic cornstarch ground ginger . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Green Pepper Steak with 2 or 3 lb .  beef chuck or round steak , fat trimmed , 1/4 c .  soy sauce , 1 clove garlic , 1/2 tsp .  ground ginger , 2 Tbsp .  salad oil , 1/2 c .  green onion , thinly sliced , 1 c .  red and/or green peppers , cut into 1/2-inch squares , 2 stalks celery , thinly sliced , 1 Tbsp .  cornstarch , 1 c .  water , 2 tomatoes , cut into wedges (can be omitted) . Here's the instruction : With a very sharp knife , cut beef across grain into thin strips , 1/8-inch thick .  Combine soy sauce , garlic and ginger .  Add beef .  Toss and set aside while preparing vegetables .  Heat oil in large frying pan or wok .  Add beef and toss over high heat until browned .  Cover and simmer for 40 to 60 minutes over low heat .

question: I have sugar vanilla shortening brown sugar eggs soda all-purpose nuts chocolate chips butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chocolate Chip Cookies with 2/3 c .  shortening , 2/3 c .  butter or margarine , softened , 1 c .  sugar , 1 c .  brown sugar , 2 eggs , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 3 c .  all-purpose flour , 1 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 c .  chopped nuts , 1 (12 oz . ) pkg .  chocolate chips . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 375° .  Mix thoroughly the shortening , butter , sugars , eggs and vanilla .  Stir in remaining ingredients .  (For a softer , rounder cookie , add 1/2 cup flour . ) Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheet .  Bake for 8 to 10 minutes or until light brown .  Cool slightly before removing from baking sheet .  Do not overcook .  Cookies will be done even though they may look undercooked .

question: I have cabbage zucchini tomatoes pepper light kidney beans onion celery carrots garlic whole kernel corn vegetable broth salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Aunty Ann'S Vegetable Chowder with 1 c .  sliced onion , 1 c .  sliced celery , 1 clove minced garlic , 1 c .  tomatoes , chopped , 1/2 lb .  carrots , sliced , 6 c .  Knorr vegetable broth , 16 oz .  can whole tomatoes , chopped , 4 c .  shredded cabbage , 1 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  pepper , 1/2 lb .  zucchini , sliced , 20 oz .  can light kidney beans , 17 oz .  can whole kernel corn . Here's the instruction : In a five-quart Dutch oven , heat 3 tablespoons of corn oil .  Add onion , celery and garlic and saute for five minutes .  Add 1 cup chopped tomatoes and the carrots and cook for five minutes .  Add vegetable broth , can of whole tomatoes (chopped) , cabbage , salt and pepper and simmer for 1 hour or until vegetables are tender .  Add zucchini and cook 10 minutes .  Add kidney beans and corn and heat .

question: I have black pepper thin spaghetti parmesan cheese water anchovies broccoli garlic bread crumbs olive oil salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli And Spaghetti with 1 head broccoli , 2 Tbsp .  salt , 4 cloves garlic , diced , 1 lb .  thin spaghetti or linguine , 3 qt .  water , 1/2 c .  olive oil , 1/4 c .  Parmesan cheese , anchovies (optional) , fried bread crumbs (optional) , 1 tsp .  black pepper . Here's the instruction : Separate broccoli florets and trim tough skins from stalks; cut up .  Bring to a boil the water and salt .  Add broccoli .  Cook 5 to 8 minutes .  Add spaghetti , cut in halves .  Cook until both are al dente .  Drain .  Heat olive oil in a pan .  Add garlic and brown .  Pour mixture over cooked spaghetti and broccoli .  Add pepper and cheese .  Serve with salad and crusty bread .

question: I have vinegar black pepper chili powder water onions butter tomato catsup worcestershire sauce salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Barbecue Sauce For Chicken with 1 stick butter , 2 Tbsp .  vinegar , 1 tsp .  chili powder , 3/4 c .  tomato catsup , 2 small onions , chopped , 2 Tbsp .  Worcestershire sauce , 3/4 c .  water , 1 tsp .  salt , black pepper to taste . Here's the instruction : Simmer in heavy skillet for 45 minutes .  Pour sauce over cut-up chicken and cook slow in oven uncovered for 2 to 3 hours .

question: I have sugar egg whites flour coconut almond extract salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Macaroons with 7 oz .  coconut , 2/3 c .  sugar , 6 Tbsp .  flour , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 4 egg whites , 1 tsp .  almond extract . Here's the instruction : Mix coconut , sugar , flour and salt in large bowl .  Stir in egg whites and almond extract .  Drop by teaspoonfuls on greased cookie sheet .  Bake at 325° for 20 minutes .

question: I have sugar mashed ripe bananas baking powder eggs soda pecans raisins flour butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Banana-Nut Raisin Bread with 1/2 c .  butter or margarine , softened , 1 c .  sugar , 2 eggs , 2 c .  mashed ripe bananas , 2 c .  all-purpose flour , 1 tsp .  baking powder , 1 tsp .  soda , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/2 c .  chopped pecans , 1/2 c .  raisins . Here's the instruction : Cream butter; gradually add sugar , beating well .  Add eggs , one at a time , beating well after each addition .  Add bananas , mixing until smooth .  Combine flour , baking powder , soda and salt .  Add to creamed mixture , stirring just enough to moisten .  Stir in chopped pecans and raisins .

question: I have sugar crackers cheddar cheese flour pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Baked Pineapple with 1 (15 oz . ) can pineapple chunks , drained , 3 Tbsp .  flour , 1/4 c .  sugar , 3/4 c .  sharp Cheddar cheese , 12 Ritz crackers . Here's the instruction : Place drained pineapple in greased casserole dish .  Mix remaining ingredients and place over pineapple .  Top with dots of butter and crushed Ritz crackers .  Bake at 400° for 20 minutes .

question: I have oil sugar eggs baking soda flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Fruit Cocktail Cake with 1 1/2 c .  sugar , 2 eggs , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 small can fruit cocktail with juice , 1/2 c .  oil , 2 c .  flour , 2 tsp .  baking soda . Here's the instruction : Beat sugar , oil and eggs together .  Then add flour , salt , soda and fruit cocktail with its juice .  Pour into a 9 x 13-inch pan .  Bake at 350° for 40 minutes .  You can add 1/2 cup coconut , if you like .  Top with Fruit Cocktail Icing .

question: I have vinegar salt cucumbers water celery bay leaves dill pickling spice . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Grandma'S Best Dill Pickles with 50 medium firm cucumbers , mustard seed , celery seed , bay leaves , pickling spice , dill , 5 qt .  water , 1 c .  salt , 2 c .  vinegar . Here's the instruction : Wash cucumbers and pack into jars .  To each quart , add 1/2 teaspoon mustard seed , 1/2 teaspoon celery seed , 1 bay leaf , 1/2 teaspoon pickling spice and 1 large piece of dill .  Bring the water , salt and vinegar to the boiling point; fill cucumber filled jars with this syrup , at once .  Seal at once .  Can be used after 1 week's standing .

question: I have vanilla powdered sugar cocoa milk butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Milk Chocolate Frosting with 6 Tbsp .  butter or margarine , 4 Tbsp .  cocoa , 3 c .  powdered sugar , 4 Tbsp .  milk , 1 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Melt butter in medium saucepan .  Stir in cocoa until combined .  Add sugar , milk and vanilla .  Stir until smooth .  Spread on cooled cake and let set until firm .

question: I have buttermilk baking powder white corn meal baking soda flour salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Corn Bread with 3/4 c .  white corn meal , 1/2 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1/4 tsp .  baking soda , 1 Tbsp .  baking powder , 1 qt .  buttermilk . Here's the instruction : Mix all dry ingredients in a medium size bowl .  Add buttermilk until mixture is thick and drops off of a spoon in a clump .  Grease a 6-inch cast-iron skillet and preheat in a 450° oven .  When skillet is hot , pour cornbread mixture into skillet .  Bake until brown .

question: I have onion fryer pimientos green beans cream of celery soup mayonnaise curry rice . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Chicken Spectacular with 1 hen or fryer , boiled and cut up; take skin off , 1 can French style seasoned green beans , 7 oz .  pkg .  of curry rice , 1 medium onion , finely chopped , 10 . 75 oz .  can cream of celery soup , 1 c .  mayonnaise , 1 small jar of pimientos .  cut up . Here's the instruction : Boil chicken and cut up .  Put rice in 2 1/2 c .  plus 2 tablespoons of boiling chicken broth .  Add onion to rice and cook for 5 minutes .  Stir several times while cooking .  Add all ingredients to rice .  Bake for 40 minutes at 350 in a long casserole dish .  Don't cover .

question: I have sugar eggs flour milk whole kernel corn butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Corn Pudding with 6 Tbsp .  flour , 1 (16 oz . ) can whole kernel corn , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 1 tsp .  salt , 4 Tbsp .  melted butter or margarine , 1 1/2 c .  milk , 4 eggs . Here's the instruction : Drain corn and mix with flour .  Add sugar , salt and melted butter .  In a separate bowl , combine milk and egg .  Stir into corn and pour the mixture into greased baking dish .  Bake at 350° for 1 hour .  Stir 3 times during baking to keep corn from settling to the bottom .  Yields 6 to 8 servings .

question: I have bread sugar vanilla milk honey food coloring butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Silly Toast with 5 or 6 slices bread , food coloring , vanilla or strawberry extract (flavoring) , sugar , butter , milk , honey . Here's the instruction : Mix 1 teaspoon milk , 1 teaspoon flavoring and 2 drops of food coloring in a small paper cup (bathroom size) .  Any flavoring can be used and any color food coloring can be used .  Make 3 or 4 different colors for child to use .  Give child 1 piece of bread and then let them paint silly faces on bread with a paint brush .  Wipe paint brush on a paper towel before changing colors .  Then toast bread as usual .  This takes a little time; but our children are "worth it" .  Butter toast and sprinkle on sugar or dip honey on top when toasted .

question: I have sugar orange liqueur club soda rhine wine lemon . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Kalte Ente(Cold Duck)   with 1/2 c .  superfine sugar , 1 large lemon , thinly sliced and seeded , 1/2 c .  orange liqueur , 1/2 gal .  Rhine wine , chilled , ice , 1 (12 oz . ) bottle club soda , chilled . Here's the instruction : Sprinkle sugar over lemon slices .  Press lemon slices with back of spoon to release flavor .  Stir in orange liqueur .  Chill .  Stir in wine; pour over ice in punch bowl .  Add club soda; stir lightly to blend .  Makes 18 (4 1/2 ounce) servings .

question: I have cumin pickle relish tandoor spice celery dill mayonnaise chicken . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Calcutta Chicken with 2 c .  chopped cooked chicken , 1/2 c .  chopped celery with tops , 4 Tbsp .  pickle relish , 2 tsp .  Tandoor spice , 1/2 tsp .  cumin , 1 tsp .  dill seed , 1/3 c .  mayonnaise . Here's the instruction : Combine all ingredients and let stand several minutes to allow spices to mingle .

question: I have egg sugar vanilla graham cracker crumbs nuts margarine coconut milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Graham Cracker Cookies with 1 1/2 c .  margarine , 1 egg , 1 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  milk , 1 1/2 c .  graham cracker crumbs , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  coconut , 1 c .  nuts . Here's the instruction : Cover bottom of 9 x 13-inch pan with graham crackers .  Mix margarine , sugar , egg and milk; boil for 2 minutes .  Remove from heat; add vanilla , coconut , nuts and graham cracker crumbs .  Mix well .  Pour over crackers in pan .  Top filling with graham crackers; press lightly .  Cover with icing .

question: I have vanilla flavoring crisco almond flavoring powdered sugar water butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Decorating Icing with 2 c .  Crisco , 2 lb .  (10x) powdered sugar , 1/4 tsp .  almond flavoring , 2 tsp .  butter flavoring , 1 tsp .  vanilla flavoring , 4 Tbsp .  water . Here's the instruction : Mix Crisco , sugar and water together .  Add flavorings and continue to mix until smooth .

question: I have buttermilk oil egg baking powder sugar soda flour cornmeal salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Corn Muffins with 1/2 c .  flour , 1/2 tsp .  soda , 1 1/4 tsp .  baking powder , 1 tsp .  salt , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 1 1/4 c .  cornmeal , 1 egg , beaten , 1 1/4 c .  buttermilk , 1/4 c .  oil . Here's the instruction : Combine all dry ingredients .  Combine milk , egg and oil .  Add to dry ingredients; stir quickly .  Fill greased muffin pans 2/3 full .  Bake at 425° for 12 to 15 minutes .

question: I have sugar vanilla eggs yellow food coloring flour milk butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make 5 Pound Cake with 1 c .  butter , 2 c .  sugar , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 2 1/4 c .  self-rising flour , 1 c .  milk , 1 tsp .  yellow food coloring , 5 eggs . Here's the instruction : Mix first 2 ingredients together .  Add eggs , one at a time .  Then add vanilla and food coloring .  Beat with mixer on medium speed for 2 minutes .  Alternate flour and milk until mixed thoroughly .  Bake in a 350° oven in 3 round 8-inch pans for 30 minutes .

question: I have sour cream sugar lemon juice fruit cocktail nuts pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Snowball Salad with 2 lb .  Cool Whip , 1 small sour cream , 1 c .  sugar , 2 Tbsp .  lemon juice , 1 (20 oz . ) can crushed or chunked pineapple , drained , 2 cans fruit cocktail , 1 c .  nuts , chopped . Here's the instruction : Mix all ingredients together and chill .

question: I have bacon red onion broccoli raisins . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Broccoli Salad with 2 bunches broccoli not cooked cut into bite size pieces , 12 slices bacon , cooked and crumbled , 1 medium red onion diced , 1 c .  raisins . Here's the instruction : Blend all of the above ingredients together .  Mix one cup of mayonnaise , 1/2 cup of sugar and 2 Tbsp .  of white vinegar; and pour over broccoli mixture .

question: I have sugar vanilla baking powder eggs flour milk butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Bonnie Butter Cake with 1 3/4 c .  sugar , 2/3 c .  butter , softened , 2 eggs , 1 1/2 tsp .  vanilla , 2 3/4 c .  all-purpose flour , 2 1/2 tsp .  baking powder , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 1/4 c .  milk . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 350° .  Grease and flour oblong pan , 13 x 9 x 2-inch , or two 9-inch or three 8-inch round layer pans .

question: I have sugar ginger shortening eggs cloves soda cinnamon molasses flour boiling water salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Gingerbread Cake with 2 1/2 c .  all purpose flour , 1 tsp .  ginger , 1/4 tsp .  cloves , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1 c .  sugar , 1 c .  boiling water , 1 3/4 tsp .  soda , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 2 eggs , beaten , 1 c .  molasses , 1/2 c .  shortening . Here's the instruction : Mix all dry ingredients , cream sugar , shortening , add molasses , blend all together . Pour into greased 13 x 9 inch pan , bake at 350° for 30 minutes or until center springs back .  Cool in pan , cut into squares .

question: I have oleo white cake mix cherry pie filling almonds . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cherry Delight with 2 cans cherry pie filling , 1 pkg .  white cake mix , 3/4 c .  melted oleo , 1 (4 1/2 oz . ) pkg .  almonds or any other nuts . Here's the instruction : Spread pie filling in 9 x 13 x 2-inch pan .  Sprinkle cake mix from box over cherries .  Drizzle melted oleo over top .  Sprinkle nuts over top .  Bake in 350° oven for 45 minutes to 1 hour .  Serve warm or cool with whipped cream .

question: I have sour milk sugar vanilla baking powder shortening nutmeg eggs molasses soda cinnamon cloves flour allspice salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Spice Cake with 1/2 c .  shortening , 1/2 c .  sugar , 1/2 c .  molasses , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 2 eggs , separated , 2 c .  sifted flour , 3 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  soda , 1/2 tsp .  salt , 1 tsp .  cinnamon , 1/4 tsp .  cloves , 1/4 tsp .  nutmeg , 1/4 tsp .  allspice , 3/4 c .  sour milk . Here's the instruction : Cream together the shortening and sugar .  Add molasses gradually , beating well .  Add vanilla .  Beat egg yolks and add to first mixture .  Sift together the flour , baking powder , soda , salt and spice .  Add alternately with milk to cream mixture .  Fold in stiffly beaten egg whites .  Bake in two greased 8-inch layer pans in 375° oven for 35 minutes .

question: I have salt onion hamburger meat cheese beans garlic whole kernel corn worcestershire sauce spanish rice . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Mexican Casserole with 1 can whole kernel corn , drained , 1 can Spanish rice , drained , 1 can Ranch Style beans (black label) , drained , 1 lb .  hamburger meat , browned , seasoned and drained , 1 medium onion , chopped fine and cooked with hamburger meat , 1 medium block Longhorn style cheese , shredded , salt and pepper , garlic salt , Worcestershire sauce . Here's the instruction : Cook spices , onion and hamburger meat together until well browned; drain and add corn , Spanish rice and beans .  Mix well and place in casserole dish with cover .  Heat in a 350° oven just until cheese is melted thoroughly .  Stir melted cheese into mixture well , then add remaining shredded cheese on top , covering fully .  Heat again until mixture has cheese melted thoroughly on top .  Serve with Mexican-style corn chips .  This can be frozen for future meals .

question: I have oil pepper onion stew meat water flour paprika salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Hungarian Goulash with 1 to 2 lb .  stew meat , 1 onion , chopped , salt , pepper , paprika , 1 to 2 Tbsp .  flour , water , 1 Tbsp .  oil . Here's the instruction : Heat oil in large pan .  Add beef cubes , brown them on all sides , stirring every couple of minutes .  Add 1 onion , chopped .  Continue browning meat-onion mixture for a minute or so .  Sprinkle flour on mix , stirring constantly , adding water slowly to prevent clumping of flour .  Season with salt , pepper and paprika .  Sauce should be spicy .  Simmer slowly for 1 hour stirring occasionally .  Serve over cooked noodles or rice with a salad .  (To ensure tender meat , cover pot during simmering . )

question: I have oil crisp rice cereal egg sugar vanilla oats brown sugar baking soda all-purpose margarine coconut chocolate chips cream of tartar salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Giant Chocolate Chippers with 1 c .  sugar , 1 c .  firmly packed brown sugar , 1 c .  margarine or butter , softened , 1 c .  oil , 1 egg , 2 tsp .  vanilla , 3 1/2 c .  all-purpose or unbleached flour , 1 tsp .  baking soda , 1 tsp .  cream of tartar , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 c .  quick cooking rolled oats , 1 c .  coconut , 1 c .  crisp rice cereal , 12 oz .  pkg .  (2 c . ) chocolate chips . Here's the instruction : Heat oven to 350° .  Line cookie sheets with foil .  In large bowl , beat sugar , brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy .  Add oil , egg and vanilla .  Beat well .  Lightly spoon flour into measuring cup .  Level off and add flour , baking soda , cream of tartar and salt .  Stir in oats , coconut , cereal and chocolate chips .  Press scant cup of dough into a 6-inch circle on foil-lined cookie sheet .  Repeat with remaining dough , placing cookies at least 2 1/2 inches apart .  Bake at 350° for 18 to 22 minutes , or until light and golden brown .  Cool completely on cookie sheets to prevent breaking .  Makes 8 large cookies , 32 servings .

question: I have strawberry halves sour cream graham cracker crust sugar eggs chocolate cream cheese almonds . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Amaretto Cheesecake with 1 c .  sugar , 4 eggs , 1 1/2 c .  commercial sour cream , 2 Tbsp .  Amaretto , grated chocolate , strawberry halves , 3 (8 oz . ) pkg .  cream cheese , softened , 1/3 c .  Amaretto , 2 Tbsp .  sugar , 1/4 c .  sliced almonds , toasted , chocolate leaves , 1 (9-inch) Graham Cracker Crust (see below) . Here's the instruction : Press Graham Cracker Crust mixture firmly on bottom and 1/2-inch up the sides of a 9-inch spring-form pan .  Beat cream cheese at high speed of an electric mixer until light and fluffy; gradually add 1 cup sugar , beating well .  Add eggs , 1 at a time , beating well after each addition .  Stir in 1/3 cup Amaretto; pour mixture into prepared pan .  Bake at 375° for 45 to 50 minutes or until mixture is set .

question: I have vanilla semi-sweet chocolate walnuts sweet condensed milk . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make One Bowl Chocolate Fudge with 2 pkg .  (8 sq . ) semi-sweet chocolate , 1 (14 oz . ) can sweet condensed milk , 1 1/2 c .  chopped walnuts , 2 tsp .  vanilla . Here's the instruction : Microwave chocolate and milk in a large microwavable bowl on High for 2 or 3 minutes or until chocolate is almost melted , stirring halfway through heating time .  Stir until chocolate is melted .  Stir in vanilla and walnuts .  Spread in a waxed paper lined 8-inch pan .  Refrigerate until firm .  Cut into squares .  Yields 4 dozen pieces .

question: I have fresh cucumbers . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Best Ever Cucumber Sweet Pickles with fresh cucumbers (firm and a good size for pickle) . Here's the instruction : Slice , strip , chunk , halve or crinkle cut; whichever you want .  Pack quart jars fairly tight .  To each jar , add 1 teaspoon salt and 1 teaspoon alum .  Fill jar with cider vinegar to cover .  Apply tops .  No need to sterilize .  Just be new and clean .  That's the easy part! Now , put away for 5 to 6 months , even a year .  The curing process doesn't take that long actually .  They are ready when rusty green .  To make off: Turn jars upside down in sink (top removed) to drain .  Drain 5 to 6 hours or longer .  Invert jars; fill with sugar (right out of the bag) as much as jar will hold .  Apply tops and shake , shake , shake until sugar dissolves .  You will need to do this approximately 3 times until enough syrup to completely cover cucumbers .  When this is accomplished , add per quart , 1 teaspoon celery seed and 1 teaspoon whole allspice .  Apply tops and shake , shake .  That's it .  Let sit a few days .  Simply delicious .

question: I have apricot nectar fresh basil couscous chicken broth mustard chicken lime wedges . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have heavy plastic spoons chocolate . Give me some cooking ideas .

question: I have cream of chicken soup swiss cheese herb stuffing mix margarine skinless white wine . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Creamy Baked Chicken Breasts with 8 skinless , boneless chicken breast halves , 8 slices Swiss cheese , 1 can cream of chicken soup , 1/4 c .  dry white wine , 1 c .  herb stuffing mix , 1/4 c .  margarine , melted . Here's the instruction : Arrange chicken in a greased 13 x 9-inch baking dish .  Top with cheese slices .  Combine soup and wine .  Spoon evenly over chicken .  Sprinkle with stuffing mix .  Drizzle with margarine .  Bake at 350° for 45 to 55 minutes .

question: I have marshmallows heavy cream water cold water nuts cake maraschino cherries lemon jell-o pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Angel Food Cake And Jello with 1 (3 oz . ) pkg .  lemon Jell-O , 1 c .  cold water , 1/2 lb .  miniature marshmallows , 1/2 c .  chopped nuts , 1 angel food cake , 1 c .  hot water , 1 pt .  heavy cream , whipped , 1 c .  drained , crushed pineapple , 1/2 bottle maraschino cherries . Here's the instruction : Dissolve Jell-O in hot water and stir in cold water .  Chill until almost firm .  Stir until fluffy .  Blend in cream , marshmallows , pineapple , nuts and cherries .  Break 1/2 an angel food cake into bite size pieces .  Arrange in a 9 x 4-inch cake pan .  Cover with part of Jell-O .  Break up remainder of cake and repeat layers .  Chill overnight and cut into squares .

question: I have baking powder flour milk bacon drippings salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Grated Corn Bread with 5 ears corn (almost hard) , 1 tsp .  salt , 3 tsp .  bacon drippings , 1 1/2 c .  flour , 2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 c .  milk . Here's the instruction : Cut corn from cob and scrape cob or grate corn .  Mix flour , salt and baking powder .  Add grated corn and bacon drippings .  Add enough milk to make a good batter .  Mix well and pour into a greased iron skillet (hot) .  Bake at 425° until golden brown .  Good with cow butter .

question: I have sweetener baking powder vanilla nutmeg eggs cinnamon soda raisins flour milk rolled oats butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Diabetic Oatmeal Cookies with 2 c .  butter , 4 eggs , 4 tsp .  sweetener , 1 c .  milk , 4 c .  flour , 2 tsp .  baking powder , 1/2 tsp .  soda , 4 tsp .  cinnamon , 2 tsp .  nutmeg , 1 tsp .  salt , 4 tsp .  vanilla , 2 c .  raisins , 4 c .  rolled oats . Here's the instruction : Cream the butter .  Add beaten eggs , sweetener and milk .  Sift and mix dry ingredients and add to first mixture .  Beat in vanilla , raisins and oats .  Drop by teaspoon onto greased cookie sheet .  Bake at 375° for 15 minutes .

question: I have potatoes garlic salt parmesan cheese paprika butter . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Zippy Buttered Potatoes(Microwave)   with 4 medium potatoes , 3 Tbsp .  butter or margarine , 1/2 tsp .  garlic salt , 1/2 tsp .  paprika , 2 Tbsp .  Parmesan cheese . Here's the instruction : Scrub potatoes .  Microwave butter in dish 1/2 to 1 minute on High or until melted .  Blend garlic salt , paprika and cheese .  Quarter potatoes lengthwise; dip cut edges in butter mixture .  Arrange cut side down in dish .  Cover with paper towels .  Microwave 10 to 12 minutes on High or until potatoes are tender , rearranging once or twice .

question: I have bird flour onions butter salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Pheasant with flour , 1 bird , cut into pieces (as for frying chicken) , salt and pepper to taste , 1 stick butter , onions , thinly sliced . Here's the instruction : Flour bird lightly .  Salt and pepper .  Slice 1/2 stick butter .  Cover with thin layer of onions .  Arrange pheasant on onions , then cover pheasant with a thin layer of onions and remaining butter .  Add 1/2 cup water .  Bake at 250° for 4 hours .  Recipe may be used for quail or other small birds .  Makes 6 to 8 servings .

question: I have cabbage sugar pepper salad oil white onion carrots cider vinegar green pepper salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make California Stew with 1 head cabbage , 1 white onion , 1 green pepper , 2 small carrots , 1/2 c .  cider vinegar , 3 Tbsp .  sugar , 1/2 tsp .  salt , pinch of pepper , 1/2 c .  salad oil . Here's the instruction : Chop and mix cabbage , onion , pepper and carrots .  Mix in remaining ingredients together and pour over the slaw mixture .  Refrigerate and stir occasionally , until time to serve .  The longer the slaw is in the fridge , the better it tastes!

question: I have mushroom stems vermicelli cheddar cheese onion lean ground beef basil spaghetti sauce salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Easy Spaghetti Bake with 1 (7 oz . ) or 1/2 (1 lb . ) pkg .  vermicelli (thin spaghetti) , cooked as pkg .  directs and drained , 1 lb .  lean ground beef , 1/2 c .  chopped onion , 1 tsp .  salt , 1 (32 oz . ) jar spaghetti sauce , 1 (4 oz . ) can mushroom stems and pieces , drained , 1 tsp .  basil leaves , 1 c .  (4 oz . ) shredded Cheddar cheese . Here's the instruction : Preheat oven to 375° .  In large skillet , brown meat; pour off fat .  Add onion , cook and stir until tender .  Stir in remaining ingredients , except spaghetti and cheese .  Simmer 10 minutes .  Stir in cooked spaghetti .  Turn into greased 2-quart shallow baking dish , 12 x 7-inches .  Bake 20 minutes and top with cheese .  Bake 5 minutes longer .  Refrigerate leftovers .

question: I have vinegar ginger brown sugar cornish hens red pepper preserves stuffing garlic apricot preserves . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Cornish Hens With Duck Sauce with 4 whole Cornish hens , 3/4 c .  brown sugar , 1 jar (18 oz . ) apricot preserves , 1 jar (18 oz . ) peach preserves , 3/4 c .  vinegar , 1/8 tsp .  red pepper , 1/2 tsp .  ginger , 1/2 tsp .  garlic cloves , chopped , Rice-A-Roni for stuffing (optional) . Here's the instruction : Bake hens at 350° for 45 minutes .

question: I have parmesan cheese green onion white pepper celery ham strips clove garlic mayonnaise parsley elbow macaroni white wine vinegar salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Parsley, Ham And Pasta Salad with 1 (7 oz . ) pkg .  elbow macaroni (2 c .  uncooked) , 2 1/2 c .  ham strips , 1 c .  celery slices , 1/2 c .  green onion , chopped , 1 c .  mayonnaise , 1/4 c .  white wine vinegar , 1 c .  firmly packed parsley , finely chopped , 1/4 c .  grated Parmesan cheese , 1 small clove garlic , minced , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 1/8 tsp .  white pepper . Here's the instruction : Prepare macaroni according to package directions .  Drain .  Add ham strips , celery and green onion .  Blend together mayonnaise and vinegar; stir in parsley , cheese , garlic , salt and pepper .  Toss dressing with macaroni mixture .  Cover; refrigerate 1 to 2 hours to blend flavors .  Makes 6 to 8 servings .

question: I have sour cream frozen strawberries pecans bananas strawberry gelatin boiling water pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Sinful Salad with 1 large pkg .  strawberry gelatin , 1 c .  boiling water , 3 medium bananas , mashed , 1 c .  chopped pecans , 2 (10 oz . ) pkg .  frozen strawberries , thawed , 1 (20 oz . ) can crushed pineapple , drained , 1 pt .  sour cream . Here's the instruction : Combine gelatin and boiling water , stirring until completely dissolved .  Cool .  Add fruits and nuts; stir to combine .  Pour half of the gelatin mixture into an 8 x 12-inch pan .  Refrigerate until set , about 1 hour .  Keep remaining gelatin at room temperature .  Spread sour cream evenly over set gelatin .  Pour remaining gelatin over this .  Cover and refrigerate until set , about 1 1/2 hours or overnight .

question: I have sour cream frozen raspberries raspberry bananas boiling water pineapple . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Raspberry Jello Salad with 2 (3 oz . ) pkg .  raspberry or strawberry jello , 2 c .  boiling water , 2 (10 oz . ) pkg .  frozen raspberries or strawberries , 2 large bananas , mashed , 1 c .  crushed pineapple , drained , 1 c .  sour cream . Here's the instruction : Dissolve jello in boiling water .  Stir in frozen fruit , bananas and pineapple .  Take half the mixture and place in mold or 8 x 11-inch pan and let set .  Spread sour cream over set mixture .  Pour remaining mixture over that and let set again .

question: I have sugar salad oil eggs flour nuts baby fruit salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Baby Food Spice Pound Cake with 2 c .  flour , 1 c .  chopped nuts , 2 c .  sugar , 2 tsp .  each salt , soda , ground cloves and cinnamon , 1 c .  salad oil , 3 eggs , 2 cans strained baby fruit (plums and prunes) . Here's the instruction : Mix together the flour , nuts , sugar , salt , soda , ground cloves and cinnamon .  Stir in the oil , eggs and baby fruit .  Do not beat .  Bake in greased Bundt pan at 325° for about 1 hour .  Let cool in pan 10 minutes .  Invert on plate .

question: I have onion soup beef bouillon cubes tomato soup stew meat frozen stew vegetables red wine . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make No-Peek Stew with 2 lb .  stew meat (pork , beef or lamb) , 1 can French onion soup (undiluted) , 1 can tomato soup (undiluted) , 2 beef bouillon cubes or 2 tsp .  granules , 1 pkg .  frozen stew vegetables , 1/2 c .  red wine . Here's the instruction : Place all ingredients in a Dutch oven and cover .  Bake at 250° for 5 hours or use a crock-pot .  Do not peek! Makes 6 servings .

question: I have tomato bacon onion bean with bacon soup chilies philadelphia cream cheese cheese olives salsa sauce . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Tacorino Dip with 1 can bean with bacon soup (Campbell's) , 1 small can mild , chopped chilies , 1 chopped tomato , 1 chopped onion or to taste , 1 (3 oz . ) pkg .  Philadelphia cream cheese (you may use the light for less calories and less fat) , chopped ripe olives (optional) , broken pieces crisp bacon (optional) , shredded Cheddar or Monterey Jack cheese (optional) , salsa sauce (optional) . Here's the instruction : Blend all ingredients by hand .  Chill and serve with snack crackers , tortilla chips or Fritos .

question: I have sugar baking powder vanilla shortening eggs flour milk ground black walnuts salt . Give me some cooking ideas .
answer: you can make Black Walnut Cake with 1 c .  shortening , 2 c .  sugar , 4 eggs , separated , 3 c .  sifted flour , 1/4 tsp .  salt , 3 tsp .  baking powder , 1 c .  milk , 1 tsp .  vanilla , 1 c .  ground black walnuts . Here's the instruction : Cream shortening and sugar until light and fluffy .  Add egg yolks one at a time , beating thoroughly after each addition .  Sift dry ingredients together .  Add alternately with milk and vanilla , beating after each addition .  Fold in nuts , then stiffly beaten egg whites .  Pour into greased and floured 10-inch tube pan or Bundt pan .  Bake at 350° for 60 minutes or until done .  Remove from pan to wire rack and drizzle glaze over hot cake .
